name: 700sqmSpacious cozy artist home, 5min fr. central!
summary: Cozy, colorful, fully furnished spacious artist studio (70+ sqm) Experience the local vibe in the heart of trendy Sheung Wan.
space: Our place is a joyful, spacious and colorful home, located on the 4th floor of a safe building with lift.  It's a great place for a couple to enjoy and the sofa allows for a third guest with no problem.  It's a happy sweet place filled with little objects we find around the world. We hope that you love this place as much as we do!
description: Cozy, colorful, fully furnished spacious artist studio (70+ sqm) Experience the local vibe in the heart of trendy Sheung Wan. Our place is a joyful, spacious and colorful home, located on the 4th floor of a safe building with lift.  It's a great place for a couple to enjoy and the sofa allows for a third guest with no problem.  It's a happy sweet place filled with little objects we find around the world. We hope that you love this place as much as we do! Entire Home Interaction with guests happens at check-in and check-out, either with us or our friendly Co-host . We are reachable by email at all times and will do our best to make sure you really enjoy your stay. Sheung Wan is one-of-a-kind.  It is a very local destination with an excellent mix of boutique restaurants and bars, distinctive affordable shopping to explore.  It is in walk-able distance to Man Mo temple, Antique Cat street and Man Wa Lane full of stalls of Chinese "chop-makers" ! The subway MTR, Airport Express Station, Ma
neighborhood_overview: Sheung Wan is one-of-a-kind.  It is a very local destination with an excellent mix of boutique restaurants and bars, distinctive affordable shopping to explore.  It is in walk-able distance to Man Mo temple, Antique Cat street and Man Wa Lane full of stalls of Chinese "chop-makers" !
notes: Strictly no smoking
transit: The subway MTR, Airport Express Station, Macau Ferry Terminals and Star Ferry is only 5 - 15 minutes away by foot, very easy to travel around during your stay. You can also easily catch a Ding Ding Tram to travel around Hong Kong island!
access: Entire Home
interaction: Interaction with guests happens at check-in and check-out, either with us or our friendly Co-host . We are reachable by email at all times and will do our best to make sure you really enjoy your stay.
house_rules: - If you plan to host a party or an event at our place, please let us know before booking. Cleaning is not included as long you keep the place clean. Or else you are entitled to pay through your deposit. Keys has payment if you lost it hk 1000. We need to change the whole lock.

host.host_about: Hi there! I am Selina, My partner and I are running our place as Airbnb as a little project with an aim to fund a local/ budding artist to stay at our place as an artist residence and to produce an art piece contributing to a bigger collection. We support artisan and your stay contribute to the artist’s funding and we will keep you update with the artworks made !

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Selina’s appartment is perfect for visiting the city. It’s really well located at the heart of Sheung Wan which means that is plenty of places to eat, have a drink... Central station is just 5-min walking so it’s very convinient to move around HK.

The appartment is very clean, bed is confortable and Selina and his friend Marie were 100% reachable if any I had doubts about the city. The place is very well decorated.

Me and my partner enjoyed a lot our stay, we really felt like home and sure we will repeat if we ever come back to HK.

Booked for my parents visit in HONG kong.Convenient location, clean place and Spacious studio. There are everything you need for travel from shower gel towel to too brush.  Very nice and responsive host of Maria and Selina.  Will definitely recommend to stay here!
Well located, comfortable and clean apartment. Some artwork and artefacts perhaps not to everyones taste but easy communciation with the hosts and a good AirBnB experience.
Fantastic place -- a real treat. HIGHLY recommended.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great apartment and amazing location. Very good and fast communication with Marie and Selina. I will definitely be back here next time I'm in HK. Thanks again.

There are so many things to say about Selinas apartment. I stayed for work and it was just perfect. The location is so handy everything was walkable for me and the mtr station is hardly a five minute walk. Fun restaurants and bars around aswell as your regular staples and grocery / convenient stores.

The apartment itself is such a delight and that’s coming from me, an interior designer. Full of beautiful art and homey decor and trinkets from their travels - to me that’s what AirBnb is about and beats a boring blank space any day of the week.
Selina herself was so helpful and responded right away.
Overall it was such a great experience and I would and hope to stay again and again and again!

Totally loved the apartment! Centrally located in Sheung Wan with easy access to public transport, elevator in the building and proximity to everything you'd need. 

The apartment was stylish and chic, with collection from travels and lush greens - rare gem in HK indeed. Kitchen is well-stocked, dining table very functional, and the large living room super cozy and comfy.

Selina and Marie are very accommodating and easy-going. Would definitely come back!

Normally one writes a quick line about a place but in this specific case I would like to make an exception. There are very few places that make you feel genuinely at home and go the extra mile in hospitality, courtesy and responsiveness. Selina does all of this. And what an incredible place. The coziness, the taste in furnishing the place, in choosing the interior design, the cleanliness, the fragrance chosen for every corner of the flat makes the experience unique. I normally am pretty hard in judging. I genuinely think this place is the best Airbnb I have ever been in. If you ladies could clone it, believe me, you would make a fortune thanks to your taste and your kindness. Best of luck and thanks for the beautiful experience!

The location is perfect! Locates in the central of Sheung Wan, 2-3 minutes walk to public transportation.
There are plenty of restaurants and bars nearby, might heard some noises at night but it’s perfectly fine when you close the windows.
The room is so clean and well designed that it’s very cozy and bright.
On one hand the room looks open and spacious; on the other hand it brings a high sense of privacy that we really love how Selina used the arts and curtains to create spaces.

Besides, Marie and Selina are flexible, replied real quick and nice that we really enjoyed communicating since the beginning. Thanks again :)

Highly recommended!!!!

I loved it ... handy and spacious for Hong Kong .. just make sure you are happy with being in Soho... it worked for me but not everybody will like the area ... 

The apartment was clean and comfortable .. I will definitely use it again

Thank you Selina and Marie for a wonderful 2 weeks stay.  Their place is very spacious and spotlessly clean.  We travelled with our 3 months old and their apartment is also kids/infant friendly.  Super central location- only a few minutes walk to The Center and 10 minutes from Central.  The flat was a little bit noisy on Christmas Eve and New Years Eve- as there are a few bars downstairs it was understandable- we had most of the windows closed- my baby slept through the night still so the noise wasn't that bad after all!

This is a cozy, conveniently located, spacious (specially for HK standards), and extremely clean apartment.
You can see the effort the hosts put in details, which is much appreciated.
I felt warmly welcomed not only to the place but to the City. Great, great hosting!
挺好的

I stayed here for 12 nights in March/April 2018, would highly recommend it. Much better than staying in a hotel which I’ve done in HK before. Great host, lovely apartment - would definitely book again!

Selina’s apartment couldn’t have been more perfect for my visit. The location is great - only a couple of minutes walk from the MTR with easy connection to the airport, and 15 minutes from the ferry piers and Central. Sheung Wan is a really interesting area to wander around, close to Man Mo Temple, quirky shops and cool street art. There’s also a lovely coffee shop a few doors down to fuel you for a day of exploring! Although there is a bar at the bottom of the apartment block, I didn’t experience any problems with noise during my mid-week stay. 
The apartment itself is very spacious for such a central location, and is stylish and unique with treasures they have collected on their own travels. The bed is comfy, and the kitchen/dining area appears to be well equipped - although I didn’t want to miss out on the fantastic food available in HK by eating in!
Selina was very quick to respond to communication, and allowed me to check in early in the morning, which was greatly appreciated. 
This is about as good as Airbnb’s get - I wouldn’t hesitate to book again when I come back to HK.
别具一格的布置,文艺风,很舒适

Loved staying here - it’s close to everything but far enough from the noisy nightlife areas. The apartment is really well sized and decorated with purpose, so it doesn’t feel like you are living in a commercial rental. And the amenities provided are really great.

This was probably one of my favorite Airbnb stays of all time.  Not only was the place perfect, but Selina was an amazing host...very responsive and full of local suggestions.  Highly recommend to anyone!

Selina's place is in a very convenient, central location. The apartment is spacious and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. There are a lot of bits and pieces around which make the apartment feel very homely. Selina was a very responsive host, and although we didn't meet her, arrival and departure was very smooth and there were numerous little notes around the apartment telling us all we needed to know. We can highly recommend Selina's place.
會推薦朋友前往出差或出遊,地點很好,房子佈置很溫馨就像自己家,兩位美女房東也貼心準備很多生活必備物...甚至還有小孩玩具,連臨時跟我一同出差的小孩都滿足,佈置的相當周全､很貼心!
Location! Super close to MTR (was easy to find, took MTR from airport to unit with no issues). Clean and spacious. Tonnes of hip cafes, hong kong style cafes and local eats.

Fabulous place, great value, bigger than the pictures make it appear, check-in was very easy, Selina was always quick to respond when needed. Excellent location - close to Sheung Wan MTR, but also very walkable to the main parts of Central.  Highly recommended!
Great location, huge place (for HK), very private, lots of good restaurant nearby.

My husband and I live in HK and were looking for a place for our anniversary staycation. I can tell you from our experience of living in this city, as well as staying in a number of airbnb's in HK, that this place is very unique in how spacious it is. The layout is one large square, with 1/2 of the space being for the comfy living room and the other half split between the bed and the dining area. There's also a small (by western standards) but completely sufficient (by Hong Kong standards) bathroom with hair dryer and toiletries. The hosts did a nice job of dividing the place with curtains that can be drawn back for light or pulled shut to partition off the different section for a more cozy feel. We enjoyed our short stay here and walked everywhere for meals, as this area of HK has a lot of cafes, eateries, and is very close to the MTR.

What a great flight in a fantastic neighbourhood that we felt right at him in (we live in Hackney, London UK). Could walk to most places we were interested in seeing and the tube was a stones throw if we wanted to use it. Love the comfortable, large open plan feel of the flat. Very clean and couldnt ask for more. Thanks for everything!

Selina’s apartment is spacious which is hard to find in Hong Kong. Thoughtful post-it notes were pasted around the place to guide guests and the amenities provided were lovely. Location was convenient too.
Had a great time in hk with a great apartment!

My husband and I came to HK during the long weekend. It was my first time visit HK and we’re glad that we stayed at Selina’s place! The apt is a  spacious studio with awesome location, it’s 3mins walk from subway and with lots of restaurants around. Selina has post-it around the apt that guide the guests to all the amendments, which we found very helpful. Highly recommended!

I had a dream stay at Selina and Marie's place. First off, the place is huge for Hong Kong standards, especially in such a central location, right next to Sheung Wan MTR! I saw the photos and previous reviews, but was still amazed. I've stayed in many hotels in HK and visited friends in their homes, and this must have been the largest private, non-commercial space I've been in! Lots of lovely touches by the hosts with tips and tricks on how to operate the shower heater, the remote controls, all the little things that make you feel more comfortable and at-home in a new space. I had a couple of friends over for dinner one of the nights I was there, and the kitchen had all the amenities needed to cook up a simple meal, and I bought groceries from a Wellcome supermarket that was walking distance from the place. The bed was comfortable. If you're finnicky about privacy or sunlight, the studio space is designed such that you'll need to draw a more-than-usual number of curtains when you go to bed. Lots of little local eateries and nice restaurants/ cafe around the neighbourhood as well - Sheung Wan is very hip. A great stay overall, reminded me why I love Airbnb. Highly recommended.

Everything you need is at her place - great location with loads of good restaurants and cafes and right next to the sharing wan station, clean and spacious place( unlike other house airbnbs and hotels), clear and thorough communication, comfy bed!! I recc highly

Selina's apartment is perfect! So much space and wonderful cosy accommodation.  The location was incredible as it was so close to Central and Soho. We enjoyed exploring this vibrant neighborhood Sheung wan with fantastic cafes and restaurants.  We will definitely be back!
This is a great apartment for a single or couple; a beautiful open space, stylishly furnished; and in a super location. Don’t hesitate — book it!

Spacious, very welcoming, organised, clean, well equipped , cool.
Will be back.

Great stay in artsy apartment in the heart of HK island. Steps away from a MTR stations which was very convenient, and also from multiple famous cheap eats in the area. Apartment was as expected, very convenient for our 3 day stay with all required amenities, and spacious for 2 guests (large kitchen and living area). Host was very responsive, and little notes around the apartment were helpful to help explain where things were kept and how they worked. Apartment decor also has a lot of character which was cool.
Great location, wonderful flat, hosts clearly go the extra mile to make you feel at home. There's planned construction in front of the building until September, just FYI :)
Will stay again

This is a 6 star airbnb in Hong Kong. The location is amazing and the house is so artsy! Selina was super easy to reach out to as well. The house has EVERYTHING a traveler needs and they all have cute post its to tell you where things are. Its pretty huge (which is a luxury in HK) and I practically just wanted to live there. The bed and sofa is super comfy too! The restroom is really clean and the shampoo smells nice. Best airbnb I’ve been in across 5 different countries with this price. Thank you ladies!! :) I’ll definitely book this place again no doubt!
The location was great. I was a solo traveler. I had easy access to a great nightlife and all that Hong Kong has to offer. The place is exactly as described. I definitely recommend this place.

A nice and cozy space with everything in it. Located nearby the MTR station, had great accessibility to major spots in Hong Kong island. Also had a large dining table, couch as well as a full-sized kitchen which were very useful.

Selina’s home was absolutely beautiful. Very well decorated and quite spacious. Extremely comfortable in a perfect location. It was an ideal place for my time in Hong Kong, and would highly recommend!

I stay at Airbnb’s a lot and this is by far the best one I have ever stayed at. The hosts were incredibly detailed and thoughtful.

The place was super open and had a great layout. Amazing location right next to transit.

Seriously stop looking at other places. You won’t regret it.
Very stylish home from home. Super clean. Very helpful hosts.
Really stylish apartment with a perfect location.

Selina’s place in Sheung Wan is superb. The decor are the most quirky and interesting I’ve seen for a long time. Also the amenities and details are very thoughtful. The location is good less than 5 mins to the tube station. A very nice stay

Location 100%
Spacious and stylish apartment with all mod cons. Much bigger than it shows on the photos.
Great bed and very quiet.
Would we stay again.... YES PLEASE.
Super host and a super apartment.
If you're looking to stay in Central/Sheung Wan, you probably will not be able to find a place as great as Selina's. Spacious, clean, lift access. Perfect.

We had a wonderful stay at Selina's Airbnb!!!

It was our first time in Hong Kong and we couldn't have picked a better place. The location is excellent with easy access to the MTR. It's also within easy walking distance to so many cool/fun areas and we really felt like we were living in the city as it's on a quaint little side street.

The apartment itself is very large and was perfect for two people but could easily accommodate a third.  It was super clean and I really loved the interior design, the plants and all of the interesting knick knacks adorning the apartment. Also, the apartment is thoughtfully marked all over with notes so that you can find/use anything that you needed.

Lastly, the hosts were really responsive and nice and I wouldn't hesitate to book this place again if we are ever lucky to be back in Hong Kong! =)

Selina’s place was beyond my expectation! Very convenient location, only 3 mins walk from the mtr station, lots of restaurants and cafes nearby. The bed sheets and towels smelled sooo good! The apartment has everything you’d need. Definitely will stay at Selina’s place again : )

Selina’s place is amazing.  The pictures are completely accurate.  Little notes around the apartment are extremely helpful and Selina was easy to communicate with the entire time.  The place was clean and well stocked.  The bed was firm but comfortable.  I will definitely try to book again the next time I am in town.

Best Airbnb i have stayed in to date:  fantastic location; large by HK standards;  linens and bedding top notch; an actual kitchen with full fridge.  The kitchen table can actually seat 6 which in HK is unbelievable.  Will stay here again if available.   Highly recommend.
Wonderful apartment in a very central location! Selina was very kind and responsive. Highly recommend!

An awesome space. So big and beautifully curated. Had everything a traveller could wish for. We used the local laundry Selina recommended - so cheap and quick. The bed was comfy and the shower was amazing. The location is perfect. There’s a great coffee place just down the street (Coffee Roastery Lab) who make the best coffee. Would highly recommend. Many thanks to Selina for letting us check in early. Much appreciated.

This place is so good, even better than expected. Perfect location, huge open space, everything you can think of is already there and the hosts are super responsive. Even let us check in early as we landed in the morning. We wanted to extend but was already booked. Highly recommend! And will def stay here next time in Hong Kong!

Selina's place is a cool NYC-style loft, I especially loved the art pieces and decor they placed in the apartment. While being an open space loft, the space actually compartmentalized pretty well. Selina left clear instructions within the apartment, so you would have no trouble finding the necessities. The apartment is located in the middle of everything, full of local and international food. It is also very close to the MTR station, and walking distance to the Soho area. I will definitely stay again!

What a little gem. Great location, a large and spacious studio by any standard. 

Great base to explore HK. Better than any 5 star hotel if you are looking for a homely stay.

Light filled and well composed apartment space that had everything you might need. Close to MTR, tram and buses plus local shops and restaurants. It was very clean and communication was great. Would stay again, thanks for having me!
有回家的感觉｡
A lovely place in Hong Kong, love it.
The place is very well located, nice thoughtful touches on the property and very clean. It was a very short stay but in my personal opinion one of the best Airbnb I stayed so far in Hong Kong.

I've done a few Airbnbs in HK (and around the world) and this place absolutely nails it! amazing location, great communication with Selina, awesome apartment - so good that I almost don't want to leave a good review so that this gem gets less known . JK! amazing stay! thanks for all!

Amazing, stylish and super spacious apartment in a fantastic, hip Hong Kong location. A little bit of noise on Friday and Saturday nights from the bars in Jervois Street, but that didn't really bother me. There is also a bit of a priapic preoccupation in the decor, which may not be to everyone's taste, but its a very cool and roomy space for Hong Kong, and extremely comfortable. Selina is very responsive and the check-in and check-out are very straightforward.

Seline is a very responsive host and the house is like what it’s described,  the direction to the house is clear and check in was easy, and we were especially impressed by all the clear and warm instructions in the house which made our stay easy and comfy. The house itself is well furnished with everything you need, the location, though it was a bit noisy from the streets at night, but on the other it means it’s near everything, local wet markets,  cafe and restaurants, galleries and museums are all within walking distances. I would recommend this place to people who visit Hong Kong.

Wonderful location. 1 min to the MTR and all kind of transportation. Close to all kind of shopping and restaurant from 3 stars Michelin and local and international cuisine. A really pleasant and usual big apartment for Hong Kong standard. Really good value for its price. Thank you for a lovely stay.

The apartment was very stylish and had great space.  Everything from the common area, bed, kitchen, and bathroom were very clean and well organized.  Selina had very helpful post-its around to label and describe everything.  Selina was incredibly helpful in communication of offering to receive train tickets for us, and for accommodating us in a last minute change to stay an extra night.  Great location as well, and felt safe on the 4th floor.

Great stay! Very close to public transit and central station is within walking distance. A lot of great restaurants and shops within walking distance. Place was very clean and spacious - would love to stay here again! Selina was very responsive.

Great place and even better location. The apartment is MASSIVE for HK standard and it's tastefully done (though the decor may not be children-friendly...I'm not complaining). 2 mins to MTR and 10-15 min walking to Central and Hong Kong MTR station which is where the Airport Express ends. Will 100% recommend and book again if I were to return to HK.
Great stay! Not really babyproof but location was soooooo wonderful
房间精心布置,设施齐全,房东非常热情｡离地铁站很近,吃饭和出行都很方便｡

This is an amazing apartment in Hong Kong! If you want a truly Hong Kong experience in a spacious and cool apartment, this is the place. The location is great, easy walking distance to lots of sights and right near Sheung Wan MTR. The space is huge and easy to settle into for a longer stay - it really felt like home. It’s clean, functional and has lots of little touches to make it feel comfortable. Selina and Marie are very helpful and responsive. I would happily stay here again.

name: Close to park and sea: Light and airy family apt
summary: My renovated 1930's apartment is in a family friendly block of 4 apartments. It is light and airy, has wooden floors, plantation shutters, a second toilet and bifold doors off the kitchen leading out to a garden deck with a lounge and BBQ. It is calm and relaxing and best suited to families looking for a quiet holiday. Everyone seems to enjoy being here, so I hope you do too.
space: My apartment is my sanctuary and much loved home. The apartment is on the first floor and has one set of stairs leading up to the doorway. It has period features including high and decorated ceilings, and lead light windows. The master bedroom has a queen bed and through a door, to the sunroom and study. The sunroom/study has one single bed. The second bedroom, is my son's bedroom and has a King Single bed with Single trundle.  Further down the hall to the rear of the building is the recently renovated and refurbished living area and kitchen. The kitchen opens out through bi fold doors to the outdoor verandah, with outdoor seating a BBQ and a leafy outlook. Please note this apartment is best suited to families, not groups of adults.
description: My renovated 1930's apartment is in a family friendly block of 4 apartments. It is light and airy, has wooden floors, plantation shutters, a second toilet and bifold doors off the kitchen leading out to a garden deck with a lounge and BBQ. It is calm and relaxing and best suited to families looking for a quiet holiday. Everyone seems to enjoy being here, so I hope you do too. My apartment is my sanctuary and much loved home. The apartment is on the first floor and has one set of stairs leading up to the doorway. It has period features including high and decorated ceilings, and lead light windows. The master bedroom has a queen bed and through a door, to the sunroom and study. The sunroom/study has one single bed. The second bedroom, is my son's bedroom and has a King Single bed with Single trundle. neighborhood_overview: Randwick is a large suburb in Sydney's prestigious eastern suburbs and has many notable landmarks including the famous Randwick race course, large university campus, lively and family friendly cafe and restaurant scene, state of the art hospitals and surrounded by the large Centennial Park on one side and the beachside suburbs to the east. Approximately 6-9kms to the CBD, it is well connected by public transport and the perfect base for exploring Sydney.
transit: The 339 Bus Stop is at the end of the block. City bound it will take you to Central Railway, the CBD, Circular Quay and to the steps of the Harbour Bridge. There is a path to walk across the Bridge, and catch a ferry back to Circular Quay. Or catch the 339 beach bound to Clovelly Beach, just a 10 minute bus ride down the hill.  The apartment is walking distance to: - 10 minute walk to Westfield across Queens Park - 5 minute walk to Centennial Park - 10 minute walk to Royal Randwick Shopping Centre - 10 minute walk to Frenchmans Road and the cafes and restaurants there The local 400 bus goes from Bondi Junction to UNSW.
interaction: Our Hosts from AirButler will give you your key and tell you all you need to know about your stay and also guide you to anything you need in the local area. They will also be available to contact for any issues that might arise during your stay.
house_rules: We ask that you treat the apartment as you would your own home.  Absolutely no smoking in the apartment, on the outside terrace or anywhere on the grounds of the apartment block.  Please be mindful of the other tenants in the block.  We are all friends and hope to keep the harmonious atmosphere.

reviews.comments: Very nice and great location!!!

A stunning home in a lovely location, three minutes away from a bus stop taking you directly into the city of Sydney or to one of the many picturesque beaches under ten minutes away and Queens Park at the end of the street. There are also plenty of cafes in the area which do lovely breakfasts and coffees.
It was an amazing place to take the family, we could not have felt more at home.

Ronda' house was our little home away from home.  The decor was beautiful and the apartment was spotless with everything there that we could possible need.  Ronda was great and went above and beyond leaving beach chairs and umbrella out for us.  The price for such a great location was fantastic for our family of 5.  We will be back.

name: #5 ECONOMIC 5 PAX FLAT
summary: 60 sqm. with two bedrooms each with it's own bathroom and shower. Location is within 10 minutes to all main historical attractions and sultanahmet center. SULTANAHMET, CEMBERLITAS TRAM STATIONS and CATLADIKAPI BUS STOP is about 10 minutes walk distance  It is in a quite and safe neighborhood. Public park and private parking lot with extra charge is at the sight. Wedenesday's farmers' market takes place within only 5 minutes walk. Two major parks with playgrounds for children is 5minutes away.
description: 60 sqm. with two bedrooms each with it's own bathroom and shower. Location is within 10 minutes to all main historical attractions and sultanahmet center. SULTANAHMET, CEMBERLITAS TRAM STATIONS and CATLADIKAPI BUS STOP is about 10 minutes walk distance  It is in a quite and safe neighborhood. Public park and private parking lot with extra charge is at the sight. Wedenesday's farmers' market takes place within only 5 minutes walk. Two major parks with playgrounds for children is 5minutes away.

host.host_about:
Hi There, My name is Omar  Farouq Tekin and I'm the owner of SUFI APART SUITES. I was born and raised till university in central Turkish town of URGUP which widely known as CAPPADOCIA. Being from this spectacular land of nature and history and as a member of a family which now for three generations dealing in art works and antiquties has helped me to built an esthetic understanding for interior decoration, thanks to this I was able to give unique touches  to my apartments in order to cheer up my guests' not only accomodation comfort but visual taste as well.
As a husband, a Father and a constant traveller, I have the ability of foreseeing A travellers' concerns. Therefor I always take necessary  measures in order to provide utmost safety and comfort. 
My main field of interests are philosophy, history, nature, art and the anthropology. I consider myself as a very lucky person since  I've been  living and  working in places which helped  to enjoy and develop my fieslds of interest on daily basis. Oh and yes definately Culinary as well :-))) I LOOOVE to cook and am a sea food expert as well, so if you care about fine local food too then you are in the right place my friend. Just ask me  or even better, Join me! :-)
I am hoping to see you all in my place to exchange cultural knowledge and have woderful friendships with sweet memories.
WITH ALL MY BEST WISHES TO YOU
OMAR FAROUQ TEKIN.

reviews.comments:
Farouq is an excellent host, when we arrived he showed us places where we can eat, shop, and different ways to arrive home. 
The apartment is beautiful, two bedrooms, two bathrooms, one kitchen, small but independent and has everything you need. It was also very clean. 
You can always find Farouq by (Hidden by Airbnb) , he helps you with every question. 
The apartment is in a good location, close to the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia and other interesting points. 
The wifi is not so good. 
Thanks for everything, magic city.
Clean and pleasant accommodation. Well located to visit many monuments.
Excelente lugar y servicios. Cerca de lugares históricos, restaurantes y transporte público.
We had a great vacation and Farouq is very good host. the apartment is clean and very welcoming. We recommend.

The perfect combination. Price and quality. The apartment is clean and comfortable. The location is excellent. A picturesque authentic area. 10 minutes to Sultanahmet. In the quarter where the apartment prices in restaurants are lower than in tourist places. Nearby great places. Excellent breakfast in Ziya Baba Turk Mutfagi.Inexpensive and tasty hookah in Reggae BR Shot & Food. Farouq quickly answers and solves the problems.

name: FANTASTIC APARTMENTS, LUX RESIDENCE
summary: Our apartments furnished with lux furnitures and only designed for guests. 1 bedroom with queen bed and 1 living room with sofa and included kitchen. Kitchen equipped with necessary kitchen equipments and in bathroom available bathroom materials. Location is easy to reach to airport and city center. Just 5 mins away from metrobus station.
description: Our apartments furnished with lux furnitures and only designed for guests. 1 bedroom with queen bed and 1 living room with sofa and included kitchen. Kitchen equipped with necessary kitchen equipments and in bathroom available bathroom materials. Location is easy to reach to airport and city center. Just 5 mins away from metrobus station.

reviews.comments: Güzel ve huzurlu bir yer tavsiye ederim konaklamayi düşünucek insanlara . Beautiful and peaceful house. Lady rasha very nice person , I would recommended stay .

name: Wonderful Color blends Studio Square Victoria!

Alejandro.

French doors lead out from the bedroom to the terrace, letting the outside in Guest bedroom with wooden floors and high ceilings Third bedroom is a child's paradise with tee pee tent and plenty of kids toys Fourth bedroom available with cot and/or single bed Upstairs terrace leading off the third and fourth bedroom - great for an afternoon snooze in the sun! neighborhood_overview: Situated one block back from the famous Manly Beach, this impressive residence combines beach side and luxury living at its best. Manly is the only place to be during Sydney's summer, with it's unlimited beaches, swimming spots, bars, restaurants and activities for all ages. From this family home everything Manly has to offer is on your doorstep - you just need to put on your flip flops and go! If your adventures take you further than Manly, access to the rest of Sydney couldn't be easier with the ferry wharf being a ten minute walk away. Traveling by boat is the best way to get around in Sydney and from Manly Wharf you can get ferries to Circular Quay, Watson's Bay, Darling Harbour and Taronga Zoo. Closer to home the newly built ' Andrew Boy Charlton' swimming pool complex is a few minutes walk away where you will find a 50m pool, a 25m pool, kiddies play pool and steam room/sauna. This property will allow you to embrace everything that Manly, the Northern Beaches and Sydney has to of
notes: For the comfort and health and safety of our guests, all properties are supplied with 5 star hotel linen and towels that is professionally laundered.  Guests will be charged $44 per bed which is to be paid prior to gaining access to the property. We will call you to take this payment after you have booked the property.
access: When you book through Property Providers you are booking with a professional property management agency rather than an individual homeowner or personal host.  Key collection/return for the property will be from our offices which are located at 3/526 Sydney Road, Seaforth, NSW 2092 unless otherwise agreed at the time of booking.  Standard check in time is from 3pm and check out is 10am unless agreed otherwise in writing.
interaction: Our offices are open Monday - Friday 8.30-5.30 and we have a phone number that you can call 24 hours a day 7 days a week in case of emergencies - this number will be given to you when you come to pick up keys or can be found on our website.
house_rules: - Bookings made through Air B and B are subject to Property Providers terms and conditions as displayed on the Property Providers' website.  Payment of your deposit constitutes acceptance of our terms and conditions.  If you wish to see our T&Cs before booking please ask or look them up on the website. On key collection we will require a copy of your ID and a valid credit card.  These documents are held securely and will be destroyed after you depart.

reviews.comments: Cet appartement est parfaitement situé, facilement accessible et très propre, très calme et bien chauffé l'hiver, on y trouve toutes les commodités et les éléments nécessaires à notre confort. Ivonne est une personne accueillante, disponible et très réactive. À refaire avec plaisir

Impeccable
Identique au photos
A clean, new, beautifully designed space with delightful hosts. Stay here

Ivonne's place was clean and beautiful and I had the place to myself, which was great. She had an alarm system so I felt safe and it was easy to check-in. Location was great, in the middle of the Plateau. The only issue, which was quite disappointing is that her place did not provide wifi although it said on the website said that it was part of the amenities. It was also annoying that she did not warn me of this and that it took her quite a while to tell me and I had to text and ask her multiple times about it before she told me that it had been cut off. This was frustrating for me since I was there apartment hunting and thus was dependent on wifi for this. She also stated she would reimburse me for this but still has not yet and it has been a few weeks now. I understand she was travelling at the time but I would have at least appreciated better communication about this. If there were not issues with the wifi or communication, I wouldn't have any more complaints about her place.

Ivonne’s place is in a centralized area in a small gated sub community in the city. The gates, keyless locks, and security alarm add an extra layer of security. It was easy to access buses/trains and local taxis. There are also endless amount of place to eat, grab dessert, or grab a drink in the area.  The place is modern and clean. The bed is extra firm and pillows are really soft, so that’s something to keep in mind. There are two small windows in the room, but because of their high location they can’t be opened for light/air. 
I did not get a chance to meet 

Ivonne because she was on vacation during my stay. However, she is fairly responsive via text. 
Also, be sure to clarify amenities with Ivonne prior to your check-in, there was no wi-fi or cable tv as listed in her apartment amenities. She also didn’t have the apartment cleaned till the second day I was there. She did state it was due to a call out on the cleaners behalf, but she failed to leave me instructions for where I could find bedding/towels in the meantime. Luckily, I just  opened the room door closest, and I saw extra sheets and towels.  
After all said and done, Ivonne did offer me a small amount off for the lack of initial cleanliness and lack of WiFi and tv in the apartment, but her attitude was a bit nonchalant in general, which pissed me off initially.

Endroit paisible 
Très près des commodités 
Beau condo

Ivonne's place is the place that you are looking for, very modern, air conditioning is huge bonus, specially when we know how humid and hot in  Montreal in July. And also you want the perfect location which I would call it French quartier where you want to be in the summer. There is only one downside which the internet, with the internet it would be 5 stars place. Would I stay there another time, Big yes and definitely.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
