The bedroom, is also huge with a queen size bed and floor to ceiling windows that look out to the city of Manhattan with clear views of

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hello new Friends! I am a creative director in Advertising and I love having guests come and stay. I hope you enjoy what you see.

reviews.comments: Russell's place was in a great location right in the heart of Williamsburg. The place was really clean and looked even better than the pictures show.

Great location in a great NYC neighbourhood - it was fun soaking Williamsburg's atmosphere right there. Also, getting to Manhattan was very easy - 2 subway lines are less than 10 minutes away, plus you can always take Brooklyn's water taxi. Thanks, Russell, you were a great host and I can absolutely recommend your place!

Russell's apartment has everything you could possibly need for a stint in the uber cool area of Williamsburg, it's literally on the doorstep of everything, yet it's very quiet, has a stunning roof terrace and the most amazing views over the Williamsburg Bridge and Manhattan - you might never need to leave!

Dealing with Russell from making the booking to checking out was easy and a pleasure.

I'd definitely recommend a stay at Williamsburg's finest!

Wir hatten alle Informationen zum Beziehen der Wohnung rechtzeitig zur Verfügung. Die Wohnung war ganz in unserem Stil, modern, offen aber trotzdem zum Wohlfühlen.
Alles war sauber und funktionierte perfekt.

Great location and a fantastic place! The apartment is located within a 10 minute stroll from the Bedford Ave L stop; as mentioned in the ad there are endless choices for restaurants, bars, live music and shops. 

The place itself is as listed -- very stylishly decorated with fantastic views over lower Manhattan and the Williamsburg Bridge. You can also access the buildings rooftop. Bed was very comfy and we also used the fold-out in the lounge which was great. 

Russell was a great host. He left detailed instructions on how to access the property -- it was all very secure and thorough. The apartment was cleaned upon our arrival with plenty of towels and extra sheets. We didn't take him up on neighbourhood recommendations as we know the area but he was very willing to help! 

All in all a great AirBnb experience, and would highly recommend this property to anyone looking for a stylish and central Williamsburg location.

We had never used Airbnb before (despite hearing about it everywhere) so when we decided to go to New York for NYE we thought we would give the site a go. As the first apartment we had rented from the site I have to say it couldn't have been better.

The flat itself is very stylish, clean and has incredible views of the city. The photos don't actually do it justice! Entry to the apartment itself was made really easy and we were also given the code for the wifi, which is always a bonus when abroad. 

The area is amazing. Having always stayed in Manhattan when travelling to New York, we didn't know what to expect from Brooklyn, but Williamsburg is fantastic and we will be going back to stay in the area again. The apartment is in a perfect location, in easy reach of Bedford Avenue where all the main amenities are. Russell was also kind enough to give us a list of bars and restaurants to try around the area, which proved to be very helpful. 

Russell was a brilliant host and was very flexible to our needs given we had to leave quite late on the return journey home. 

Would definitely go back and also recommend to friends and family!

Great location, love the neighborhood !
Russell was a great host. Many thanks. N

We had a wonderful stay at Russell's place! His flat is decorated with great taste, very comfortable- even for 4 people - the view on Manhattan skyline is breathtaking, the location is ideal - close to so many cool restaurants, cafes and stores at the heat of Williamsburg - we simply loved it and want to come back in springtime, as it should be even nicer , enabling us to enjoy his terrace. Russell was very helpful, super reactive to any of our questions and requests. Definitely highly recommended! Thanks Russell, Marie and family

The apartment is nice, spacious and stylish, in a great location close to local restaurants and bars, and 10 minutes walk from the nearest subway station.

The living area is comfortable, well lit, with a good TV and fast internet connection.

The balcony has a good view on Manhattan skyline, and might be really enjoyable in warmer days.

Kitchen and Bathroom are well equipped, and the smaller bedroom was comfortable.
 
Disregarding the bit of inconvenience during check in and key pickup, and the miss-communication regarding the apartment smoking policy, Russell has been a great host, keeping his place in great condition and helpful in providing recommendations for the nearby attractions, and I believe we managed to settle all differences properly and smoothly.

It has been an overall pleasant stay.
The reservation was canceled 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Russell's place is gorgeous and optimally located -- one short subway stop away from Manhattan.  The apartment is filled with natural light and is clean, artfully appointed, and well cared for.  It is, seemingly, at the epicenter of great food in Brooklyn.  We especially loved The Heyward.  The Smorgasburg (Saturday food flea market) was close by.

The shower, WiFi, TV, heat / fan and appliances all worked and were easy to deploy.  Building trash and recycling were steps away from the apartment door.

Russell made key pick-up super easy.

It was a true pleasure spending ten days in a beautifully curated, clean, well-functioning and perfectly located home away from home.
Nice open and light apartment. There is smell of tobacco smoke in the apartment, most disturbing in the bed pillows. Great view to Empire State at night

Great apartment in one of the best neighbourhood of NY.
Extremely nice terrasse with a nice view.
Russell has been extremely helpful.
Highly recommended.

Russell's place was absolutely amazing.  The patio/deck was awesome and had a stunning view.  The apartment and apartment complex seemed very new.  It was clean and decorated nicely.  The gym was a really nice feature.  It was a bit dusty, but reasonably so since the apartment complex seemed brand new.

The location of the apartment was also perfect.  So close to a ton of great bars and restaurants.

Frankly, everything about our staying went perfectly. The flat and neighborhood is exactly as described if not better. Russell was extremely informative on how to access the flat and provided practical information on places to eat and check out. Highly recommend this place!!!

Beautiful apartment full of light, in the center of Williamsburg about a 10 minute walk to the subway and very quiet for nyc. Russell isn't a great communicator but he has a really nice apartment. He said we can leave the luggage on check-out-day but changed his mind only the night before. To find the key with his description was a bit adventurous, the internet didn't work and wasn't fixed but we did get the neighbour's password, so all good in the end.

The apartment was wonderful! It was beautifully furnished and very comfortable. It was clean and it had the loveliest huge terrace with tables for 6+ and two great chaises! Plenty of dishes and wine glasses! The views especially at night are wonderful. You can walk to so many restaurants and the subway isn't far at all. You can also park your car very near or even outside the building. Williamsburg is much quieter than Manhattan! Will go back and stay there again!

Russell's place is great!  It's in the perfect location of Williamsburg with plenty of great coffee shops, bars, restaurants and shops just a few blocks away.  The massive terrace with views of Manhattan is an added bonus.

Het appartement is smaakvol ingericht. En het zit in een geweldig leuke buurt met goede restaurants en winkels. Het is een relatief nieuw appartement waar je je snel thuis zult voelen. Opvallend vonden wij dat ondanks het feit dat het een nieuw gebouw is, de isolatie te wensen overlaat. Geen groot probleem. Maar in de zomer wordt het er snel warm. Maar het prachtige dakterras biedt dan uitkomst! Absolute aanrader voor een ontspannen weekend New York / Brooklyn

The location of Russels place is great.  It is very close to food, shopping and transportation and the apartment was well appointed.  The sleeping accommodation in the living room is quite small.  It was fine for our two teenagers but wouldn't be great for 2 adults.  Communication regarding finding the place and getting the keys could have been better.

Great apartment, great location. Very easy check in / check out. 

Thanks Russell!

Perfect base for Williamsburg - great host, amazing apartment, exciting neighbourhood. Some special NYC experiences within surrounding blocks, a chic and trouble-free base to stay, and a discreet host. It delivers what it promises - the best!

The description is far from the reality! A very nice apartment in an amazing borough. Huge terrace, apartment super neat and clean. Very simple to get the keys and Russel will provide you with many tips about Williamsburg. Many thanks Russel for this week

Russell's apartment was beautiful. The furniture was amazing and the apartment had all of the comforts of home. It is in a lovely building with very friendly neighbors. The bed was literally the most comfortable I have ever slept in from the pillows to the sheets, to the comforter. I even wrote down the brand names to find some myself! The neighborhood was absolutely perfect. It is located in a great spot, we walked everywhere and I didn't even want to go into Manhattan. We would stay here very time we visit if possible!

We had a wonderful stay at Russell's place in Williamsburg. The apartment is gorgeous and exactly as described and pictured. We had three people staying there comfortably. Plenty of sheets and towels. Beautiful and in an awesome location. Russell was very responsive. And getting into the apartment was super easy.

Once again, staying at Russell's was great. There was a little miscommunication with his cleaning help, as she went to his other air Bnb instead of this one. We explained the situation to Russell, describing that the place was somewhat messy when we arrived. He was extremely apologetic and the cleaning help came right away.

Thus, Russell is extremely accommodating and accessible, as he is quick to respond.  Again, the place is absolutely lovely. The rooftop and location are prime.

Magnifique séjour chez Russell, qui est très réactif et a l'écoute de ses hôtes . La terrasse et la vue sont absolument géniales! Et l'appartement est fidèle à la description, bien équipé, très récent et parfaitement situé.
(Un peu juste pour 4.)
Williamsburg est idéal pour visiter NY
Russell was very on top of it and wrote a great list of recommendations in the area.  The apartment was beautiful and immaculate.  I will definitely look to stay here again in the future!

Apartment was amazing, great location, and in 30 degree heat the balcony was a god send. Everything you might need is provided in the apartment and it feels really big and spacious with a quality feel. Russell was a perfect communicator and all instructions were accurate and clear. We loved Williamsburg and we had the best view of manhattan, I wouldn't stay anywhere else!
Awesome! Nice apt. Nice neighborhood. Nice view. Can walk to the L train. Tons of good food around. I would stay again for sure.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Russell´s apartment was great, just as the pictures show it. It is 0 minutes to the metros stop, which is only one stop away from Manhattan. The instructions to get into the place were simple and easy. However, when we arrived, the apartment had not yet been cleaned. I tried calling Russell but had no immediate response. Sent an email and he responded quite quickly, and in the afternoon someone very nice came by to clean the place. A couple more things, the terrace is awesome, but shared with the adjoining apartment. And for people travelling in a larger group (not just one couple) the bathroom is en suite, inside the bedroom, something that might be uncomfortable for some people. All in all, the apartment was a great experience. Wifi worked great, cable TV also. All the appliances were top of the line.
Russell's place was in a great location! Short walk to the L line and close to awesome shops, food, etc. made this place a perfect fit. Great views of midtown as well from the deck.
Great location, well designed and accurate listing

Russell has a perfectly spotless, guest friendly apartment, with a patio that includes a pretty terrific view.  We were quite comfortable staying there. The place looks exactly like the photo, and the bed was wonderfully comfortable too, which helped us get enough rest to keep playing while we visited Brooklyn.  

During out short, two night visit, we explored the neighborhood shopping, and dining. We were delighted to find a cosy place to dine called Juliette which had some fantastic wine and tasty tapas. Our second night, after enjoying dinner at Brasserie Witlof we saw the Book of Mormon musical in Manhattan, and ended our Saturday night by checking out Radegast Hall & Biergarten. Sunday morning we investigated Mimosa for brunch, and had some delicious bites to go with our cappuccinos. All in all, a wonderful visit.

Thank you Russell!

This was one of my absolute favorite Airbnb experiences to date! The photos on here do not do this apartment justice. It is an incredibly stunning space with killer views from the balcony and rooftop. The energy of the apartment is so wonderful too, Russell was an incredible host and even though I did not get to meet him, my stay was absolutely perfect! Thank you Russell!
Awesome apartment- great location!
The apartment is very nicely done.  The host was responsive when we had questions.  I would stay here again.

This place is great! Looked exactly as pictured. Location was awesome. Great park on the water nearby. Grocery/bodega directly across the street and we were able to park right in front of the apartment the entire stay. Subway was a quick walk away through a super cute area. Lots of food options nearby. LOVED IT! Will be back and highly recommend.

Das Appartement hat eine super Lage und tolle Aussicht. Wir hatten mit 3 Personen eine tolle Zeit in Brooklyn. Auch die Lage ist sehr gut. Die Subway ist schnell zu erreichen sowie der Fahrradverleih Citybike. Wir kommen gerne wieder.
Very nice comfortable apartment it does exactly what it says on the description
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Best apartment, best host, best value
Clean comfortable and convenient. Would definitely recommend this place. Wish we were able to take advantage of the great deck!
Fantastic views across the river to Manhattan, easy 10 minute walk to the L train, tons of nice bars and restaurants within a few blocks, clean and comfortable, well-designed apartment.

We had the best time staying in Russell's apartment !!  It looked exactly like the photos.  Beautiful views of the NYC skyline from both rooms!!  Everything we needed and check in and payment process were seamless!!  Love, love this place .
We will be back hopefully sooner than later.
Clean place. Nice neighborhood. No issues.
Great place. Exactly as pictured. Easy check in. Great location. No complaints.

Place was great and just as he described.  Great location, close to L train, Bedford street with great restaurants and bars.  Great grocery store literally 3 blocks away.  Easy to uber back and forth to the city.  

Great place and great host.  Awesome views of the city.  Would definitely recommend.

Nice place with a fantastic view. Loved the proximity to Blue Bottle, the L train, and so many great bars and restaurants. The neighborhood is one of my favorites, and the beds were really comfortable.

Russell's apartment was spectacular! The bed was comfortable, the views were great, and it was the perfect location! Definitely recommend this to anyone traveling to Williamsburg and hope to be back soon!

We were blown away by Russell's apartment. Check in was easy and were were happy that there was a lift in the building. The place is also child friendly and we were lucky enough to have been sharing the outdoor area with a lovely family so our daughters could play together. We were absolutely in love with the neighbourhood as well and would never stay in Manhattan again. Russell's apartment is a short stroll (no more than 10 mins) to the Bedford Ave subway and it's only a few stops to Manhattan. We also walked down to the ferry and caught that into Manhattan. Just loved the area and were so sad to leave. There is also a great supermarket down the road and it seemed like a perfectly safe area. We also loved the Mexican restaurant downstairs from Russell's apartment. Parking was also fine and there is a kids playground nearby. Will be back for sure.

We had a great stay at Russel's place. Our arrival went very smoothly and the place itself was spotless. We had everything we needed and were very close to the subway. We booked very last minute and Russel was very accommodating and quick to get back with us. Would stay here again!

Russell was a very welcoming host and he gave lots of great recommendations for things to do during my stay. The flat was absolutely perfect. We had beautiful sunshine on most of the days which meant we used the awesome roof terrace a lot and the view was spectacular at night time. I would highly recommend this flat for anyone staying in Williamsburg, there are tons of restaurants, bars and shops close by and the subway into Manhattan is a short walk away. I will definitely be staying here again when I go back to New York!
The flat comes as described. Very well laid out and has everything you need for a great time. Russell was very helpful and prompt in his communications. A good time was had by all.
Stayed here before and will again. Great apartment in a great location. Easy arrival and good communication. Clean and well-appointed. Great location in Williamsburg.

It was a great experience to stay in Russels loft. Everything was perfect like the description. Speechless terrace with the view to Empire State. Nice neighborhood with a lot of good restaurants and bars. 5min walk to the subway with fast access to Manhattan. The in and out was a pleasure with Russels communication. All in all its not going better. We hope to come back next year. Uli.

Russell - was a helpful host w answering all our questions. The location and the neighborhood are excellent. Great restaurants, wine shop, cheese shop, music venues all walking distances. The apartment is just like it looks in the pictures, amazing. Very clean with everything you need provided. I highly recommend this for your next visit to Williamsburg. I plan on returning to this beautiful apartment.

Great nieghborhood. Location is perfect distance to restaurants, bars, etc without being right on top of it. Very enjoyable stay. Loved his sound system w his iPod qued up (good taste in music). Apartment was as listed. No surprises. Great deck. Would recommend.
Had the best time in nyc. The apartment was clean and had the most amazing view. The host was great and informative as well. Over all great time.
Amazing place! Russell was a great host and we will definitely be back. Apartment was absolutely amazing!
All perfect. Much attention to detail .
Great apartment just as advertised. Good communication even from traveling abroad.
Russell's place was amazing! Such a great location, such a great spot. Would 100% stay there again

This place is exactly as pictured. It was fantastic with a great view. Modern fixtures, style and appliances. Very comfortable bed and enough room in the place for four of us. Plenty of amenities including sheets and towels. The patio balcony was easily accessible and fully furnished. Perfect for watching the sunset over the city. Rooftop access was a plus. In a good neighborhood - in walking distance to many restaurants, shops and the subway! Would highly recommend and would stay there again!
Bright, clean and comfortable apartment in an excellent location in Williamsburg. New building and a great terrace off the living room. Would recommend!

Super smooth apartment. Perfect off Bedford location with hotel suite style accommodation. Private rooftop served us well too. Great and relaxed communication with russel. Worth the money for an upscale Airbnb.
Amazing penthouse in the hearth of Williamsbug. My family loved it, especially the balcony. It is huge and the view is beautiful. Russ was a great host, and responded to our calls right away.

Fantastic place! Genuinely couldn't ask for more - Russell was a great host, really hospitable with great recommendations and quick to come back with any queries, and the view from the rooftop is absolutely incredible. Thank you

Russel's place was exactly as listed. Very clean and had all the amenities one may need on their stay away from home. Very well located in the Williamsburg neighborhood. He was also very accommodating and helpful when I was inquiring about my stay at his place. Will definitely be back!

We had an absolutely wonderful time staying here. Everything was as advertised if not better. The house is fully equipped for weary travellers like us with fresh towels, disposable plates , shower gels etc. Made life very easy. The location was perfect and the neighbourhood amazing. Can't say enough good things about the place and we will def be back to stay. Big love. Karan and Liza x

Wow — what a beautiful home smack dab in the middle of Williamsburg. Russell was very accommodating and flexible as we made somewhat of an eleventh hour reservation. The apartment was in impeccable shape and all appliances, plumbing, A/C were working perfectly. The check-in process was seamless as Russell is very thorough with his directions. The space receives beautiful, natural light throughout the day and the apartment has a one-of-a-kind terrace with a clear view of Midtown. My stay was very comfortable and I'd highly recommend that others consider this space if/when visiting New York City. Thanks so much, Russell!
The deck is amazing!   Love the place.   Couldn't have been happier.
Love Russell's place. The interior design, the neighbourhood and everything. If I must say, this apartment is almost what my dream house looks like.

Fantastic apartment that was perfect for us and 2 kids. Had everything we needed to feel at home in New York, and being blessed with good weather we were able to make the most of the terrace and amazing views. As first time Airbnb'ers we were very impressed and won't be staying in hotels in the future!
A fabulous flat in a gorgeous neighborhood. The views of Manhattan  are spectacular, the flat safe and enjoyable to be in and we were so pleased to be staying in Williamsburg.
Russell was extremely helpful when I had accidentally locked the keys in the apartment. His apartment is beautiful and well-kept, and lived up to all expectations. Highly recommend.
This was a truly beautiful apartment in a prime location. I live in Brooklyn and rented the place for my parents who were visiting, it was perfect. Thank you Russell.
Loved this place, one of my favourites places on Airbnb so far.
Great as always! The location is perfect and the rooftop view can't be beat.
Great location, view was wonderful, big & comfortable room

Russel's place is a chic, modern apartment in a hip neighborhood. It's well appointed with a full kitchen, washer and dryer and a modern, clean bathroom. Great location, close to restaurants, bars and subway to manhattan. We had a great time!

I stayed here for 5 nights and loved it! Amazing neighbourhood, so much to see and do. Great restaurants, shops amazing breakfast at Egg two blocks down and so much great Street art to explore all around Berry Street (if that's your thing) Also if you want to explore of Brooklyn your just 5 minutes from L line and two metro stops from union square 14th St which we found a great starting point for exploring more of New York. Chelsea and Highline area are easily accessible also using the  metro. Beautiful apartment, great communication, zero hassle check in/out and so clean, comfortable and stylish with great views. To sum it up we will be back.
Fantastic place!

The flat is like a paradise in Williamsburg: lovely views from the terraze (it was sknowing), HI-FI sound with a extraordinary selection of music, a super confort king size bed, and cool soap in the bathroom. You also have a small gym. All you need to enjoy is relax.

Russell's place is fantastic.  Very clean, modern, well stocked with kitchen utensils, very comfortable bed.   The neighborhood is also great as close to public transportation, it was very easy to get around.  This was one of my favorite apartments in NY.
Great apartment, great location, exactly as pictured.
Russell's place is modern, cozy and clean. It has everything you need and is located in a great Brooklyn area. Easy access to public transit and tons of bars, restaurants and shops.

Russell's place better then pictures, huge deck right off apartment with awesome views from in and outside. Cambridge is really the best spot to be in to visit NYC but still have a all you need right outside your front door..really good restaurants in walking distance. Would definite look up his place again for our next visit.
The location and views are great! A short walk to the subway. So many restaurants and bars nearby. It was a good size for three of us.
Had a great time in this flat with a friend. Very well located and super nice!
Russell's appartement is perfectly located in Williamsburg and was the ideal place to visit New York during 5 days. I highly recommend it. Thanks Russell for your flexibility !
Great place! Excellent communication.

I've visited NYC on many occasions, and in my experience, Russell's penthouse is one of the best Airbnb places to stay in the city. It's very much as he has described and shown in his photos—though I was pleasantly surprised to find it larger that it appears. It's very well furnished, has an unusually large terrace, and the view of Manhattan is a bonus. The surrounding neighborhood is vibrant and thriving. Russell was easy to reach to answer my questions. No problems. No hassles. It was all good. Two thumbs up!

Great apartment in a fantastic location. Roof deck is gorgeous with stunning views of the city (it is shared with another apartment but it's huge). Russell is a great host, super helpful friendly and quick to respond to any questions we had. We loved staying here and would stay again in a heartbeat. Thanks Russell!

Russell's place was incredible! Super clean, very central, it is literally in the center of Williamsburg nearby tons of cute shops, good restaurants and awesome bars. Will definitely think about renting it again and come back to this awsome neighbourhood! :)
Super quartier, bel appartement et superbe terrasse avec vue sur NY.

El apartamento es tal cual se muestra. Espacioso, comodo, con todo lo necesario para tener una estancia comodisima. En nuestro caso, la terraza fue un plus. 100% recomendable. Las vistas, increibles de noche
Great spot and location
Great location, very nice place

Great location, relaxing spacious apartment, stylish and modern. Well-equipped. Check-in/out was easy and we had no problems whatsoever. Balcony area is shared with another apartment so just be aware of that if you fancy prancing around in the nude! Close to the main drag of Williamsburg and there is great bar called Skinny Dennis just a couple of minutes' walk away. Would definitely stay there again.
Russell's place was just what we were looking for to discover hip Williamsburg. It offered an amazing view over Manhattan and was incredibly comfortable. The stay was great.

Russell's place was amazing, possibly even better than the photos! The location was perfect, and my visiting family was able to explore the surrounding areas with food and bars, no problem. We were also able to BBQ on the terrace on a lovely afternoon while enjoying the NY skyline. I highly recommend Russell's place!

Fantastic place right in the heart of Williamsburg. Walking distance to so many fun places. The patio was lovely with great views of the Manhattan Skyline. Will definitely try and stay here again next time I'm in New York. Russell is very responsive and provided me with everything I needed to know regarding the listing/neighborhood. Thanks!

Location and patio/terrace are outstanding.  Well furnished & stocked.  Good sized one bedroom for NYC.  Perfect for someone traveling alone or as a couple to explore all Williamsburg has to offer.  Easy check in/check out.  No problem parking.  Tons of restaurants, bars, nightclubs, shopping, etc within a few blocks.

Wir waren bereits in 2016 in Russel ‘s Appartement (siehe alte Rezension) und jetzt wieder für eine Woche. Es war erneut super und hat nichts an Qualität und Sympathie verloren. Wir kommen gerne wieder. Hervorragend ist die schnelle und nette Kommunikation mit Russel. Williamsburg ist aus unserer Sicht die ideale Location für NY, man hat jede Menge Möglichkeiten abends gut essen zu gehen und ein tolles Nachtleben. Dennoch ist man schnell in Manhattan per Fahrrad oder L Train.

Très bien équipé et situé dans Williamsburg , ce sont les 2 points forts .
Si vous choisissez cet appartement pour la convivialité avec Russel , passez votre chemin , mais ce n'est pas non plus rédhibitoire ni désiré par tout le monde 
Attention , le bruit des climatiseurs  placés en intérieur est insupportable , en laisser un sur deux et vivre dans l'autre pièce ; 
Equipements parfaits  et la terrasse avec vue sur Manhattan , quel bonheur !!!!
This is a beautiful apartment in a great location.  We had no trouble at all parking near the apartment.
Had a great time at Russell's apartment. Centrally located, clean, and great views! Loved the terrace.

L'appartement de Russel est moderne, dispose de tous l'équipement moderne et il est très bien décoré. La terrasse immense est exceptionnelle par la vue qu'elle offre sur Manhattan : Chrysler building, Empire State Building... c'est tout simplement magnifique 

L'appartement se situe dans une rue au calme mais à 5 minutes à pied se trouve des restaurants, boutiques et un magasin whole food. Tout peut se faire à pied. Une petite gym se situe dans l'immeuble et un centre de fitness à 3 blocks qui offre gratuitement un pass d'essai de 3 jours 

Russell est un hote très à l'écoute et disponible qui répondra à toutes vos sollicitations. 

Je recommande vivement cet appartement.

For anyone that likes the Williamsburg area, this apartment is perfect. It's in a great location. It is close to everything. The apartment has high ceilings and huge windows with a fantastic view. The deck is amazing. It was great to eat dinner and hang out while the sun set. Russell is a fantastic host. He had everything planned and check-in/check-out was a breeze.

This is a fantastic apartment in a prime Williamsburg location. You'll find it exactly as described and photographed. Check in was a breeze with door codes for lobby and lockbox for apartment key. I'd happily stay here again.
Russell's apartment is an absolute gem. Perfect location. Beautiful views. Clean, organized, plenty of space to unpack and make the place feel like your own.
Lovely apartment, perfect for 2. Clean and well designed. Nice area with good food. Thankyou!
A brilliant apartment for a travelling couple - incredibly high spec - incredible location - very accommodating re. early arrival and late check out - amazing roof deck - coming back soon!
Great location and apartment

Russell's place is located in a perfect spot in Williamsburg, a short stroll from the Subway. The place is spacious, clean and has a wonderful deck overlooking Manhattan. Russell went out of his way to be accommodating with great recommendations for things to do and places to eat and when our plans changed last minute he was very quick to respond and allow us to arrive a day early for our stay. I highly recommend Russell's apartment to experience NYC like a local.
Great place

Williamsburg is a fabulous alternative to staying in Manhattan - far quieter, packed with cool shops, friendly people and great restaurants. Russell’s apartment is well located, about 10 mins walk from the very convenient L train, and only a bit further to Marcy Ave for connections to Wall St. Excellent restaurants are nearby. So a great location!

The apartment was as described in the listing, comfortable even on bitter winter days. The sofa bed was great for our son. There are good facilities and although there are a few scuffs and bits of wear from bring a popular property, everything worked fine. We very much enjoyed this different way to see NY.
Beautiful apartment ,great area
Russels place was great! Awesome location and a killer and comfy apartment with great views!

Russell's apartment is great. Clean, nice, well-equiped, with quite a view. The location is perfect to discover Williamsburg and easy to get to Manhattan thanks to the 2 metro lines not far from it. We booked it in the hurry, and Russell was reactive. He agreed to a late check out, very nice of him. It's a good host and it's a good place!

We've stayed at Russell's place a couple of times now and it is a first rate Airbnb. Great location, clean, stylish, AND a Taco place on the ground floor of the building! Russell is responsive and great to deal with. Highly recommend.

This is a very nice place with a great view of the Manhattan skyline.  It is located in a very nice neighborhood in Williamsburg Brooklyn; close to a lot of nice restaurants and interesting places to visit.  Whole Foods market was a short 5 minute walk away from the apartment.  I recommend checking out Joe's Pizza for a delicious slice of New York pizza.  Fabulous apartment, with a nice rooftop deck to eat your pizza while looking at the beautiful New York skyline.

This is a fantastic flat,great location accessible to a great area.The flat is large ,well equipped and very stylish.Views to die for overlooking Manhatton.
Advice good and helpful notes.A fabulous balcony ,however we didn't get much chance to use due to poor weather.
We would definitely use again.

Edward's apartment is in an awesome area in Williamsburg. The space is super cute & we loved sitting out on the balcony in the mornings. Checking in was a breeze & we crossed paths with the cleaning person upon check out which made it even easier! Def recommend this spot as a great place to stay.

I've lived in Brooklyn, and also stayed in dozens of Airbnbs around the world. This one was disappointing for the price and did not live up to the stated promise of being "on par with anything you'll find at any 5 star hotel". I have never stayed in a 5 star hotel that was as noisy as this one. Yes, NYC can be noisy, but this listing should caution that the apartment (and your bedroom_ look over a 4-way intersection, and that cars, motorbikes and loud trucks will wake you til late in the night and again early in the morning. The listing also promises: "Right off the living room is a huge private balcony". However, two people from another unit strolled out onto this supposedly "private" balcony and peered directly into the apartment while I was standing in the living room in my shorts. Even if you lower the window shades, the shades do not give privacy in the living room or block out light in the bedroom. Also, I have never stayed in a 5 star hotel where the living space had not been swept or vacuumed properly. The cushion on the living room chair was badly stained, so they just flipped it over (even though it looks bad to be wrong-side up). There was no guidebook, so you have to text the owner and wait for a response to basic queries like "Where is the gym?" (there are no signs in the building), or how do you work the TV remotes (there are no instructions). On the positive side, the gym in the basement has all the basic equipment (bike, treadmill, elliptical, dumbbells, multi-function weight machine).

This place is an awesome place to stay wether your going to see the sites in Manhattan or want to get the Brooklyn vibe. The roof top was great along with the person huge balcony my favorite! Excellent location with many bars and restaurants nearby. We will definitely be back next year.

Thanks again Ed!!
Great apartment in the hub of hipster Williamsburg..easy to walk to the metro  line to Manhattan.Would highly recommend this apartment to stay in for visiting NYC!

We really loved this spot in Brooklyn. The location is amazing and it is a quick walk to some of our favorite spots. Because of the weather, we only had a few moments with the wonderful view, but those moment were perfect because of the amazing sunset. Would have liked to use the outside space more, but maybe next time, when we come back...thanks again!

Stylish, clean and spacious apartment in the heart of Williamsburg - we loved our stay! Positives included the location, super fast WiFi, comfy bed, air conditioning and amazing views. One thing to mention - the terrace is definitely not private, but shared with another apartment so you won't have it to yourself!
Amazing stay in an amazing apartment. Great location and great views across the Manhattan skyline. Would definitely stay again.
Everything posted by the host about the flat is 100 percent accurate.
Lovely weekend stay.  Great location, great place, communicative host and a perfect set of neighbourhood recommendations.   10/10 would stay again.

The apartment was impeccably clean, stylish and very comfortable. I would probably say though that the sofa bed isn't really big enough for two adults but for one it worked great! We especially loved the balcony area and enjoyed eating out there and watching the sun set over Manhattan, the neighbours were very friendly so it wasn't an issue at all that it was shared. Edward was very accommodating and allowed me to check in early after a long overnight flight which I really appreciated. We would definitely stay again.
This was a beautiful home, perfect for our family, with outstanding views of the city. Close to everything, but a little oasis in the midst of it all!
Very much like advertised. Beautiful, fully equipped apartment in exciting (!) area. Truely expensive but worth it. A MUST in NYC.

Edwards place was absolutely wonderful I could not have asked for more in a listing. The place was clean, very spacious, and modern. The balcony was huge and location of the apartment was in prime. I would highly recommend this listing to anyone looking for the best in Brooklyn. Thanks again Ed and look forward to coming back soon!

Great space and in the heart of Williamsburg. Short walk to the water (Domino Park) and some great restaurants and shops! Apartment was clean and easy to access. Definitely recommend for anyone spending some time in Brooklyn and NYC!

I loved this place, the apartment is nice decorated and has a beautiful view of the neighborhood.
Every peace of the apartment has a touch of elegance and good taste.
It was very clean and had all the amenities I needed for my family of 3.
The location is so perfect that I would move there anytime.  Communication was very easy and fast since the beginning.
5 starts and I would love to come back.

Edward's apartment is truly a gem in the heart of Williamsburg. It is a huge 1 bedroom (by Brooklyn standards) that is stylishly decorated making the space absolutely beautiful. The terrace is incredible, and provides for amazing views day and night. As a host, Edward is top notch--responsive, friendly, and eager to make your stay as best as possible. His restaurant recommendations were right on point, and it is clear he cares about your stay at his home. Would highly recommend!!

The location and view of this apartment was absolutely fantastic. Great shops and transport near by. The decor and amenities were great also.
Our only issues were with the washing machine that leaked and still had garments in it, the TV didn't work, the instructions to get the key initially were confusing (2nd lockbox instead of third) and the drawer of the dresser fell off on my foot and was unusable.
Edwards's flat was beautiful and in  great location. He recommended local spots for us to check out while in the town. would stay at his place again next time in Williamsburg
Edward place is so beautiful and is located in an amazing location!
I stayed at Edward’s place for a quick weekend trip to the city, and it was everything I expected and more. I would definitely recommend staying here, and would come again!
Great place and wonderful location. Very close to many spotlights. We surely recommend.
A great space in a prime location! Close to everything in Williamsburg and great NYC skyline views. Easy check-in and good communication. Would stay here again.
Been to to this listing twice now, location, the views and the comfort of the apt can't be beat!!

Awesome place—so spacious and comfortable. A wonderful basecamp for Manhattan and Brooklyn (at least for as long as the L Train is still running)! I drove and it was super easy to move the car and keep it on the streets for free.  The views are exceptional and the place is super quiet—was there for 4 days and didn’t see a single other person the whole time coming or going. A nice reprieve from the bustle of the city. The neighborhood is great; had my dogs and loved walking to Domino and McCarren Parks. Tons of shopping and restaurants to choose from too. Definitely recommend!
Really beautiful and clean flat! Stylish and very close to amazing bars and restaurants. I also appreciated the quick communication.

Convenient location in the middle of Willburg. The space itself is tastefully designed and offers sweeping views of Brooklyn. It was wonderful to wake up to the morning light and look upon the skyscrapers of Manhattan from the shared patio. 

Ed was very accommodating and quick to respond. He's full of recommendations from a local's perspective.

Phenomenal! We’ve stayed in Manhattan’s trendiest neighborhoods countless times, and this was our first adventure in Brooklyn. So we came into this trip with a lot of unknowns...

Right off the bat, during our very first night, it became clear how perfectly located Ed’s apartment is for enjoying Williamsburg. This exact block cannot be beat! Close to everything, while still quiet for a good night’s sleep. 

Moreover, his apartment is atop the whole complex and has the best (perhaps only) views of the Manhattan skyline, including the spacious shared patio. Epic. 

Everything else was totally solid. Great communicator and all around 5 star experience. Thank you!

This is an amazing place to stay, close to NYC and right in the middle of the best that Williamsburg has to offer! Sparkly clean, very stylish and comfortable apartment. It cannot really get any better! The host also provides great recommendations of what to do around.

Edward was very friendly and hospitable from the moment of the booking. His apartment had everything and then some in terms of amenities and nice personal touches, it was absolutely a top notch stay in Williamsburg as promised!

This is a really beautiful apartment and in a perfect location In Williamsburg. It's an outstanding bargain,, there's a beautiful shared patio that looks back across the East River. You can see the Empire State building in the distance. Edward is very responsive and on the one occasion when I did need to communicate with him I heard back from him in just a few minutes. The check in process was flawless and the place was sparkling clean and looked very fresh and well kept. I would highly recommend this property and it is a fantastic bargain. We stayed in a similar sized two room suite at the William Vail last time we were in Brooklyn and payed $1000 a night. Sorry William Vale but  thanks Edward.
Great location, great apartment, great host, great stay!
Joker

name: Charming apartment facing Laurier park
summary: --- Français dans la description détaillée --- Cozy apartment right in front of a beautiful park and steps away from various stores, restaurants and gourmet food shops. You are only 5 minutes walking from the vibrant Mont-Royal street, a tourist and local hotspot, and 8 minutes from Laurier metro, which is a short ride to Downtown and Old Montreal, the city's historic center.  Ideal for a 1-2 people, looking to be close to the action, but in a quieter, more local spot.
space: --- Traduction à venir, mais je parle Français et il me fera plaisir de communiquer avec vous et traduire d'ici là. N'hésitez pas à m'envoyer un message privé. --- The space is quite open, split between a bedroom + living room, and the kitchen. It is on the 3rd floor of the building, and has 3 balconies, one of which has a view on Park Laurier. It has everything you need to cook, as well as basic toileteries. It is located right next to a grocery store, wine/liquor store, and several restaurants, coffee shops and stores.
description: --- Français dans la description détaillée --- Cozy apartment right in front of a beautiful park and steps away from various stores, restaurants and gourmet food shops. You are only 5 minutes walking from the vibrant Mont-Royal street, a tourist and local hotspot, and 8 minutes from Laurier metro, which is a short ride to Downtown and Old Montreal, the city's historic center.  Ideal for a 1-2 people, looking to be close to the action, but in a quieter, more local spot. --- Traduction à venir, mais je parle Français et il me fera plaisir de communiquer avec vous et traduire d'ici là. N'hésitez pas à m'envoyer un message privé. --- The space is quite open, split between a bedroom + living room, and the kitchen. It is on the 3rd floor of the building, and has 3 balconies, one of which has a view on Park Laurier. It has everything you need to cook, as well as basic toileteries. It is located right next to a grocery store, wine/liquor store, and several restaurants, coffee shops and stores.
neighborhood_overview: The place is right in front of Laurier Park, which is a Montreal highlight. It is also close to trendy restaurants, bars and shop on Mont-Royal Ave. and Laurier Blvd.  It is a calm neighborhood, so you will be able to sleep well at night, but there are vibrant places to go out to just a few minutes away.
notes: Please be mindful of other residents in the building, as it is a quiet neighborhood.
transit: There is a parking spot behind the building, if you have a car. Please let me know if that is the case so I can arrange for you. Otherwise, public transportation is very accessible (Laurier Metro is a short walk from the apartment), and you can also use Uber or Teo Taxi (Montreal's "local Uber").
access: The entire place will be yours to use. There are no common areas in the building.
interaction: I may or may not be in Montreal when you arrive.
house_rules: - Be calm, and considerate of other tenants.

reviews.comments: Tim is a great and reactive host! He even left me a welcome gift! His place is quiet, clean and cozy. Its near metro station and a lot of great restaurants and groceries. Very recommended!

Charming location full of restaurants and shops. Perfect size for a couple or even a solo traveler. near the metro station and only a few stops to Old Montreal. Tim was  responsive and warm and even left little notes throughout the flat. Would recommend :)

name: Close to Ortakoy Square and Public Transportation
summary: Close to public transportation and Ortaköy square, in a secure neighborhood Dereboyu caddesinde toplu taşımaya ve Ortaköy meydanına yakın, güvenli bir mahallede

name: Sleeps 4, One Block from Waikiki Beach
summary: Recently Updated!  New carpet, paint, bath vanity, kitchen and appliances!  This room has 2 Queen size beds, kitchenette, refrigerator, stove, cooking utensils, cups and dishes, WiFi wireless internet, air conditioning, iron and hair dryer, wall mounted large screen TV, coffee maker, stove-top and sink. Full bathroom with shower and tub. A lanai with 2 chairs and table provide an outdoor space to relax. Coin operated washers and clothes dryers are available on 4th floor for guest use.
space: Our studio has a new air-conditioner, kitchen area with two small refrigerators, two-burner stove top, microwave, coffee-maker, color cable TV, hair dryer, iron/ironing board, and free Internet access.
description: Recently Updated!  New carpet, paint, bath vanity, kitchen and appliances!  This room has 2 Queen size beds, kitchenette, refrigerator, stove, cooking utensils, cups and dishes, WiFi wireless internet, air conditioning, iron and hair dryer, wall mounted large screen TV, coffee maker, stove-top and sink. Full bathroom with shower and tub. A lanai with 2 chairs and table provide an outdoor space to relax. Coin operated washers and clothes dryers are available on 4th floor for guest use. Our studio has a new air-conditioner, kitchen area with two small refrigerators, two-burner stove top, microwave, coffee-maker, color cable TV, hair dryer, iron/ironing board, and free Internet access. Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in and give you keys Aloha - Here is the important contact information; We have a Guest Host who will meet you at the property for your check-in. Our process is to meet guests for their arrival at the property. It's important to call my Guest Host
neighborhood_overview: There are wonderful restaurants nearby, including the well-known Cheesecake Factory; Hy's Steak House for a very special dinner; Tiki's Grill & Bar for great food, inexpensive drinks and Duke's Canoe House, oceanfront, food, drinks, with both places great spots for sunsets, people watching and nightly entertainment; and Cheeseburger in Paradise, always crowded, located at each end of Waikiki.
notes: Often referred to as an Oasis in the Heart of Waikiki, the Aqua Bamboo & Spa is a lovely property that even includes its own Spa with a beautiful swimming pool and large sun deck in a garden setting called The Outer Sanctuary. There is a pavilion and even a barbecue grill--it's a wonderful spot to take a swim, or just simply relax after a day of activity. There is a new Cafe in the pool area that is open from 6:30 am to 4:00 pm. You can have breakfast or lunch onsite at the pool.
transit: - Uber and Lyft are available in Honolulu and Waikiki - 'Biki' bikeshare is available throughout Waikiki & Honolulu - Try out 'Segway' tours of Waikiki, using their stand-up scooters  - Convenient public transportation options include 'TheBus' and the 'Waikiki Trolley' - Taxis are another great way to travel when in a group and the cost can be shared. You can find taxi stands at hotels, most major shopping malls and at the airport. Note that using taxi stands and calling for pick-ups by phone or via hotel concierge is the norm in Hawaii rather than hailing a cab.
access: Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in and give you keys
interaction: Aloha - Here is the important contact information; We have a Guest Host who will meet you at the property for your check-in. Our process is to meet guests for their arrival at the property. It's important to call my Guest Host at ** (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ** when you arrive at the Honolulu Airport. That way he will know when to meet you at the property. We also have a live answering service who will take a message if our Guest Host is unable to pickup immediately, please leave a message and our Guest Host will get back to you usually within 15 minutes Sincerely, Mark G.H., Property Manager, Hawaii Americana Realty

host.host_about: Real Estate Broker

reviews.comments:
Appartement situé dans un hôtel. 
Très bien situé dans waikiki, toutes les commodités sur place. 
Bien équipé avec tout ce qu’il faut pour la plage. 
Bruit de la route.
Apartment is as described. Great location and easy communication with Mark.
위치가 너무 좋았고 (하야트리젠시뒤) 새롭게 레노베이션 한 곳이라 그런지 깨끗하고 집기도 새 것이였습니다. 뒤늦게 급하게 예약하게 되서 많은 선택지가 없어 걱정했는데 너무나 완벽한 숙소였어요. 사용하진 않았지만 비치용품도 다양하게 구비되어 있어요. 하와이에서 에어비앤비로 머물게 된다면 다시 여기에 올거에요.

My daughter and I stayed at the Bamboo. The value, location and several of the amenities were perfect for our stay. The condo was clean and the linens smelled fresh. (Shag carpet was a little different but it is fairly new) Loved the cold AC and it helped drown out the road noise. We loved having the little kitchenette, stocked full of everything you will need(paper towels, dish soap etc) If you wanted to prepare a meal or warm things up, it was provided  The condo had extra towels, linens, blankets and provided beach towels! We used the little cooler everyday for our outings and took along the straw mats, boogie boards and umbrellas! Seriously we didn’t have to buy any of these items! Oh and they had beach chairs! For the value and only two blocks from the beach I would definitely stay here again! Mark was easy to work with and David met us with a smile to introduce us to our condo!

Also if renting a car and like I refused to pay garage parking, between the hours of 6p-7a street parking is free. For four nights I found parking but at 7am we had to move the car to a meter or go put money in the meter.(the ABC store always gave me change:) Yes a pain but we saved $$$ FYI look for street parking in the neighborhood directly across from Hotel back in there, can’t remember the name of the streets but there was always something available. Hope that helps!
This is an amazing little hotel type room in a great location. A block away from Waikiki, close to transit, bikes and every amenity. Simple hangout in an amazing area off the strip. Thanks!

Small but perfect for what we needed (a place to sleep)!  Easy to walk to the beach, shops, and restaurants!  Centrally located in Waikiki, just 2 blocks from the hustle and bustle of tourist, which was great!
Great comfortable place only 1.5 blocks from the Waikiki beach! And there's a delicious vegan pizza shop downstairs with nice pool.
Loved this place.  Very clean.  The location was wonderful.  The additional hotel amenities that were included were great, and the pool area was fantastic.  I would stay again!

Great location in a Waikīkī near the beach and near amenities. Walking distance to shops and restaurants. Allowed for late checkout for additional cost; which was useful for our late flight. Good find in Waikiki.

Excellent value for money!!! It is just like booking a hotel room. It is super easy to walk to the beach and you're close to tons of shopping and food (we enjoyed the smoothie place next door and surf and turf tacos!). The pool and hot tub are also nice to have there. In our room we were also provided with several beach amenities like umbrellas, towels etc. Would definitely stay here again. Mahalo!

Great location to walk to the beach, shopping, or restaurants.  We had a car for work reasons, but parked it nearby (public parking garage a block away) in the late afternoons and walked around in the morning and evening when we did not need it for work purposes.  Plenty of pillows and towels/beach towels.  Good closet space and kitchenette for cooking quick meals (cook-top and microwave). Very easy check-in and tour/review of the facility from Mark's staff.  Also, staff at Hotel very friendly and free coffee in the lobby.  Bus stops very close if you do not have a vehicle.  We are not city dwellers, so the road noise of busy street was a bit overwhelming, but the hum of the AC helped at night.
Close to lots of different shops and restaurants. Grocery store in walking distance too.

3 of us came to Waikiki for a wedding. The unit was exactly as described. The amenities were just what we needed (coffee for the coffee maker, hair dryer, bath and beach towels, wifi, etc) The location is centrally located, within walking distance to everything you'd want to see! We loved how it was a hidden tropical oasis in the heart of the city. The pool area was amazing! Our only complaint was the shag carpeting that seemed to absorb a lot of the moisture that is in the air (naturally as a humid place) and so it smelled mildewy. The apartment overall was clean, linens were clean, and everything was great. An awesome option for staying in Waikiki. We would stay here again!
Unit is too small for 4 adults, OK for 2.
Awesome location. Close to all activities in Waikiki.
Great place to stay! We loved being right by the beach! Easy check in and easy check out!!

Room was located really nicely to Waikiki and also fun places to walk to. There was a security guard at night making sure no one just randomly walks into the hotel so it felt very safe. Parking is a pain though. We had to pay $30/day to park next door and that parking garage didn’t have an elevator.

This unit is okay. It gets the job done and wasn’t overly dirty or anything. It did have an overall musty smell when you walk in but the whole building smelled this way as well. The carpet should maybe be swapped out for wood floors to cut back on that. The beds were just okay. They were pretty hard so putting some mattress foam toppers would really help with that. 

The lanai is small but nice. The chairs out there were not. They were very old and dirty. Some nice chairs would have been awesome to have so we could sit outside a bit and enjoy the space. It is on a Main Street (Kuhio) and there is a major bus stop right across from your lanai so it does get fairly loud, even with the AC on full blast (and throughout the night). 


Overall, it was an OK room. If I was very budget conscious I may stay there again.

Overall, a nice place with a good location.  It is about a 10 minute walk to the beach, a bit more than the 1 block indicated.  Still, there were plenty of amenities, including beach chairs, beach toys, and umbrellas.  My main complaint, which AirBnB helped me with, was the lack of any indication that there was no parking available. It is listed as an apartment, so I was expecting a parking lot.  It is a private room in the Aqua Bamboo hotel, and parking is available at the hotel next door for $30 per 24 hours. This information was given to us after we called to inform the company we were at the airport.  It was a bit too late, and had I known this extra hidden charge, I'd have probably looked for someplace else.  A prompt call to AirBnB to complain resulted in a credit for the unforeseen parking charge.

The location was amazing close walk to everything and the room was clean and loved the fact there was a kitchen to prepare our own meals if we wanted to stay in. Overall loved the place and will be coming back again. Thanks Mark.
Great location

Lugar muito bem localizado , simples porem com tudo o que vc precisa para descansar após um dia de praia e passeios na agradável Waikiki . Mark e Fave além d , e toda equipe de apoio são fantásticos e providenciaram com
Muita agilidade a troca da geladeira por uma nova já que a que tínhamos apresentava problemas derefrigeramento .
Recomendo e estamos muito gratos pelos ótimos dias em Waikiki

Great location right in the centre of Waikiki. The place was clean and offered all of the hotel amenities you would need including use of the pool. Would recommend if you are after comfortable and affordable accommodation in the area.
Great location, excactly as described!

This was a good place for our budget-minded family of 4. Check-in was fast and easy. The room is no-frills with just enough space for 2 adults and 2 teenagers. The location is awesome! Turn a corner and you can see Waikiki Beach and walk there in just a few minutes. The pool area is a beautiful oasis. Laundry facilities are on the same floor. We didn’t use much of the kitchenette but it was very nice. The only caveat: this is a privately owned room in a hotel, and boy did we feel the distinction. We knew upon check-in that we needed to call our host’s answering service and not the front desk if we needed anything. But just know you can’t participate in poolside activities or rent a dvd from the kiosk in the hotel lobby. Not a big deal - except that some of the hotel employees made us feel like unwanted stepchildren for even asking. That said, we still enjoyed our stay!

The location and service of the accommodation were good!
But sensitive people may feel the accommodation a little humid.
Unbeatable location and great value.

Surpassed expectations. Location is phenomenal. Two short blocks to beach, grocery, malls, food places. Looking forward to seeing tile instead of that carpet. I give it 5 stars. With a couple of changes it would get 6 stars if it was possible. Would def come again!
This place is in a great location. Except for the damp humid smell it was tidy, the air con worked and it is a functional space. So close to everything. Walk everywhere!
Very nice.

Fantastic location! Close to shops, beach, Alamo car hire and plenty of restaurants. The apartment had all that we needed for our week long stay. The pool area was incredibly beautiful and relaxing, not overcrowded (in fact, we had it all to ourselves at times). The beds were comfortable and clean. I would recommend this accommodation.

We stayed here for an extended weekend and it was great as a home base to explore the island as well as Waikiki. As pictured and described and in a great central location. Around 3 minute walk to the beach and plenty of restaurants and parking near by.
Great location!!
Great location and have everything you will need to make you feel like you are at home away from home.
Nice spot close to everything. Pool here is lovely!
Very close to the beach
Perfect spot to stay - centrally located to walk anywhere. Super clean and quiet building.

The location is great.  The room is nice but please be aware that the smoke alarm went off multiple times, once when we were out sight seeing, and once at 1AM and the guest hosts did not respond to our calls when this was going on.  Also, since the room is privately owned, the Hotel employees are not exactly helpful or welcoming.
Clean, great location and wonderful pool. You get what you pay for as far as the unit though.

Two adults and the child stayed at Marks apartment, we didn’t have high expectations so it was enough for us.   It is nice that this place has two  double beds,  but just one night stand, I wish they would have another one by the second bed.   Small kitchenette, we didn’t cook a lot so that was OK for us, but the refrigerator was too small.  The biggest plus to this apartment is that there was no cockroaches! Thanks! 
At first it was a little smelly when we just walked in but after we opened the balcony and turned off AC,  The smell is gone.  We ended up not using AC for All 9  nights,  didn’t really need it.  We slept with the balcony halfway opened but for sure it was noisy, the apartment is facing semi busy road.  The balcony door was kindda  hard to open or to slide,  had To use some muscle.  There are two beach chairs available and some  inflatables:) 
 We suggest it to the owner to change dressers because they are smelly inside,  we didn’t use them.   We couldn’t really use the table for eating our lunch, it was too small and the wings were bent half way down. 
 Overall the apartment had everything we needed, beds were ok, clean and firm.  The  outdoor furniture for  balcony was a poor choice, wood doesn’t last long outside in the rain so that was looking dated.
   The location is great,  Close to the beach and food pantry store, restaurants, and  international market Place .  International marketplace have shows every day at 6 PM. 
 We didn’t use TV a lot, there are some channels available and the DVD player.  Laundry access on the same floor,  have some coins available.   Pool/ jacuzzi  area was great with some tables to have some coffee in the morning.  Regular Americano coffee is available at lobby for free.
Mark很热心,房间位置好离海滩很近,对面就是公交车站,这个也导致有些吵,周边吃饭非常方便｡总之很满意｡

Super value for money hotel room within a complex one block back from Waikiki beach. It’s comfortable and Staff are very helpful and as long as you’re not expecting the Ritz it’s a great place to stay.

This was the worst experience with Airbnb 
An unresponsive host that let me wait with all my family at the door with a paid reservation 
The host is still given me excuses to return the money after an late cancellation.

Great communication with Mark, check in process was easy and smooth with the host meeting us in hotel lobby then showing us the facilities in the apartment, The apartment was the perfect size for the three of us and not cramped. It had everything you would expect and much more, including beach towels, beach mats, boogie boards etc. We used the kitchen facilities often and it contained all utensils you would need for cooking, including a very good sized refrigerator. As the apartment fronts the main street there is some traffic noise but it is not overpowering and didn't affect our holiday at all. The location of the hotel is great with only a short walk to the beach, shops and restaurants. The staff at the front desk were always friendly and helpful. and all in all we had a really great time, thanks Mark.

reviews.comments: Great location
Everything went very well. He was always answering very fast and took care of everything I was asking. Really nice and tidy place to stay and the mtr is really close. Would do it again!
C'est bruyant. Noisy

Cosy, clean and modern apartment near to MRT, 7 eleven, Welcome store and much, much more.
  The apartment is well secured, If I was to stay there alone I would feel perfectly safe.  Ky was a great host, answering any questions with a super quick response.  Highly recommend.
房间是新装修的,还有一些油漆味道,房间的空间比较小,因为是比较旧的住宅改造的,外部空气比较差,开窗就有油烟味,和各种味道都有,房间除了电视､冰箱和一条毛巾,其它的什么都没有,生活用品都需要自己准备｡我去住的房间,床上用品上一位客人走了都没有换｡被褥都有些头发和味道,在我致电了房东一个半小时才安排了一个外佣过来更换｡

Good host, value for money was good and location is great. Very close to MTR. Only one towel so for two people it's a good idea to bring another one as they don't dry at all if two people are using it - also hot water does not last very long, must wait 15 minutes between showers for it to re-heat. Other than that great stay - Thanks!
Got for what you pay. Super central. Go left when leaving Exit C ;-)

anfitrion muy correcto no tuvimos ningún problema con la llegada. el wifi funcionaba bien y la habitacion como se describe, pequeña pero limpia,nosotros solo la utilizamos para dormir y poco mas,estuvimos dos semanas y sin (Website hidden by Airbnb) cama esta bien para dos personas y rs comoda. a la salida se me olvido una cosa en la habitación y tuve que llamar al anfitrion y me lo solucionó muy rapido. muchas gracias.
Best location, near restaurants and shops etc.! Small but great appartment, fits two people. It is quiet, tidy and convenient! Host was flexible with timetabels. Would recommend!

-Very good location!!!
-Cute and comfortable room.
-Walk distance to see the horse race.

-Note: there's other rooms in the same apartment, but independent toilet and shower inside the room, maybe that's why the host call it "independent apartment". However I misunderstood it as a studio before I check in, hope you guys don't.

This is the second time I have stayed in John's apartment. First time it was apartment A, this time is a bigger apartment B, both absolutely excellent. As per my review for apartment A, if this is your first time in Hong Kong you might find the apartment very small, but trust me this is very normal in Hong Kong and you will not find a better modern looking apartment at this price in as central a location as Causeway Bay. Apartment B has a double bed and  very cosy. Shower unit is excellent and the check in with electronic locks is so convenient. Most of all the Host KY is extremely responsive to my needs, always come back in  timely manner and you can always rely on him to resolve your problem ASAP. I have no reservation in recommending this apartment.  

Useful notes
Convenient stores literally downstairs.
MTR station 3 mins walk.
TV has HDMI in, so you can hook up your tablet or laptop if you have the right cable.
Air con is nice and cool.
Since it's a small apartment, you might find it cramp if you have large or many luggage.
The apartment has an  inward facing window so no  views (really not an issue)
My third stay in Jon's apartment. Please see my other reviews. Still the same high standards, excellent host and great value room in prime location

I saw bigger closets than this apartment but still it was a great place

I wouldnt recommend it if you are taller than 6ft5

Will most definitely book it again if I cant find a better deal in HK

Jon was a great host, and this was definitely value for money. At this price you shouldn’t be expecting much though. The space was very small. We were two people staying, and we could barely both stand up in the room at the same time, and the suit cases had to be opened on the bed. 

I do also feel that the place was missing a kettle. 

I will definitely consider staying at Jons apartment the next time I visit the city!
It was a pleasant stay in very clean and cozy apartment. No matter that the size of the room is pretty small (typical HK), I could see details were thought out.

Very central location. Heart of shopping district and close to many good food places. Host was accommodating to our requests. Small space but well-designed room. Aircon was good. Very clean room. Towels and toiletries were provided even though it was said that they weren’t in the description. Very friendly security guard on the ground floor.
Very convenient location, great host. very easy check in and check out. Size is what you’d expect for good locations like this in HK. Will be back

name: Stylish 1 bed flat with balcony in Montjüic
summary: Spectacular 1-bedroom apartment which has been completely refurbished, finished off with luxury details and which has plenty of natural light ideal for long stays in our fabulous city.  You will be staying next to the new up and coming neighbourhood of Poble Sec, which is just a 15-minute walk from the center and is in a very quiet area of the city and right by the magnificent Montjuïc Park.
space: This is a completely refurbished apartment with high quality furnishing details. The design maintains authentic mosaic floors as well as other traditional elements which are part of the building and combines them with a modern, practical and cozy design.  It has 1 bedrooms and can host up to 4 people. The apartment has all essentials to make you feel at home during your stay in Barcelona. The main bedroom, with plenty of natural light, has a  double bed and direct access to the balcony.  The apartment also has a balcony and a dining area, perfect for meals amongst friends and family. The modern open plan kitchen is totally stocked up with everything you will need for your full-on cooking sessions!    The bathroom has a powerful stand-up shower – without doubt this will be your relaxing spot after a busy day in the city.

The modern ope
neighborhood_overview: Poble Sec is a local residential neighbourhood located by Montjuïc mountain and right next to a big park with sporting facilities, museums, monuments, theatres and from where you can really enjoy some outstanding views of the city. Only 100m away from the apartment you will come across several pedestrian streets with many tapas bars and trendy restaurants. The city centre is just a 15-20 minute walk away – L3 metro is also near the apartment, and will take you to almost anywhere in the city.
notes: Please keep in mind that according to the Law, you will be asked at the moment of the check-in for your IDs and to sign a contract for your stay. This is compulsory to stay at the apartment. Also, you will be required to present your ID/Passport upon arrival. In order to follow local regulations and to be able to register all our guests on the local police’s database, we will have to take pictures of ID documents for all guests. Hope this is not an inconvenience! - For all rents longer than a 2 month period, it is a legal requirement to pay a deposit for your stay. This amount has to be transferred from us to a local institution called INCASOL. Full amount will be refunded upon check-out if no damages or loss is visible in the flat. We will let you know the exact amount to be paid when requesting to book. - It would be great if you could send ID and residence details prior to arrival  - You will have to sign a medium term rental contract when arriving to the flat. Please do not hesitat
transit: The nearest metro stop is PARAL.LEL (L3 green line), which will take you to all the tourist hotspots in the city centre in less than 20 minutes (get off at PLAÇA CATALUNYA). El Prat Airport: 20-minute car drive. The best way to get to the apartment in public transport from the airport is to get on the AEROBUS to Plaça ESPANYA and then change on to the L3 and get off at PARAL.LEL and walk 10 minutes to the apartment.
access: You will have access to the entire apartment, which has 1 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a big living room with an open plan kitchen.  You will also be able to sun bathe on the fantastic balcony overlooking the park in front of our apartment.
interaction: My friends at Hostmaker are looking after my home while I am away. They're an Airbnb management service team in Barcelona who are Airbnb hosts themselves. I trust them to give you a warm welcome! Hostmaker will look after you. If you have any questions about your stay, please get in touch through the Airbnb chat.

reviews.comments:
The rooms are quite dark and not very pretty, but for this price - including a very good breakfast at Cafe Decolata - it's a good offer.
Recommended for budget travelers who don't care about a fancy room and like free breakfast.
Great value
Clean room, friendly host and super cheap too what more is there to ask for?
Quiet and cheap place. You get what you pay for.
Good for the price
Gd place to  stay for the price a bit noisy in the front room with traffic, planes, horns tooting. But an enjoyable stay.
The room was good for the price.
Good for money

David's place was fine.  It was easy to get to from the airport by bus, which stops right outside the cafe shown in the pictures.  As expected, the place has all the basic amenities one needs, and there are lots of restaurants in the area as well as a supermarket.

This is a good option for a cheap place to stay, but only if you plan to be out doing things during the day; the space is very small, not a problem if you make the most of your time in the city.
      The wifi is great, very helpful for trip planning etc. Kitchen and fridge is small; I spent most nights out with friends so this wasn't an issue.
      David was very communicative and fast to be so. I didn't have phone access until the day I was to arrive at his place and he was available for info and plannin (Website hidden by Airbnb) Not a far walk from king street and some other cool suburbs, and its a half hour metro ride to be at the opera house for reference (Even closer to the airport so its a good middle point). Overall a good cheap place to stay for non fussy travelers intending on seeing Sydney whilst saving some money.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Basic but very good value! Place is a 5 min walk from train station and shops, in a good area with bars and for food.
Good place. Central. Next to bus stop. Good value for money
David’s place was very good
This is great value and you can cook your own food with all plates etc provided. If I get more work at the same place I would really like to stay here again.

David's place is good for people on the go.. it's a really small room (I had 3 suitcases and ended up having to put one on the chair and another on the table just to save space). The walls are quite thin. Wifi is fast enough to use, sometimes a bit slow/spotty for watching things. I wasn't home a lot and I really just needed a place to sleep so this place was great. I saw David a few times during my stay and he was always very kind and welcoming. :)
Good place to stay
Surprises!
David offers very cheap accommodation and it is fine for the price. David was very quick to respond to any issues or queries that I had.

This accommodation has 8 rooms (mine was approx 3m x 2.5m) and very basic, the bed was comfortable and there is a bar fridge in the room for your day to day needs. The premises are quite old and could do with a spruce up however the location for me was only 5 min from an event that I was attending so brownie points for that.

Prior to arriving at David's Airbnb, I did not have the false assumption that I would arrive to a luxurious room; I understood I was choosing a cheap price over great accommodations.  What I did arrive to was nothing in which I had prepared myself for.  The entrance was through a back alley, which I knew before, but I did not realize it would lead to a loading dock with stairs leading to a row of numbered rooms, an apartment or any type of real living conditions.  After getting to the top of the stairs, I was instantly hit with the repulsive odor of the Airbnb.  As I continued walking in, I noticed the bathroom in the dark hallway, which I instantly knew I would not be using, due to the smell getting stronger.  I still held hope for my room, thinking maybe a fellow guest had left the bathrooms a mess.  When I entered the room, I was even more disappointed.  The sheets were clearly not changed and there was hair on the pillows, the floor was disgusting, there was no window and a hole in the ceiling, and the bed was held up by crates.  The smell was just as strong in the room as it was in the entrance and hallway and I did not even feel comfortable putting my bags down.  I sent David a message that the room was not accurately listed, and I was going to find different accommodations.  I stayed at a hostel for the next few nights, only $3 more than David's Airbnb, and it was a dream compared to David's room.  Before my arrival, David was very responsive with Airbnb messages, and sent me a very detailed message regarding my self check-in.  He responded to my message about leaving his Airbnb within a few hours, offering me a different room in the same complex.  I informed him I already made different arrangements in this time, and do not see how a different room could be much better.  I asked for a full refund and he never responded.  I contacted Airbnb, and they were able to get me 1/3 of the initial payment.  Sad to say, but I do not recommend this Airbnb.
This place is good for the price! I loved my room. Very easy access to the city. A bit of construction noise, so I would suggest light sleepers to bring earplugs.
Good value for money, would rent again
Place just as described. Good small room.

Cheap accommodation in Sydney. 5 km from downtown. Easy to reach everywhere by Uber or bus. Internet works. Hosts is very friendly and helpful. One consideration for claustrophobic people  is the room does not have windows

summary: Newly renovated, comfortable and convenient 1-bedroom apartment in the heart of Wan Chai. The apartment has one main room with a kitchen, washing machine, TV, and sofa. It has 2 smaller bedrooms, one which has a bed in it.
