address.street: Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: I stayed at Danny's place for a month. Danny was very helpful and quick to communicate. His place was in the exact location I was looking for during my stay. It was very convenient to walk around Wan Chai and Admiralty. Danny realized before I arrived that the bed size was slightly smaller than his listing originally mentioned and he let me know right away. The size was decent for HK apartment on Hong Kong island.

I stayed at Danny's apartment in Wanchai for a week while visiting family and sightseeing. His apartment was perfectly located for me. It was very close to the MTR station and near restaurants and shops. It was exactly as described and his directions got me there easily. Perfect location if you are visiting the Wanchai area! I did not personally meet Danny, but he was responsive and gave me all the info I needed. 

Thanks, Danny!

Danny’s home in Wan Chai is awesome. It’s so close to everything. Five minutes from four different MTR stations which are all interconnected underground and the subway system is very accessible and easy to maneuver. Danny was an excellent host! He had his maid clean the place right before we arrived and each separate room in his place is equipped with a/c. The kitchen area is a little small maybe not intended for a long term stay of 6 weeks like ours was, but it’s Hong Kong and space is limited. Luckily Wan Chai is quite the gastronomic delight so we didn’t have a problem eating our meals out and finding new places all around the area to eat. Danny also gave us his personal recommendations which ended up being our favorite restaurants. I strongly recommend staying in Danny’s place if you want something clean, with a prime location and an attentive friendly host!

Check-in and check-out times are flexible negotiable - I look to facilitate and work around your time for a more relaxing and stress free stay.  Please check with me if other arrangements are necessary.
transit: Campsie Station is located only 5 minutes walk away, 20 minute train ride from Campsie Station takes you to Sydney CBD.  Campsie bus stop is located only 5 minutes walk away. Bus '400 route' services travels to Sydney international airport.   UBER is another form of cheap transportation around Sydney.
access: Guests have access to 2 bedrooms, lounge, porch, kitchen & bathroom available.   Street parking available, no private parking available on the property.
interaction: Minimal - Available to you, however reachable if required.

reviews.comments: Nice cosy apartment style home close to ships and transport
The house is super. We enjoyed our new year holiday with relaxing, clean and comfortable house. Fully furnished and amenities

name: Spacious Room close to the Station and Sydney CBD
summary: Our apartment is a renovated 2 bedroom apartment in a leafy and bright suburb. We have opened up our second bedroom for guests to stay and experience Sydney and the local area. Our accommodation is perfect for those coming to Sydney for business as well as local or international travellers. We are a young professional couple so happy to provide advice on what to do and see in the local area.
space: You will have exclusive use of a large double bedroom in our spacious 2 bedroom apartment. The renovated apartment has all of the necessities including a full kitchen, laundry, 2 bathrooms and connected living room and dining room.  We will supply what we can to make your stay as comfortable as possible!

Our accommodation is perfect for those coming to Sydney for business as well as local or international travellers. We are a young professional couple so happy to provide advice on what to do and see in the local area. You will have exclusive use of a large double bedroom in our spacious 2 bedroom apartment. The renovated apartment has all of the necessities including a full kitchen, laundry, 2 bathrooms and connected living room and dining room.  We will supply what we can to make your stay as comfortable as possible! The guest will have access through our front door as well as an access through a sliding door onto the patio. We are quite social hosts so would love to share a drink with you, however, we also want to provide you your own space. Artarmon is a central suburb only 10 kms from Sydney city. Our apartm
neighborhood_overview: Artarmon is a central suburb only 10 kms from Sydney city. Our apartment is only a 5 minute walk from the train station and all the local shops. We live in a green and leafy area with plenty of parks, a tennis court across the road and easy access to outdoor activities.
transit: Getting around is very easy. We are in close walking distance to the station and only a 10 minute train into Sydney CBD. This means you can easily explore everything Sydney has to offer as well as enjoying the city nightlife and easily getting a train home.
access: The guest will have access through our front door as well as an access through a sliding door onto the patio.
interaction: We are quite social hosts so would love to share a drink with you, however, we also want to provide you your own space.

host.host_about: I am an avid traveller and a fellow AirBnB host. I usually travel with my fiancé as we explore new places and immerse ourselves in new cultures.

reviews.comments: Our stay was great: good location, great room with good facilities and awesome hosts! There is just a short 5-minute-walk to metro station and the metro takes ca. 15min to Circular Quay. The hosts give you enough time for your own but they are great to have a chat as well.
One of the best homestay I have experienced. Friendly & very helpful host who makes you feel at home.
Ellie's place is very clean and spacious. Close to shops and great neighbourhood. I would definitely stay here again when I visit Sydney.

Kevin and Ellie are very nice people and are welcoming and generous hosts.  Their apartment is spotless, comfortable and very nicely decorated.   The guest room and bathroom are great in all aspects and the apartment is ideally located.  I would strongly recommend this accommodation.

My friend and I felt so welcome. We were so excited about being at the other side of the world and kev and Ellie took good care of us and gave us good tips what to do and where to go! I can totally recommend this air bnb.

Lovely perfect home with all necessary attention to their guests! Ideally located close to a train station that gets you to central Sydney in a dozen minutes. You greatly contributed to make my Sydney city trip amazing! Thank you

Ellie's place is perfectly described - well appointed bedroom and bathroom (which is shared but didn't feel like it - really I had it all to myself for my brief stay!). Her home is very close to transport yet very leafy and quiet.  Ellie was flexible with my arrival time, and helpful with parking, making a cup of tea, explaining wi fi etc. Enjoyed my stay - highly recommend.

Ellie and Kevin's home is fantastic and they are a very welcoming couple. The location is close to transport, shops and restaurants. I was very happy here as their apartment was really beautiful, very clean and the room I stayed in very comfortable. I could highly recommend anyone to stay there
Delightfully welcoming hosts and feels like home away from home.  I was offered share in their dinner!  Great location close to Artarmon Station.  Good internet and comfy bed.  I'll be back!
Convenient location for the train (about 5 mins walk), yet I heard no train noise at all! Very friendly hosts who were happy to help in any way they could.

Ellie’s place is as clean, reachable and well-equipped as you imagine. Living area is very nice with a lot of amenities making your stay enjoyable and easy. Private room is well-lit and spacious with much comfort. The house sits in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood. Shopping facilities and train station is just 5 mins walk away. City center is only 15 mins train ride, or you can go to Chatswood, the local Centre with huge shopping malls and fancy restaurants, which is just one stop away. This is an ideal place for both business and leisure travelers come to visit Sydney.

name: Suite 3-Costa Cabral Boutique Guest House@Porto

space: This amazing House is from the late XVIII century and has just been all refurbished trying to maintain the original layout but with all modern comfort including great isolation both thermic and acoustic and all the domestic modern cmodities. The Common spaces include a big living room with dining tables, cable tv with a balcony that leads to the garden with the BBQ! There is also a big kitchen to share with the other guests.

neighborhood_overview: This is a residential neighborhood. Many cafes, supermarkets and traditional comerce.  Estadio do dragão (Portos soccer team stadium) is close. The cock from the neighbours can still be heard as this is a residential area and some older residents still have chickens on the backyard:)
transit: If you have a car it’s a good location to stay as you have free parking on the street.  To go to the city center you have the metro station in an easy 10min walk. The ride will take you there in just a few minutes. You have a bus station just outside the house too. If you need a transfer from the airport let us know and we'll help you to book a trustable one.
access: You'll have access to your private room with private bathroom + Shared kitchen, living room and garden.
interaction: Before check-in we will help with everything you need including organizing your arrival (we don't have a reception so we need to be there to give you all the info and keys). During your stay we are always reachable by email and phone. We will come just in case you request to help you sort out anything you need.
house_rules: - Treat everything well and with care as it was your own.   - Smoking is just allowed outside.    -Please respect the neighbors: No loud noise allowed before 10h00 am or after 10h00 pm    - Babies are free till the age of 2 (max 1) when using existing beds.  - Baby cob is available upon request and availability confirmation on booking: 10 euros/stay    - Please Respect the check  in and check out times.  - A 24/7 check in is available upon request after 23h, subject to a 30euros fee-payable at arrival (cash only)    -You must provide a check in time at least 24h hours before you arrival.  We will meet you at the apartment to make you the check in at arranged time . If you are more than 30min late let us know at least 1h before your arranged hour. . If you get later than 30min without any previous notice, we will not be able to wait for you at the apartment and will be waiting for your phone call- (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) to arrange another check in time subject to our availabili

host.host_about:
Hi!

I hope you enjoy to visit Porto as much as I enjoy living in here! If you stay at my place I just hope you'll feel Porto as much as I've been feeling and enjoying this wonderful city! :)

I'll be more than available to tell you everything about the best restaurants, the places to visit, where to spend your time, etc..

I see myself as passionate about my own city but...I was born here! :)

name: Paradise Waits
summary: ALOOOHA!  It’s open! We have our surf and swim break back just 10mins away!  Introducing Paradise Waits! Our fabulous guest house could be your home for a splendid Hawaiian vacation. Pamper yourself in luxury with our infinity edge, completely tiled pool and incredible hot tub as you bask under the Magical Milky Way. Come explore the rugged Kalapana coastline, with breathtaking spots along the way that will beckon you to stop and relax, or get out and explore, for this is a truly amazing place!
space: We offer a one bedroom suite complete with a private bathroom (not one, but two outdoor showers!) lanai, kitchen, dining area as well as hot tub and pool. Our retreat is perfect for those wanting to unwind and enjoy the Hawaiian tropics. The spectacular views from the bedroom, lanai, kitchen and dining area will delight you as you relax steps away from the tiled pool. Venture in for a dip, lounge on the in-pool floaties, bask under the sun on comfy lounge chairs. Escape to the umbrellas when you've had enough sun.  Our lush grounds offer tropical plantings of ti, hibuscus, bamboo, helconia, ohia, ferns, orchids, a variety of palms, and seasonally flowering lilikoi, night blooming jasmine, plumeria, gardenia and more for you to enjoy. Play lawn games like croquet, dice, or bbq in your own lava-rock fire pit. Or - head out and enjoy the wonderful Kalapana Coast. From refreshing ocean swims and world class surfing, to unforgettable hikes and awe inspiring gasps at brand new land and unsur
description: ALOOOHA!  It’s open! We have our surf and swim break back just 10mins away!  Introducing Paradise Waits! Our fabulous guest house could be your home for a splendid Hawaiian vacation. Pamper yourself in luxury with our infinity edge, completely tiled pool and incredible hot tub as you bask under the Magical Milky Way. Come explore the rugged Kalapana coastline, with breathtaking spots along the way that will beckon you to stop and relax, or get out and explore, for this is a truly amazing place! We offer a one bedroom suite complete with a private bathroom (not one, but two outdoor showers!) lanai, kitchen, dining area as well as hot tub and pool. Our retreat is perfect for those wanting to unwind and enjoy the Hawaiian tropics. The spectacular views from the bedroom, lanai, kitchen and dining area will delight you as you relax steps away from the tiled pool. Venture in for a dip, lounge on the in-pool floaties, bask under the sun on comfy lounge chairs. Escape to the umbrellas when you
neighborhood_overview: Great Area!! In this delightful neighborhood, people stroll in the morning and evening, some toting along pets and strollers. It is a very safe, clean peaceful place. A 5 minute walk finds you at a lovely black sand beach, known to be frequented by dolphins in the morning. Minutes down the road is Uncle Roberts Kawa Bar, a Puna attraction and highlight in the guide books. They have a fab farmers market Wed evenings and Sat mornings.
notes: This is an outdoorsy tropical place, nature and wildlife are all around - we have sightings of hawks, owls, cardinals, golden finches, morning doves etc. We also have symphony of geckos and frogs, which we find quite delightful. We are equipped with mosquito nets, but they are seldom used. If you are sensitive, we offer mosquito repellant and citronella candles. But our breezes usually keep the air pretty comfortable.  The state of Hawaii does not let Airbnb collect taxes, and since we operate more like a hotel, we collect taxes upon arrival just like a hotel does. It is Hawaii State VAT and GE taxes of 14.5% via credit card or cash.
transit: You will want to rent a car or other vehicle. We are about 45 minutes to an hour from Hilo, 20 minutes from Pahoa, and while there is bus service, it is infrequent. It is a lovely drive along the Kalapana coast.  We are very close to the recent lava eruption, that has stopped. Our air is of amazing quality once again and new growth is all around. You can venture to see the newest land on Earth just minutes away. It’s pretty spectacular!
access: You enter in through our front gate, gazing at the koi pond as you wander over to your section of the property. As you can see from the pictures, the layout is separate buildings comprising a fully functional home. We have an in ground pool, that is shared with the owners (we won't go swimming while you are here, but may swim while you are out.) We have utilized plant barriers to increase privacy. There is an expansive lawn area and the hot tub is only steps from the pool and second outdoor shower.  We are happy to assist you in any way and make your stay more memorable. We can give you referrals for great activities to do in the area. Guide books and local information are on site. With advance notice, we can arrange a massage on premises, or an acupuncture treatment. Let us know if you have special requests.
interaction: We live on the property so we are here to promptly help you with any questions or concerns. However, its YOUR vacation, and should be as you wish. Let us know if there is anything you need, we will help make it happen.
house_rules: ~Pools and glass don't mix! So,  No glass allowed in the pool or hot tub areas.  ~Please honor Hawaiian style - no shoes in-doors.  ~Please keep kitchen clean so critters are not summoned inside.  ~Smoking outdoors only, provided it does not drift indoors to either house. ~Please shower before using the hot tub or pool.   ~Please quiet after 10. ~Cover the hot tub after use.  ~To reduce our carbon footprint, turn lights and fan off when not in use especially when you leave. ~Our place is super special to us, and we do read Airbnb reviews. If you don't have any reviews, please send us a referral from someone who knows you in a professional capacity. Thanks very much!!

host.host_about: I love living in the tropics of Hawaii with my husband, Scott. We love to travel the world, and I frequently lead medical and dental clinic trips to struggling, far-away countries and serve others in need. We are so blessed, and this is one way we give back. I am a charter-school teacher here in Hawaii, and my hubby practices Chinese Medicine, including acupuncture and Chinese herbs. In our spare time, we swim, surf, and practice yoga. And we love our animals too. Come visit us for a bit of Aloha! Namaste.

reviews.comments:
Airbnb should provide "6 Star" rating for these hosts and this tropical retreat!  Even the gorgous photos don't do this justice, and we're already considering calendars for our next visit (can't be soon enough!)...
The property location is safe and off the beaten path, yet reasonably close to basic amenities.  The black sand beach is within walking distance (though with a private pool - why go anywhere else!).  The tropical lifestyle of sleeping, cooking & dining with the sounds of the wind & waves, frequent gecko guests and chirping wildlife is nearly intoxicating, and fosters a sense of aloha time to unplug & rejuvenate.
Scott and Suzie are Exceptional hosts, who are as welcome at our home as they made us at theirs.  The fresh fruit & macadamia nuts, together with the anniversary bubbly were great touches, not to mention the snorkel gear to further our explorations...lots of local color on that side of the island, less commercial and more "real Hawaii" than the Kona side...
Don't hesitate to book this romantic retreat, you won't be disappointed!

Suzie and Scott are great hosts!

Their place is in a great location (on the less touristy side of the island), close to the beach, excellent snorkeling, and very convenient for day trips to go see Volcanoes National Park, and stargaze at Mauna Kea. We had a fantastic and very relaxing time. Their property is beautiful, and incorporates many thoughtful and useful small touches. (Local guidebooks and snorkel gear, fantastic open air kitchen, lovely outdoor breakfast nook, outdoor shower(s), and a hot tub under the stars.) - Suzie & Scott, thanks again for having us, and for all of your local recommendations! We would love to come back to your little slice of paradise! :)
Suzie and Scott were exceptional hosts and the property is even more amazing than the pictures. You’ll never want to leave!

This is a truly special place to stay. The cottage is full of unique, memorable touches and the lounging area (outdoor kitchen, jacuzzi, pool) gives the experience a private resort feel. Suzie and Scott were incredibly nice and welcoming - they provided local tips and resources while being very respectful of my space. Plus, people always told me it was rainy on the Hilo side of the island. While it did rain in Hilo most days of my trip, the Southern/coastal area of Suzie and Scott's home is known for having a window in the sky through the clouds that has a microclimate of its own. This was a huge bonus - gave me beach days and starry nights while it was raining just a 30 minute drive away. Highly recommend. Until next time!

Wow, what an amazing place to stay! The pictures don’t do this place justice. We were very impressed with the beautiful and tranquilness of this space, and loved the outdoor living aspect of it. Suzie and Scott were the ideal hosts. Helpful and very friendly, but also sensitive to our privacy and space. We’d love to stay in their slice of paradise any day and can’t wait to come back.

This place is perfect! Decoration & cleanliness are on point.
Suzie & Scott were friendly & fast at responding.
I stayed there for honeymoon, and couldn’t ask for a better place.

Paradise really is waiting! Suzie and Scott’s place is simply amazing and so are they! This is the perfect place to relax, unwind and chill out under the Milky Way, right down the road from spectacular black sand beaches - the newest beaches on the planet! We can’t wait to go back! Thank you, Suzie and Scott, for sharing your very amazing and special place with us!  ❤️ Jessie & Jim!

We just loved our stay at Suzie's place of paradise. Our room was clean, cool and comfortable. The pool and property was perfect for us. Plenty to do from this location. Awesome walk to beaches and coastline. Big mahalo to our hosts. We look forward to staying with them again.
Amazing place in a magical setting. Just kick off your shoes and bask in a luxury outdoor living paradise.

Suzie and Scott were great hosts! They have a very beautiful, peaceful and private backyard that we fully enjoyed. We loved being able to watch all the star at night from the hot tub.  The bedroom has very neat decor and the bed was very comfortable. There were a couple minor issues that came up and they were very prompt to resolving them.   The experience was like "glamping" so if you do not like cooking or showering outdoors or hate mosquitos then this may not be the place for you. Also, it is ideal to have a car due to the location but there are many great places to check-out on this side of the island.

Suzie and Scott's place was paradise!  We enjoyed our stay as it was exactly as advertised and what we wanted.  The Host's were fantastic and during our stay we had privacy and enjoyed the Big Island.  Lots to do close by with great beaches (black sand beaches) and easy access to the entire south end of the island.  We would recommend Suzie and Scott's place to anyone who travels to Hawaii!  Great time!

name: Bright and spacious Sheung Wan apartment
summary: Light and spacious one bed apartment in modern building with a lift. Less than 5 mins walk from the MTR station (Sheung Wan), 1 min to lots of buses and trams, 10 mins to the piers and central / soho area. This place is at the water level which means you don't need to walk uphill at the end of your evening out! Quiet location with a bit of a sea view.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Place is very clean, looks new, living space is spacious, sofa and bed are comfy. Shower has consistent warm shower pressure. Has water filter jug which is great as we didn’t have to buy bottled water.
No wardrobe, but there is a rack for hanging clothes. TV isn’t available though.
Location is fantastic and would re-book.

Great location, really nice and quiet, but still close to loads of great bars, restaurant and the MTR. Owen was a great host, quick to respond via (Hidden by Airbnb) . The place is really nice and clean, sofa is super comfy. It’s pretty big by HK standards. I’d definitely stay again

Owen was an excellent host!  He was very accommodating, flexible and easy to communicate with.  The apartment is centrally located in a nice building with good security.  Owen's place is spacious, clean, and comfortable.  It was the perfect place to get some work done from my laptop or relax after a day of exploring the nearby shops and restaurants.   I highly recommend and would stay again without hesitation.
The host canceled this reservation 97 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Although the residence is not located in the city centre, a complimentary shuttle bus service offers transfers to the centre of the city within 15-20 minutes. The local area offers plenty of things to do – particularly for nature lovers. With the Wilson Trail, Wong Nai Chung Reservoir Park and Tai Tam Country Park all nearby, guests will never tire of the spectacular views and hiking trails. The local area also has a number of banks, restaurants and shops nearby for guests’ convenience.

Within minutes there are some of the best restaurants and shops New York has to offer.  Easy access to all major subway lines, uptown and crosstown buses.

Kitchen, washer/dryer, cable, wifi, backyard.  Within minutes there are some of the best restaurants and shops New York has to offer. host.host_location: I live in the building, right upstairs from the apartment with my partner, Manny, and one of our children.
host.host_about: I've wanted to hav (Website hidden by Airbnb) since an amazing trip to Ireland and Scotland over 20 years ago.  We stayed with so many wonderful people and met fellow travelers from around the world.

reviews.comments:
Sheila and Manny are the types of hosts who make you not only feel at home, but also like family - from inviting us to their local pub with their delightful friends, to having a meal at what must be one of the most authentic Chinese restaurants, not to speak about introducing us to Rocco's which must have the best canneloni outside Italy :)
A wonderful spot for those who want to be part of New York life and still have a peaceful place to retire to at night :) The apartment is exactly like on the pictures - charming, newly renovated, clean and well-equipped. 
It is in a lively neighbourhood with a great cafe for brunch (Cafe Orlin), jazz and good French food (Jules Jazz bar) and some of the best pizza slices right on the corner at Stromboli. There are also some amazing little shops and parks in the area. The perfect location in all aspects. 
We loved it and we will be back!

Spend a very very nice time by Sheila and Manny. The studio was exactly has expected and advertised. I've been travelling with my wife and our 20 months old daughter. The location was perfect for us. Quiet studio in the middle of East Village. Just a few minutes away from the subway station and Greewich village. Everything needed was available in the studio: wifi, kitchen, washing machine, dryer, ... Sheila and Manny were really helpful at all time. We will definitely stay again there during our next stay in NYC.

Shelia was great! My parents came to NY for the second time and stayed at Shelia's place on St. Marks Street. The place was so cute and very clean. There was a lovely little outdoor space and my parents couldn't stop raving about the apartment. Sheila was so accommodating and was there to answer any and all questions any time my folks had any. Thank you Shelia for making their stay in the city so stress-free and wonderful!

The stay at Sheila and Manny's was great! They are very thoughtful hosts and provided everything we needed, including necessitites, information and a most warm welcome. The apartment is large (we stayed there with four people in the large main room and didn't mind a small bathroom) and cozy and equipped with everything you could wish for, including coffee maker, washing machine, a large gas stove etc. It is located in the centre of the vibrating East Village with its many restaurants and bars. The apartment is in the back so you hardly notice the bustle outside. It has a small backyard where you can sit outside to have breakfast before walking around Manhattan or taking the Subway (which is very close). We will love to come back and highly recommend staying there!

Sheila and Manny were the best hosts we could have imagined. The apartment is perfect and roomy with its own private entrance and access to an outdoor patio (grill and all.) They have thought of everything you could possibly need including a full list of food, coffee, and sites worth checking out. The location was even better than I thought as we were a matter of blocks from most of our main NYC food destinations and merely and hop and a skip from everything else you could possibly want to do. 

We had the pleasure of meeting Sheila for a round at her local watering hole and highly suggest to pop by to meet all of her neighbors and friends! These two hosts have really made a home for themselves in their neighborhood and welcomed us with open arms. 

You have to stay at this St Marks gem!  Unfortunately for any other prospective hosts in this city, we will always have Sheila's studio as our first choice. My only regret is that we couldn't stay longer, but we will be back soon. 

-Shannon and David

What a perfect place to spend some great days in New York City! 

Sheila and Manny are very welcoming, helpful, and generous hosts. We really enjoyed staying in their charming studio, which is clean, cozy, and very well organized. It is also very conveniently located in East Village, which made it easy for us to get to our destination during our NYC trip. Sheila is extremely responsive, and I highly recommend her as a host. We went out one evening together in her favorite bar just around the corner and met some of her friends. It was such a nice evening. Thanks, Sheila! We strongly recommend this studio and we certainly would like to be hosted there again. Hope to see you soon!!

From the minute I contacted Sheila the first time on Airbnb, I new I had met someone special! We became (website hidden) friends right away to get to know each other, better. My last day in New York I posted this on my(website hidden)wall: 
"Normally I don't post this kind of personal stuff, but I felt I had to.
This week I met the most incredible woman and his husband.
Sheila was our host during my visit to New York and she made this stay the best ever. She is the most affectionate and funny person I have met before. Smart, cute and so open minded. I fell like we've been friends for ever. I wish you  the best and thanks for being such a great person"

It is a real privilege to be hosted by Sheila and Manny.

We had a very nice stay at Sheila's appartment. The place is very quiet, well furnished, everything needed is there and new! There is also a nice little place outside to have a drink. The area is full of interesting restaurants and shops, not those common megastores or brands one can find everywhere. But most of all, Sheila and Manny were so kind!!!!! We'll be back.

The Apartment, neighborhood and Hosts were so much more than we expected, everything was perfect. I will never stay anywhere else when I come to New York from now on. Our hosts Sheila an Manny are wonderful.

Staying at Sheila`s was awesome, great place, amazing location. My friends and I were mostly out all day, so we didnt hang with Sheila, but she was always aware that we were ok and having a great time. I dont have words to thank yo Sheila!

Gracias!
This was,by far, the best location we have ever stayed at. It was everything it was advertised to be and the hosts, Sheila and Manny, were the warmest, most welcoming hosts anyone could hope for.

We really enjoyed staying at Sheila's. She was a gracious host and the apt. was super nice with everything we needed plus more. We only wish we could have stayed longer. Sheila and Manny were generous and kind and it was great fun meeting them. I will definitely come again given the opportunity.

Sheila and her family have been the best hosts that we could imagine. The apartment is like you can see in the pictures and it has all you need. The neighbourhood has a lot of shops, restaurants and the subway is very close and you can go everywhere.The best way to live NYC. Thanks Sheila & manny for your hospitality. We hope see you soon in NYC or.... in Catalonia !
The apartment and the location were outstanding!  It's in a fun neighborhood, but it's extremely quiet in the apartment at the same time.  I definitely recommend it!

Shelia apartment was more than what we expected. The apartment was much larger than anticipated and fully stocked with hygiene products, coffee, extra linens and towels and even some milk and other food products. She also had plenty umbrellas handy which were needed on our trip. I stayed at the apartment with my two cousins and a friend and we were comfortable in the apartment. More importantly, one of my cousins had a sudden accident and was in a wheel chair during our stay. The apartment is very handicap accessible with limited stairs, spacey hallways and living space and also a detachable showerhead and tub railings. This is a huge plus because we were worried she would have a lot of trouble getting around but it was no hassle at all. The apartment itself is very clean and modern. We really loved the garden area which had a full set of chairs and table for relaxation and was also very private. Shelia and her husband were amazing hosts and helped with any questions we had. Honestly, our experience was amazing and I am so glad that we had the opportunity to stay in Shelia's apartment.

Had a great time at Sheila's place in the East Village. The location was fabulous, just step out and you are there! The studio was new and clean and had everything you may want to make it like home.  Had a great time!

Sheila and Manny were great hosts in every way.  Met us and briefed us on the place and offered much information about events in the area.  The roomy ground floor apartment has dishwasher, washer/dryer, and all the kitchen appliances you'd need, including our favorite Keurig coffee maker.  Closet space, beautiful floors, stylish modern furniture, and a bed to gladden the heart of the traveler.  This block of St. Mark's Place is peaceful enough during the days, and the area around it throbs with activity especially on weekend evenings.  Classic Lower East Side digs and exceptional hosts.

Merci Sheila pour votre accueil.Votre appartement était propre,bien équipé, au calme dans un quartier très vivant.Nous espérons avoir la chance de pouvoir y revenir!Nous avons passé une très bonne semaine.A bientot.Cathy et Olivier

De bästa värdpar man kan önska sig! Vänliga generösa och hjälpsamma och flexibla.
Lägenheten är jättetrevlig, fräsch och  förvånansvärt tyst för att vara NY. Bakgården är verkligen en tillgång med blommande buskar och träd och morgonsol som sipprar ner mellan husen.

L'appartement est joliment aménagé et bien situé dans Manhattan, à moins de 20 mn de métro ou de marche de la plupart des lieux majeurs de NYC, du quartier des affaires à central park, en passant par soho, chinatown ou little Italy. L'aéroport JFK est à 40 mn de taxi.

La quartier East Village est vivant, très représentatif de l'idée qu'on peut se faire de New York, cependant la rue et l'appartement restent paisibles. Nous y sommes restés au jeudi au mardi et on y dort bien, même le week-end (cela dit, c'est tous les jours le week-end ici).

Sheila et Manny sont très sympathiques et accueillants, il s'agit d'un vrai BnB et les hôtes sont attendus et bien reçus.

Merci à vous pour ce séjour agréable, nous reviendrons.

Sheila was a fantastic host.

We contacted her 3 hours before we arrived to book the apartment, due to a mix up with our hotel. 

She went above and beyond to help us out, literally pushed the boat out for us to accommodate.

The apartment was immaculate and ideally located in the east village. I knew Sheila would be a good host as she shares the same name as my mother haha :)

Thanks again Sheila for everything you really helped us out 

Ross

Our experience staying at the apartment was great! Sheila & Manny were both very helpful and so friendly. Sheila met us when we arrived & showed us around the apartment & where everything was. Looks just like the photos! She went over and above and helped book us some transportation to the airport for a day trip we had & then again for the day we were flying out. The beds were comfortable & everything worked well. The only thing we had trouble with was the hot water in the bathroom but once Manny explained it to us it was easy (you have to let it run a few minutes for it to heat up). Would definitely stay here again & recommend it to everyone :-) thanks for a fabulous time & all your help & recommendations!!!

Our stay at Sheila's apartment was perfect. She was an amazing host. We were celebrating my sister's birthday and were welcomed with warm greetings, flowers and wine. Everything was clean and comfortable and updated.

It was a truly amazing experience to stay at 61 St Marks place, with Sheila & Manny. We could feel they would of great help if a problem occured, and were very nice to us. The appartment is great and really what we expected (even better). We really enjoyed our stay of one week in New York, thanks to Sheila and Manny. I know who to contact for my next trip to NY ;) 
Greetings, 
Héloïse, Alejandra, Garance, Laura

On a scale of 1-10 this is a 20.  The accommodations, the hostess and host, and the neighborhood allowed us to not just visit but to live "NYC".  The pictures of the apartment did not lie.  Plenty of room and a quiet and comfortable place that provided us with everything we needed.  Sheila became a friend for life and her family and friends were the icing on top of the cake. The neighborhood welcomed us into their inner circle.  We loved every minute of it.  We will return !!!!!!

One of new yorks great neighborhoods with restaurants cafes shops and handy to subways.
The place is quiet and private and newly remodeled and clean.
 Its got washer/dryer, dishwasher and every kitchen thingy you need.
The hosts are terrific. Sheila is a super ny lady who can assist with any issue within minutes of a text/call since they live in the building.
The final secret, a private little outdoor teagarden out the back door...wonderful.
Because I hope to stay here on future trips to ny I hesitate to encourage you but I must be honest.

Sheila is one of the nicest people I've ever met. I stayed here three nights and four days with my boyfriend and my dog during our vacation and we felt so welcomed. She provides towels, soaps, fruits, some staple foods like coffee and some condiments. The place smelled very clean when we walked in. There were fresh flowers as a  center piece of the table. Location is right next to the many restaurants and bars in East Village so we only needed to walk a block or two to get some good food. The dog park is just 2 blocks down so it was very convenient to walk our dog. the place is also very private and quiet surprisingly since it is so near a busy street. I highly recommend staying here if you want great service (Sheila really is the best) and a great location.

excellent séjour chez Sheila et Manny. L'appartement est trés coquet, propre et bien situé sur Manhattan. Le quartier est trés sympa , vivant , on y trouve de trés bons restaurants. sheila est trés investie, soucieuse du confort de ses hôtes. Sa famille s'est montrée adorable à notre égard. A recommander sans aucune restriction!

L'appartement est tout à fait conforme aux photos et commentaires. Le quartier est vivant, très agréable et il y a une multitude de restaurants possibles pour se restaurer. Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Sheila qui avaient prévu quelques attentions à notre arrivée : fruits frais, nécessaires pour le petit déjeuner... Sheila et Manny sont très chaleureux, disponibles et de bons conseils pour les visites à faire ! Je recommande cette annonce sans aucune hésitation, l'appartement peut tout à fait convenir pour une famille de 4 personnes (nous étions en famille avec 2 ados). Les stations de métro sont facilement et rapidement accessibles depuis l'appartement. Il y aussi des supérettes ou l'on trouve tout le nécessaire.
Un grand merci à Sheila et Manny sans qui notre voyage n'aurait pas été aussi parfait !

Vi blev mødt af Sheila og hendes familie ved døren til ejendommen, meget søde mennesker. Shiela fulgte os til lejligheden som var lige så fin som på billederne og beskrivelsen, en helt perfekt "rede" for et besøg i byernes by New York.
Vi følte os meget godt behandlet og vil helt klart komme tilbage hvis vi skulle til NYC - stor anbefaling til alle der skal have et sted i NYC.
Kærlig hilsen Familien Laursen

Stay by Sheila and Manny ( her husband ) was like being at home . Are two wonderful people . They advised us where to go and even offered a wonderful dinner at a restaurant reviewed by the ny times.
I hope that we can be reunited one day . I'll recommend this apartment to my friends interested in spending a holiday in Manhattan. Perfect!

Upon arrival we were warmly greeted by Shelia waiting for us in the rain, we were made to feel like family from the word go everything about the apartment was as we expected , including the personal touch of  flowers  wine & fruit making us feel at home right away.
 The village atmosphere was more than we expected felt safe to wander around at night, comfortable walking distance to Astor Place for metro for both Uptown & Downtown lines.
There were many restaurants & supermarkets for food choices everything was so easy as Australian's we feel it was good value for money.

We had an amazing time staying at Sheila's listing! The location was perfect for us since we spent most of our time around Soho. Upon arrival Sheila's son let us in and soon Sheila stopped by to let us know where everything was. The day we arrived was my birthday and she left cupcakes and flowers for us! She was a great host and promptly replied to any of our messages. This studio was a perfect fit for our family of 3. We will try to stay here the next time we are in the city!

Accoglienza ottima! L'alloggio molto carino e confortevole, ampio, estremamente pulito e recentemente ristrutturato. Era dotato di tutto il necessario per cucinare e hanno fornito non solo gli asciugamani ma anche tutti i prodotti per l'igiene personale. Dotato di lavastoviglie, lavatrice e asciugatrice. Il quartiere caratteristico, con molti locali per la sera e strategico per visitare Manahattan up & down. I proprietari, Sheila e Manny, sono stati sempre molto disponibili nel darci indicazioni e suggerimenti e molto friendly!! Assolutamente da consigliare.

Sheila's studio is perfect!

My boyfriend and I stayed here for two weeks over Christmas 2014, and were super happy with the apartment. Its cozy, clean, quiet and in a great spot!

Upon arrival, I was welcomed by Sheila and immediately felt at home.  There were flowers, basics in the fridge and cupboards (like eggs milk and cereal) and extra towels/sheets if you need. 
The subway station (we walked to Astor Place) was just at the end of the street- about a 3-5 minute walk. The neighbourhood is buzzing with bars, restaurants and feels young and hip.
The apartment itself (like other guests have noted) is at the back of the building, so it is super quiet and easy to sleep well in.

Sheila was easily contactable throughout our whole stay, and kindly invited us to her annual Christmas party- which was a lot of fun!
For Josh's birthday we received wine and chocolates- Sheila really is the perfect host!

Thank you Sheila (and Manny!)- we honestly felt like the luckiest people in NYC staying at your place.

Olivia and Josh (Melbourne, Australia)

A sweet and gracious hostess , an apartment equipped with the best of a room at the best resort you can stay , attention to detail , such as towels , immaculately tidy and smelling sheets . there are no words to describe the feeling of surprise as we enter and discover all the pampering and treats prepared for our arrival . Before finish this post I have to take my hat off to Sheila and Manny . thanks for everything.

I’ve been back home for a week after spending four (4!) wonderful weeks in New York at Sheila and Manny’s airbnb. This was my first airbnb experience – and it couldn’t have been better! Sheila and Manny’s airbnb may be the best secret in New York City! It’s so incredibly quiet, comfortable, convenient – and it has all the amenities (including washer and dryer!) – plus it’s in one of NYC’s most fun neighborhoods. And Sheila and Manny are wonderful, generous hosts.

Sheila and Manny’s was recommended to me by my friend Ulrika W. from Sweden who usually stays there when she travels to New York with her family. 

I’m from New York myself and lived in this neighborhood in the East Village many years ago. Now I live in Europe, but I’m so happy to have found Sheila and Manny’s – which really felt like my own home away from home. I can’t wait to stay there again!

Sheila,  What a delightful getaway you offer for the weary traveler!  This apartment truly offers everything one would need and more!  We found the space to be just as you have advertised...clean, modern and quiet!   I couldn't believe the building was on such a happening street as quiet as it was inside!  There were plenty of towels, blankets and pillows and then with all the extra touches, we really felt like guests in your home rather than customers.  I would highly recommend this Air BnB experience to anyone.    Joan & Ed Merchlinsky

Sheila and Manny have been wonderfull hosts. They were very active in the commmunication. What was also al plus was that they could us great tips about the area, a nice diner, restaurants. And even a tip for gospel also we were not fit enough to make it. I thank them for their tips. The apartment was reallys nice. Everything besides the bathroom is in one space. The only thing was that there is not much light since it is in the basement. We had a great time there. Thanks

Soggiorno perfetto, casa pulita, accogliente e con tutti gli accessori necessari. L'appartamento è a pochi minuti a piedi dalla Metro, situato in un quartiere molto carino, pieno di vita e di locali diversi, ma comunque molto silenzioso. L'accoglienza dell'Host è stata impeccabile e i suoi consigli sui locali da provare sono stati molto preziosi, ci siamo goduti l'esperienza newyorkese fino in fondo!

We had a wonderful time.  The apartment was super clean, bed comfy and very quiet.  We especially loved the flowers, wine and bowl of fruit.  What a great surprise!

We also enjoyed some of the restaurants she recommended for us - very helpful.

Loved the invite for St. Patrick's Day dinner.  Very hospitable and welcoming.

Felt very safe.

My family and I stayed at Sheila and Manny's studio for a week and we absolutely loved it. It's just as described, super clean and with everything you need. We appreciated very much the little extra touches such as the beautiful flowers, the coffee, wine, fruit, etc. Even though it's located a very busy street with lots of bars and restaurants, it was really quiet at night because it leads to the back yard. 
Sheila and her family are wonderful people and we are very happy we chose their place and got to meet them and had an evening with them. We couldn't have had a better NY experience!
Thanks S&M!

If you are looking for a singular Lower East Side experience then this is the place to stay! Sheila and Manny are fantastic hosts who were so generous and welcoming. As part of the close-knit St Marks community, their knowledge of the area was boundless.  The apartment was very comfortable, spotless and quiet with lots of touches to make our stay special. Would definitely recommend.
Sheila et Manny nous ont gentillement accueillis. Nous avons appréciés leur discrétion. Appartement confortable et très bien situé pour visites et découvertes. Je recommande cette location.

We have highly appreciated our stay in Sheila's apartment. We spent one week with our childrens. Sheila and Manny are really nice host guest, we had a very good welcome. They were very reactive to all our request ( reply in less than 2 minutes with (Hidden by Airbnb) -:) ) and always ready to help you. 

The appartement was fully compliant with the description and pictures, clean, and very well equipped ( all is new ) with more than all you will need. It is perfect for a family of 4.  It's also important to say that it is very quiet, with absolutely no noise from the street, what is rare in NYC.

The area ( Saint Marks Place in East Village ) is very nice, close to many restaurants, bars and shops, you will love it if you want to live as a New-yorker, far from very touristic areas. 

At the end of the day, we fully recommend this address.

A beautiful, quiet apartment in a great, vibrant and lively neighbourhood! Over 7 days, we enjoyed restful sleeps, our first coffee of the day in our private little garden space, and the use of laundry facilities and kitchen (stocked with condiments and more - like the great coffee and fresh milk!). On the street and throughout the neighbourhood, food and drinks and parks and art and culture abound, sometimes making it difficult to stray too far away in the day. Greenwich and SOHO are also great neighbouring areas within easy walking distance. Thank you, Sheila and Manny, for your great company and generous spirit (and for the wine  - and the beautiful flowers which began to wilt and fade only in the last hour before we left ;)). Did we mention to you that we will be back next year? Please reserve a place for us. xoxo

Just came back from a week's wonderful stay in NYC - much thanks to Sheila and Manny and their lovely quiet apartment right in the center of East Village. Great funky neighborhood and a very functional apartment that was very quiet - we woke up in the morning from bird song from our little patio outside! Didn't think that was possible in Manhattan! And Sheila took really good care of us and made us feel both welcome and comfortable - info beforehand, chilled wine and fresh fruit when we arrived and tips on things to do and see while we were there. I would definitely stay there again on my next visit to NYC. Also a short walk to subway stations so you easily get to where ever you want to go - but it is also a nice walk up and down Broadway to get to Battery park or to Time Square. I would rate this a 5 star stay :-)

Siamo stati ospiti di Sheila e Manny per dieci giorni durante il mese di maggio 2015.
La casa è esattamente come nelle foto se non meglio. Al nostro arrivo Sheila ci ha mostrato come muoverci nell'appartamento e ci ha fornito di una guida con i consigli utili sulla zona. La dispensa per la prima colazione era ben fornita. E' stato davvero comodo avere a disposizione lavatrice, asciugatrice e lavastoviglie. Da non sottovalutare il piccolo giardino sul retro che regalava momenti di relax circondati dal canto degli uccellini. Potremmo continuare ad elencare i lati positivi della casa, dalla posizione ai servizi locali ma questo si può tranquillamente trovare nelle precedenti recensioni. Preferiamo invece dedicare delle parole alla gentilezza di Sheila e Manny. Abbiamo avuto la fortuna di incontrare due persone davvero straordinarie. Ci hanno accolti come amici di lunga data e così hanno continuato a farci sentire per i giorni successivi. Capitava a volte di incontrarli davanti casa tornando dalle lunghe giornate e subito ci invitavano a bere qualcosa di fresco per fare due chiacchiere. Abbiamo iniziato a consigliare l'appartamento ancora prima di rientrare in Italia e nel caso dovessimo fare ritorno a NY sarà sicuramente questo il nostro punto di riferimento. 
Grazie di cuore!! 
Un bacio <3
Alessandro, Elisa e Daniele

Our second stay with Sheila proved as interesting, welcoming and exciting at the first.  The pictures that she uses are very representative of what you will find when you get there.  She is always available to answere any questions about the city and the neighborhood.  East Village is a vibrant, diverse and fun place to spend time.  I will be back again for sure

Sheila and Manny’s apartment is located in vibrant East Village where you’ll find plenty of small shops, restaurants and lots of bars. The pictures accurately represent what you’ll find in the apartment: it has everything you need and the bed is very comfortable. The streets can be noisy at night, but you won’t hear any of it inside the apartment which is very calm. Instead, you’ll wake up to the pleasant birds’ songs coming from the backyard. 
We were very pleased to arrive and find fruit, chocolate and wine at our disposal. Sheila and Manny were great hosts in every way: welcoming, generous and very helpful! We would definitely like to stay here again. Thanks so much!
Thanks so much for a lovely stay, the flat and area was amazing! You and Manny were really helpful, definitely see you again!

Sheila et Manny sont des hôtes charmants et accueillants, nous avons passé un excellent séjour. L'appartement correspond parfaitement à la description de l'annonce, situé en demi sous-sol et en arrière cours donc à l'abri du bruit de la rue. Il est un peu juste (un canapé lit peu confortable) pour 4 sur un long séjour (10 jours) mais parfait pour 2 personnes. Le quartier est très vivant (pleins de petits restaurants), a proximité de nombreuses lignes de métro et bus permettant de profiter pleinement de Manhattan. Encore merci pour votre accueil.

Sheila and Manny are 2 great and warm persons we have appreciated for their kindness and availability.  Flat was perfect to look around and close to subway so.... Great.  Clean,  cozy and perfect for a small family.  We appreciated a lot the stay and their help especially because we had one of our daughters not feeling 100% and they were always available for suggestions.

Sheila and Manny are very awesome. They given us all the necessary for living in their apartment like ours. They are lovely, friendly, generous, beautiful like thier apartment too. If I would asked to describe in only one sentence Sheila, Manny and their apartment, we could only reply: "simply the BEST!!!.
My bests Dario's tribe

We loved our stay in the East Village, and will come back for sure!! The apartment was perfect.  Sheila and Manny were very welcoming, helpful, and generous.  We felt well looked after - travelling with my daughter, it was so nice to know someone was nearby in case we needed anything. The apartment was very spacious, well equipped, comfortable, and quiet - we slept so well after our big days out on the town.  The East Village is the perfect location with things to do day and night, and walking distance to Lower East Side, West Village, Greenwich Village, and subway lines.  
I hope to visit again, and would definitely stay again at Sheila and Manny's place - our home away from home in NYC!
Great locating with loads of eating places just minutes away. Apartment has everything we need. Manny & Shala was helpful and timely in responding. Looking forward to going back in a week's time!

Wow...what a great place. Perfect in every way. It was also very quiet, which is not something one expects in NYC. Sheila was very nice and I hope that on future visits to NYC we will have a chance to get to know her better. Apartment is very nice, quit  and has everything that is necessary for a great stay in a great city.

We enjoyed our 2nd week stay in the apartment. Sheila has been friendly & helpful. Great location , mins always from the train  & great eating places. Apartment well equipped and well kept. Other than there is no phone signal in the basement apartment, all had been great. Will definitely come back!

Sheila y Manny nos recibieron afectuosamente, compartimos una copa de vino presentandonos y nos dieron algunos tips para recorrer por NYC. El apartamento estaba en exelentes condiciones tal como se ven en las fotos. El barrio es muy comodo ya que teniendo el subte a dos cuadras nos quedo accesible para trasladarnos. Esta lleno de bares muy cancheros y restos donde se puede almorzar y cenar. Recomendamos un 100% a esta familia para hospedarse. Muchas gracias a Manny y Sheila, los esperamos en Buenos Aires cuando gusten! Saludos! Luciana y Bernabe.

Wir hatten eine wundervolle Zeit in New York und das Apartment war perfekt- die Location, die Einrichtung und die Gastgeberin. Alles wurde mit viel Liebe zum Detail ein- und hergerichtet. Vielen Dank!

Thank you Sheila for a great stay. The apartment was lovely with everything that we needed for a week in New York. Sheila was very helpful and friendly, always on hand for recommendations or to answer questions. Staying with Sheila made our trip to New York just that much better. And living in an apartment instead of a hotel was a great way to get a feel for what it would be like to live in the city.

Great location! Halfway between downtown and Times Square area. Tons of very excellent and famous restaurants. Apartment was very cozy and felt like an authentic New York experience. Hosts were great and incredibly accommodating. Would stay here again.

Sheila and Manny have been the best host ever! Caring and really willing to make you feel welcome. Lovely people a pleasure talking with them. The flat is perfectly located, we walked all the time never for a cab. It is clean a very nice. She also welcomed us with a complimentary bottle of wine. What can you ask more? Super...we will be back no doubt!

Sheila and Manny are wonderful people, they were really pleased! We feel as in our home and we left them with pain in our hearts. The apartament is situated in a great area (near the lines 6, N, Q and R of the metro) and omptimally linked to all the city's most important places. Everything you can need is in the apartament and for all the rest ask to Sheila, she'll provide for you. 
For sure we'll return in Sheila and Manny's apartament in our next holiday in New York, we are glad to have found two new friends!!

Sheila and Manny made me feel very welcome and it was great of them to stay up until midnight to show me the studio when I arrived late from London.
Sheila left a bottle of red wine which was a lovely touch and one I enjoyed over the course of my stay.
The Studio is really well located in walking distance to great restaurants and great local stores that seem to stock everything: Soho is a 20 minute walk away and it's really easy to get everywhere else too.
It's also presented really nicely and has everything you could want including a washer/dryer and the most comfortable bed.   
I stayed at the studio for a 4 day business trip so unfortunately my schedule didn't allow much time to get to know Sheila or the neighbourhood but what I did see, I loved.

Wonderful hosts, Shiela, Manny and family and friends of theirs all contributed to making our New York trip feel like our home.
 The apartment is comfortable with every toiletry you could ask. The kitchen cupboards are well stocked too- everyone leaves things for the next guests, as well as the wine, nibbles and flowers that welcome you.
The garden is a little haven and the neighbourhood is vibrant  and full of supermarkets, restaurants and bars.
We will definately be back.
our sons aged 20 and 17 adored the area and were able to be totally independent.
Buses ,trains and subway all safe and easy to get to.

P.s excellent lighting at apartment.

Debby and Geoff.

Sheila greeted us warmly and was responsive to our requests. The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed. The location was great, with plenty to do in the area, and yet the apartment was quiet and private.

Our stay in New York was great because Sheila and Manny made us feel at home. They are wonderful and caring, and the apartment is perfect! Great location, close to subway and restaurants. Quiet, clean and it had everything we needed!

We were made to feel so welcome .I can honestly say Sheila & Manny are the perfect hosts .They have a font of knowledge which they are willing to share.We are so pleased that we stayed at their beautiful studio apartment .We couldn't have wished for better .

What can I say about this place? Amazing location, amazing bars and restaurants, and of course amazing hosts! Sheila and Manny are the best host you could ever ask for! Very inviting and a pleasure to meet. The condo is very cozy and has all the amenities that you are looking for. It is very quiet at night in the middle of East Village which is a plus! I will definitely be back!

Our stay at Sheila and Manny's was absolutely perfect for a first time Airbnb user. The apartment was beautiful and clean, and there was a bottle of wine left for us as a welcome which was incredibly sweet. They left a great suggestions book of restaurants and bars - one of the highlights of our trip was going to happy hour at Tile Bar for a drink with Sheila and talking to the locals, I'd recommend getting a chance to go for a quick drink and getting to know her if you have time in NYC! We can't thank you enough for everything Sheila, from texting us and checking in on how we're doing to having a drink together and all your guidance for the city. If I return again, I'll be back to stay with you for sure. Thank you!

What an excellent experience we had here in east village! The hosts were very friendly and welcoming and the apartment was beautiful and roomy, and was as described. We even had a beautiful orchid arrangement that made the place elegant! It is also located in a wonderful neighborhood; we especially recommend the "Mud" for coffee and breakfast, just around the corner. Would definitely stay here again when we return to NYC. Thank you for an excellent experience (our first with AirBnB)

This is our second time at Sheila's. Just like the first time, it was a wonderful experience. I don't have words to describe how nice is Sheila to their guests. Since the first time we came, she made as feel family and all life time friends. The place is so perfect, excellent location and with details such as gourmet delicatessen selected especially by Sheila in the fridge for their guest to enjoy for free. Goat Brie,  beer, bagels and even fresh flowers to name some. This is definitely a 10 stars paradise.
Thank you Sheila for making the first trip and this one, again, a unique superb experience.

Abbiamo soggiornato il ponte dell immacolata, l alloggio è come nella descrizione: centrale, comodo ai servizi, in un bel quartiere, pulito e spazioso.

Sheila e suo marito sono persone fantastiche, gentili e molto disponibili.

Lo consiglio a tutti coloro che vogliono soggiornare nella grande mela! Spero di tornarci presto.

Grazie di tutto!

As soon as we arrived Sheila and Manny welcomed us with open arms. They were easily accessible if we had any questions and were happy to give us tips on where to go around town. We couldn't have asked for better hosts in Manny and Sheila.

The unit was absolutely perfect. After looking at what we would be paying for a hotel near Times Square at this time of the year, then deciding on this, we could not have been happier. It was twice the size of what I expected, and was fully stocked with everything we needed. Even though it was warmer than expected, the studio was warm, and the little yard out the back added a nice touch.

Overall, the place was perfect for a week's stay in the Big Apple and, when we return, I'll certainly be in contact with Sheila and Manny again!

We absolutely could not have asked for a better host, and we only saw her on the first day of our trip, that is how amazing she is!!

The apartment, exactly as it looks, perfect for a couple and even a few kids, all the amenities of home.

The location is AMAZING and Sheila leaves no stone unturned as you will find a lengthy list inside the apartment of her favorite local eatieries and shopping areas.  We took one or two suggestions as a trial and then quickly tried to check out the rest because everything is spot on, nearby, and incredible.

My partner and I stayed with Sheila and Manny for New Years and we were greeted with Champagne  to ring in the New Year.

There is no doubt that we will stay here again, if it's available next time we are in New York.

Thank you Sheila for pretty much perfection!
Sheila's flat in NYC is great. Its location and amenities are excellent. Sheila is a great hostess.

Sheila is a great host. Prompt mail responces even she was away in some days during my stay, welcome fruits and flowers...etc.. I had to check out on the day we experienced an historical blizzard, I had change my check out time several times, she arranged it flexibly. It was very nice.

I love the location very much. It's really in the middle of Eats Village, but not so noisy even in the evening. I did not have to walk long to get to 24 hours super market, my kind of bars and restaurants.

One of my friends who lives in this neighbour hood for a long time, visited this room and told me "I want to live here!".

Sheila was so wonderful. She's a taste of an authentic New York that is all to hard to come by these days. The space was perfectly represented in the photos and Sheila and Manny were accommodating and so easy to communicate with. Highly, highly recommended stay! Also the place has an excellent basement entrance which is nice and private and the whole apartment is so quiet and peaceful.

Sheila is a wonderful host. The flat is lovely and very practical, we felt at home right away (I even was able to do my laundry, so convenient!). Sheila and Manny invited us to their superbowl party, it was great. I am definitely coming back!!
There are no difference between the reality and the pictures show on the website. Sheila was a nice and responsible host. I very enjoyed my stay here in New York.
I don't want to write a good review because this place is so wonderful that everyone will want to stay here and it might be so booked I will never get to come back!

Sheila et son mari nous ont très bien accueillis. A notre arrivée nous avons trouvé un joli bouquet de fleurs, une bouteille de vin, du lait, des amandes et des petits biscuits...des attentions très sympathiques. Le logement est un grand studio, simple mais très propre et surtout très calme (important à New York). Sa situation en entresol fait qu'il n'est pas très clair mais si l'on vient pour visiter New York, cela n'a pas d'importance.

Sheila & Manny's spacious East Village apt. was a perfect location for my son & I as is a block from my college daughter's apt. & 10 min. from NYU & subway stops. Sheila's extra touches of fresh flowers, wine, soft drinks & greeting us when we arrived was so nice! Great to have Kreuig coffee maker, dishwasher, TV (w/Netflix access) washer/dryer, hair dryer & enjoyed their outdoor courtyard too! Appreciated the separate entrance w/ timed hallway light. Will request to stay when in NYC again! - Liz (from Oklahoma)

Sheila and Manny were great hosts. Sheila was there when we arrived and showed us around the space. The space is exactly as shown in the photos. Perfect space for what we needed. So conveniently located, short walk to the subway. Neighborhood is lively and friendly, can find anything you need within a block. Hopefully I am able to come back sooner than later. 
Also after I left, Sheila found one of my earrings and mailed it home to me. Thanks so much Sheila and Manny

Sheila and Manny are the greatest hosts ever. We felt really welcomed, more like we visited a friend. The appartment is tidy, clean and you have everything you need (and actually some more). I will recomend it to all friends going to New York and will for sure ask to stay here again if I return!

Sheila, the apartment, New York, East Village - everything was great! We're going back!  Would recommend it to anyone!  Sheila was super sweet with coffee, tee, milk, beer, wine, butter, jam, fruit and snacks for us! That was incredible!  We had everything we could wish for! The location is great.   The apartment roomy, comfortable, homey! Don't think twice about staying with Sheila!

We arrived earlier than planned and Sheila was happy to meet us when we arrived. Im at a loss of words when it comes to describing how lovely the apartment is, how thoughtful and generous her accommodations were (she has truly thought of everything in terms of stocking the apartment), and how friendly and courteous she and her family are. It was my birthday and she even went as far as to buy us a bottle of wine and 2 cupcakes! She is incredibly respectful of privacy, yet there when you need something. Staying in this super cozy, yet spacious apartment and having the pleasure of getting to know Sheila was definitely the "icing on the cake" in terms of our vacation. Perfect neighborhood, perfect apartment, perfect host. Absolutely ZERO complaints, which is utterly amazing in NYC when you always seem to have to sacrifice something! (Noise level, outdoor space, indoor space, walk-up building, etc). We've already said that we can't imagine going back and not staying here-- as anywhere else would surely be a letdown. If you're lucky enough to stumble upon a vacancy for this place, book it asap!!

Fantastic stay- Manny showed us round, then Sheila came to say Hi  next day, even getting up early to say Bye on our last morning. The apartment was lovely, clean and welcoming. We loved the fresh spring flowers! Great to have milk, cereal and some food in cupboards when we arrived worn out. East Village is a fab area, full of really nice cafes and restaurants, with a friendly vibe. Our hosts recommendations for meals were very useful, as were the guide books and maps. Felt like a home from home- a big thankyou to Manny and Sheila! x

Shiela's place was the perfect place to call home on our trip to New York! She was so friendly and made us feel comfortable in the unfamiliar city. She was willing to answer any questions that we had, and had great suggestions on where to eat! The place itself was very clean and perfect for our family of four. When we go back to the city, I'll definitely be looking up her place to see if it's available!

Après avoir échangé avec Sheila et Manny sur notre voyage à l'occasion des 10 ans de notre fille cadette, nous avons été accueillis avec cupcakes, bougie, fleurs, bouteille de vin...
Sheila et Manny sont des hôtes extrêmement chaleureux et attentifs, qui ont à coeur de rendre votre séjour agréable et enrichissant. Manny nous a emmenés le dimanche matin dans une église de Harlem pour assister à une messe gospel et nous avons eu avec eux des échanges très agréables et intéressants. 
Ils se sont tous deux montrés très attentionnés avec nos deux filles, qui les ont adorés ! 
Le logement est très bien situé, au coeur d'un quartier très vivant d'East Village. On peut s'y restaurer à toute heure du jour et de la nuit et pourtant, l'appartement est incroyablement calme. On n'entend pas un bruit de l'extérieur.
De plus, le logement est très bien équipé. Il ne manque rien. Il y a même une machine expresso et des produits de base à disposition.
Nous recommandons sans réserve cette adresse. Sheila et Manny sont les meilleurs hôtes que nous ayons rencontrés jusque là.

Sheila was the perfect host. She greeted us out front and helped us find parking in the neighborhood. Once we got inside we were delighted to discover that Sheila had gotten us a gift card to a nearby coffee shop for our anniversary. The apartment is the perfect home base for New York. It was so nice to have a small outside patio to relax on. The neighborhood has so many amazing restaurants and bars within walking distance. The metro (6) was only a few blocks away as well. If we had any questions or issues Sheila was so helpful and easy to contact.

Thanks Sheila for this week. It was a pleasure to live in your apartment with our 2 daughters (7 and 4). The flat is very clean and very useful with the kitchen and a lot of surprises! Umbrellas, hairdryer, travel guide, milk for the kids, fresh fruits... The subway is at 5 minutes walk. You can find a lot of restaurants just near the flat. Thanks again for the help and your kindness during the lost of our baggage by British Airways! It was our first try with AirBnB, it will not be the only one!

Very nice, beautiful and well equipped apartment. Great location in the city center, lots of bars and restaurants around. Sheila is a perfect host, very friendly and helpful. It was a pleasure to stay at her place. Recommend to all:)

Alors appartement de Sheila est tout simplement parfait, l'on s'y sent comme a la maison. A notre arrivé Sheila nous attendais sur les marches de l'immeuble pour nous donner les clefs et faire la présentation de l’appartement. Celui-ci est t'elle que décrit , c'est un grand studio muni de toutes les commodités nécessaire (l'on a pu faire une lessive,Sheila nous a mis a dispo tous les produit nécessaire;) il est également munie d'une petit cours extérieur fort agréable. le cartier est vraiment top , très bien situé , très vivant et animé ( mais l'on ne l'entende pas depuis appartement;) pleins de resto proche et proche de ligne de métro; En un mots , appartement au top, je recommande fortement et sans hésitation cette appartment a tout personne.

From the moment we arrived we felt right at home ! The department is as it looks in the photos and even warmer , very comfortable and three blocks from the subway that takes you everywhere . 
Thank you Sheila for your cute energy and thanks Manny for taking us to the best Gospel Church that can exist, was an unforgettable experience.
See you soon!

Agréable appartement, dans un quartier super agreable .
Propore et spaciwux pour new-york, une bonne adresse pour nyc

Sheila and Manny are great hosts who make the East Village experience interesting and complete.  They helped us with our traveling difficulties and had pre-stocked the kitchen so there was no immediate requirement to go shopping.  I loved the coffee !  Well done.

Nuestra anfitriona Sheila y Manny nos hicieron sentir como en casa. Siempre atentos a nuestras necesidades. 

Al vivir en el mismo edificio, podíamos consultarla cualquier duda... una experiencia genial!! estamos muy agradecidos. Es un sitio 100% recomendable. La casa mejor que en las fotos. Nueva y muy bien equipada. A parte que nos dejó algún snack, etc... teníamos el frigorífico con bastantes cosas. Y una botella de vino de bienvenida!!

Encontramos la casa sin problemas en un barrio muy cerca de la línea verde, amarilla y gris (acceso a todo). Había muchas tiendas y restaurantes.

Repetiríamos sin dudarlo.

Sheila was waiting for us as we arrived which was lovely. As well as showing us round the apartment she had provided milk, juice, coffee, wine and snacks-what a welcome! The apartment was beautifully furnished and decorated with stylish coordinating textiles and soft furnishings. Sheila is a wonderfully warm and generous host.

Sheila is a gracious and welcoming host!  She was very accessible and responsive to any and all questions we had before our visit and even during our visit.  Sheila truly made us feel at home!  She went the extra mile by bringing us fresh bagels, lox and veggies for breakfast one morning after we mentioned we were looking forward to New York bagels.  I highly recommend booking Sheila's studio, the accommodations, neighborhood and host all were intrinsic in our great weekend!

Sheila was an exceptional host. She was very accessible and helpful all through our stay. We arrived to fresh flowers, fresh fruit and a bottle of wine!  The apartment was just as described and we loved the little back yard patio. The neighborhood was lively--packed with restaurants & bars. We would definitely recommend this place and would stay here again. Thank you Sheila & Manny!!!
Sheila was very welcoming, helpful and generous. Everything was perfect. I recommend it to anyone, who... well, really just anyone.

The studio was perfect!  Sheila and Manny were the perfect hosts!  Sheila greeted us the first day with fresh flowers and fruit. There was milk, juice and even wine in the fridge. They were so helpful with tips on places to go eat and things to do. The apartment was stocked with everything you would need for a stay. the apartment was located in a very trendy centralized location with many places to eat and lots to do. Very clean and quiet. We were so impressed, we wouldn't want to stay anywhere else when returning to NYC. thank you both for sharing your wonderful apartment. You both helped make our two week stay wonderful!

We loved staying at Sheila and Manny's place!  We enjoyed conversation on the stoop, access to the back garden for morning coffee, the roominess of the studio for our family of four (five for one night!), fresh fruit, wine and flowers on move-in day, and the way we were welcomed into the family/neighborhood !  Manny and Sheila were both available with recommendations of where to go and what to do that made it easy to go beyond the usual tourist stuff.  It felt like staying with friends and we would absolutely come back!!

My daughter and myself had a fantastic stay in Sheila and Manny's place.  It was exactly as described. Very clean and quiet.  Very spacious, fresh flowers on arrival, wine, fruit - wonderful surprise.   Perfect location to everything, subways, eateries, etc.  They also recommended places to eat, places to visit etc.  

The neighbourhood is very lively with lots of restaurants and bars all reasonably priced as well.  

We will definitely be back and hopefully will be looking at staying in their place if available.

What a wonderful apartment to base your stay in New York we didn't get to meet our hosts as our holidays clashed but they were still in touch by email Everything was clean and tidy and we felt at home as soon as we arrived! Good instruction were left for markets and restaurants and places to go We had a great week !

Shelia and Manny were amazing hosts! They were very welcoming, generous, helpful, open and friendly. 
The apartment was an oasis from the busy city- it was quiet, clean, comfortable and had everything (and more) than we needed. There were also thoughtful extras provided when we arrived such as flowers, wine, milk etc.
East Village is a very lively area and there is a huge variety of restaurants and bars to choose from just a short walk from the door. 
This was the perfect place to spend our month long stay in NYC and Shelia and Manny couldn't have been better people to stay with.
Sheila's Place was wonderful. It was spacious and very clean.  Sheila goes beyond necessity to make her guests feel comfortable by providing many extras.  I would highly recommend it to everyone.

Sheila is a great host! This was my second stay with her and I can't wait to go back. The location is great for exploring the whole city or just the surrounding neighborhoods. Clean and comfortable with everything you would need.

This is a great spot in the heart of the east village. It is perfect if you want to live like a local. The amenities are really great too-- a washer and dryer makes all the difference! The courtyard is lovely and would be great in summer. The apartment has a private entrance so you have a lot of privacy which is great. We can wait to go back!
Sheila ar Manny are very helpful and she takes care of you all the time. Our stay in NYC was perfect thanks to them... we are very grateful!! 100% recommended

Todo bien , el lugar es bonito y el barrio está súper tranquilo y seguro. Fuimos 3 personas y estuvimos cómodos durante nuestra estadía. El internet fallo por momentos pero sheila buscó en todo momento repararlo y los últimos dos dias ya funcionaba sin problemas , pienso que fue algún detalle aislado. Si es recomendable!!
