I cannot say enough good things about my stay.

One thing that I feel should be mentioned, if you plan to walk to the beach, it is down some steep hills, and the walk back is up some steep hills. If physically that would be a problem, is should be noted, but I rather enjoyed the walk!
Martin’s place was excellent! Great location and such a stylish, clean space. It’s a shame they’re selling their cute place! Thanks again for everything!
ｵｼｬﾚでﾏﾝﾘｰの雰囲気ととてもﾏｯﾁした素敵な家でした｡ﾎｽﾄのMartinには現地の情報やﾌｪﾘｰのお得な乗り方を教えてもらいました｡同じ金額でそこそこのﾎﾃﾙに泊まるなら迷わずMartinの家をおすすめします｡

Martin & Jackie are true superhosts. We stayed her in early March 2019 and had a fantastic time. Super apartment and Martin personally ensured our stay in Manly as comfortable and smooth as possible. AirBnB at its best. Thank you!

name: 尖沙咀的1房1厅,住3人,有厨房月租14000起
summary: 在尖沙咀的1房1廳,有厨房,可住3一4人,近佐敦地鉄上,合長住,可自己做飯
description: 在尖沙咀的1房1廳,有厨房,可住3一4人,近佐敦地鉄上,合長住,可自己做飯

host.host_about: 本人在油尖旺收租多年

reviews.comments: good experienced...nice location and easy to reach..will take this again if possible for next visit to Hong Kong,thanks to the host for everything...
房东很热情,离佐敦地铁站很近,楼下有百佳超市,设施齐全,有厨房方便烧饭｡

name: Near Tai O,Airport,Big Buddha,Disney, beach.Nature
summary: Near to the Hong Kong International Airport and Tong Fuk Beach. It is convenient to go Tung Chung to get access to a huge shopping mall, Tai O, Big Buddha and Hong Kong Disneyland. The flat contains 2 double bedroom, a furnished kitchen and a Japanese style living room (Tatami) where you can sleep. Air conditioner and TV are provided. The flat is located on the ground floor, there is no need for you to walk stairs.
space: A small flat perfectly for tourists and local families to spend their holidays and journey. It is away from the city for you to relax.  The air is refreshing as it is surrounded by many greening area.
description: Near to the Hong Kong International Airport and Tong Fuk Beach. It is convenient to go Tung Chung to get access to a huge shopping mall, Tai O, Big Buddha and Hong Kong Disneyland. The flat contains 2 double bedroom, a furnished kitchen and a Japanese style living room (Tatami) where you can sleep. Air conditioner and TV are provided. The flat is located on the ground floor, there is no need for you to walk stairs. A small flat perfectly for tourists and local families to spend their holidays and journey. It is away from the city for you to relax.  The air is refreshing as it is surrounded by many greening area. The whole flat is ALL for you!  You can cook and eat hotpot. Besides, there is a big outdoor area for BBQ and exercise. You can go hiking nearby. It is just 5 mins from Tong Fuk Beach. You can swim, surf and sunbath there. There are several restaurants and grocery stores where you can buy necessities and have meals. We can communicate Cantonese, English and Mandarin. You can a
transit: Taxi, Bus, Ferry. It is convenient to come from airport
access: The whole flat is ALL for you!  You can cook and eat hotpot. Besides, there is a big outdoor area for BBQ and exercise. You can go hiking nearby. It is just 5 mins from Tong Fuk Beach. You can swim, surf and sunbath there. There are several restaurants and grocery stores where you can buy necessities and have meals.
interaction: We can communicate Cantonese, English and Mandarin. You can always look for us if you have anything in need.
house_rules: lower volume after 11:00 P.M.

host.host_about: I am Nam! I am a friendly talkative and outgoing person. I’d like to meet people from all over the world. Welcome you all!

address.street: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Had a great stay in HK!

Location is super close to Bus stop.. 

Host/s are extremely accommodating and hospitable!!!
Great place to spend some days in a relaxed and peaceful environment in HK. Tiffany is very caring and her worker was very attentive and helpful with us. She also lent us her two subway cards.

Nam is very accomodating tho I didnt see him in person, we arrived earlier than the check in time Im so worried because I have a child and old pals with me but he allow us to get inside and take a rest, he answers quickly to all my queries, when we return to Hongkong for sure I will book again to his place.

If you like the beach, this is the perfect place. The beach is just about 500m away from the premise. I feel that the place is pretty far from the central area, ie Tung Chung station, but it is convenient to move around since buses and taxis are plenty.

非常棒的住宿體驗 Nam熱情 細心 Tiffany周到 有耐心 之前出行人數沒有確認好 反復修改了三次 Nam都第一時間回復同意更改 還幫忙加床墊等生活用品 並發送了一份圖文並茂的出行指南書 方便我們坐車 購物 吃飯 點個讚 ! Tiffany很有禮貌 每次見面都打招呼問好 還借給我們洗衣服的盆子 還有轉換插座 非常感謝!   房子靠近大嶼山 依山面海 環境好 空氣佳 花草樹木 陽光沙灘 早晨都是鳥兒叫我們起床 對了 這裡的牛牛也是一道美麗的風景線 誰住誰知道 哈哈
Really nice, comfortable AirBNB! Enjoyed our stay.
Tong Fuk is a perfect location to relax, go to the beach and hike in the mountains. Very nice and clean place
Staff  are friendly and helpful.  My family had a nice vacation staying at your flat. Thanks a lot.
overall the accommodation is nice and clean. The host will respond quickly and she is very eager to answer our questions.
We really enjoyed our days at Nams appartment. Nam and the office next door are helpfull and answer quick and relevant.
新裝修好,乾淨,整齊,廚具齊全,房東有善｡房間冷氣足但直吹頭部, 被鋪太薄不足夠,冷氣調較至最高温仍很冷｡
near to tongfuk bus stop & the beach

Cool place if you want to go to the beach, the ferry boat can bring you on the island in half an hour, direct from Central pier
The ton Fuk beach is very nice and is safe (safeguard and anti-shark system)

The host was very nice. Spoke good English. The bathroom was small. The beds weren’t bad. The apt is near the beach. There’s a taxi stand and bus stop right out front which makes it easy to get around. There are a lot of dogs and cows around so watch your step.
The host is friendly and kindly, the place is close to the beaches and bus stops, you could see a few cows around there. nice location and had a great night at Nam’s place.
Great location

The best part is the beach at a walking distance. Please carry a phone to contact Nam as the connection to WiFi is a challenge and Nam lives somewhere else. Do take the pictures of bus schedules at the nearest bus stop. The beds are queen sized in both the rooms.
The room was clean and we were so comfortable. Location is far away from Tung Chung station but easy to get there by bus number 11 or 23 which takes around 20-25mins.
不错,很好的入住体验

房东很好,很晚才到住宿的地方,还好房东及时沟通,才能找到住宿位置,晚上的话最好打的过去｡
环境挺好,距离海边很近!适合休闲游玩选择住宿｡
如果行程时间比较紧,就不要住这么远了｡

name: Sand Sun Surf w Parking. City 9km
summary: 2 minutes to bus stop, beach - Cafes, Sun, Surf & Sand. 4 Secure rooms in older style, 4 bedroom house. Can squeeze in up to 15 guests (9 beds, 2 sofa beds in lounge & a single sofa mattress) BUT is best suited to 10-12 people Wireless Internet, under cover parking, unlimited street parking.
space: 4 Secure Private Rooms in older style 4 bedroom home. Share 2 bathrooms, one with Spa bath.  Wireless Internet, under cover parking available & unlimited on street parking. The house is a 2 storey semi. There are no pets here. The rooms have heaters and fans. Access to the bathroom, kitchen, lounge, dining room and car port. I am available to answer your questions by email . Escape the crowds at Bondi Beach or Coogee, discover Maroubra Beach’s cafes, amazing ocean surf and breathtaking coastal views.  FOOD: Enjoy the beach kiosk takeaway, local BBQ's or a delicious meal with stunning views at the Pavilion Beachfront Restaurant on the Promenade.  FACILITIES: Tea, coffee & cereal, honey, jam etc is included. You can use the Kitchen, Dining Room and Lounge areas. ACTIVITIES. The beach is fantastic. Sun, surf and sand.  SURFING – Maroubra is a  1 kilometre long beach. FAMILY ACTIVITES - Swimming, relaxing, surfing, picnicking, BBQs, ball games, jogging, fishing and beach fossicking. There
description: 2 minutes to bus stop, beach - Cafes, Sun, Surf & Sand. 4 Secure rooms in older style, 4 bedroom house. Can squeeze in up to 15 guests (9 beds, 2 sofa beds in lounge & a single sofa mattress) BUT is best suited to 10-12 people Wireless Internet, under cover parking, unlimited street parking. 4 Secure Private Rooms in older style 4 bedroom home. Share 2 bathrooms, one with Spa bath.  Wireless Internet, under cover parking available & unlimited on street parking. The house is a 2 storey semi. There are no pets here. The rooms have heaters and fans. Access to the bathroom, kitchen, lounge, dining room and car port. I am available to answer your questions by email . Escape the crowds at Bondi Beach or Coogee, discover Maroubra Beach’s cafes, amazing ocean surf and breathtaking coastal views.  FOOD: Enjoy the beach kiosk takeaway, local BBQ's or a delicious meal with stunning views at the Pavilion Beachfront Restaurant on the Promenade.  FACILITIES: Tea, coffee & cereal, honey, jam etc is i
neighborhood_overview: Beach, cafes, playgrounds, ocean pool. Neighbours on the right are an extremely quiet family.  The other neighbours are a small block of units.
notes: There is no air conditioning & no central heating. There are fans, heaters & electric blankets.  There Native Stingless bees in the garden behind the back fence. They look like tiny flies and are harmless. There are Honey Bee hives behind the fence. Please do NOT go behind the back fence or approach the Honey bees.
transit: We are 3 minutes walk to the bus stop to the city
access: The house and car port.
interaction: Myself or a family member is available by txt or email.
house_rules: Please read the information on the site before booking. Only paid guests on the premises after 10pm. No noise and No parties or you will be evicted immediately, with no refund. No smoking in the house. Please put butts in the outside bins not in the plant pots.  Do not drink or eat in the bedrooms.

host.host_about: Born in Jamaica. Arrived in Australia (via London) as a child. Went Ketogenic in 2015. I’m studying Psychology full time and I work in the Personal/Professional Development field. I am a Effective Action Coach, working with large groups. I also run courses in Communication & Pain Free Presentation skills for adults & Confidence/Self esteem programs for young people and teens. I cant live without grass fed, grass finished meat, wild caught fish, pastured eggs & fresh sprouts, ferments, Kombucha, Kefir, my family & friends, beauty, great sounds & raw chocolate. I have traveled to over 30 countries. I speak excellent English, basic French & awesome body language. I am a quiet introvert, who loves reading, learning & pondering the possibilities of life... With our thoughts  ... we make our world... (Thank goodness)

reviews.comments: Marcelle is very nice. The house is very good because it is near the beach. The house is very suitable to a big family.

Ons verblijf in Maroubra Beach was zeer goed. Het huis ligt ideaal op slechts twee minuten lopen vanaf het strand. De baai is mooi, met veel surfers en een groot breed strand. Met het openbaar vervoer is de trip naar Sydney centrum goed te doen. Met twee kleine kinderen was de afstand misschien iets te groot (zo'n 45 min tot aan Circular Quay) maar als volwassene is het prima. 
Het huis hadden we helemaal voor onszelf en ideaal was de tuin aan de achterkant. Iedere avond hebben we hier de bbq aangestoken en heerlijk gegeten. Al met al was het een zeer goed verblijf.

Fantastic location only a minutes walk from the awesome Maroubra surf beach.
We hired the whole property which slept eight of us comfortably.
The house was well equipped and the host had allowed use if all her kitchen gadgets. It was child friendly too.
There was an excellent playground by the promenade and an ocean filled pool a 10 minute walk away.
Good transport links to the Harbour area and other local beaches. Easy walk to supermarket with taxi back.
Lovely row of cafés minutes from house with excellent choice of food and Seals club also.
We had a fantastic stay in Maroubra!

Marcelle's house is clean, big and comfortably accommodates 8 adults. If you love reading, there are plenty of books in the living area and kitchen.  The beach is 2 minutes walk from the house and a grocery shop nearby. On the day of arrival, Marcelle was at the house to welcome her guests.  My fellow Rotarians enjoyed their stay.  I never got to meet Marcelle but our communication was easy and reliable.  She even rearranged the bedrooms to meet our specifications. The WIFI at the house functions perfectly well and I was enable to keep in touch with our team in Maroubra while in San Souci.  One can easily access the CBD by a short bus ride to the train station. I would highly recommend a stay at Marcelle's residence to Sydney visitors looking for a beach-side house in a quite neighborhood.

Had a great time in Sydney which was made even better by the stay at Marcelles lovely home . The house is spacious and well appointed with convenient access to the laid back Maroubra lifestyle or  easy access to the city as required . Marcelle left clear and concise instructions on everything to do with the house and further information for people not familiar with Sydney .

We have a good stay at Marcelle's house at Maroubra Beach. The house is equipped with almost everything except WiFi and cloth dryer. Marcelle is very helpful and got us a hairdryer when we requested one from her.

The only bad experience we had is from the dirty floor at the kitchen area. Just wear shoes inside the house if you don't want to have black ink on your barefoot. We informed Marcelle about the floor and she quickly cleaned it but still not perfect.

Location of the house is only a few minutes walk to the beach and only 15 minutes drive to Sydney city or airport provided there is no congestion.  

Overall, we are happy with the stay but it would be better if the house get cleaned regularly and hygiene level is improved.

There were 8 of us staying in this home and it was confortable and welcoming. The 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms were key for our stay and met our needs.The home was ready for us when we arrived and even thought it was not necessary it was available for late checkout. The community provided necessary groceries, a restaurant or 2 and coffee shops. I really wish we had gone in the summer as Mercelle's home is a quick walk to the beach.
Great location, right by the beach. The place is cosy and furnished quite nicely. Bedrooms are large and comfortable. Definitely recommended.
Had a great stay with ample space. Very accommodating host. Beautiful location albeit the weather. Thank-you so much. Would definetly stay again
Very nice place, close to the beach and shops. Relaxing and cosy house with spacious rooms! Only 15 min away from city and is very convenient with public transport!

Marcelle's house was a great place to stay. It's only a stones throw from the beach(best beach in the Eastern Suburbs) and even closer to a variety of coffee shops. Public transport is easily accessible from the house too. 
I would recommend this house to any anyone coming to see Sydney, especially since it can sleep up to 10 people.

We are group of 10 and have a great stay in Marcelle's place. Everything is as described. The house is close to the beach, transport and daily shoppings. Instructions for running the house are clear. Thanks and recommended.

It was a pleasure staying in Marcella's home.  The house was well presented; each room even had travel toiletries.  The beds were comfortable and everyone enjoyed a good night sleep despite a small amount of noise from the neighbours.  
Location was perfect, only a 5min walk to the beach and a short cab ride from the airport (~$50 for a maxi cab).  There were some lovely cafes and restaurants in walking distance and looked as though even more were about to open up.  
Marcella was a fantastic host and I would definitely not hesitate to recommend a stay in her home.
Marcella is a welcoming host providing all the details that we needed about the house and the place.  It was close to the beach and shops and just a 15-20 minutes drive to the city.

Marcella's house at Maroubra is a wonderful space that hosted our party of seven adults easily. Two minute walk to the beach and around the corner from a club, hotel and restaurants. We had a fantastic time. Marcella responded quickly to our request and was happy to accommodate a late departure. Thanks Marcella.

Had a great time at Marcella's place. Walking distance to the beach and food places. Transport into the city was also easily accessible with multiple routes to take. Would highly recommend this place for any group that is going to Sydney.

4 bee hives in the backyard when the host knew we were bringing children was not a good start. House needed a good airing out and kitchen a thorough wipe down. Also tv and dvd not working. Once we had come to terms with these drawbacks, the place was fine but not worth $500 a night in our opinion.

Marcella is an awesome host, such a lovely friendly lady who made us feel most welcome
the accommodation was perfectly described and we throughly enjoyed staying there, we would have no reservations in recommending Marcella or this property to anyone

Flying in from interstate, Marcella was flexible with arrival and departure times. House was very clean and in ideal location for beach and cafes. Felt very welcome with tea, coffee, cereal, milk etc.  Marcella supplied beach towels for us all on request.  All 9 of us really enjoyed our stay and would loved to have stayed much longer.

The house was perfect for our needs -- two minutes from the beach and close to shops, restaurants, the pub and a frequent bus service to Bondi Junction and Sydney.  The house is more spacious than it looks in the photos --  six people spanning three generations could have been difficult but it wasn't, we never felt on top of each other.  The rooms were all very nice and the kitchen well-equipped for the most part. We all enjoyed our stay, Marcella was very accommodating when we requested an additional night. I would definitely recommend this to my friends.

Marcella was a great host. Trying to organise holiday accommodation for 8 adults is never straightforward, but Marcella made life a lot simpler! She responded quickly to messages and was very flexible, giving me the option of adding an additional bed when my guest numbers changed last-minute.
The house is in a great location, 1 block away from a great beach & close to cafes and shops. 
The house is spacious (includes parking!) and each room is quite large - great place to stay.
Despite noisy neighbours and a few insects in the kitchen we had a nice stay. Good location near the beach and bus stop. Good space for our family of 6.

I booked Marcella's place on behalf of family and she was extremely communicative in making sure their needs were met and that getting in was trouble-free. I would recommend dealing with Marcella without hesitation!
Thank you for such a great stay. House was clean and a lot bigger then the photos make it look. Plenty of room for our large group. The spa upstairs was nice after our pamper night.

We were a party of seven including two children and one toddler. Marcella's descriptions of the the house were accurate and communication with her was very good. Her directions were clear and arrangements for collecting the key etc. clear and easy. The house was very close to the beach, shops and bus stops, we hardly needed to use the car while we were there.  There was plenty of room in the house to each have our own space as well as communal space.  We particularly liked the outside shower which was great to use after spending time at the beach. Marcella provided plenty of beach towels, which were much appreciated especially by our overseas visitors. The fans in each room were much appreciated as it was hot in Sydney while we were there. The neighbours were noisy a couple of times, this was more of a concern to us as there were young children in our party. We enjoyed our stay and Marcella's house was good value for money.
Marcella is a great communicator and her place was super for our three families of adults and children. Close to the beach, restaurants and a super playground. Thanks Marcella.
The house is beautiful and lovely. There are a lot of stores nearby. The beach is only 50 meters faraway. There are a rock swimming pool nearby that I love the best.

My family and I had a good stay at the accommodation. Marcella had clear instructions on necessities pasted around the house. The house has 4 bedrooms which are spacious ebough for up to 10 people! Also, there is a cardboard full of books of different categories, good for avid readers!

The house is easily accessible to shops and eateries. The best thing the fact that it is so near to the scenic beach! Good for families or friends who want a short getaway!

We stayed in a group of 11 and absolutely loved the house. It was clean and comfortable. Marcella provided everything we needed and more. While there are many books and household items of hers around, she made sure there was plenty of storage for us including heaps of space in the fridge and wardrobe space in each room. 
The location of the house is perfect. A very short walk to the beach but off the main drag so not too busy. Most importantly everything was as described or better. Thank you for opening up your space for us.
We had an excellent time staying in Maroubra. Marcella was extremely welcoming to our group and was more than happy to tell us about the area. We look forward to returning one year

We had a great weekend.  Marcella's house is beautifully placed near the beach a little hospitality strip.  

We didn't spend a lot of the time at the house, but enjoyed the fact is was reasonably close to Randwick Racecourse (what we were there for) and not too far away from the city.  

If you go there, make sure you check out the Spanish Restaurant just around the corner.  It was absolutely superb.
Great location and a lovely house, only wish I had more time to enjoy the area more.  The rooms were as expected and the space was warm and welcoming.  Thanks Marcella for a great stay in Sydney. :)

First time using airbnb and Marcella's place has exceeded my expectations. Ideally located, it was quiet, yet close to everything. There was a great fenced park 2 min walk away for the kids. Well appointed, warm and homely with a fantastic library (which time did not permit me to enjoy). Would definitely recommend this place to a group of several families or friends.
We had a great stay. The place was well equipped and in a great location- walking distance to beach, park and cafes.

Marcella was very welcoming, even leaving us milk in the fridge! Her place is in a fantastic location, right near the beach, and was the perfect place for our family get together. Lovely and cozy in winter and would be fab in summer, so close to the beach. Would definitely stay again

Thank you Marcella for this lovely home. We so enjoyed our visit. Your description of the house and area was perfect and your attention to detail in all the instructions was outstanding. I would highly recommend your place. Thank you also for being so quick to get back to me each time I contacted you and for your flexibility. A huge thank you again

Marcella was very easy to contact and graciously accommodated my requests for early check in and late check out. We had no problems during our stay. (was a little cold at night but it was expected in winter and all the beds had electrical heaters)
The house felt like a friend's home and was comfortable to stay in. 
There were 8 of us and the house did not feel cramped at all (except for when we had to take turns using the 2 bathrooms but that was not a big issue)
The neighborhood was nice and quiet with no concerns about security.
Parking was ample for 2 cars on the drive and there was plenty of street parking (just be careful if you have low lying cars as the driveway has an awkward angle that will give your bumpers a some affection especially if the car is loaded with passengers - found this out the hard way)
All in all a very pleasant experience for my first AirBnb stay :) 

Thanks Marcella!

I needed a house for 6 of my operators as we were working nights at the Sydney Airport. We booked with Marcella as the location was perfect, we had a few hiccups with our start date on the run way and Marcella was nothing but a delight to deal with, she accommodated us the best she could and it is very much appreciated. We needed to add additional nights onto our stay and this was not a problem. Marcella is a amazing and from the feedback from my operators (6 men) the house is fantastic.
We as a company and myself as an individual will defiantly book with Marcella at the City Surf Sun & Sand again.

Marcella was very quick with her replies and very easy to get to the accommodation. Location was very good and near the beach. Her place was very spacious and more than enough room for our group. Accommodation was generally quite clean but perhaps the upstairs wasn't used as often so it was a bit dusty. We had a small welcome pack which was a very nice touch! The extensive library was very impressive, wished we have more time to make more use of it.
Marcella's welcome was very enthusiastic and warm. Her home is in a very quiet, safe area and very well positioned to the beach, corner shops, cafes and restaurants.

The house is very clean & roomy.  The location is excellent, minutes walking to beach and only half an hour bus to CBD.

The book collection in the living area is a huge bonus.  After a long day, it's great to read a lovely book.  Many books I have as well, so it is more like reading at home.

This would make a perfect stay for a group of 8-10! Marcella has a cosy home with comfortable beds. She was a helpful host who considered all our needs and made suggestions and arrangements for us accordingly. 

The house is located a short walk away from the beach and local cafes for our coffee runs. We had 12 people (so we really pushed the limits!) and Marcella helped us arrange all the beds as we needed and allowed us the use of the couch and a spare single mattress - I especially appreciated the linen and towel which was set out in the lounge room for these two; it added a friendly welcoming touch! 

The comprehensive information provided in our Airbnb communications was also printed out and visible on the fridge so we didn't have to keep checking our phones. There was an ample number of power point spaces - crucial so there's no fighting over phone chargers. 

The only issue we had was that we couldn't turn on the fan ventilation in the kitchen despite following the instructions and pushing on all the buttons, there was a light which indicated something was on, but no fan. It made for a pretty stuffy kitchen especially since we happened to be there when it rose to 38 degrees. We tried to open up the back door but there were too many flying insects and mosquitoes all too eager to fly in and join the feast. We made do and had an enjoyable time regardless.

호스트가 부재중이였으나, 메뉴얼에 따라서 체크인을 쉽게할 수 있었으며, 비치와 샵이 가까이 있어 생활하기 편리했네요..

집이 다소 지저분하것 빼고는 잘 쉬다 왔습니다^^

Very easy to find house with easy access to beach and nearby amenities. 
Keys provided so we were able to  move in without any hassle. all bedding was clean. 
i was concerned about 10 adults all staying on one place, the bedroom space was excellent with everyone having enough room at night, however the living space is small and we were not able to sit together anywhere in one room which was a shame as it was a special family get together - i recommend not too many adults because of this. - dining space max 6 people. limited outdoor space to sit and eat. 
besides this, it was a great opportunity to have time with people we hadn't seen for a very long time and this made up for it all
thanks

Our stay was lovely. Marcella was very accommodating and her home was lovely. Location was great, only a few min walk to the shops and the beach. Great communication and response from the start. She even let us have a late check out and was very understanding when one of the guests accidentally took a key home. I would definitelt recommend staying here.

Great!
We got in early before the agreed time and Marcella allowed us to drop our bags off as the house was still being cleaned, this was greatly appreciated!
Clean, neat, tidy, quiet, plenty of room and just a stones throw to nice cafes and the beach. If you're looking for something just a little quieter than busy Bondi, this is it!
Thank you for having us!

Marcella made us feel absolutely welcome and her place is in the most amazing location for a trip to Maroubra.  She was also so accommodating when our trip plans got changed and had to arrive a day later than originally planned.  Thanks for a great stay and I would definitely recommend Marcella's place, its tops and she's lovely.

This is a very good location to the beach and near to CBD. The property is comfortable however it's quite dusty on the second floor and there's a lot of mosquitoes around the house. Some of us got bitten quite badly but owner did provide insect repellent. Bad luck for us on power failure on the 2nd day but owner got it fixed so no complaint on that, although update can be more prompt to remove the anxiety we faced when approaching the night time with the problem still outstanding.

Marcella is a great individual. She was more than happy for us to check in earlier. The location is really nice, only 2 min walk to a beautiful beach and also there are many great cafes around. However house was a bit dusty and older than we were thinking. There were some insects and cockroaches around. It wasn't big enough for 10 adults specially if you are traveling with family as there wasn't enough space in the living room for late night gatherings!
Brilliant location close to fabulous beach and shops.  Comfortably accommodated our group of 10.  Marcella ensured we had everything we needed and communicated well in the lead up to our stay.

Place was perfect for us. We were a group of 8 - beds were really comfy, bedrooms nicely furnished. Place is spacious, clean and family friendly. Large kitchen and living space worked well for us also. The beach and cafes were literally around the corner - ideal location. Space to park our cars was great as well. Marcella is a pleasure to deal with. Very positive experience!

Marcella was easy to deal with and it was simple to find all amenities in the house. Plenty of rooms for everyone in a large group to have their own space. Short walk to the beach and quick car ride to local shops.
Everything was well set up for our group of 11.  A great location and a comfortable base for our weekend in Sydney.  The kids really enjoyed the beach.

Marcella is a great host and available to contact as required. as this is a used house (not just rental space) the house is full of useful kitchen/living items to make the stay more user-friendly, although some may feel it is somewhat "busy". There is an extensive library for anyone with time to explore. The property is ideal for exploring Maroubra and the beach. 
Internally it feels a little dark without lights on- possibly due to proximity of other buildings and mature vegetation at the rear.  Heat at the time meant we needed fans in every room which were provided. Overall a great site and well located.

We had total 7 people stayed for 3 nights. We all enjoyed a lot your spacious and tidy house!!! Walkable distance to the beach, shops, bars and restaurants, close to airport and downtown, your house is a really good place for a gang of friends or family for holiday!

We had very good experience in the house. Everything was available and in rightly manner. House has enough space and good collection of books.
I would definitely recommend this to friends.

The location of the house is excellent due to its vicinity to the Maroubra beach and downtown city.  The house is spacious, good enough for a big family or a group of friends.  It's also nice that the house has lots of cooking utensils that allow you to prepare food so we can make our own food sometimes.  The host is also very nice to let us use the seasoning in the kitchen.  

The only comment of the house is a bit older than we expected and we encountered small insects inside.  The repellent that was provided in the house was useful in that case.

Overall speaking, it's a nice stay for my family.

What a great place!!! Location was brilliant! So close to the beach & cafe's 
The house fit is very comfortably! Everything you need is there. Just add food! Great first experience! Thanks so much
It's a nice house, clean, comfortable and everything is orderliness. We like it.

Marcella is a great host.  Communicated with us when the house was ready.   The location and the size of the house was great, able to accommodate a party of 10 comfortably.  

Cons:
pillows
kitchen-was so so
bathroom- no hand soap

Just had the most fabulous weekend with my family at Marcella's very welcoming home, perfect for the 9 of us.  

So close to the beach and restaurants.  

Without hesitation would go back again.
Perfect location, house was wonderful and clean great communication from host A+++

Marcella's home is in the best location and extremely suitable for a large group.  Rooms and living area have ample space.  I found it easy and a pleasure to deal with Marcella.  Thanks again for sharing your home with me and my friends.
Everything was good except that the house was abit small and wasn't much comfortable for our 12 ppl large group. Everything else was good enough. The host was great.
You can find everything in this house. 20min from dt. Near beach. Recommend.
The house was lovely and comfortable, very close to restaurants etc.

Marcella was fantastic at communicating with us. She arranged for early cleaning & check in. Great location ! Couple of minutes to the beach. Excellent location for going into Sydney to see the sites. Also convenient to airport.
Great host, great communication, great location. Would go back. Perfect place for a business retreat.

Marcella's house was perfect for our reunion of two families (each of 2 adults and 2 kids). Both families were comfortable and at the same time not feeling that they were living on top of each other. The house had everything we needed to have meals in as well as a good choice of venues within 5 minutes walk. The area is great with the nice beach on the doorstep. The city was easy to access (40 mins by bus traffic permitting) with the bus stop just around the corner. No complaints from us and we will definitely consider staying again should we require so many beds!
great location. very close to beach. The check in procedure was easy and smooth. The house itself was clean and cosy. will definitely come back again! Thank you Marcella

A really great place to stay, handy to public transport and the beach. Off street parking is a bonus because it gets very hard to find a park on the weekends.
The beds are comfy and there are plenty of them. 7 seniors stayed for one week and none of us have any complaints.
There are plenty of kitchen utensils, plates, cups, glasses etc if you need them. We dined out quite a lot at the local restaurants which had pretty good tasting food.
Next time we need to be in Sydney we will definitely be staying at Marcella's place, its got everything we need and it's close to the beach.
Thank you for having us Marcella.
Great place and location. Marcella was quick to reply prior to our stay.

Marcella was fantastic. She was more than happy to help and assist us in our needs. The location was great, close to the beach and neat little cafe's and convenience stores. The Maroubra "Seals Club" near by offered a venue which could easily cater for our large group providing great meals at cheap prices.

We all enjoyed our time at your humble abode. Thank you, it is a beautiful home and everything was supplied we were all well looked after and I'll be sure to recommend this place to family and friends. Location was conveniently just a short stroll to the beach and shops. Thanks you Marcella

Nice and quiet neighbourhood. Extremely close to Maroubra Beach and several cafes and restaurants. House has a lived in, comfy feel with dozens if not hundreds of books on several bookshelves. Access was quick and easy and Marcella was easily contactable for all our questions. Internet is not blazingly fast but was more than sufficient for our needs.

Love, Love, Loved it.   Everything was within walking distance, the beach, lovely cafes and eateries as well as transport.
Our host Marcella, was very accommodating to our needs and was always on hand to answer any questions or requests.
I would without hesitation recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay would not be disappointed.
Thank you Marcella.
location of this place is spot on with the coast line and shops only a short walk from the front door.

The house of Marcella was perfect for our group of 10. House was clean and comfortable, Well equipped with what we needed, clothes washer, electric iron, complete kitchen items since we did a lot of cooking esp. breakfast in the mornings. The backyard space was great for entertaining guests.
The location was ideal, near the beach and walking distance to the bus stop going downtown. Marcella was very accomodating
and helpful and was ready to help when  we needed an extra key to unlock a bedroom and when the faucet in the kitchen sink got loose. Will definitely recommend this place for future stay. Thank you, Marcella for our positive new experience with the Airbnb.

We had a great time at this place. The location is fabulous with access to food outlets,  a great coffee shop, Chalk and Clubs, providing multiple options to eat out.  The beach is so close and the bus stop a few minutes easy walking, with two buses to the Circular Quay, taking approx. 40 mins.
Marcella's place is lived in, most of the beds are comfortable, the fans in the rooms were a great idea as it was warm when we there. Marcella communicated well and was responsive to questions. Check in was easy.

Marcella was a wonderful host who was very accommodating to our needs and always tried to be flexible with check-in and check-out. The place is lovely, it was perfect for our big group and we all had a wonderful time there. And so close to the beach! We felt very welcome during our stay and would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a place for a group in Sydney.

We had a great stay at Marcella's place. 4 big bedrooms spread over 2 levels means everyone had plenty of their own space. The fact that it is a 1 minute walk to the beach with plenty of cafes in between meant we could wander between the house and beach very easily! 
Great little outdoor area with table and chairs as well.
Highly recommend it!
Everything you need is right there
It was great for what we needed - we wanted 10 out of town family members to stay together for a wedding and marcellas place was great for that!

Fantastic location and a great space for a big family. Super close to the beach and very comfortable accommodation - we stayed over Christmas and very quickly felt at home. Marcella was quick to respond to any queries at all stages of our booking and stay. I would definitely recommend her place to future guests.
Excellent location near the beach and cafes, pretty comfortable place that can host quite a lot people and nice friendly host.
Great house, only issue was I didn't realise there was no air con and the weather was pretty hot
Great location average house very cluttered, bathrooms and kitchen need a good clean heating and cooling very limited not good value for money
Good place on the beach parks shops everything a your door step
Everything was perfect. Marcella was very accommodating of our requests. Would definitely stay again.
House was in good location close to beach and cafes. However it was very hot and air conditioning would have been nice
Would without a doubt stay again if travelling with a group.
Great Location. Clean and Tidy inside. Marcella was great to deal with.
Good place near the beach

Marcella is an incredibly helpful guest. When we requested if we could check in early after a long flight from the USA she went out of her way to insure the cleaners came early, which we were most thankful for, after a long flight
We had a great weekend at Marcella's. Great location, close to beach, cafes etc. House was perfect in terms of space, interesting decor etc. Marcella made us feel very welcome! Thank you :)

Very interesting home. Lots of books. Bedding was excellent. Great value and convenient. Great communication and patience from host as I had a few issues setting up with Airbnb. Once that was sorted everything went smoothly and Marcella was very accommodating with any requests I had. Thanks heaps Marcella.

Great place to stay, great host, clean house, lots of options.
Would love to be there next time!
Recommended.
Great place to stay.
The house was perfect for what we were after with a number of us travelling to Sydney for an event. Location  could not have been better and facilities were great.

Marcella was very helpful and easy to contact, and the place was great and have everything we need for a group of 9!
The only downside was the floor wasn't that clean, but overall the place was huge and we had awesome stay!
Fantastic location, spacious home with everything in walking distance.
Everything is good. Just a bit dirty around the living room.
Good spot

Marcella's home is a great for a group of 10-11 people. It was great to find a home that could accommodate a big group and still provide single bed options. The house was nice and cosy, had good sized living spaces and is so close to Maroubra beach, cafes, restaurants and shops. 

Parking is competitive but thankfully Marcella has a drive-way that you can park the car in.  The electric blankets were a nice touch for those who may stay during winter. 

Our group was comfortable and had plenty of space - thanks for the great stay!
Marcella was very easy to communicate, all the bed arrangements are as expected. I would recommend this is good place for long or short term visit to Sydney

Our group of 14 friends and family has just had a very comfortable stay at Marcella’s house over the June long weekend. The communication with her was smooth, and the detailed info sheet and the house rule book explained all that we needed to know. She was also kind enough to rearrange the time for the post-departure cleaner so we could spend some extra time – which allowed me to go surfing and the others enjoy a walk along the beach. I’d recommend Marcella’s house for those seeking a comfortable/spacious place to stay close to a beautiful beach.

Wow. What a fantastic location. We parked our cars and walked to club, cafes, beach in a few minutes. The food at these places was also excellent. Marcella was so accomodating and her home was perfect for our large group of friends. We will definitely be returning if Marcella will have us but hopefully for more than 1 night. Thank you Marcella for sharing your lovely home with us.
The location is very good
Great place for a bunch of ppl who love traveling
Marcella's place was beautiful! Close to the shops and the beautiful beach. Thanks so much Marcella!

Great location, 2 minutes from cafe's and the waterfront. Ideal for larger groups and families. The house was clean and tidy. Marcella is quick to respond to enquiries and made the check in process easy. I would recommend staying here.

Marcella's place is very big and got lots of book. Near to the beach. But the floor is quite dirty and dust. We even need buy a mop to clean it by our own as we need to stay there for 4 days. Overall is great and nice.
Marcella's house was just what we wanted and as described in a great location.
Fantastic host and house in a great location, super close to beach and cafes. Would highly recommend for a short or longer term stay.
Great location, in a beautiful part of sydney

Great location, 2 minute walk to maroubra beach, local cafes and places within walking distance. The beach is beautiful and the area is not so far from the airport. Around 15-20 minute drive. The neighbourhood is quiet, and peaceful. Cleanliness of the place could have been better, with it being abit dusty and a few cockroaches here and there. Other than that, the hosts are quite friendly, easy to communicate with and easy going.
Great location and caters for a big group.
this is a great place and landlord is very helpful.

The house was big and very nice, very comfy and Cousy.
We really enjoyed our stay and had a lovely time at the home. It was very central to where we had to go.
Fantastic location, great spacious, private home near the beach and very close to cafes etc.. Apart from one small cleanliness issue can't fault this place. It was a great time away.
Perfect location, fantastic clean large house! Easy check in/ check out! 10/10
这个房子很棒,位置很好,就是距离超市比较远,附近没有什么超市,装修风格多样化,房间里有挂着和服,没有问可不可以穿,后院有烧烤炉,但是炭火需要去稍远的加油站买
Excellent location, plenty of space and perfect for a large group.  11 of us stayed and it was great.
Fantastic place in a great spot. Couldn't recommend more highly.
Near to beach & bus stop to city center
Marcella was a great host and was very responsive to any inquiries we had. It was great to stay overall.
Great location with a fantastatic host
Great location walking distance to beach and cafes. Property has space for 2 cars which is very convenient. Host is quick to respond and very accommodating.
Excellent location to cafes, beaches and parks. Very quiet. Only thing when hot or air needed not many of the windows open, there are fans in bedrooms which help. Thanks for the stay.
A great location if you want to be close to the Eastern beach suburbs. Off street parking is handy and access was quite simple.
Perfectly located home for our group of 11. Right next to the beach, shops, cafes and restaurants. Good communication with the host. Great layout for social settings in the lounge room.
great location to beach n shops
位置特别好,在离海边只要步行5分钟｡房东很热情随和,我们提前把行李放进去,退房后又放了一个多小时才拿走行李,非常满意｡房东是个非常热爱生活的人,各种厨房用具调料很全,简直是中国人的福音｡满意!
Great spot, plenty of room for everyone! Thank you
Awesome host, awesome location, awesome house

Wonderful stay for a large group. Highly recommended.
Thank you
We had a wonderful stay at Marcella's place. The location is fantastic and Marcella was extremely friendly.

Marcella's place is in a great location just minutes to walk from shops and restaurants. Loved the enviro conscious rubbish system and the full book shelf in the open kitchen/dining area. The house is cosy and our group loved the back yard to enjoy a coffee chat or our meetings together. Saying that, it would have been quite crowded to have them indoors ( rainy days?). We were there with 15 people, which i believe is too big a group for Marcella's house. The fridge capacity as well as sleeping arrangements ( if you look for average comfort in space and matresses) as well as dining space were not sufficient to host that many adults. Marcella answered to my inquiry for 'what to do?" but could unfortunately  no find solutions to our space problems. They stayed unaddressed and no compensation was offered. All in all it s a 3 out of 5 for us.
A great location and very helpful host! We very much enjoyed our stay here.

If you want to be near the beaches it’s at a strategic location and excellent if you want to be near Maroubra beach. Very near shops - cafes, restaurants, small convenient stores. Within the area but not walking distance are many shopping centers including Westfield Eastgardens. This house is really about location. Actually house is cosy and spacious enough but it’ll be better if it is neater and cleaner. Walls are thin so big groups staying in the house can expect noise being heard anywhere in the house - you will hear people talking in the dining room downstairs and walking up/down the stairs when you are in the upstairs bedrooms.
Great location right near the beach. House was clean and a very comfortable stay. Would definitely stay here again if we’re back in Sydney!
Marcella’s home is lovely. Our social group have now stayed there twice and very much enjoyed it. Everything is so convenient and the location is brilliant.
Well equipped and spacious for our family to stay and enjoy Maroubra. Great spot. Close to beach and shops.
Great place for a big group! Very clean and easy to get to.

Marcella's home is in an amazing location just around the corner and walking distance from a wonderful array of restaurants, coffee shops and the beach and had ample room to host our party of 12.   Marcella was quick to respond and assist in all our queries.  Thanks so much for hosting us!
体验很好
Great location and very responsive host. Highly recommend.
The rooms were excellent not (Email hidden by Airbnb) munal areas were also spacious !!! So many things to look at and appreciate which definitely made for a homely stay . Definitely recommend!!!
Awesome place to stay

Fabulous to communicate with, everything was exactly as shown/described 
We would definitely stay again!!
Great experience all round. Thanks for accomodating us.
Very nice, spacious place close to the beach!  Also very convenient to the bus which we used to travel to the SCG.

Great location and a large house able to accomodate a few families or separate individuals, each room is individually lockable. Very handy to all events or places in the Eastern suburbs. Great communication from the host, Marcella
Great host, great house and fabulous location! Thanks so much for having us!
Great spot will return anytime. We enjoy our stay

Close to beach. 
Very unclean - floors, sand in beds, cockroach in kitchen. 
Lack of cooking equipment - we had to go and purchase a frying pan.
Great location and perfect for a large group.

Unfortunately, the house was not cleaned properly and meant that we had to wear shoes inside to stop dirt and grime from collecting on our socks/feet. Also, the house is very dark, the lounge and dining area (which are the only communal areas) felt like a cave most of the time. But is a great location in Maroubra and was quite affordable by Sydney standards.
Great place to stay. Highly recommend
Great location, easy walk to cafes and the beach!
Fantastic location only a few minutes walk to the beach, cafes and shops. Just note that the house is a little dusty and sandy in parts.
Very nice home, has all the amenities you need and is in a prime location!!

Excellent location. Just a very short walk from the beach and cafes.
Easy communication with the host. Excellent layout of the accomodation giving everyone ample space if they need it.

Very spacious home , great location close to the beach, comfortable beds with clean linen, off street parking was a bonus. Great home in a quiet Neighbourhood. 
Thanks Marcella for making our week in Sydney comfortable!
Thanks a lot again for the wonderful stay.
Great location a few mins walk from the beach. Convenient for large groups. Communicative host with fast responses.

Great place and Great host... 
Marcella offered us early check-in which saved my day and we could see the New year firewokrs...! Thanks heaps ....
Really Enjoyed our stay and we ended up wanting to extend our stay . 
Great place and great location. I am willing to book again if i am here in near future.
Fantastic house, great location very comfortable and our host made everything so easy.
Super handy location to beautiful Maroubra beach.  Able to accomodate our large group and very responsive to communication.

Overall a very good house, the location amazing, 5 minute walk to the beach along with several cafés and a pub. Quite comfortable for up to 10-12 guests, would be very cramped with 15 although it could be done! 

Very cozy, would definitely recommend to others!
Good place and really close to the beech
房子位置不错,离海滩很近｡其他都完美,缺点就是没有空调,夏天房间有点热,不过好在晚上睡觉凉快点,不影响睡觉
could not complain
Very nice place, super clean and cozy! Great location right next to the beach and rock pools. Plenty of space for a large group! 10/10

name: The Bohemian Nest | Santo Ildefonso | Bedroom#2
summary: Private room in a cozy 1930's apartment, completely renovated, in the center of Porto.
space: Three bedroom apartment in a building of the 30s, located on the 1st floor, with original features preserved, both on the facade and the interiors. Light and windows in all rooms of the house. Terrace with access through the kitchen and living room. Original flooring. All bedrooms are to rent and you will be sharing the common ares with other guests.
description: Private room in a cozy (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 's apartment, completely renovated, in the center of Porto. Three bedroom apartment in a building of the 30s, located on the 1st floor, with original features preserved, both on the facade and the interiors. Light and windows in all rooms of the house. Terrace with access through the kitchen and living room. Original flooring. All bedrooms are to rent and you will be sharing the common ares with other guests. Guests have access to their private bedroom, a set of keys for the room, the apartment and the building. They also have access to all common areas and equipement of the house, shared with other guests. We don't live in the apartment but the check in will always be done in person and we are available at all time by internet or phone. All guests will be given an interactive map (Porto has several points of free wi-fi throughout the city) and one in paper along with tips on how to make the most of your stay, Porto and Douro regio
neighborhood_overview: Located in front of Plaza Campo 24 de Agosto, here the true spirit of Porto is still preserved, with all the traditional services at your doorstep.
notes: MUNICIPAL TOURIST TAX  As of 1 March (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) What is the tourist tax for?  To consolidate Porto as an attractive and sustainable city. Who is required to pay the tourist tax?  Anyone older than 13 years, staying a night in Porto, pays the tax per night, per person for a maximum of seven straight nights per person and per stay. Who is exempt from paying the tourist tax?  a) People travelling for medical treatment, and continue therapy in medical facilities. Family members and/or companions are exempt also. Documentary evidence of medical and care service has to be provided (or equivalent document). b) People who are disabled to a degree of 60%. Supporting documents must be presented. Tourist Tax rates?  2€ per overnight stay and per person, up to a maximum total value of 14€ (Seven straight nights per overnight stay/person). How to pay the tourist tax? The tourist tax is paid as a single amount in the final bill. Where?  Tourist tax payment is due to the manageme
transit: ★ Campo 24 de Agosto metro station (direct connection to and from the airport) - 2 min. walking ★ Bus Terminal (Transdev bus, Citiexpress, Rede Expressos, etc.) - 2 min walking ★ Taxi rank - 2 min walking ★ Campanhã Station - 12 min walking ★ São Bento Station - 15 min walking ★ Funicular dos Guindais, 15 minutes walking, direct to Ponte D. Luís.
access: Guests have access to their private bedroom, a set of keys for the room, the apartment and the building. They also have access to all common areas and equipement of the house, shared with other guests.
interaction: We don't live in the apartment but the check in will always be done in person and we are available at all time by internet or phone. All guests will be given an interactive map (Porto has several points of free wi-fi throughout the city) and one in paper along with tips on how to make the most of your stay, Porto and Douro region!
house_rules: Por favor, fazer o mínimo de barulho das 21h às 9h

host.host_about: Hello! We're Catarina and Alexandra and we would like to welcome you to the amazing city of Porto! We love art, design, architecture, photography, vintage objects, music, history, travelling and, of course, the amazingly rich Portuguese gastronomy and we want to help you to make the most out of your trip!

reviews.comments: Be warned : It will be so comfortable staying in that you might loss time sightseeing Porto. This place is beyond awesome. From the location, decor to the comfort of the bed, and not forgetting the satellite TV where I catch up with worldwide news over a cup of coffee.... It has all the ingredients to make you forget that you need to go out and see the city. If not because of the mouthwatering food recommendations and must-see places from Catarina.... We might just stay in all the time.
The best acommodation in Porto as I could wish. The apartment was beautiful, clean and comfortable. I can recommend it to everybody.

We had a great time in porto as catarina welcomed us, and gave really good and usefull advices! The room is really nice, clean, confortable. There are 3 renting rooms in the flat. The building is on a busy street so expect some "city noise", easy to walk around, and close to many good food places.

Very nice, comfortable and clean Airbnb! It was very generous that we could left my luggage for a few more hours after check-out. We really enjoyed our stay in this Airbnb, and when coming back to Porto we would always choose this accommodation again!:)
People may know that the Airbnb is about 10-20minutes away from all the sights in the city Centre, but for us it was just perfect as the bus station of RedeExpressos and the metro station to the airport is directly there.
非常漂亮整洁的房间,Alexandra和 Catarina非常热情友好,给我们提供了各种各样的建议,如果有机会还会来这里住｡

this place is a really good option to stay in porto for a reasonable price. It is located in a nice neighborhood not right in the center so that you get to see some of the “normal” daily life.
What we also really enjoyed is that there was a kitchen so we could cook in the evening and start the day with a coffe and some breakfast.
All in all a really recommendable place to stay in porto.

La atención exelente 
Piso muy grande , confortable  y limpio , las chicas muy atentas , céntrico 
Solo faltó calefacción adecuada   
Lo recomiendo

Catarina è un ospite gentile, al check in ci ha dato una piccola mappa della città con molti suggerimenti. La casa è in una posizione abbastanza comoda, vicinissima alla metro per l'aeroporto e leggermente fuori dal centro (In una ventina di minuti a piedi si è sul fiume Douro). La stanza è molto rumorosa in quanto sulla strada passano bus e camion anche di notte. Consigliato per chi è di passaggio a Porto!

Catarina was really friendly and offered us great advice and tips about the city when we first arrived. The room was spacious, clean and very bright. She was accommodating with our schedule. I would highly recommend!

A recepção é ótima, com várias dicas que foram precisas. A casa é super charmosa, impecavelmente limpa, roupa de cama e de banho de muita qualidade. O atendimento é imediato, as proprietárias são muito agradáveis e me auxiliaram em tudo o que precisei. Foram dias muito bons e certamente eu recomendo.
Super comfortable and cozy room. Great location and host gave plenty of useful tips for Porto. Would happily stay again.

The appartment owner is a very nice person. Always providing quick answers to all our questions. The rooms themselves are very clean and comfortable. The bath room is top! There are only 5 minutes by feet to the center of the city. 
Catarina provides a lot of useful tips about good places to visit.
We would recommend this appartment to everyone!

La estadia fue buena, Alexandra nos recibio de gran forma y nos dio muchas y muy buenas recomendaciones de donde ir. Tal vez lo unico negativo fue que el agua caliente se nos terminaba demasiado pronto, y algunos problemas de comunicacion que tuvimos para acordar el horario de llegada. De todas formas el lugar es recomendable

The room was lovely. Very good located and near to a lot of restaurants, coffee shops etc. Catarina was very kind and available for any question, she also provides a incredibly detailed map that was very useful. I really recommend!
Perfect night in Porto! Good location, spacious and nice room, very welcoming host!

On the outskirts of city centre but easily within walking distance and near metro line. Worked well for us being right next to the bus station too. Catarina was very helpful and gave us lots of restaurant recommendations. Really enjoyed our stay in Porto.
Un apartamiento muy cómodo y limpio. Nos gustó muchísimo. Está muy bien comunicado y Catarina es muy simpática. Queríamos volver pronto!
Un service exemplaire. Un lieu près de toute les commodités et une propreté assurée

Pasamos 4 noches en casa de Catarina y estuvimos genial. A solo 5 minutos caminando ya estás en el centro. A pesar de que Oporto está lleno de cuestas, la zona de la casa es bastante llana lo que se agradece después de todo el día caminando.
Está todo muy limpio, con todos los accesorios, incluso con posibilidad de cocinar. Nos sentimos como en casa. Barrio tranquilo y seguro.
Volvería sin dudarlo.
Accueil chaleur et agréable avec de nombreux conseils locaux ! Appartement bien situé propre dans un quartier vivant et animé proche des lieux d intérêt de porto.
Perfect host, perfect home . Thank you so much. x
위치도 좋고 모든것을 갖춘 편리하고 깨끗하며 예쁜 숙소입니다. 호스트의 유용한 정보와 신속한 응대 또한 좋았습니다. 적극 추천합니다.

Catarina and Alexandra have a nice appartement but we didn't have luck because the other room-mates were really noisy and dirty. But in general the place was clean.
We were there in the crazy heat wave (47 degrees) and the hosts were nice enough to bring us a fan to our room. This kind of sweet attention show that they are great people.

During our stay we had some problems with the bathroom and the room was placed in a  very noisy street which could disturb the sleep.

Finally, Alexandra told us that she had booked a taxy for us, because we left very early in the morning, but that taxy never came and we had to  book another one by ourselves on the spur of the moment. 

Despite those thing, she gave us a really good and detailed map to discover Porto and the apartment was very pretty.

The apartment is in a good position, at walking distance from the historical centre and just in front of the metro. We really appreciated the map Alexandra and Catarina provided us with, very accurate and with a lot of good recommendations! The only negative aspect was that our room's windows overlooked a quite trafficated street, which made our stay a bit noisy.
Nice place to stay !!
地理位置非常好 紧邻地铁站 Catarina 专门制作了谷歌地图 并给了我们多方面的建议 非常贴心
집이 엄청 좋습니다. 정말 편하고 기분좋게 쉬다왔네요. 한가지 아쉬운건 좀 외진곳에 있다는건데 걸어서 20분내로 중심가로 갈순 있어서 괜찮았습니다. 슈퍼나 맛집도 주변에 있고 카트리나도 자세한 설명과 실시간 답변을 해줘서 좋은 추억남기고 갑니다. 집은 정말 좋습니다.

Catarina foi uma pessoa muito amável que recebeu particularmente bem meu namorado e eu. Nos permitiu fazer um early check-in e também deixar as malas por algumas horas após o check-out. A sua recepção, ao check-in, além de muito simpática, foi cheia de sugestões e indicações sobre a cidade, incluindo locais mais econômicos para o dia-a-dia e um belo restaurante para nossa comemoração de namoro (Casa D'Oro, recomendamos!). Ela e Alexandra, quem não tivemos a oportunidade de conhecer, disponibilizam seu próprio (Hidden by Airbnb) maps da cidade, com ótimas sugestões. 

A cidade de Porto é encantadora e o apartamento de Catarina não está aquém. Após um lance de escadas, você encontra aquele charmoso ambiente, bem decorado, com três quartos que são alugados. Há um banheiro completo e um outro apenas com assento sanitário. Quarto espaçoso, com cama muito confortável. A região é muito tranquila, mas acontece durante a noite de passarem automóveis mais pesados que fazem mais barulho, por estar no primeiro andar acima do térreo. Está muito próximo (a pé, tudo 5-8min) de supermercados, metro, autocarros e do terminal rodoviário. Fomos andando nalgumas vezes ao centro e à Ribeira (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) min), mas porque queríamos conhecer.

Única sugestão seria ventilador no quarto para os mais calourentos como eu, mas conseguimos ficar bem com o climatizador que havia disponível na casa. 

Recomendamos fortemente o quarto, o apartamento, a anfitriã, a região e a cidade. Obrigado, Catarina, pela experiência. 

E não menos importante:
#gayfriendly

B N is a beautiful house very well located. We had a great time at Porto, Catarina was waiting for us with a map and showed us all the best places to go. This introduction to the city by a local was great! We would definitely go back to her place!

Our stay in Porto was perfect thanks to Catarina. She is wonderful host who gave us great advices about nice bars, restaurants and local cultural life. The place is perfect as well. Bigger than on the photos, clean and tidy and like 10 minuets walk from city center. I would definitely recommend to everyone and would love to come back soon.

Catarina and Alexandra's place is amazing! The kitchen is fully equipped, the house is very spacious, it has a nice balcony and the rooms have heating, which is nice. Catarina was very helpful and always available and she gave us some nice tips. The location is very good, walking distance from a lot of places, very near to the subway and has several supermarkets and grocery stores around. We recommended it!

El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, limpio y recogido, y tiene todo lo necesario para estar unos días a gusto. Catarina fue muy amable y nos recomendó un montón de sitios que visitar. Además nos facilitó muchísimo el check in and out, dejándonos las llaves hasta tarde para dejar nuestras maletas. Sin duda volveríamos a hospedarnos en esta casa. Gracias por todo :)
Defiantly recommend. Great space. Next to metro, groceries, and walking distance to centre. We enjoyed our stay. Felt like home.

name: The deck house @ Clareville Beach
summary: From the moment you arrive, feel the stresses of everyday life slip away as you absorb the atmosphere and view from this stunning holiday (Website hidden by Airbnb) is situated in beautiful Clareville yet minutes away from all the action of Avalon Village. Clareville Beach is ideal for families with kids who can play in the calm waters of Pittwater. Surf beaches Avalon, Whale and Palm beach are minutes away by car if your keen to surf. The Deck House is a 2 storey beach home tastefully decorated and modern.
space: The Deck House has 2 bedrooms on the ground floor and a further 3 bedrooms upstairs and sleeps 9 comfortably.The kitchen, dining and living areas are wonderfully spacious and open out onto a fabulous deck which has views out to Pittwater.

host.host_location: Dover Heights, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: Hi, I’m from Sydney and have just listed our home on Airbnb. We love to travel so we’re looking forward to experiencing the “other side” of Airbnb as guests!

reviews.comments: La casa está excelentemente equipada y si uno quiere estar cerca de Sydney (40 minutos en auto) pero en un lugar tranquilo es inmejorable. La mejor playa para mi gusto (Palm Beach) está solo a 10 minutos. Sin dudas un lugar de elite..

This house has it all!! Views, lots of bedrooms, every convenience you could need from coffee machine to bean bag lounges to sit on the deck and take in those views.  As a group of five women, we each had our own room with room for more if needed and while we didn’t visit with our kids, would also suit those with children. Our host was very responsive and the house was impeccably clean and stylish. The kitchen had everything and the bathrooms spacious. Just what we needed for a quiet girls weekend away from the hustle and bustle. We had an incredible lunch a short drive away at the new Merivale restaurant Bert’s Bar & Brasserie at the Newport, a must if you’re in the area and looking for a very special dining experience. Loved the house, there’s a cafe a short picturesque walk and Avalon shops a short drive. We’ll be back!

We all loved our stay here. The house is beyond beautiful. The view is amazing and the house was perfect for our weekend getaway. 
Thank you to Erin and jo for your hospitality 
We had the best time.
Jo’s house is absolutely stunning. The view over Clareville is gorgeous and the house is very well equipped, comfortable and immaculately clean. We would definitely stay again.
The view from the deck ! Was amazing

The place is described as it is, very nice and homey! Everything was provided for and communication was excellent. The house is just a moments walk away from the beach and the living room view is stunning. Thank you for such a great stay!
Ticks every single box! Amazing house in a relaxing setting, with everything you could possibly need & more. We can’t wait to go back again. Highly recommend.
Beautiful spacious tranquil house with amazing views

summary: new apartment with great views over Golden Horn waters.lift .2 bedrooms one double one single a lounge with couch sleeps 2 persons.modern American kitchen, very large TV satalite,wifi, Gas,electric and water from mains.small balcony,valet intercom and camera.

neighborhood_overview: Between Garcia D'Avila and Anibal de Mendonça, the so called "Golden Block", the apartment is located in one of the most priviledged areas of the city - and even the country.  It also suits the need of tourists, with easy access to transport (subway and buses) and facilities (supermarket, drug-stores, etc.).  Be aware, location is specially important: (1) on busy holidays and events (Carnaval, New Year's Eve, World Cup), when public transport is not enough to accomodate the crowds. (2) to feel safer during late hours.
notes: PRICING AND NEGOTIATION: If interested, make your offer. Be fair and I won't disappoint you. Feel free to justify your offer mentioning other opportunities you have. I will say "yes" or "no", simple and direct. Note, I'm not into continuous bargaining for a few bucks more or less. (1) PACKAGES FOR SPECIAL DATES New Year - 10 days - R$ 4.000 Carnaval - 10 days - R$ 4.000 (2) AIRBNB SMART PRICING I'm trying AirBnB Smart Pricing. Though, I've already noticed, it is not that smart and I identified plenty of mistakes, as the suggested price for new year's eve. Therefore, please confirm with me. I obviously have the right to refuse reservations with unreasonable values. (3) DESIRED PROFILE  Any time, better pricing PER WEEK (7+ days) and PER MONTH.
transit: READ THIS !!! (1) the very best neighborhood, wealth and safe (away from the dubious division of Copacabana & Ipanema) (2) two blocks from the beach (sunbathing, swimming & restaurants), four from the lake (jogging and sightseeing) (3) the very best supermarket in the neighbourhood is just across the street, with an AMAZING SPACE FOR BREAKFAST for a very reasonable price, you must try, and also delicious pizzas.  (4) 15 min walk to the subway, taking you to the main daylight tourist attractions (5) to the other side, two blocks to enter Leblon, a great district to go at night: restaurants, bars and clubs (6) in front of H.Stern's (the famous Brazilian jewelry) headquarters and main store; also close to Amsterdam Sauer, Louis Vuitton and MontBlanc stores (7) flagship stores Nike and Adidas by the next corner (8) famous Italian ice-cream and chocolate store, Venchi since 1878, is across the street  (9) free and high quality gym by the beach (Posto 10) on the months of January and Februar
access: 30 min from Santos Dumond airport (SDU). R$40 to R$50 taxi ride. 1 hour from Galeao International airport (GIG). R$80 to R$125 taxi ride.
interaction: During check-in and check-out, and any time guest needs help. I currently live in Rio.
house_rules: Common sense, such as: (1) Avoid noise after 10pm, according to building's rule and bylaw in Brazil. (2) Use the air wisely. Please turn it off when leaving the apartment. (3) If you break, you pay.  (4) Check-in and check-out between 9am and 8pm. Otherwise, please consult me, there will be an extra fee. (5) Flexibility on check-in and check-out as long as it doesn't disturb other paying guest. Since people may book the apartment in the last minute, I can only guarantee early check-in (before 2pm) or late check-out (after 11am) one day ahead.

reviews.comments:
Мы с супругой останавливались у Марсело с 14 по 24 июня в период группового этапа чемпионата мира по футболу 2014 года в Бразилии, когда все гостиницы были переполнены и цены на проживание возросли вдвое, однако благодаря airbnb и гостеприимству Марсело, мы провели не забываемый отпуск в одном их лучших районов Рио де Жанейро. Одним из безусловных преимуществ апартаментов Марсело является их расположение в элитном и безопасном районе Ипанемы. 
В квартире имеется все необходимое, чтобы чувствовать себя, как дома (стиральная машинка, электрическая плитка, кухонные принадлежности, пляжные шезлонги и тд. ). 
Апартаменты чистые и уютные.

Marcelo was a great host and the apartment was exactly as described. Considering this was my first trip to Brazil, the apartment was located excellently in the upscale Ipanema neighborhood. Everything that I needed for my vacation was conveniently located within walking distance. I had access to restaurants, grocery stores, and of course the beach.

Marcelo responded to all questions both before and during my trip promptly and thoroughly which was greatly appreciated. He assisted me in a getting a ride to the apartment from the airport as I was completely new to the area.
Very clean flat and good aircondition. The appartment is just two blocks away from ipanema beach. Provides anything you expect from an apartment!

Fuimos recibidos por la madre de Marcelo, una señora muy agradable y atenta. El departamento es muy confortable, muy bien cuidado y con todas las comodidades y elementos que una casa precisa. Es tal cual las describen las fotos de la pagina. A solo dos cuadras de la playa, con supermercados, farmacias y demás servicios al alcance! Nos sentimos muy a gusto en el departamento y lo recomendamos porque seguro van a disfrutar de sus vacaciones en él!

O apartamento é como nas fotos. A localização é boa mas se pretende se deslocar apenas de metro, a distância até a estação é considerável. Só utilizei Taxi. A praia fica a duas quadras da praia e a rua tem um comércio bastante movimentado. Tem porteiro 24 horas e eles são muito prestativos, o que tornaram a estada bem mais tranquila. O banheiro estava com um pequeno vazamento mas de fácil conserto. O fogão é elétrico. E há armários espaçosos para guardar as roupas.

El apartamento tiene todo lo necesario para una estadía confortable. La ubicación es excelente, como la predisposición de Marcelo, el anfitrión. Sabiendo que muchos viajeros tienen muy en cuenta la seguridad, genera mucha confianza que el edificio cuente con vigilancia las 24 horas. También que haya un control policial permanente apenas cruzando la calle. En el barrio podrán encontrar todo lo necesario, supermercados, tiendas, farmacias, y la hermosa playa de Ipanema a solo dos calles. El wifi funciona perfecto, lo mismo que la TV con canales locales, youtube y Netflix. El baño, cocina y, lo más importante, la cama, son súper cómodos. La limpieza es impecable. Súper recomendado.
O apartamento é confortável e limpo. Localização excelente. A hospedagem foi muito boa! Voltaríamos outras vezes se possível.

The location is perfect and the apartment is as described.

However, I had some issues in the relation with the host, Marcelo.
Marcelo complained, at various rates, in any single occasion we had to comunicate: literally from the first day to the last.
Although I was probably not at the highest of the organization , it was Carnaval in Brazil. This makes messy the country in general and Rio in particular. But for this reason we were paying a specially high amount of money, more than 500 reais/night for 1 room flat.

Not to enter here disputable and unsolved big issues, I mention here only three indisputable ones:
- a complain about cleanliness (which was absolutely fine, according to former experience) and especially sand (!?) while I am paying 180Reais(!!) for cleaning 1 room
- a complain about trash, when not a single word was told us on how to deal with it (whoever travels, knows that rules change consistently from country to country)
- an ABSOLUTELY FALSE complain about used condoms left around, which we did NOT use at all. We left some closed ones because we were given those in Carnaval. Either this was a plain lie, or some former used condoms were found in the flat, which would make the cleanliness of the flat really low. However, we did not find any used condoms.

All those kind of complains, which I found completely bad posed, rendered my relation with the host uneasy.

In conclusion, if the period of time and your style of travel is highly fixed, and you do not specifically care about the relation with the host, probably your travel here will work without any problem and, I repeat, the location is amazing.

If, for your travel, it is crucial the hospitality and a nice and smooth relation with your host, this might be not the right place.

Marcelo tiene una comunicación en más de un idioma, lo hace bueno para manejarse mejor con él. el apartamento está ideal, creo que podría decir que mucho mejor a lo que representa por fotos. La limpieza al momento de nuestra llegada estaba perfecta. fuimos una pareja, el sommier es muy comodo, algo a tener en cuenta si se va a pasar varios días. (10 nuestro caso)
la ubicación es practicamente perfecta, a 2 cuadras de la playa (el apto cuenta con un par de sillas y sombrilla) aparte de estar realmente muy bien equipado en otros aspectos, tiene esto un plus si también tu idea es hacer playa.
Como consejo si viajas sin datos moviles, preguntar antes de la llegada numero de telefono o numero de apartamento, para contactarlo al momento de hacer el checkin, no tuvimos esa información y cuando el portero nos hizo pasar al lobby del edificio, (dudaba si dejarnos pasar porque no teniamos mucha información) estuvimos vario rato buscando la forma de contactarnos con el anfitrión para ingresar.
Despues de todo, fueron unas muy lindas vacaciones, el apartamento es muy comodo para ser un mono ambiente, y no le hace falta nada. sin dudas que si algún conocido vuelve a ir, le recomendaría el apartamento de Marcelo.
para el que quiera, entrando en éste enlace y creando una cuenta, tendrá unos 30 USD gratis para su hospedaje: https://es.airbnb.com/c/danieli8000?currency=UYU

O apartamento é estilo loft, muito arejado e claro. O banheiro reformado e com chuveiro elétrico trazem sensação de limpeza e segurança. A cama é muito boa e a roupa de cama de qualidade, porém os travesseiros são ruins. Fez bastante falta a mesa para comer (Marcelo informou no check in que estava aguardando a chegada do tampo) e acredito que deixaria a sensação de um espaço mais diferenciado um jogo copos novos, pratos brancos e talhares novos (algumas facas estavam desmontando). Senti dificuldade com a geladeira que não gelou água mesmo no freezer. 
Minha estadia foi muito boa, a localização do apartamento é realmente excelente, o espaço é reformado e vale o preço cobrado mesmo precisando de algum ajustes.
Host extremamente atencioso, preocupado em ajustar e resolver qualquer demanda para que a estada fosse a melhor possível.
