host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: nice place to stay and Linda was nice.
还不错
It was very private, cozy place. A very calm neighbourhood, with good food in the area
Very nice and quiet space
Very nice house, very good host!!
Everything is good. Clean and comfortable
很精致的房子,很舒适而且设计很用心,半地下但是并不潮,卧室空间很充足,床铺也很舒服,附近几条街晚上需要寻找停车位,注意停车信息就好,总之挺满意的~

Really clean and nice place!
Linda is really enthusiastic, worth to stay here!
Amazing place! Exactly like the pictures. So comfortable and home-y. Close to a lot of restaurants, malls & transportation. Would definitely stay again.
nice and clean place!

Linda’s place was very clean and the pictures did match the place. However, the check in instructions were a little unclear. She is also really strict about the check out time, which isn’t that big of a deal but it felt like we were rushed out of there. Overall our stay was pleasant.
Nice, beautiful apartment with many mirrors and musicians' pictures on the wall

I booked Linda’s apartment for my parents when they were visiting their new granddaughter. They told me that Linda’s place was very spacious and stylish. Water was hot and the location was perfect- minutes away from food and transportation. Linda herself was very communicative and easy to deal with. They liked it so much I will be staying there later in the year, when I am in New York! Thanks Linda.
Very nice place to stay and the location is very convenient.
Enjoyed our stay. The house was very close to the train station and local shops, and being so close to china-town was a definite benefit.
很棒的居住体验｡地址方便,家里温馨,装修也很棒｡推荐!

Linda's place was very nice and clean. Her home was exactly the way it looked in the pictures. The location was very convenient, especially for where I needed to go. She always replied very quickly if I had a question and she was very thorough and made sure to give me all details for a smooth check-in. I would definitely recommend staying with Linda!

Linda’s place is close to the central Flushing. Very convenient in access to restaurants and subway. All rooms are clean and nice except they’re at the basement with no windows that could open. 

Overall it is a nice and affordable place to live if you ever want to stay in Flushing for several days. Safe, clean and the host is very hospital to all questions. 

Linda的屋子非常干净,有着十分便捷的交通位置,去各种餐厅､地铁及机场都很快速｡两个卧室都十分整洁很舒服,但由于在地下室的位置,房间的采光和通风收到了一定限制｡Linda是一个很热情的房东,沟通很及时很礼貌,人也很好｡如果您需要在Flushing住上几天,Linda的屋子是您可以考虑的性价比较高的住处｡
Very safe and convenient location to Mets stadiium.
Linda is very easy to communicate with.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Linda’s place looked exactly same as the pics show. It is a two-bedroom basement, with no window. There was some odor in living room. Except the odor, the place was clear and nice, Pretty organized.

However, it were some problems to communicate with Linda. She cannot provide a clear location to either in Chinese, nor in English. The place was hidden in a living area and She did not have an organized logic to provide check-in instruction. Be prepared before you come, or you’re pretty much on you own :/
非常好的房东,热情周到,房屋干净整洁一应俱全,地理位置方便出行,强力推荐!

Linda's apartment looks like it is advertised, with a great location in Flushing (2 min from a supermarket and 5 min away from restaurants). Linda was responsive and as helpful as she could be and the apartment was a great value. The bedrooms are comfortable, each have an AC unit, and the water is hot. However, there was a problem with roaches and while Linda was concerned and came to clean each time I saw more roaches, they would come back every few days. Being there during the US Open, I did not have time to find another place as everything was fully booked. 
My parents stayed in her apartment months before and did not have an issue, so hopefully it is something temporary. I was also made to use a fingerprint scanner to enter the building door, in which my friend who was staying with me could not get his finger scanned as he was not Chinese. I'm not sure of the logistics there, but Linda offered to come open the door for him any time I wasn't accompanying him. 
Overall, I would recommend Linda's apartment as long as she finds a long term solution for getting rid of the roaches.

Quiet neighborhood but near Flushing Chinatown (walking distance.) The place is newly renovated and is spacious and comfortable. The host was responsive and accommodating  (waiting there for me when I arrived) and showed me how how everything works. A nice and hassle free staying experience.
she was very responsive and made me feel comfortable with my stay. would stay again!

name: BONDI BEACH HIDE AWAY ❤️
summary: The perfect beach pad located a few steps from Sydney's iconic Bondi Beach. Newly renovated, sunlight 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment located on the first floor of an Art Deco building  directly opposite Bondi Beach.  The perfect little apartment to immerse yourself in the Bondi culture.
space: Our super cute 40m2 apartment is set on Campbell Parade and is meters from the famous Bondi Beach, pools and bus stops. Ideally suited for a single traveller or couple, the apartment is cosy and has all the basics you need to explore Bondi.  Surrounded by the best cafes and restaurants, you will have the best Bondi Beach experience in this incredible apartment. - 200 metres from Bondi Beach - Comfortable queen size bed with hotel linens and towels - Air-conditioning with heating and cooling settings - Fully equipped kitchen - Internal laundry with washing machine - Modern furnishings and classy touches
description: The perfect beach pad located a few steps from Sydney's iconic Bondi Beach. Newly renovated, sunlight 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment located on the first floor of an Art Deco building  directly opposite Bondi Beach.  The perfect little apartment to immerse yourself in the Bondi culture. Our super cute 40m2 apartment is set on Campbell Parade and is meters from the famous Bondi Beach, pools and bus stops. Ideally suited for a single traveller or couple, the apartment is cosy and has all the basics you need to explore Bondi.  Surrounded by the best cafes and restaurants, you will have the best Bondi Beach experience in this incredible apartment. - 200 metres from Bondi Beach - Comfortable queen size bed with hotel linens and towels - Air-conditioning with heating and cooling settings - Fully equipped kitchen - Internal laundry with washing machine - Modern furnishings and classy touches You have access to everything in the apartment.  Just bring your bathing suit and come and relax. Whi
neighborhood_overview: Bondi Beach is Australia’s most iconic beach. Reliable waves draw in surfers while, the locals swim in the Icebergs ocean pool year-round. Trendy, health-conscious Sydneysiders head to laid-back cafes and restaurants around Hall Street, while hip backpackers frequent the area's casual pubs. Walkers and joggers use the clifftop Bondi to Coogee Coastal walk, with its amazing scenery. Fun fact: Bondi Beach was a working class suburb throughout most of the twentieth century with migrant people comprising the majority of the local population.
notes: - We only have Chromecast available on our TV as there is an issue with getting reception via an antenna in the apartment.   We'll provide you with instructions on how to setup Chromecast (if you haven't previously used it).  Once downloaded, its super easy to stream NetFlix, Stan, Free TV etc. - Parking can be a bit difficult in Bondi.  We don't have parking on site however paid street parking is available in front and behind our apartment block.  There is also a number of parking stations close by.
transit: Bus stops are directly outside our front door with buses running frequently to Bondi Junction and the CBD.  Look for bus routes (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) .
access: You have access to everything in the apartment.  Just bring your bathing suit and come and relax.
interaction: Whilst we don't have a concierge, I'm available to answer any questions you might have, both pre-stay and during. I try to respond to all questions quickly & I'm available on mobile, SMS and messenger. :)
house_rules: - We have a close relationship with our neighbours.  We ask that you respect our neighbours privacy and monitor noise levels during the night time.   - To reiterate our apartment is also a non smoking area.  If you need to smoke, please smoke outside and dispose your cigarettes afterwards.  - Please leave our home in a clean and respectable state.  Our cleaners will charge extra should the property be left untidy and they are required for a longer than usual period of time.

host.host_about:
Hello! We are both Sydney born, foodies with a love for yummy food, travel and fitness (good balance hey!).  When we're not working, we are on the look out for a new cafe or restaurant, exploring new hiking tracks or getting in a game of tennis.
We are back and forth between Melbourne and Sydney so if you need any pointers on where to start, we will happily share all of our hot spots and awesome tips with you :)
Happy travels!

reviews.comments: Kasey was a fantastic host with great communication. Her apartment is beautiful with so many cozy touches. Her place is right in the heart of Bondi with everything you need right outside the door!

Location was amazing and right around the corner from a great cafe strip. Great restaurants were all walking distance and the bus was not far and easy to get straight into the city. Located on the main strip on Bondi it was perfect for a few relaxing days at the beach. The apartment was small but better than the photos and has been tastefully renovated recently. Very comfortable for two people and the personal touches were nice. We had a great time :)
Kasey's apartment is beautiful! Right on the beach (yet away from the road so less noisy), and beautifully finished. Our stay was like staying in a hotel. Highly recommended.
Fantastic location and comfortable stay. Kasey is wonderful at communication and make our time here so easy!

Hands down the cutest little secret spot in Bondi!! 
Right on the beach front, brand new apartment, not to mention done up so well! 
If you don't book this place, you're missing out big time! 
THANKS SO MUCH KASEY :)
This place is amazing ! Perfect location, lovely apartment with everything you need. Communication with Kasey is very easy ! I strongly recommend
Great apartment, exactly as it looked in photos. Right on the parade, just across from the beach. Kasey was very helpful and quick to respond. Highly recommended!

El lugar está recientemente remodelado y es muy lindo y estiloso, cerca de todo, al frente de la playa, del transporte público y a dos cuadras del supermercado.
Tiene lavadora y proporcionan toallas, jabón, shampoo y acondicionador.
Lo mejor para esta época de verano es la jarra con agua helada esperandote en el refrigerador.
El dpto es muy iluminado aunque no tiene ventanas hacia la calle principal. 
Para los que lleven maletas hay que subir unas escaleras hacia el primer piso.
Se puede cocinar pero tener cuidado para que no suene la alarma de humo.
Tiene horno, hervidor, tostador todos nuevos.
Excelente lugar para unos días en Bondi.
Nos encantó.
Y Kasey preocupada de cómo estábamos siempre.

Gracias 
Monica
Intimate apartment on Bondi Beach. Kasey kept in touch and provided all the information required for an easy stay. Thanks

Kasey been a amazing host! Location was perfect, right across the street from Bondi Beach. Check on us regularly about our stay and constantly offering help if we need any. Thank you again Kasey for being such a good host!
Great location, very modern, awesome host. 10/10

Kasey's apartment is brilliant. The location is perfect, being right on bondi beach and close to all the restaurants and bars that Bondi has to offer. The apartment itself is very clean and has everything you need for a comfortable and relaxing stay. Kasey was a brilliant host - she was incredibly responsive and helpful and constantly offered us any help if we needed it. A fabulous stay on Bondi - thanks Kasey!
Amazing place in brilliant location
Kasey’s place is perfect. Amazing location, great value and communication and checkin was super easy. Right in the heart of Bondi :)

This home is in a great location (can't beat it!) and photos of the property are accurate.

The sheets and towels were very clean.

Check-in was seamless, and communication with the host was regular and timely.

One minor thing to note, it was fairly warm in the property - no aircon. The property is located so, so close to the beach and is a beautiful location, so this was not much of an issue for us as we were mostly out and about. A fan has been provided at the property.

I would stay again!

Such a cute one bedroom apartment in the perfect location. It’s small but packs a lot in and all the action is on your doorstep. Gorgeous renovation and super easy to communicate with. I would stay here again and again.

Nicely styled 
All that is needed for a comfortable stay provided
Kasey's place was great. It was very clean and in a great location, right on the beach. Would highly recommend!
Great apartment, fantastic location.. like the style and it is renovated very nicely. Enjoyed to jump out of the door into the ocean and to have all the nice cafes and restaurants around
Kasey’s appartment was clean and well located, and we had overall a nice stay in Bondi

Kasey was a wonderful host, very responsive and helpful. Her home had all the amenities we needed and was in a perfect location - right opposite the beach and surrounded by plenty of hip cafes and supermarkets. Would stay again!
Great location and stylish, nicely renovated apartment. Not much wardrobe space for clothes but otherwise well equipped. Kasey was very helpful and responsive. I would recommend this to friends.
Very nice, clean place right on the front at Bondi. Kasey's very helpful & quick with responses.
Lovely little apartment in an ideal location for exploring Bondi Beach. Kasey was a wonderful host, great communication & very accommodating with check in & check outs. Would happily stay again.
So close to Bondi beach, cafes and the nightlife. A comfy bed and all the things you need for a great getaway.
I had an excellent stay here. The apartment is ideally located directly across from the beach with lots of shops and restaurants in walking distance. Kasey was super responsive and accommodating!
The most central location in Bondi. The apartment was beautifully styled and exactly as it looks in the photos. A great place to stay.

Kasey’s apartment is clean, modern, and perfect location for a stay in Bondi. All appliances are new and run well and Kasey was very attentive in making sure everything was up to standard. I would gladly recommend this apartment to anyone wanted to stay in Bondi!
Had a great stay! Right across Bondi beach. Very clean and Kasey was lovely to deal with!

Kasey is a great host and the apartment is everything we imagined,location is brilliant and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it to anyone 
Malcolm

I would definitely recommend this apartment!
Very clean and tidy.
Location is great, in front of the beach.
Communication with Kasey was so easy, and she even let us check in early in the morning!
Thanks for everything!

Kasey's place is a must stay for anyone wanting to check out the Bondi area! Kasey provides wonderful hospitality and her place is totally adorable! Just steps away from Bondi Beach :) Her place is perfect for 1-2 people and i couldn't be happier with our experience there! Thanks Kasey!

Look no further! Perfect accommodation for your stay in Bondi. Ideal location- So close to the beach yet you don’t hear any noise from the apartment. The air con is great too and a rare find around Bondi.
The weather lads is exactly like the pictures and very clean. Kasey was super responsive and very accommodating with my request to extend the stay.
Thanks Kasey.
Fabtastic apartment ight on the beach close to great restaraunts and shops

I absolutely loved my stay at Kaseys beautiful flat! The furnishings and attention to detail made me feel right at home. Kasey herself was an absolute brilliant host, very attentive, lovely and so super quick with responding to anything and everything. Last but definitely not least....location, location, location. Kaseys flat really is located at the heart of Bondi which is just awesome and leaves you with endless possibilities to explore and enjoy your days! I‘ll definitely was sad to be leaving and will return for sure! Thank you Kasey!!!
The location is superb- right in the beach! Kasey was really lovely to engage with. The space is so nice, very organised and clean! Highly recommended!

Wonderfully clean and stylish apartment steps from the beach - I even considered missing my flight home to stay longer! Kasey is an amazing and responsive host, could not recommend the apartment more highly!

This flat is perfectly located for an early swim in the morning. Your literally on bondi beach within seconds. Everything is just around the corner. Nice place just in the middle of ‚where the magic happens‘...
Excellent location and Kasey was very easy to communicate with. I would recommend.

Kasey’s place was perfect for our Bondi Beach adventure. The apartment was so cute and sparkling clean, with thoughtful touches everywhere. Kasey was quick to respond to us and went out of her way to work with us on a late checkout. We had the best time!

Kasey’s place is the best place to stay in Bondi. You can literally walk out of the apartment and right onto the beach. She was such a fantastic host, extremely responsive and accommodating, and we will certainly be back one day!

The apartment in a great location very close to a wide range of restaurants, shops and is across the road from Bondi Beach. The apartment is beautifully furnished with a minimal, yet rustic and calming feel. Divine linen and the apartment even included beach towels.
Kasey was quick and helpful with all our communications. Her place is just as lovely as the photos and in a perfect location for a beach holiday. Would definitely love to stay again.

The location is unbeatable! Across the street from the beach and right in the middle of shops, cafes, bars, and stores. It’s a perfect spot for those who plan to lie out on Bondi Beach, walk over to Tamarama Beach, or take an Uber/ferry to Sydney’s downtown area. Missing it so much!! The unit itself is cute and only one flight of stairs up. Something tells me you won’t spend TOO much time indoors here, though!
A good couple of days.

Amazing apartment only a step away from the beach. The space is very nice with attention to the detail and there is everything you need to make your stay comfortable. Kasey was a brilliant host and very responsive. Don’t look any further - this is the place to stay in Bondi Beach!

LOVED staying here. So close to the beach and close to restaurants and shops. The place was a cozy and comfortable place to come back to at the end of the day. We had everything we needed and more to make us feel at home. I’d come back in a heartbeat!
Amazing location combined with a cute space which is very well thought out.  Lots of helpful tips and would stay here again. Cheers!
Kasey’s place is really nice! Location is perfect! I will definitely come back!

host.host_about:
Hello My name is Lulu. I love travelling around and making friends｡ I hope you would enjoy my place like your home. The following are my apartment source:

https://zh.airbnb.com/rooms/8480074

reviews.comments: 挺好的

Perfect in every sense of the word! Extremely close to the metro, plenty of stores and malls around if you want to go shopping for amenities and food or clothes, easily accessible and secure (felt very safe), everything about Lulu’s place was fantastic. Plus, Lulu was very hospitable, making sure we were okay and even bought us some apples and bread to eat after she knew we had a few complications at the airport, which I found very touching. All in all a great 5/5 experience, will definitely stay again here should I come back to Hong Kong.
방은 보는 것 보다 더 컸고 역에서 도보 5분정도라서 가깝고 좋았습니다. 호스트가 영어를 할 수 있어서 의사소통에 문제가 없고 아주 친절하셔서 늦은 체크인에도 불구하고 밖에까지 나와주셨어요. 만족합니다.
位置方便,靠近地铁站,房间干净整洁｡沟通交流都没啥问题｡
不过房间真的很满意!在香港最繁华的地方,晚上也不是很吵,大厦治安也很好,屋内跟照片一模一样,下次来香港还会住这里的
放心大胆的选择Lulu,非常热心,来港五天我咳嗽,发烧,拉肚子,没有自备药的情况下我和老公求助了Lulu,她带我老公去买药,Lulu的关心对我是一种雪中送炭,不知道此时浏览房源的你是否理解,Lulu给我的感觉不单单是我找她租房子而已,而是一种情怀｡
住的地方离地铁站非常近,交通方便,房间虽然小但是设备很齐全,还有电视机,电源转换头,还有就是非常感谢lulu对我们旅程的热心建议,下次有机会还会选这里
比图片好多了,挺干净的,什么东西都有,门口就是太子站,4号在最里面,不错!
房源地理位置实在太好了,市中心,房间设施齐备｡房东回复快,贴心｡唯一觉得需要改善就系床单需要消毒下,晚上一直觉得有野咬,痕左成晚｡除此之外,觉得呢间房间真系非常非常好,而且真系所见即所得｡一定有下次,诚意推荐比所有人｡
emm..挺好的 就是有点小 交通很便利是真的 over!
環境還不錯,近地鐵站
空間大,有足夠冷氣及獨立廁所,位置便利,出門舒適
在自己没有很好的通讯准备的情况下,lulu总是能够十分及时在我能联系上她时回复我,这是让我觉得很暖心和满足的｡房子十分好,很干净整洁,有一定的“房子小”的心理准备下意外发现其实还算是不会很小的｡麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,床也很舒服,入住的体验感是十分好的,同时房子的地理位置也很好,如果再有机会我是会再次选择lulu的房子的｡
感谢lulu为我提供这么棒的住宿,麻雀虽小五脏俱全!距离太子地铁站特别方便,楼下也有特色茶餐厅,非常愉快的一次旅行,推荐大家!下次有机会来香港一定还会选择这里

Clean, simple, fully functioning flat at a great location. Use MTR Prince Edward Station C2 exit, or even better airport A21 bus at Metropark hotel stop. 1-3 minutes walk. Tons of foods and bars nearby. Great communication.

Lulu was a good host that answered all our questions. We did not have any problem communicating with him. The place is perfect. Walking distance from MTR, 711 and there are restaurants in the area open til late at night. Building is well maintained and the room is much larger than the average rooms in HK. Place is better than the photos.  Will surely stay here when I visit Hong Kong again. Thank you Lulu! :)
已经系第二次入住了,本身打算住周六,但系距无房,所以我地更改周五入住,可想而知距地质量真的不错,下次黎都会继续入住｡

name: Vintage plantation house

The decor is simple, walls, are painted in a neutral color then We use our imagination to add color with pictures and furniture and linens! Lighting is normal (LED lights). It counts w/ ceiling fans in Kitchen and Living room Hot water Washer and dryer are provided for your Convinience. Two bedrooms with AC unit in each one!

The house is central located close to the freeway making every destination just minutes away from you. Kahala mall is in a walking distance with all the restaurants and shops and supermarket.

host.host_about:
Travel passionate, fitness is a hobbie. I am an Animal lover.
Audio books are the best!
Apasionado de los viajes, Fitness mi  Hobbie y amante de los animales.
Me encanta escuchar los audio libros.

reviews.comments:
We were the first people to stay there and I have to say that everything was thought of ahead of time. My daughter was extra cold the first night we stayed (a cold front moved in) and Antonio was so very considerate to make sure she had a warm comforter brought to her. 

Antonio was a first class host and I would recommend his places to anyone at anytime. 

Thank you so very much for everything

An affordable alternative to the outrageously priced Honolulu hotels, but house and amenities are old--might remind you of the home of an elderly relative. Neighborhood is fine and safe but a minimum 15-minute drive or Uber ride from downtown Honolulu and Waikiki. If you're looking for a place to use as we did -- to sleep and shower while you spent most of your time elsewhere on the glorious island of Oahu, this will be fine, but don't expect elegance.
Great hideaway place.

This house was centrally located in a good neighborhood and was close to the mall and restaurants.  Antonio was flexible and very responsive to our requests.  However, when it rains the whole front yard floods which makes it difficult to get in and out of the house. This happened about 3 times during our stay and one time we had to move our cars up the street.  The house is very old, internet/TV is spotty, and not all of the windows have locks (but pieces of wood were added once we shared our concerns with Antonio).  Overall it met our needs as a long term, dog friendly, 2 bedroom rental but was not the most comfortable place for us.

Antonio's Dream Plantation House in Kaimuki was a fantastic place for my friend and I to stay for 2 weeks. Not only was it a good value, it was cute, conveniently located, and allowed us to live like locals and visit and meet locals and local businesses. there are many fantastic places nearby to eat at. There are also many grocery stores you can get your supplies at: Foodland, Safeway, Whole foods. There are several drug stores like Longs nearby if your prescription runs out. 

Antonio kept his place well stocked with essentials such as tp, paper towels, bath towels, soap, shampoo, etc. There is a washer and dryer which we were grateful for on our extended stay. The kitchen has everything you need to make simple breakfast and meals. We made eggs and portuguese sausage or kalua pork for breakfast. We made sandwiches and loco mocos for other meals, trying to live and eat local. We visited North Shore Grinds and Brew'd for food. Leonard's is nearby for malasadas as dessert. 

Not pictured is a cute back yard where there is a bench, and a faucet to wash off your swimsuits, rash guard, and snorkel gear. There is enough room to store longboards too.

Atonio was very fast and helpful with answers to any questions we had. Thank you for the good experience and aloha. Mahalo

Antonio’s place is a convenient 15 minutes from both the airport and the beach. It was in a safe area, and was such a comfortable space. It had all the needed amenities, was very clean, and easy to access. We enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it to anyone!

We have stayed at the two of the owner's other Historic homes. This was our favorite for it's affordability, easy access to the freeway, proximity to a mall, the position of the home to take advantage of the tradewinds,  and easy parking. High recommend staying here if you'd rather have money for things to do or buy. The owner is responsive in case you need anything.

Great location; towels, beach towels and extra soap provided; the place was clean and quaint. It's an older home, but has reliable wifi, tv and is comfortable for a homebase to sleep. Would happily recommend and would stay there again! Oh and parking was a plus!

Antonio's place was wonderful. It was my first stay in an Airbnb and I couldn't have been happier. Antonio was very helpful with any questions I had and always responded very quickly! Definitely would recommend!

The location is what we enjoyed most about this place since we like staying in the Kaimuki area of Honolulu. The air conditions were great when it got hot. Check in and out was easy. Antonio was a hands-off type of host. We never even met him. The house is pretty old and only has the bare necessities, so be prepared to provide your own items when cooking and going to the beach. The backyard could also use some updating.
Nice place - I would rent there again.
This beautiful little house was great,  the beds was so comfortable, and the price was fantastic, I love it!!
谢谢房东在这里很开心感觉像家一样棒再见欢迎天津去玩回来联系我们
Cute home, great location,  comfortable beds, and air conditioners!!!
Nostalgic

We stayed in this comfortable house for a week. It's nice to be outside of the hustle and bustle of Waikiki, but close enough to drive there in 10 minutes. Having the parking space was a definite bonus as many Airbnb places within Waikiki don't include a space and finding parking there can be a major headache. It's a 5-10 minute walk to a mall and a supermarket which is very convenient, and it's also right on the freeway for getting around the island.

The place is older and could use a few updates in some areas, but overall in terms of location and value it's great. It was nice to open the house up and have the tradewinds blowing through and when that wasn't enough the AC units worked well. There is a small backyard with some seating - it's not in great shape but it's usable. Would stay here again. Antonio was great with communication as well. Mahalo.
Money worth spending

We stayed 5 nights at Antonio's  cottage and loved it! I t is rustic being a historic plantation style residence.   It is easy to access,  in a great location  near lots of nice cafes,  yoga studios and restaurants.  The beach and a nice mall with Whole Foods and theaters are just a couple of minutes away.  The cottage is well appointed, very clean, and in a quiet, safe neighborhood. With the whole 2 bedroom cottage to ourselves,  including washer and dryer out back and parking space in front,  we couldn't have asked for more! Would definitely stay again.

We enjoy our stay here.

The location is really convenient, it is within walking distance to the grocery store (but it is better to drive there given the temperature) and a mall, and a few minute drive if you want to relax in Waikiki or want to go some hiking in Diamond head.

The place is clean and has all the necessities you need for travel.

Most important, our host Antonio is great. He is quick to respond our messages, and do not hesitate to help us on a Friday night when we are having some medical emergency.

Great location, spacious rooms and vintage feels. Can’t use washer and dryer in late night because of the noise complaints from next door. Key box was seriously tough to open. Could get cold on winter time.

name: Luxury Living! Sleeps 8, 2 Car Spots, Close to CBD
summary: Impeccable newly furnished three bedroom 142 sqm apartment in a secure building. All rooms have floor to ceiling glass. Impressive space flowing seamlessly onto wrap around terraces. All terraces have Crim-safe doors. Sleeps eight with three beds, main with en suite and walk-in wardrobe. Second bedroom with two king singles, third bedroom with queen bed. Lounge room has double sofa bed. Timber/tiled floors, Caesar stone kitchen, Miele appliances. Two underground secured car spots.
space: Quiet ground floor apartment, leafy residential aspect in quiet neighbourhood yet only minutes from CBD. Handy to airport, trains, buses and beaches.

All terraces have Crim-safe doors. Sleeps eight with three beds, main with en suite and walk-in wardrobe. Second bedroom with two king singles, third bedroom with queen bed. Quiet ground floor apartment, leafy residential aspect in quiet neighbourhood yet only minutes from CBD. Handy to airport, trains, buses and beaches. Internal gardens and  security building. Also secure parking for 2 cars included Zetland is an inner-eastern suburb of Sydney, NSW, Australia about 4 kilometres south of the CBD, in the local government area of the City of Sydney.  The East Village shopping centre is very modern and has Coles Groceries, butchers, fishmonger, bakeries, cafes, restaurants etc.  Th
neighborhood_overview: Zetland is an inner-eastern suburb of Sydney, NSW, Australia about 4 kilometres south of the CBD, in the local government area of the City of Sydney.  The East Village shopping centre is very modern and has Coles Groceries, butchers, fishmonger, bakeries, cafes, restaurants etc.  There are also many nearby parks, with some that are leash free for dogs. There are also basketball courts, bbq areas, a library and several children's play grounds.
notes: It’s worth noting Sydney does have a tropical climate, and so there may be a few bugs about in any property you stay in - nothing that would negatively impact your stay though!
transit: Zetland is an excellent suburb for transport. TRAINS are at Green Station which is 1km away and would take about 12 mins to walk there - or about $10 in a taxi or uber. Green Station also takes you directly to domestic and international airports. BUSES TO CITY are within 3 min walk from apartment and TAXIS are 5 mins walk away - approximately $25 to get to airport in 10 mins. CAR SHARE - Go Get is a car-share company and has many cars available in Zetland within walking distance.
access: Internal gardens and  security building. Also secure parking for 2 cars included
house_rules: - Please be quiet when arriving and leaving the building as it is a quiet residential area, No noise after 10pm.

host.host_about: Friendly couple who love to travel and often stay in Airbnb's themselves. Just this year we have been to Uluru, Alice Springs, Paris, Brussels and London. We can't live without travelling, great coffee, good books and good food. We welcome you to our luxury central apartment and will do everything to make sure you enjoy your stay.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Casandra and Davi's place was perfect for our family. Very modern and confortable, it is really well located, close to restaurantes and a very nice shopping center, and not so far to Sydney CDB. We had a great stay and we would like to recommend it.
This place was a very good place. Clean and excellent interior! This house is near a shopping center.
It is a beautiful place to stay, very clean, comfortable and in a great location.
Cassandra and David were terrific with communication and check in was easy and seamless. The apartment is in a good location for ease of access to Sydney city and eastern beaches.
it's a nice place to stay. it's location is good, very close to CBD. Rooms are spacious, kitchen is stylish. Kids are really like it, coz  they found some board games provided by the host.

Hi, we all had a great stay at the place was perfect for our stay. Our dinner unfortunately fell through on new years eve but the kitchen was so good we were able to cook a nice dinner for ourselves. The only down fall we had was how hot the apartment got. We thought the apartment was air conditioned but were a bit disappointed with the small mini evaporative cooler as it did little to nothing to help with the heat around the apartment. At minimum it would have been nice to at least have a fan in each room to help sleep at night. Apart from that our stay was great. Thanks for having us.

This place was perfect! Very nice, large space great for our family to hang out if we had no plans in evening. Area was quiet, buy also livrky if that is what you were looking for. Very close to shopping and restaurants. Great place for families with young kids or young adults! Thank you the great stay!

Hi Cassandra, David, We enjoyed stay in your nice, clean place. The location is great, close to shopping and restaurant. We walked to station to city and catched bus back, very convenient. Thanks again! Feng

The location of the property was perfect, close to everything and nice quiet area. There is no air-conditioning system in the house, and the host provided fans but that did not do the job as the house got really hot and we all struggled to sleep at night. The 2 occasional chairs in the living room was an interesting design and slants to the front so was very uncomfortable - we were 6 adults and the living room furniture couldn't accommodate was all comfortably.
Check everything before stay..make sure is working everything

Thank you for having us. 
Will definitely recommend and stay again
A great stay right near the Sydney CBD. Thank you for such great hospitality
This place is great.. residential yet close to everything. Modern, just like the images, big and spacious. The value is amazing for what you get
Amazing spot, fun area, fresh space, what a great place to call home for the weekend!
Nice apartment & convenient location

This apartment was just as described. It was bright and spacious with plenty of room for three couples. The location is perfect with easy access to Sydney airport and the CBD and with a good shopping centre nearby and plenty of restaurants and cafes nearby. The neighbourhood is safe, green and attractive. Dealing with Casandra and David prior to arrival was very easy with prompt responses to my questions. I would recommend this apartment and would stay there again.
Great location, spacious, nice/comfy furniture, very nice hosts and support crew. Very efficient check in and out process. We hope to stay again soon
Beautiful clean apartment, close to city. Casandra and David were great hosts. Quick responses to any queries, etc.

The unit is very good for your family to stay in Sydney, walking distance to public transport and close to a shopping centre and eateries. 
Modern unit with most of what you would want for your stay, for a larger family like ours, thanks it was great
Hi, everything was perfect apart from cleanliness and some desperately needed maintenance
Great location close to everything and very clean! Very stylish and was a wonderful alternative to a hotel room. Very quiet place to stay but close to everything.
Nice location, close to everything, very clean and great entertainment facilities.
Worth the price

The place is very lovely. Thank you for welcoming us with flower .. we love it

The place have everything you need and have complete stuff for cook and bbq

Really comfy bed and large space

Nice light apartment perfect for a large family group. Plenty of storage for luggage. Convenient location with shops and public transport fairly close....bus less than 5 minutes walk and train about 15.
Spacious family friendly apartment close to the city and many things to do.
A modern apartment in strategic location near a shopping mall, clean and cozy setting coupled with a well equipped kitchen making our stay a memorable one.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Cassandra and David’s place. The location was amazing with an easy walk to parks and shops. Nice quiet streets, very family friendly. Well set up to accommodate two families especially with two car spaces. Inside it was modern and clean. Highly recommended.

Very friendly hosts with a wonderful home. The location and surroundings are lush and very accessible. The hosts responded quickly to any of our inquiries. The home was clean and spacious. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Nice apartment just three step from the road in a quite area

Beautiful apartment, close to a large Coles. Take a good coffee at the coffee shop on the entrance of the shopping mall.
Apartment is well equipped and offers a lot of space. Neighborhood is perfect and Green Square station is about 10mins walk and offers fast transport to the city.
plenty of space and lots to do near by :)
房子很大但不太歸一,而且晚上會聽到飛機女經過的聲音｡
Fantastic apartment! We loved our stay here, it’s set up beautifully and the location is fantastic. We’ll be back!
Very easy to communicate to. Nice place and location
Great location, very stylish space with everything you need to feel at home in Sydney!

As a family of 5 we have enjoyed the spacious and nice apartment. The parking lot at the garage and its location makes it very easy and convenient. 

There are also a variety of restaurants, supermarkets and playgrounds just walking distance.

Communicating with David was easy and would just suggest they have a closer eye on their outsourced cleaning and maintenance to be sure everything is cleaned and working prior to guests arrival.

A lovely apartment, great location and David and Cassandra made communication  super easy and were extremely prompt with responses.
We would certainly stay there again.

Casandra and David's flat is in an excellent location.  We loved having the flexibility to take the train, or to drive from the location easily.   The proximity to the East Village Shopping center is also a great convenience.  

We found the beds to be very comfortable and the kitchen to be well stocked.  We also loved the patio grill.

Modern apartment with excellent amenities, lots of natural light and a lovely cool breeze when you open the sliding doors. Only a short walk to the shops, park and train station in a quiet neighborhood. Easy check-in/out and excellent communication!
Graet unit, location and amenities.  Will use again

地點很好,附近有三個公園,有兩座兒童遊戲場,是親子友善的住宿環境,有提供一個兒童餐椅在家裡可以使用;走路五分鐘就有大型超市賣場,非常方便!

清潔部分給4分希望可以再加強:)

beautiful location

nice place for family's and relaxing

This apartment is fantastic, amazing hosts with helpful and easy communication. Location was perfect if you need to be close to the city. 

The apartment it’s self is beautiful and I would 100% stay here again!
Casandra and David’s place was lovely and we had a really good time here. They provided everything we need and it was definitely worth money.
Cassandra and David’s place was super nice! So clean and modern, great location and they were very swift with their responses to me.

Great place in a great area. Had a weekend with some mates watching the cricket. 10 minute Uber or 30 minute walk from the SCG. 

Nice modern apartment that sleep 8 full grown men.

Very short walk to shops, restaurants, cafes (great coffee) and Coles. Being from the country, I was surprised at how quiet the streets was at night. I enjoyed the walk (12mins) to the station and getting the train into town.
Great place to stay!
屋子里居然没有空调 因为在一楼 开着窗s很吵很吵 难以想象 也许晚上外面很凉快 但是为了隐私又必须拉上窗帘 接着就是开电扇 很热很热 如果屋子配有空调就完美了 装修很好 位置一般 出行必须打车 价格昂贵

Great place to stay - Casandra and David had everything organised for us and communicated everything very well. Very easy check-in and check out. Central to shopping centres, restaurants and public transport. Uber into town approx $20, which was very easy.
Great location so close to East Village. Great spot between airport and town and safe area with great buses to town or Bondi.
Bright and modern house in a great location. Close to shops and parks. Perfect for a family get away.
很糟糕的入住体验,房间和位置还行,但是房东不负责任,没有及时回应,一共入住4天3晚,第一天买了一袋食物晚上烧,煤气灶头却坏了,跟房东反馈,房东说明天上午来检修,让我们用BBQ炉子,第二天等了一整天,没有任何人联系来修理,房东只说抱歉,却没有任何行动,要等到第三天才来修理,BBQ也没有液化气无法使用!房东也只会说不好意思,很不负责!房间里面 硕大的蟑螂有好几只看见,很可怕!

Fantastic apartment and location. Very spacious, modern and clean. Very prompt, clear communication at all times. Cassandra and David went out of there way to buy a travel cot for our six-month old too, which was greatly appreciated. Very useful having the underground car park too. Would definitely recommend this apartment as a great base from which to explore Sydney.

neighborhood_overview: Sarrià is the neighbourhood par excellence of Barcelona. It retains the traditional taste and the personality of lifelong neighbours. A district of shops and mansions but also green parks, health institutions and prestigious schools. Walking around Sarrià is always a pleasure and a reunion with the past.   The Sant Gervasi district is mainly a residential area which is very well connected to the rest of Barcelona. It is very close to the traditional neighbourhood of Gracia and the well-known Eixample district. The area has many shops, cafes, bars and different restaurants.
notes: Please note that for your comfort we can also provide everything you need to prepare your breakfast directly at your apartment! We have different types and snacks depending on your needs! Don’t forget to ask us about the prices!

Please turn off the Lights and air conditioning every time you leave the apartment. 4. You are not allowed to accommodate more people in the apartment than the number of guests in the booking. 5. Nice view to stay
Amazing view. Great location. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay.
Simply wonderful!

Super appartement avec une vue sur le vieux porto magnifique 

Belle expérience

Espaço fantástico, vista fantástica... o Gil foi  um super anfitrião, simpático e sempre disponível. O espaço está muito bem localizado em lugar tranquilo, mas perto de restaurantes e bares. Recomendamos sem dúvida e esperamos voltar.

This apartment is ultra modern with a fantastic view of the Douro River. Gil is a very responsive host. Taxi drivers may have a challenge finding it, but Uber drivers had no problem. Extremely comfortable bed! We’d definitely stay here again.

Hemos estado alojados en el apartamento de Gil este Puente de Mayo y sin duda lo recomendaría!!
Las vistas son increíbles, el apartamento está muy limpio y tiene todos los detalles que puedas necesitar para disfrutar de la estancia. Tiene garaje también.
Pero lo mejor es Gil, un anfitrión estupendo, muy pendiente de que no te falte de nada, disponible y solícito; sus recomendaciones nos fueron de mucha ayuda!
Sin duda un acierto y absolutamente recomendable!
Gracias, Gil!!
Gil was an amazing host. His place was very amazing and clean. He assisted with suggestion on what to do. He responded quickly to questions.

The place and location were great!  Walking distance to the Port houses.  Gil was super helpful with tips and suggestions.  Nice to have a dedicated parking spot.

Our one suggestion is that there's a sunken shower/bath in between the bathroom and the bedroom, and it should be raised up or there should be a door as I fell into the shower in the middle of the night.

This unit is just gorgeous, perched on top of an old warehouse with incredible river and city views. It is about a 15 minute walk around to all the waterfront hub and port caves. It’s a nice riverside walk, flat and it’s good to escape the crowds.  Would stay again in a heartbeat.

You wake up to the views of Porto and it is absolutely amazing with the boats sailing by! It’s about 20 minute walk to Porto over the bridge but there are lots of places to stop along the way! The only thing I wish there was a coffee shop close by! The stay was unbelievable and the bed was so comfortable!

Just being in the apartment waving at the tour boats going by might end up being one of your best experiences in Porto! Not only is the view spectacular, a short walk takes you to all the restaurants and caves along the river, whilst passing local fishermen on the boardwalk. Gil was an exceptional host, answering questions before and during our stay. We will be back and we will stay here. If this place is available, do not hesitate to book it.

The photos do not do it justice. This is a beautiful apartment in a great location with the most stunning views. Gil went above and beyond to make this a comfortable stay. Everything you want to do in Porto is a 10-30 min very pleasant walk away. I have every intention of coming back to stay in this apartment. 

Not lots of privacy so I’d only go here with a significant other, and not anyone else

O Gil é um excelente anfitrião, fez nos sentirmos em casa. 
O apartamento é incrível e a vista é deslumbrante. 
Recomendo

Amazing place. The views and the apartment are amazing, even better than in pictures!!
Less than 15 minutes walking to Gaia area with lots of restaurants and life.

When you walk through the front door, you are immediately greeted by an amazing view of the river. If fact, it feels as if you are on a tall ship above the water. The building and apartment are well designed and very interesting. Although not in Porto itself, the location is perfect if you have a car and plan to explore. It’s easy to get an Uber if you don’t want to drive.
The photos don't do this place justice. It's stunning.

Die Wohnung ist top modern und ausgestattet mit allem was man braucht. Viel wichtiger ist jedoch die nicht zu übertreffende Lage am Duoro. Die Aussicht bei Tag und Nacht ist unbeschreiblich. Es steht kostenlos ein Parkplatz in der Einstellhalle zur Verfügung.  Gil ist sehr freundlich und kompetent. Vielen Dank durften wir deine Gäste sein!
Le prime clienti italiane . :) una casa fantastica....con quelle vetrate ! Sembrava di vivere un sogno . Gil molto disponibile ! Super consigliato !
ótima escolha. Apto. muito bem decorado, ótima localização. Anfitrião muito atencioso. Super indico.
Views to die for in a stunning warehouse conversion. Super comfortable bed. Great location. Easy to find and the parking was a bonus. Loved the whole place and hope to visit again...
This is the perfect apartment for a trip to Porto. The views of Porto and the river are fabulous! I would highly recommend staying here.
A great view of Porto.
sans faute total , vue et logement inoubliable
an awesome place with a stunning view! great location to explore porto :)

The location is great and within a ten minute walk you are at the Dom Luís I Bridge which is where you see most of the restaurants and touristic attractions.

Bring mosquito repellents. Unfortunately there is no A/C and opening the windows on the river attracted some mosquitos. For what it’s worth, the views are worth it and I am assuming anywhere so close to the river you are going to attract some, especially during the summer time.
Apartamento muy bonito.

Words cannot explain the view. A bit of a walk to Porto but being outside of the city kept it quiet. The parking garage was awesome to have. We walked everywhere. So many things to do. Such a great time! Thank you Gil!

Appartement splendide ! Tout à fait conforme à la description :) 
La vue est magique !
Gil est disponible et très réactif ! 
Merci pour ce séjour, nous recommandons !
Great aparment with amazing view

great place - stunning view! i would recommend it for couples that want to have romantic weekend. little bit far from center which makes it intimate and quite. on foot you can go everywhere.  Gil is a great host - sharing good tips and responds quickly!
Great location with a great view.

Vielen Dank Gil. Nach dem wir bereits im Juli ein paar Nächte in dieser Wohnung verbringen durften haben wir uns umso mehr auf die Tage im August gefreut. Supertolle Wohnung, besser gehts kaum. Völlig unkomplizierte übernahme und problemlose Kommunikation. Hoffentlich bald wieder....

Fantastic appartment! Stunning view already when entering, and from every room. Very clean and newly furbished with modern architecture. It looks even better than on the photos. The appartment is quiet , but still centrally located close to the center of Caia, and just opposite Porto‘s old town. Exceptionell, thanks!

Nice apartment with great views of Porto including the bridge and cathedral, right on the river and boardwalk. Secure and roomy parking in a quiet, modern building (no air conditioning, unfortunately) with elevators. Gil was a great host, and his recommendation of the riverside area of Afadura (west of the apartment) for cafes and restaurants was great, as the apartment is in the old warehouse district, where such facilities are scarce.

name: APPARTEMENT MODERNE
summary: CONDO MONDERNE ET NEUF. POSSIBILITÉ D'AVOIR LES DEUX CHAMBRES DISPONIBLES OU UNE DES DEUX. PROCHE DES COMMODITÉS AVEC ESPACE DE STATIONNEMENT POUR VOITURE. LE CONDO EST TOUT ÉQUIPÉ.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Mon séjour auprès de Serge a été très agréable. 
Serge est un hôte avenant, chaleureux et généreux. 
Il prends soin du bien être de ses locataires . 

il peut vous aiguiller pour quoi que ce soit il est de nature très humble et ouvert, 
Nous avons beaucoup échanger ensemble je suis ravi d’avoir fait sa connaissance en quittant son appartement j’ai gagné un ami je vous le recommande fortement; 
Vous ne regretterez pas votre séjour à Montréal.

Serge is a great host, we enjoy our time, I was a little confuse because his add say private room, but is not just a room it is the entire apartment. and the location for me was just perfect 5 min from my family.
Propre et calme. Logement récent et sécuritaire. Rapport qualité-prix difficile à battre dans ce coin de Montréal. Hôte très accueillant et sympathique.
Great place for the price. If your looking for something a little way out of the city with parking this is a good choice.

Serge est quelqu’un de très accueillant et gentil, il m’as aider dans mes premières épiceries et répondait à toutes mes questions sur la ville de Montréal. 
Je vous le recommande fortement, d’autant plus que l’appartement est entièrement à vous. 
Serge a le cœur sur la main, personnellement, je n’hésiterai pas une seule seconde si jamais je devais à me déplacer sur Montréal dans le futur ! 

Merci Serge

Just one word: Awesome! 
Best I did until now!
I would recommend this place gray location not to busy or loud area. Great host
tres bon hote
It’s a perfect location for a nice quiet time. It’s close to transport and shops and he’s just the perfect host.

Condo à 2 chambres qui peut être louées si vs êtes seul à d autres personnes aussi. Sinon vous êtes seul ds le condo. Facile d Acces. Épicerie,  pharmacie proche, restos aussi. Endroit calme et non bruyant
Super sympathique
Très beau logement!!!!!
J ai beaucoup apprécié mon séjour chez serge . il est tres accueillant disponible tout le temps son appartement est propre , calme , bien situé et confortable. Je recommande .

This is a 2 bedroom apartment that Serge lets you have all to yourself! We had little interaction with him but he was very nice. Only problem we had was with the internet, we were never able to figure out which one to connect to and what the right password was but we didn't spend enough time at the apartment to really try and figure it out so it was all ok!

This experience was an eye-opener.  You get what you pay for.  Coming from Western Canada the communication was iffy with the translation issues.  This seemed to be resolved before we left.  The host was made aware when we would be arriving...early evening.  We arrived at the door in this unknown neighborhood, and after calling and texting many times over a 2 hour period without a reply, were starting to wonder if we had been scammed.  Finally the door was buzzed open and we went to the unit.  We did not meet or see our host until the 5th night.     The  accomodations were modern, a type of industrial Ikea -look with cement ceilings and clean and simple design.   The bed is a mattress on the floor which proved to be very uncomfortable, along with terrible pillows.  There was no table and chairs to sit at, rather just a couch and chair.   The TV/cable do not work.  We asked about the tv several times during our stay via text and phone call, but were ignored without a response.  The fridge freezer motor is very loud.  There were no paper towels, or clean t towel or dish rag available., as well as no coffee maker(if you are a coffee person that is hard in the morning)  Many cupboards in the kitchen were closed off from access.  There also is no garbage can other than a small one in the bathroom.  The ad suggests and implies that you get the entire unit to use, but once there you really feel that it is just a place to sleep and shower.  Parking is a premium to find and may require several trips around several blocks before locating a spot.  This seems to be normal for Montreal and eventually you get accustomed to it.  Patience is required.  
All in all, it was a place to sleep, but we would not return.
Nice
Great value and superior host

It is quite the commute to everything we wanted to see around Old Montreal and the Gay Village, however it makes up for it because Serge's price per night is UNREAL with how AMAZING it is. Serge is pretty much a hands off AirBnB Host (which is ideal for me personally) unless you ask him a question which he replies in minutes. Such a kind person. Would recommend this site if you're looking for affordability and don't mind a 30 minute commute from North Montreal to downtown South Montreal.
Appartement propre et bien situé. Dans un quartier calme, proche de commerces. Très bien accueillis. Je recommande sans soucis
Tout ce qu’il y’a de meilleur pour un séjour en famille. La tranquillité, la proximité avec l’arrêt Bus. Bref je recommande vivement
rien à signaler
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice place. Only issue was there was only 1 roll of toilet paper.
L'appartement de Serge est vraiment très bien. Nous avons passés super un week end.
Personne très sympathique et courtois !:-)
It was 20 minutes away from downtown but it was the cossiest place I've ever stay. Well worth the price and then some. If I come back I'm definitely looking this place up again❤
Accueillant et sympa
Great
Serge was very heartwarming, apartment was clean and the location was great also. Would definetly come back
Merci pour le séjour

name: Comfortable & Bright Studio in the East Village
summary: Bright, spacious and super organized studio in perfect location to explore NYC
space: THE SPACE: Beautiful studio, spacious given the open arrangement and very bright due to two huge windows that fill the space with natural light.  LOOK & DECOR: The apartment has dark hardwood floors and metal framed doors for some great NYC vintage charm. At the same time, it is modern and clean with a recently renovated kitchen and bathroom. I am extremely organized so the place is really well set up. The decor is beautiful, simple and modern in white and light grey colors for a spacious and peaceful feeling.  SLEEPING & STORAGE: The studio provides plenty of room for 2 adults and comfortable sleeping room for a 3rd adult (if two share the bed) given the queen bed and futon - see pictures. I provide sheets, comforters and pillows as well as a foam mattress to make the futon super comfy. The place has two closets so I will leave one for you to use with space for shoes and plenty of hangers. There is also a trunk full of sports equipment including some free weights - see pics. Central h
description: Bright, spacious and super organized studio in perfect location to explore NYC THE SPACE: Beautiful studio, spacious given the open arrangement and very bright due to two huge windows that fill the space with natural light.  LOOK & DECOR: The apartment has dark hardwood floors and metal framed doors for some great NYC vintage charm. At the same time, it is modern and clean with a recently renovated kitchen and bathroom. I am extremely organized so the place is really well set up. The decor is beautiful, simple and modern in white and light grey colors for a spacious and peaceful feeling.  SLEEPING & STORAGE: The studio provides plenty of room for 2 adults and comfortable sleeping room for a 3rd adult (if two share the bed) given the queen bed and futon - see pictures. I provide sheets, comforters and pillows as well as a foam mattress to make the futon super comfy. The place has two closets so I will leave one for you to use with space for shoes and plenty of hangers. There is also a t
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the East Village only 1 block away from the subway station, which is basically amazing. The East Village is one of the most beautiful and coolest places in Manhattan. The area is residential and fun, with tons of stores, parks, restaurants and bars. At the same time, it is right between Downtown, Midtown and Brooklyn so you can get anywhere on the subway in less than 30 minutes. I'll be happy to give you further help on signtseeing as well as restaurant and coffee shop recommendations!
notes: I love giving suggestions, recommendations and directions so you have an amazing trip!
transit: Walk less than 1 block, jump on the subway and you're 15-30 min from all the main attractions. You can literally walk to some of the most appealing ones, which are usually in the lower side of Manhattan, such as Soho, West Village, Brooklyn Bridge, Chinatown, etc. Otherwise, you can taxi everywhere for cheap. For example, an Uber pool to Soho would be between $7-10. I'll be happy to give further directions as needed, especially from the international airports.
access: The entire apartment is for your access and you also have laundry room downstairs. You will be able to do self check-in through a key locker in a Key Cafe in a coffeeshop around the block from the apartment. You can also check in after hours as I will leave the key at a deli open 24hours.
interaction: If you're booking that means I'm probably traveling. However, I use a co-host service and he'll be available throughout your stay and lives 1 block away! so he can take care of any needs you may have. I will use self-check in via coded lockers - super easy and available 24hrs! I and my co-host will both be available via messenger to answer any question throughout your stay. The space and linen will also be cleaned before and after your stay.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I work in the fashion industry. I love coffee, tennis, apple pie, travel, clothes, netflix, music and hanging out in NYC.

reviews.comments: Guillermo’s place was fantastic! Great value, great location and quick responses over messenger as we checked in. Thank you!!
We had a great time in the apartment with my girlfriend. The place is really like on the pictures, it was clean and tidied-up  . The location is absolutely perfect to travel around the city.

The appartement was great, very spacious and well situated (there’s a subway station close by, or you can easily walk everywhere in Manhattan). There are different food options all around, including a Trader Joe’s.  Guillermo and Seth were so nice, answered quickly and willing to  help us check in. We had a great time at Guillermo’s place, I definitely recommend it !

I had a great stay at Guillermo's studio! The place is just like in the pictures. Check in was easy--instructions were clear and very thoughtfully explained. Everything was clean and the location is wonderful. 

Thanks for a great stay!
Great space in a great location! Communication was fast and friendly! Would Certainly stay here again.

Excelente experiencia. Guillermo siempre estaba al pendiente y atento a nuestras necesidades. La localización es perfecta, la estación de tren está a menos de 4min caminando, hay supermercado, tiendas de comida, entre otras cosas súper cerca del alojamiento. Además, la vecindad es bastante segura.

name: GoodStay - Mouzinho
summary: This is a lovely apartment a few meters away from the riverside Ribeira.
space: Lovely modern loft in a typical Portuguese building. The apartment is on the first floor with a lift, has 2 beds, one double bed and one single, very spacious and bright, is the perfect place for you to stay in Porto.
description: This is a lovely apartment a few meters away from the riverside Ribeira. Lovely modern loft in a typical Portuguese building. The apartment is on the first floor with a lift, has 2 beds, one double bed and one single, very spacious and bright, is the perfect place for you to stay in Porto. In the area there is a lot of restaurants, coffees, and grocery stores, our place is very close by of one of the most charming streets in Porto "Rua das Flores", as well as public transportation, Bus, metro and train, which will help you moving around. We welcome every guest personally and we always have time to help you with some tips and recommendations about the city. We're always reachable, so please let us know if there's something wrong or if you have questions. We always try to answer as fast as we can. A few meters away from the riverside Ribeira, this apartment has a privileged location. From here you can walk everywere, the main sights are all around.  In the area there is a lot of restaura

In the area there is a lot of restaurants, coffees, and grocery stores, our place is very close by of one of the most charming streets in Porto "Rua das Flores".
notes: Extra towels have a cost of 20€
access: In the area there is a lot of restaurants, coffees, and grocery stores, our place is very close by of one of the most charming streets in Porto "Rua das Flores", as well as public transportation, Bus, metro and train, which will help you moving around.
