address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The flat is very spacious with super high ceilings that even the loft bed feels airy. Quiet with excellent shutters for blocking out light and sound. Very modern and stylish and perfectly centered in Porto. Would stay again and highly recommend. Thanks!

Location is stupendous. Love the huge windows/doors overlooking the city. 
Excellent space.

We had a really great time in Porto and this flat is definitely the best place to stay there. It's very central, modern furnished and clean. Joana and Elói are great hosts - evereything went smoothly.

We will come back for sure.

Loft acogedor en pleno centro de Oporto, con un servicio atento e impecable, que se mantuvo en contacto con nosotros en todo momento.
Muy recomendable

One thing I love about Airbnb is finding unique places to stay, and this is one of them. Great use of space, perfect size for 2. I loved staying here and wish I could have stayed longer. Great location, easy check in and really comfortable apartment. Would definitely stay again.

Great design, very cosy flat. There is anything you may need equipment wise. Perfectly located, all the interests points are at walking distance. You're close to some nice restaurants as well (try Puro 4050!). Only drawback: it is quite noisy with the street outside and the neighbors. But other than that the flat is perfect!
Our stay was great ! Central location, close to the Douro, Joao gave us good adresses to visit Porto, everything was great !
Au coeur du quartier historique, un lieu très agréable où l'on se sent bien. Merci.

Joana’s and Elóis’s apartment was simply incredible! From a stunning view of the vibrant city to beautiful interior and a warm atmosphere, it offered a comfortable stay right in the centre of Porto. Joana provided wonderful recommendations upon arrival and it was truly one of the most memorable stays. Couldn’t be more grateful!
The apartment has great furnitures, perfect location and it was very clean. Better than an 4 star hotel.

Tolles Appartment in einer absoluten Traumlage. Ein wunderschönes altes Haus, typisch Porto. Bad und Küche sind in einem Würfel unter dem Hochbett integriert, was wir ganz lustig fanden. Dadurch fällt auch der Wohnbereich größer aus. Ideal für einen Ausflug zu zweit. Gerne Wieder.

Nulla da dire, appartamento incantevole, moderno, zona centralissima: a piedi in un raggio di 10 minuti raggiungi qualunque luogo da visitare. Joana è stata super carina e disponibile. Assolutamente consigliato!

By far the best experience I have had at any Airbnb rental. The host was exceptionally friendly and accommodating - I was set to arrive in the early afternoon but due to train delays I did not end up arriving until the evening, the host was able to move her schedule around and was at the door waiting for me when I finally arrived. The space is BEAUTIFUL and very functional. The bed was very comfy, the window shutters blocked all noise from the busy street, the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you could need and the bathroom was stocked with towels, soaps, shampoos, etc. I would HIGHLY recommend staying  here!

The apartment was beautiful, clean, and in an amazing location. We stayed for a week and wished we could have stayed for longer. Eloi was an amazing host, and incredibly friendly and accommodating. We’ll be back!

A very cosy and comfortable apartment with a load of daylight. Well equiped kitchen and spacious living room. In a very central point down town Porto. All the nice places like the riverbank with Porthouses, streets with bars and restaurants are in walking distance. However the appartment is located next to an important street, we didn’t experience noices. Joana was very helpful and gave is great tips to discover Porto. She responded quick on our messages and brought us extra towels, coffee and a missing win glass. Super host! A great place to discover the amazint city of Porto.

Lovely space, in the PERFECT location to explore a beautiful city. Really close to shops and restaurants, as well as the main station in Porto, São Bento. Very stylish apartment, which was super clean. Our host was really friendly and gave us lots of tips for the area.
Nico Location. Clean. Nice interrior

Stylish and  spacious apartment which was roomy for three. The location is a block from the train station and close by to many great restaurants, cafes,  shops, and so on. The host was nice enough to let us check-in early and sent a nice fellow who showed us around the apartment and gave a lot of good recommendations to sight-see and to go eat. Highly recommend!

The Apartment place is ideally located for all the sites to see in the old district of Porto. The apartment is modern, clean, and well laid out. We enjoyed our stay there very much and recommend it highly.

Pros: clean, tastefully designed studio right in the center of town.
Cons: it gets hots and stuffy (windows only on one side) and neighbours are noisy
Great apartment and a very clear process  - i'd definitely stay there again!

This is a great base from which to explore the lovely city of Porto.  It is easily within walking distance of most sights and very close to Sao Bento for connection from the airport or any explorations further afield.  There are plenty of nice restaurants and bars in the area and the charming rua das Flores is the next street over.

The apartment is just as it looks in the photos - spotlessly clean and very comfortable for a couple.  Eloi and Joana have been extremely responsive and easy to communicate with.  Check in with Joao was flawless.  They offered to keep our luggage for a few hours before our late afternoon train on the day of our departure but we just used the luggage storage service offered at the Magic Moda store across the street.

Overall, we had a great stay and would highly recommend this apartment.

Our stay exceeded expectations in every way. The flat was large, beautiful, airy light and quiet. Modern interior in a 100 year old building. Centrally located. Quiet. Our host was fantastic. He was incredibly knowledgeable , helpful and responsive. Would absolutely stay here again. Thanks for making our visit such a success!

Super efficient arrangement of apartment space. Uncluttered, comfortable, contemporary furnishings. Great location, easy walking access to a variety of small eating establishments and public transport. Street noise was not an issue. I’m super sensitive to cigarette smoke, so kept windows closed to keep smoke from wafting into the apt from the many sidewalk smokers. Our host graciously accommodated our late arrival because of  delayed trains.
Great location, awesome hosts who were very communicative and incredibly helpful. Would recommend this place to anyone!

Perfect stay, perfect place and location, with a design touch !
We recommend it for sure !
Very very good. Nothing else zu say… Porto is amazing
Perfect location and fantastic apartment, really recommend it!!

Beautiful modern apartment in a great location. In walking distance to everything, including the metro and all other public transport. Lots of restaurant options in walking range. 
The apartment has  working elevator making it easy to transport luggage up stairs.  Check in and out was very easy. The host spent a lot of time going over recommendations for the entire city - this was extremely useful. 
We had a great stay in this apartment. When we return to Porto we will definitely be back to this accommodation. Thank you!
the apartment is very well located, decorated with taste and well equipped. We were well received and advised, we will definitely return.
Amazing apartment in a great location! Would highly recommend.
The space was perfect... clean, natural sun light, fun and stylish. Would definitely recommend!
Lovely apartment, really quirky layout but still so spacious. Perfect location, right in the centre. Booking in was good and got lots of helpful tips. Would 100% recommend

Tolles & stylisches Appartment, zentral gelegen! Kommunikation, check-in und check-out haben wunderbar und reibungslos geklappt. Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt sehr genossen. Das einzige Manko ist die sehr lebhafte Strasse direkt vor dem Appartment. Da es sehr heiss war hatten wir die Fenster entsprechend geöffnet und dementsprechend war es laut. In Nacht 2 hatten wir uns aber schon etwas daran gewöhnt. Zusammenfassend kann man einen Aufenthalt jederzeit empfehlen. Alles fußläufig sehr gut zu erreichen! Gastgeber sehr nett und hilfsbereit.

In posizione strategica, a pochi passi da tutti i principali siti di interesse. Ottimo il collegamento con la metro e il treno. La casa è molto graziosa, pulita e provvista di tutto quello che può servire. Joana è stata molto disponibile nel consigliarci e nel venire incontro alle nostre necessità. Assolutamente consigliata!

Our stay in the apartment was very nice and comfortable. Host was waiting for us in the house for the check-in and gave us some helpful tips being an architect like us. The apartment is probably in the best position to visit the city centre. Wonderful and cozy details make the wooden box perfect!

What an intelligently and well designed appartment! We felt at home at once. We were wellcomed  friendly with all the information we needed, thank you. Everything we needed was there. Moreover the appartment is well situated so you can get to a lot of interesting places in no time. Though the traffic noise was very loud and we had to close all the windows while sleeping, we highly recommend the appartment, cause it‘s so nice and well situated.
Excellent location, close to everything.  Apartment has absolutely everything needed for a short stay!

Ótimo apartamento, silencioso pois há portas a prova de sons. O espaço foi bem pensado e atendeu às expectativas. Estive sozinha, então foi suficiente. Creio que três hóspedes ou mais poderia ser complicado.  Recomendo a casais ou viajante solitário.

name: A Bright Brooklyn Apartment With A Private Balcony
summary: A brand new apartment perfect for those looking to experience Brooklyn while also being less than 30 minutes from Manhattan or Queens via the A,C or G train.  Located within walking distance of a park and Bed-Stuy favorites like Peaches, Nagel's Bagels, Bed-Vyne, Saraghina and Lover Rock! This top floor apartment has fantastic natural light  with lots of windows, a sky light and a spacious private balcony with an unobstructed view across Brooklyn to the Manhattan skyline.
space: Whether you plan to use the apartment as a place to drop your bags and explore or spend a lot of time in. Great for a couple or friends looking to spend time together.
description: A brand new apartment perfect for those looking to experience Brooklyn while also being less than 30 minutes from Manhattan or Queens via the A,C or G train.  Located within walking distance of a park and Bed-Stuy favorites like Peaches, Nagel's Bagels, Bed-Vyne, Saraghina and Lover Rock! This top floor apartment has fantastic natural light  with lots of windows, a sky light and a spacious private balcony with an unobstructed view across Brooklyn to the Manhattan skyline. Whether you plan to use the apartment as a place to drop your bags and explore or spend a lot of time in. Great for a couple or friends looking to spend time together. I am happy to answer any questions you may have and can make myself available by text at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  Bed-Stuy is a wonderful neighborhood filled with an eclectic mix of restaurants, bars and shops. Conveniently located and easily accessible to other great Brooklyn neighborhoods such as Bushwick, Clinton Hill and Williamsburg. A shor
neighborhood_overview: Bed-Stuy is a wonderful neighborhood filled with an eclectic mix of restaurants, bars and shops. Conveniently located and easily accessible to other great Brooklyn neighborhoods such as Bushwick, Clinton Hill and Williamsburg.
transit: A short walk to the A/C or G subway stations. Citi bike station 1 block away and a ton of bus lines that will take you all over Brooklyn.
interaction: I am happy to answer any questions you may have and can make myself available by text at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: A New Yorker who loves to get out of the city every now and then.

reviews.comments:
The apartment was clean bright and well maintained. All furnishing, products utilized in home and organization was fabulous. Easy to follow instructions, great communication and a personalized note just sent it over the top! 

Thank you.

Jaime's place is super duper cute! Her space is adorably decorated and quaintly comfortable. She had the perfect balcony for a couple of people to have a glass of wine and check out the city skyline. There were limited household products, such as towels and tissue, but perfect for one or two guests sharing space. Jaime has a great system in place for check in and her apartment building is very conveniently located near trains and buses. There are some great bedstuy restaurants nearby and the apartment has a small but extensive enough kitchen arrangement to make breakfasts and reheat leftovers. I recommend her place for a single guest or couple, as it is a bit small, but I very much enjoyed the stay!
Loved it!

Jamie's apartment is so chic and modern. Everything from the décor to the private balcony will make you feel like you're staying at an apartment straight out of a catalog. She even left us a little welcome note and quickly replied if i had any questions. The only advisory is that it's a 5th floor walk-up so don't bring a big, heavy suitcase but if you do, it's worth the climb up. I will definitely be coming back to stay at Jamie's place!
Great stay in stylish, comfortable apartment! Thanks, Jamie!

This place is absolutely lovely. Every detail is well thought out, from the books placed throughout the apartment (my bookish heart was happy) to the art on all of the rooms, it's definitely a place I hope to stay in again. Easy to use gas stove, plush towels, soft sheets, this place had it all. And so sunny and bright!
The host canceled this reservation 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jamie was excellent host throughout our booking she was very quick to respond to all of our questions. Check-in was quick and painless and the building was easy to locate. The apartment is beautiful and has amazing views of the city. The transit is very close to the apartment which makes getting downtown New York very easy. We strongly recommend this stylish apartment when you come explore New York.

We really enjoyed staying at Jamie's place while we were in town for a wedding. The apartment is in a great part of Brooklyn with lots of great restaurants and bars nearby. The apartment is adorable and was spotlessly clean. The private deck is a huge bonus. The mattress and bedding were all very comfortable. As ex-New Yorkers we visit Brooklyn regularly  and would happily stay at Jamie's place again.

The most beautiful space! Jamie was so coordinating, hands down an amazing host. 
High ceilings, stunning decor, super peaceful and relaxing. Just a 7 minute walk to the G train, plus cool hangout spots around the neighborhood. 
So glad we spent thanksgiving at Jamie’s home! Definitely do not hesitate even once before considering staying here!

name: ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Baaasic Spaaace (ฅ´ω`ฅ)
summary: The apartment is divided into 2 seperated rooms (typical situations in Hong Kong :) But we have independent restrooms and cooking place, so basically I'm living on my own. I myself as a music lover, have multiple kinds of musical instruments, sheets, CDs, LPs, books in this tiny space, usually with quite updated information about events in town, we could chat a lot on music, movie, culture, arts, and share personal recommendations and even play a little bit music together if you want :)
space: The room is only around 2m*2m in size, a 1.2m*1.8m mattress would be provided, with blankets and pillows, the bathroom and toilet is shared with me, and I would be sleeping on my framed bed above your mattress (around 1.5m height, and the underneath space is all yours).
description: The apartment is divided into 2 seperated rooms (typical situations in Hong Kong :) But we have independent restrooms and cooking place, so basically I'm living on my own. I myself as a music lover, have multiple kinds of musical instruments, sheets, CDs, LPs, books in this tiny space, usually with quite updated information about events in town, we could chat a lot on music, movie, culture, arts, and share personal recommendations and even play a little bit music together if you want :) The room is only around 2m*2m in size, a 1.2m*1.8m mattress would be provided, with blankets and pillows, the bathroom and toilet is shared with me, and I would be sleeping on my framed bed above your mattress (around 1.5m height, and the underneath space is all yours). Usually I would be home except for the working hour (9-19 during work days), but I don't wish my guests would be home during my cello practicing time (19-21), because there is literally no extra space for others in room, of course we cou
neighborhood_overview: Plenty of nice restaurants around (Michelin Street food)! Even for vegetarians ;) The Tau Ma Tei Market is just downstairs! Many options for convenient shops, ATMs, supermarkets, shopping malls as well
notes: Oh and most important thing, please make sure you send me a request before booking! Because I can hardly update my calendar in time, so I would have to check if my place is available on your request date It is totally alright for me if you think the rules are too strict and cannot accept them, I would also be pleased to meet you two and show you around if I have time
transit: The apart is very closed to Nathan Road (so enjoyable walking all the way along Nathan Road to Tsim Sha Tsui), so there are plenty of public transport options: bus, MTR, ferry...
interaction: Usually I would be home except for the working hour (9-19 during work days), but I don't wish my guests would be home during my cello practicing time (19-21), because there is literally no extra space for others in room, of course we could work it out if you wish to participate in music here :) I don't mind if my guests wish leave my room after I go for work, as long as they lock the door properly, but they do not actually have the access if I am not home, since currently I don't have spare keys for it...We could discuss for special cases anyway
house_rules: - Shoes should be left outside the room - Using the washing machine may cause extra charge

host.host_about:
Born and raised in China, educated and working in Hong Kong.
With an engineering background, always interested and enthusiastic in music, movies, literature, arts, gender studies, social science, earth science, etc. I am trying to travel more in my spare time and wish to have some working holidays in the future.
I would not say that I am extraverted, actually kind of slow-burn, but would always keep strong connections with people once we become friends, and I am always trying to stay rational (as trained to be an engineer), but sometimes could be quite emotional to certain topics.
I am currently learning Russian, Tibetan and German, since the regions where these languages are spoken are on my list to visit in the near future. I am always happy to exchange information with people about culture and music.

reviews.comments: 琪人很好,和她相处的这几天很愉快｡期待下次再见面!

name: Heart of Lahaina ~ Beautiful Aina Nalu C14 -
summary: Unit assignment along with check in instructions will be sent approximately 7 days prior to arrival. Please note that the front desk charges $20 per night to park on property.  You can park free on the street or $12 across the street
space: This is a beautiful resort setting 1 block from the ocean, beach, shopping, dining, etc.  Loacted on the westside of Maui in historic old Lahaina.  A fully furnished 2 bedroom condo with king bed in one room and queen bed in the other. There are  2 swimming pools on property.  The Aina Nalu is walking distance to everything you will need! The Lahaina harbor is just 1/2 block away for excursions. There are many ocean front restaurants as well on Front Street.  Shopping on Front Street is a favorite pastime.  And don't forget to grab your favorite shave ice!  A favorite with families, weddings, reunions, and just a great hawaiian Holiday! This two bedroom 2 bath condo is fully furnished and fully equipped kitchen. This Hawaiiana property boasts 2 swimming pools (one is saline), Jacuzzi.  There are two bar b que areas with gas grills for your enjoyment.
description: Unit assignment along with check in instructions will be sent approximately 7 days prior to arrival. Please note that the front desk charges $20 per night to park on property.  You can park free on the street or $12 across the street This is a beautiful resort setting 1 block from the ocean, beach, shopping, dining, etc.  Loacted on the westside of Maui in historic old Lahaina.  A fully furnished 2 bedroom condo with king bed in one room and queen bed in the other. There are  2 swimming pools on property.  The Aina Nalu is walking distance to everything you will need! The Lahaina harbor is just 1/2 block away for excursions. There are many ocean front restaurants as well on Front Street.  Shopping on Front Street is a favorite pastime.  And don't forget to grab your favorite shave ice!  A favorite with families, weddings, reunions, and just a great hawaiian Holiday! This two bedroom 2 bath condo is fully furnished and fully equipped kitchen. This Hawaiiana property boasts 2 swimming po
house_rules: There is free parking on the street, though if you want to park on property, the resort charges $20 per night parking fee paid directly to the Outrigger at the front desk.  For stays of 3 weeks or longer, the parking fee is $100.

host.host_about: I am a Realtor here on Maui as well as in California.  I love to travel and assist people to find the best on Maui!

reviews.comments:
The  host emailed me to call her and she will come to greet us, but when we arrived i called her twice and she didnt answer, than there were not enough sheets for the pull-out sofa and all towels were still in the dryer.  We paid $100 for cleaning fee, but it was not quiete ready.

Unit by its self is nice, great bathroom w/shower, nice kitchen, but its only 3 bar stools and it says it can accomodate 6 people.

Carol was a wonderful host.  She was readily available by phone and able to help with any of our concerns.  The condo is very convenient for walking to restaurants, shops, and the harbor.  It has a nice pool.  Be sure to park on the street as the parking in the lot is $15 a night.  We did not have trouble finding close free parking along the street.

Carol is a wonderful host - fun, informative, flexible and extremely helpful  to our needs! We would love to stay with her again soon!

The 2BR apartment has a lovely tropical ambiance with lots of light and being on the upper floor, quite peaceful. It is clean and well maintained. It has a great location in Lahaina close to all the shops and restaurants.

We had a lovely time in Carol's condo. There was five of us and it was a good size and clean. It has a great location in Lahaina. It is just a four minute stroll to the seafront where all the restaurants and shops are. There are two swimming pools at the condo's complex. 

It was easy finding free parking out on the street in the evenings if you have a car. You can also choose to pay and park in the complex but we didn't feel it was necessary.  

We found it very helpful that there was a small both by the pool that was occupied by a very friendly member of staff who can give you advise about anything on the island and can also book activities for you.

Carol was very easy to deal with and quick with responses. Everything went very smoothly. We would definitely contact Carol again regarding accommodation.

A little tip is that there is freshly brewed coffee in the mornings by the pool.

Super convenient location in downtown Lahaina. We were able to walk to the pier for our whale watching excursion and to Front Street for restaurants. The 2BR/2BA is spacious, clean and there's a pool in the complex. Plenty of towels and fresh bars of soap were provided. We found street parking out front easily on the weeknights, but on the weekend we ended up paying the $20 to park inside.
What a wonderful condo, and wonderful host! Perfect spot on Maui. Close to everything. Would definitely stay again in the future.

The location of the condo in the Aina Nalu is convenient. We could walk to the wharf for our whale watching excursion, the bus stop to Ma'alea was close by, restaurants were fairly easy to get to and the shopping on Front Street were also easily accessible. The location was about the only thing we enjoyed out of this accommodation. The unit in itself was not very well cleaned (or... cleaned OUT more like). We found old ice cream and water bottles in the freezer from previous guests. There were also several old combs in my bathroom when I opened some of the cabinets, the 2 bathrooms weren't cleaned very well (my sink was filthy and my friend told me that the toilet bowl hadn't been scrubbed in her bathroom) and our towels were stained yellow. As for our host, I really have no comment as we didn't see her at all, through check-in, during our stay or as we were checking out. I don't entirely feel the money I paid was worth staying here.

We were extremly pleased with the condo.  It was (Website hidden by Airbnb) were the grounds & pools. 
 The only ONE negative would be the $15.00 a day to park..but, we just avoided that by parking on the street. It was not a problem to find a spot.
You are sooo close to downton Lahiana - a short 2 blocks.  We walked (Website hidden by Airbnb) was GREAT!

We so would stay here again~

Absolutely beautiful condo! The pictures do not do it justice. It was well-equipped with so many amenities- dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster. Not close to the beach, but less than 1 block's distance to downtown Lahaina with great shopping and restaurants. 

The only negative is I would suggest buying your own toilet paper- no extras there and the coffee pot makes only about 2 cups per pot. We were briefly locked out for about 40 minutes, but it wasn't anyone fault and Carol, the owner, was great at fixing the mistake right away. 

HIGHLY RECOMMEND BOOKING THIS GREAT CONDO!!!

This place was awesome.  We loved our stay during our entire trip.  Carol was a very generous and gracious host.  She was there upon our arrival and gave us some great ideas for things to do, most of which we ended up doing.  She provided plenty of beach towels and even supplied an aero bed when we asked for it.  The condo is beautiful and the grounds are just lovely.  The pools and hot tub where a nice way to relax after running around all day.  If I ever go back to Maui, I will be staying here again for sure!

Location, Location, Location! The condo we rented was amazingly close to the main street in Lahaina. It was great for 4 people (each couple had their own bathroom). It was clean and easy to find. My only word of advice would be to budget for the cost of parking as street parking was difficult to find. However, don't let this stop you from using this condo. Carol was a great host and made the trip easy to plan!
Great place, it had everything we needed and more!

This is a fun condo complex - centrally located in Lahaina where you can walk to bars and restaurants. Its not right on the beach or anything but nothing in central Lahaina really is. The saltwater pool and surrounding area is fab. It was a great place to meet people and theres even a tv so you can watch games from the pool.  Although we were missing some amenities when we first got there, Carol was immediately responsive and got us what we needed. We enjoyed our stay.

In general, the location was great, the overall condo complex was just fine, and the unit was fine.

Unfortunately we had several hiccups over the course of our stay, and Carol did her best to remedy them, but wasn't able to remedy them all (e.g., we never had cold water from the faucet in the master bath). 

I think that's the risk anyone takes when booking a room on airbnb vs. a hotel (with more dedicated maintenance staff), but I've usually had rock solid experiences with Airbnb.

Condo is very nice with two comfortable beds and spacious bathrooms. It's also located near the main area for Lahaina - so very convenient. Carol was great in coordinating our arrival. Everything went smoothly and we had a nice time.

The condo was lovely, and the beds were so comfortable. We had access to whatever we needed, and the beach and shops were so close we just walked down the street. We would definitely stay there again.

Durante los dias que estuvimos alojados, nos hemos sentido como "en nuestro hogar"!!!. 
El Condo se encuentra muy bien ubicado: cerca del centro y de la playa (solo un par de cuadras).
 Las habitaciones, mobiliario, decoracion y confort fue mejor de lo esperado (hasta disponiamos de sillas playeras!).
GRACIAS!
Wonderful experience, everything was good to go. Carol was extremely helpful and responsive. Location was close to everything.

We booked the apartment for 6 adults (turned out to be actually 7) to have a nice base for all different activities on Maui (beach, snorkeling, shopping, hiking, hang gliding, sightseeing and going out for dining).
We were not disappointed; Carol's apartment is well located very close to downtown Lahaina in walkable distance to restaurants and bars.
Also the common BBQ area allowed for the whole group to prepare food and to dine outside together (area accessible until 10:00pm)!
The small dishwasher was very helpful to quickly clean all dishes to be ready for breakfast inside the apartment.
We were very happy to have Carol's place as a base to explore all areas of the island of Maui!

We stayed at Carol's apartment for 7 days and were satisfied 100%. The Condo is located in the really nice Aina Nalu Resort. It is very nice, spacious with two bedrooms and two bathrooms, equiped with everything we need and everything was as described. The location is great, very close to the main area for Lahaina within walking distance to many good restaurants, bars and the harbour. Everything went smoothly and we had a great time. We definetly will recommend staying at Carol's place and will come back next time.
Carol was a great host and the condo was perfect, great location and just as described in the add.
We had a great stay with our family. The accommodations we're great - just as described. Thanks for everything

Everything went very well.  Condo is nice, pool areas are great, and location is primo.  Awesome to walk to restaurants, shops, and bars.  Only problem is parking.  Condo charges $20 per day, but this was no surprise.  This was clearly stated.  You can park on street, except there's never any spots except in morning.  Some cheaper pay lots accross street. I paid $140 for 7 days.  It was worth it, since parking sucks in Lahaina.
I had an awesome experience and would definitely do it again!!
Carol was great to work with.  There was an error with the room set up and she was quick to respond and have it fixed.  The accommodations are exactly as described.  I recommend working with Carol!

This was a beautiful condo. Very well stocked. Walking distance from everything in Lahaina, but far enough away where you felt like you were off the beaten path. The complex its self was very clean and  everyone was friendly. Parking was $20 a day but to us it was worth it. Carol was a pleasure to work with. She responded to emails promptly. We had an amazing time and I would definitely stay here again.

It was very easy to check-in to the condo. It was very clean and well-stocked. The location was within walking distance to restaurants, shops (including the outlets), and the beach. We were able to find street parking for the whole duration of our stay (6 days). Carol helped us in a timely manner when we had minor issues arise, and accommodated our request for a late checkout with a small fee.
The place was great. Exactly what was advertised. Carol was extremely nice and accommodating.

Our stay with Carol was very pleasant. Although we didn't meet her in person, she was very responsive and gave us detailed check-in information both over the phone and via text. The condo's location was the best part, as Lahaina's restaurants and shops are just a few blocks away. The condo was as described, with more space than we were expecting. Carol was a wonderful host and we had a fantastic time in Lahaina!
Yes the apartment was as described and very well 'fitted out' with everything you would need for a holiday by the sea.

This was a perfect base to explore Lahaina & Maui.  The condo is lovely, comfotable, and well-appointed for an easy time. Carol was very responsive to questions and information requests. Instructions were clear and helpful.  We would highly recommend this wonderful property!

Our stay at Carol's condo (G104) million was very nice. We made good use of the Infinity pool & hot tub (there are actually two pools). The location is excellent.  It is within a couple of blocks of the market & Front street.  Although we did not meet Carol in- person, she responded quickly to our texts  in regards to questions or requests.

The condo accommodated 4 people nicely (with the exception of having only 2 stools at the counter).  Kitchen is well equipped if you plan to eat your main meals at nearby restaurants.  If you plan to do more cooking, bring storage bags or containers.

We definitely would stay here again.

Dorothy
A wonderful condo in the perfect location! The unit was beautiful, the pool was great, and Carol was very responsive and easy to deal with.

The condo is clean, comfortable and in a good location. There were extra towels for the pool, a full kitchen, all the amenities of home. It's a really nice place. The main strip of Lahaina is conveniently a little over a block away.  
The downside is the condo is right next to the highway. If it was on the lower level the wall would block most of the sound, but it is on the second level above the wall. I honestly never really got any sleep due to the vehicle sounds from the highway. When it was quiet the fan in the master bedroom squeaks. As I was in and out of sleep I would awaken to the alternating sounds of truck air brakes releasing and the continuous squeak of the fan.
Yes eventually you would get use to it, if you lived there year round. But staying only 4 days, my wife and I could not ignore it. Not a single full night sleep was had by either of us.

Unit A-207 was a lovely spot to enjoy Lahaina & escape the heat. The buildings are old-style with lots of louvered glass windows, so yes, there is some noise coming in from other guests. However, this was mainly during the day (pool closes at 9pm) & didn't bother us. We enjoyed the closeness to Front St. Kitchen is well-equipped and all the furniture was very comfortable. Nice amenities including pool towels.

This condo is beautiful. Large comfortable beds, everything you need in the kitchen. Air conditioner was a life saver! Fantastic location, only a short walk to Front Street. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Great condo, great spot! 
Thank Carol for all you've done to accommodate us

The condo is very well placed at the center of the town, very pleasant with everyrhing you need. Moreover checkin and checkout were very easy based on code share; Carol was very prompt to answer my request and questions.

Just perfect for your stay at Lahaina !

The location was perfect.  We were visiting friends who live in Lahaina and only a few blocks from the condo.  We also were just across the street from restaurants and shops.  The ocean is 2 blocks away.   Our family tries to live like locals while vacationing and this was a perfect place for doing so without missing out on some fun touristy options.  
The condo has a great lay out and felt spacious.  We are a family of 6 and it fit us perfectly.  There were plenty of towels, a closet full of beach gear and plenty of food prep supplies.  Walk a few blocks to Foodland and pick up some groceries and you are set. 
 We enjoyed using  the grills by the pool one evening.  There was an older couple out playing dominoes and a resident, who is a surf instructor grilling along side of us. 

We were very content at Carol's condo and plan to return.

There was a snafu during checkin but Carol was responsive and did her best to sort things out/accommodate our requests as fast as she could. Place was comfortable and located in a very convenient location in the heart of Lahaina. Good bang for your buck in the center of a desirable location during the holidays.
Can't beat the location! Perfect walking distance to downtown Lahaina. The condo was clean and comfortable. Thanks Carol!
This place is awesome! My favorite trip so far.
The place was great and close to everything that we needed.

The rooms are spacious and comfortable. 2 bedrooms and 2 restrooms, and we cooked by ourselves every night. Safeway is only 8 minutes drive. It's quiet, but is very near to the busy Front Street. The environment in the Aina Nalu is also beautiful. Finally, Carol is very patient and responsive.

This resort is in a great location with lots of amenities. The pools were amazing! Well kept grounds and lots of parking (if you're willing to pay $20/day).
We were in unit A203, which had the most wonderful showers ever!  I must say, though, the furniture was not very comfortable, and it is a pretty small place. Other AirBNB's where I have stayed provided the basics, but here we had to buy coffee filters, dish soap and pretty much everything we needed other than dishes and silverware. Also, I requested a first floor unit, because I was traveling with an elderly parent, but was given a second floor unit anyway.

The condo was really nice location, close to Front Street. Just walking distance to the historic buildings, fancy shops and restaurants. The Italian restaurant "Penne Pasta" very close to the condo was our favorite. We could park free on the street during our stay but it might be a little bit difficult to find the space to park in high season. Anyway we had absolutely nice holidays in this condo. Thanks Carol.

Carol's condo is perfect for a relaxing family getaway. The development is a beautiful collection of two story buildings with gorgeous landscaping and two pools - one large with a hot tub and a large cabana area, the other smaller and prone to early (and welcome) shade. The complex is very quiet and a short to walk to everything you need in town: coffee, smoothies, shaved ice, the harbor where you can hop on a boat for an excursion, and all the tourist shopping and restaurants you could want. It is possible to walk to the beach, but not pleasant with kids and all the accompanying supplies. We drove to a couple of different beaches while we were there. 

Carol was a perfect host - responsive instantly by text but otherwise we had no interactions with her and were left to enjoy our vacation. The unit was stocked with plenty of towels, beach chairs and mats, and all the dishes and supplies you need. 

Thanks for a great visit!
Convenient, tasteful and well worth a return visit....I wouldn't change a thing
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great place for downtown Lahaina location .  Walking distance to everything! Carol was great to work with. Very accommodating and great communicator.  Highly recommended!

We really enjoyed staying at Carol's place at Aina Nalu.  The location is unbeatable, the facilities in the condo and at Aina Nalu are very comfortable, and Carol was a fantastic and responsive host.  Thanks, Carol!

Carol's Place was very convenient and comfortable. The unit we got was right by the parking lot and made things very simple. Beds in the bedrooms were comfortable, bathrooms very nice, an overall excellent stay.
Quiet, but close to everything. Foodland only 5 min, Front Street only 3 min away.
This is a great place if you enjoy a peaceful setting, within walking distance to great shops and restaurants in downtown Lahaina. Definitely would stay again.
Check the information about the unit before booking.
Very nice, clean and well-equipped unit. So close to front street.

This condo was great!  Awesome location, walking distance to everything, 2 amazing pools.  Very clean when we arrived and had everything we needed provided.  Checking in was super easy and pain free.  Would rent again for sure!
The location is perfect for easy access to both of the pools located on the property as well as a quick 2 minute walk to Front Street with all of its amenities.
Clean, easy access from the highway. The wifi worked so well!  The complex amenities were really nice - infinity edge pool and hot tub.  Other guests were easy going.
Great location to Lahaina’s main streets. Quiet, clean, and spacious. Easy to check in, and quick response from the owner.
Great place, beautiful location, great sized unit for two small families! Would definitely visit again. Carol was very attentive and responsive. Lahaina is an amazing place to visit.

This was our first Airbnb experience so I was a little nervous. But, it was a fantastic place, as described, very clean and any question I had was very quickly answered. Loved it! I’d take my family here again.

This is a truly amazing place to stay. Staying in old Lahaina is really like old Maui, not the new Kaanapali "super hotel hustle" feel. Aina Nalu is secluded a few blocks off Front street (the main drag in Lahaina) in a very quiet neighborhood. It literally takes just a few minutes to get to the old Banyon Tree and the harbor which are the center of all activityin Lahaina. Walking to and from is not only refreshing, but extremely convenient. Lots of shops and restaurants are super close by.
The unit itself is very nicely adorned with full amenities including washer/dryer combo, fridge, TV's in every room, a master suite and a 2nd bedroom. The carpet looks very new and we tried to keep our shoes/flip-flops at the door to help maintain the fresh look. The couch is quite comfy and it is just a very nice place to stay. We did not go to the pool area to swim, but it looked clean and kept up and there seemed to be people there everytime we passed by, so in good shape.
The Outrigger folks are friendly as well. The only down side is the parking fee which we found out is paid to the landowner not the Outrigger, so that explains they can't really give you any discounts because that is just passed on to the landowner. 
This is a place we will definitly return to. Oh, also, if you're suba diving, Lahaina Divers is literally a block and a half away so very easy to get to, and they are amazing. 
A whole lot of Aloha going there! Great place to make your Maui vacation relaxing and memorable.
The space is great! Good location. Good value.

Good location, close to Front street and various good places to eat. Street parking is free and worth holding onto your spot if you find one. Was clean with a few basic amenities. Laundry is a nice bonus. Carol communicates quickly and had no problems with the stay. Would recommend anyone looking for a central location, its a very popular building among tourists.
Great spot! Would definitely recommend

Carol is a great host. We had a 15 month old grandchild joining us for a few days and Carol provided a booster chair with play toys and a crib for sleeping. We asked for a larger coffee pot and in less than a day we had a 12 cup maker that as a grand help. You will be happy to find how quickly Carol responds to any question or issue before you arrive and during the 10 days we were there.
  We wanted a place in Lahaina to give us a central western Maui location and the walkability of the town.  This 2 bedroom unit is a great comfortable place to sleep and a base for traveling the island.

Great place and great value! Lots of nice amenities provided like beach chairs, boogie boards, snorkel gear and beach toys. Very short walk to Front Street in Lahaina. Fairly short drive to the beaches in Ka’anapali. The grounds/pool area are very nice. We chose to park on the street to avoid the $20 daily parking lot fee. Easy to find spots on week nights...more difficult on weekends, but manageable. Carol was easy to communicate with and returned messages quickly. Would definitely stay here again!

Location was excellent - a quick walk from Front Street and even Old Lahaina Luau. We enjoyed the pool and BBQ areas. The unit itself was clean and comfortable. Carol was great - quick to respond and very accommodating. Made the whole process of check-in easy and hassle free.

C104 is a great condo for families. The beach chairs and accessories are great. Carol, the manager, responded immediately to a dishwasher water leak and was genuinely concerned about our comfort and needs. The location is ideal for Lahaina town shopping and dining. We would stay in C104 again. Thank you!
Such a nice unit and great location to both the pools! We had a great time and would definitely rent from Carol again.

The location (right in Lahaina) was fantastic. We could easily walk downtown, to the waterfront, and to restaurants. The place was just right in terms of space - two bedrooms with some living space. And amenities - two swimming pools.

Very family friendly, with beach chairs, boogie boards, baby needs. Grounds are beautiful, well kept. Both pools are nice. Neighborhood is very quiet considering how close it is to Main Street. Most of what you need is walkable, restaurants, shopping, beach. Easy to book, & communicate with Carol.

Carol was an amazing host. She was very professional and provided quick and prompt responses to all our questions and concerns. Her place was beautiful and well kept. Her kindness made this a very pleasurable experience. I would highly recommend her to friends and family in the future.
This is a terrible house do not rent from her
Great place. Very comfortable and convenient to everywhere we wanted to go.

Great location, easy check in, the unit is lovely and has everything! We will stay there again if we go back to Maui! Beware the paid parking there though, signage not terribly obvious and we saw another guests car get towed!

We enjoyed our stay at this condo. Carol was quick to reply with my questions and access info. The place is so close to Front Street. The pool and lanai were very nice. Sitting in the pool under the stars was really relaxing. The landscaping was amazing. Would stay again for sure.

Everything positive that folks are reporting is completely accurate!  The home is really a luxurious place (in our opinion!) and we loved staying there!  The pools are fantastic, everything is within walking distance and there were quite a bit of food staples provided.  We had 2 kids with us and they thoroughly enjoyed staying there as well!  There is air conditioning and fans in each room, along with a washer/dryer and washing soap is provided.  It was fantastic!
Carol‘s apartment was very nice and clean located in the heart of Lahaina. We loved our stay and will come back every time we will be on Maui.
Great staff, great location

Clean and quiet. AC in every room worked well and was a must in the Lahaina summer. Loved being able to walk everywhere- what a beautiful town Lahaina is!  Thoughtful touches like spices and extra toilet paper. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay again. Thanks Carol!
The host canceled this reservation 95 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 99 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Perfect location being in Lahaina - walkable to restaurants & shopping! Excellent pools at this place. Clean, comfortable and love the AC! Thank you!

I really have no complaints—Carol’s place is amazing and her hospitality is top-notch! Her responses were always speedy, which is always appreciated. The location is also perfect and very  convenient as it’s close to many shops on Front St. Highly recommend!
close to beach and activities.
Great Location! Great Host! Great Value!
Great location for getting around Lahaina on foot. Highly recommended.

Carol's place was absolute perfection. The location was incredible, right in the heart of Lahaina. Parking wasn't that bad. You had the option of paying for it at the front desk or parking on the street (which was what I ended up doing). It was walking distance from great restaurants so things were so easy to get to.

Your home was super clean and had all the necessities we needed. On our last night, we were had a few questions that needed an urgent response. It was in the middle of the night and Carol answered right away. Your hospitality will not be forgotten. Thank you Carol!
Beautiful place!

Pros:
Great pool and lanai
Close to ice machine
Walking distance to many shops and food.
Full kitchen.
Front and back access for easy unloading.
Security is friendly 
Plumerias for your girl all over

Cons:
No drink or food near pool (just annoying)
Staff at front desk not helpful.
Parking is 20 dollars a night (can’t pay nightly you have to pay the whole stay per the front desk).

This location is fantastic! What a great area! We had so much fun exploring and checking out front street. The place was cute and clean! I loved the shower! The only issue we had was parking at the resort for the night is $20, which was conveyed ahead of time and finding free parking on the street wasn’t terrible. Overall, would definitely stay again!

Carol's place is located right near all the shops and restaurants of Lahaina, but far enough to enjoy peace and quiet.  There is air conditioning throughout the place and the beds are very comfortable.  Carol has provided plenty of linens, towels, coffee pot, tea pot and all the basics needed for a comfortable stay.  I would definitely recommend this place.  If I had any negative thing to say it would be that there is not an ocean view, but I didn't see many places offering that, since the shops and restaurants have all the ocean views.
This condo is in a nice location in Lahaina. Carol is quick to answer our texts if there were any issues. We would come back again if we return to Maui.

name: Fashion & Sleek 1BR Relocation & Business!
summary: Snag this classy 1BR apartment in the BnC for yourself right in the sought-after Quartier des Spectacles neighbourhood and you'll experience the very best of Montreal! Fall in love with how easy it is to live in the city, being just minutes away some of the best restaurants, bars, and cafes around, as well as three metro lines, a bus terminal, and car and bike rental services. Better yet, take the time to explore and just walk to Downtown, Old Montreal, Chinatown, or the Gay Village.
description: Snag this classy 1BR apartment in the BnC for yourself right in the sought-after Quartier des Spectacles neighbourhood and you'll experience the very best of Montreal! Fall in love with how easy it is to live in the city, being just minutes away some of the best restaurants, bars, and cafes around, as well as three metro lines, a bus terminal, and car and bike rental services. Better yet, take the time to explore and just walk to Downtown, Old Montreal, Chinatown, or the Gay Village.

host.host_about:
Greetings to this wonderful Airbnb community! :)

I have been blessed to travel all around the world and experience many cultures! This has allowed me to understand much better travelers and I my passion is to take a good care of your accommodation!

Speak English, French and Spanish! :D
We would be pleased to host you when you come to Montreal for business, relocation or leisure! 

Thank you for checking our apartments and we hope to have you soon!

Alejandro.

reviews.comments: Great suite. Amazing location. Close to street and thin windows so prepare for noise throughout night.
Not what he said.  Changed location. Complained about noise and stopped replying

name: OVERLOOKING BEACH 2 BED WIFI PARKING
summary: GREAT POSITION OVER BEAUTIFUL TAMARAMA BEACH. 2 BIG BEDROOMS, LARGE ENTERTAINMING AREAS, BIG KITCHEN, QUIET, AMAZING BIRDLIFE AND DIRECT ACCESS TO THE BEACH.
space: What a terrific spot to enjoy one of the most picturesque beaches in Sydney, with direct access from your entertaining deck with BBQ and al fresco dining. In this fully furnished home, there are two bedrooms, two bathrooms, an enormous living area which flows through to the outside deck with the views, a big dining area and a very large kitchen with gas cooking top, electric oven and quality appliances. There are polished floors, Foxtel, wireless internet, garage for one car and one offstreet, full internal laundry, a large study/office and a quiet leafy retreat area. Main bedroom has access to front deck and views, a king size bed, built ins and an ensuite with full separate bath. Second bedroom has two singles and separate bathroom with exterior access. The house is only 15 minutes’ walk away from Bondi’s bustling shops, restaurants, cafes, pubs and clubs, but you could be a million miles away on your quiet patio, listening to the sounds of the ocean, not the traffic!  Just down the
