host.host_about: full of life

reviews.comments:
What a lovely, lovely older home . The private enclosed deck allows you to open the bedroom doors , fall asleep and wake to the sounds of crashing waves and native birds on beautiful Tamarama beach . The house is atmospheric, bright light and welcoming with its large entertaining spaces and roomy galley kitchen. Lovely touches were added with a few footballs my son was able to enjoy. 
I regularly use Airbnb, I’d definitely recommend this home , it’s been one of our favorites.

name: 3 bedrooms apartment
summary: The Grand Blossom是位於紅磡寶其利街123號的服務式住宅,逾700平方呎3房住宅單位,部份更可飽覽維港晝夜海景｡單位貫徹簡約舒適的室內設計,傢俱配備齊全,高速Wi-Fi無線上網, 獨立冷氣裝置, 並設有獨立廚房可供煮食,致力以酒店營運模式提供優質舒適的住宿環境｡
space: 入住/退房規則: 入住下午3點開始,若您的入住時間將晚於晚上9時,請與我們聯絡｡ 退房時間上午11點為止,若您申請延長退房,延長費用港幣200元, 可延長至退房日期的下午2點,視乎當天入住情況而定｡ 打掃規則: 停留期間為5晚以下的, 每天進行更換洗臉毛巾､浴巾及浴室踏墊,並回收垃圾桶內垃圾｡ 停留期間為5晚以上的, 開始5天進行一次更換床單､枕頭套､洗臉毛巾､浴巾､浴室踏墊,並整理床鋪､補充房內設備用品､打掃室內､回收垃圾桶內垃圾｡
description: The Grand Blossom是位於紅磡寶其利街123號的服務式住宅,逾700平方呎3房住宅單位,部份更可飽覽維港晝夜海景｡單位貫徹簡約舒適的室內設計,傢俱配備齊全,高速Wi-Fi無線上網, 獨立冷氣裝置, 並設有獨立廚房可供煮食,致力以酒店營運模式提供優質舒適的住宿環境｡ 入住/退房規則: 入住下午3點開始,若您的入住時間將晚於晚上9時,請與我們聯絡｡ 退房時間上午11點為止,若您申請延長退房,延長費用港幣200元, 可延長至退房日期的下午2點,視乎當天入住情況而定｡ 打掃規則: 停留期間為5晚以下的, 每天進行更換洗臉毛巾､浴巾及浴室踏墊,並回收垃圾桶內垃圾｡ 停留期間為5晚以上的, 開始5天進行一次更換床單､枕頭套､洗臉毛巾､浴巾､浴室踏墊,並整理床鋪､補充房內設備用品､打掃室內､回收垃圾桶內垃圾｡

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
真是很棒的房子,父母住的很开心,一开始不知道热水器和电磁炉灶怎么用,联系以后马上帮我解决｡房子打扫很干净跟图片一模一样,每天来换毛巾真的对于我这种不喜欢带毛巾出门的人太好了,离旺角地铁三个站非常方便,房子离地铁站很近,而且比旺角的房子便宜很多｡前台工作人员都很热情,耐心讲解｡非常棒的体验,我想下次去还会再住的｡
地點尚算近地鐵站,室內設施簡潔實用,好適合家庭使用者｡

I love the location.  It’s very convenient and close to the MTR (about a 5 min walk).  The 3 separate rooms were great especially for a large group.  Concierge check in is great for late arrivals.  I would definitely choose this location again.
整体来说房子是很不错的,空间在香港来说已经很好｡装修也还可以,服务很细心到位｡需要提醒的是热水的总开关设置在了厨房门外旁边,第一个晚上以为热水坏了都没洗｡最不满意的一点是,之前看过评价说附近是殡仪馆,其实隔得一两条街倒还能接受,但是真的接受不了这两天公寓大门外面就一直停放着两辆殡仪馆的车,真的很影响心情｡
在何文田站下车慢走5分钟就到住宿地方｡三室两卫的房间,在香港这个寸土寸金的地方已经很好了｡住宿周围有7-11,茶餐厅｡我们到的时候因为是过年,所以有些商家休假｡平时应该是很方便的｡房东很贴心的给了去迪士尼的详细地铁路线图!

name: Centrally located room in Besiktas
summary: I would like to share one room of my flat with travellers. I speak English and Spanish. I also hope to make new friends and learn about the experiences of travellers :)  The flat has all the appliances you would need. It is 10 mins by walking to Barbaros, center Besiktas. Easy access to all tourist places:Taksim,Sultanahmet,Asian side etc.It has two rooms, living room, a bathroom and kitchen. You can use common areas, private room and also the kitchen if you are not gonna set anything on fire :)
description: I would like to share one room of my flat with travellers. I speak English and Spanish. I also hope to make new friends and learn about the experiences of travellers :)  The flat has all the appliances you would need. It is 10 mins by walking to Barbaros, center Besiktas. Easy access to all tourist places:Taksim,Sultanahmet,Asian side etc.It has two rooms, living room, a bathroom and kitchen. You can use common areas, private room and also the kitchen if you are not gonna set anything on fire :)

reviews.comments: Seyma is a great host! The flat is in the centre of Besiktas, well located in very a calm street. The room and the flat in general was very very clean. I recommend more than 100%. Thank you Seyma for all the support and attention. All the best, Thiago

The apartment is in a quiet street but very near the trendy area of Beşiktaş with all the restaurants and nightlife. The apartment is clean and Seyma is very nice, a great host. I absolutely recommend this place!
Flat located in one of the Best suburb of Istanbul. A respectful hospitality, so are the locals. Enjoyable and to do it again !

name: BEAUTIFUL*Partial Ocean View by TOP Swimming Beach
summary: Located just steps away from breathtaking sunsets and stunning moon rises, this partial ocean view unit is perfect for your next island getaway. You will love its bright and inviting ambiance as well as its open and spacious kitchen. Relax with a chilled beverage on your own private lanai, facing the sparkling pool or enjoy watching waves tumble and whales play off the coast of beautiful Maui. With its perfect location across from Kam III beach, this condo is perfect for families with children!
space: Relax on the king bed in the master bedroom after a long day of snorkeling, hiking or sunbathing on the beach. Ceiling fans keep you cool at night and the TVs in the bedroom and living room keep you entertained after the sun goes down. This bedroom is roomy and stylishly appointed with Hawaiian bamboo furnishings throughout. The updated kitchen allows you to cook your favorite meals while on vacation and the newly updated kitchen cabinets are large enough to hold all of your groceries. Enjoy your meals inside with the tasteful dining set, or watch the sunset from your lanai while sipping your favorite beverage. Located on the border of Kihei and Wailea Resort town, this unit is within walking distance to gorgeous white sand swimming beaches, award winning restaurants, Kihei Boat ramp, golf courses and the upscale amenities of Wailea town. Try new cuisines, schedule a spa treatment or explore the shops and galleries of Wailea. The unit can accommodate up to four guests as it comes equip
description: Located just steps away from breathtaking sunsets and stunning moon rises, this partial ocean view unit is perfect for your next island getaway. You will love its bright and inviting ambiance as well as its open and spacious kitchen. Relax with a chilled beverage on your own private lanai, facing the sparkling pool or enjoy watching waves tumble and whales play off the coast of beautiful Maui. With its perfect location across from Kam III beach, this condo is perfect for families with children! Relax on the king bed in the master bedroom after a long day of snorkeling, hiking or sunbathing on the beach. Ceiling fans keep you cool at night and the TVs in the bedroom and living room keep you entertained after the sun goes down. This bedroom is roomy and stylishly appointed with Hawaiian bamboo furnishings throughout. The updated kitchen allows you to cook your favorite meals while on vacation and the newly updated kitchen cabinets are large enough to hold all of your groceries. Enjoy you
neighborhood_overview: Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. The property's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor - 6 miles - Many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. The town of Kihei is a quant, laid-back beach town boasting some of Maui’s most pristine stretches of white sand and turquoise waters. South Maui is fun for couples and families
transit: Kihei is only a 20 minute commute from the Maui airport and is the perfect location if you want to explore the island. Centrally located, accessing any part of Maui is easy from Kihei. I always recommend renting a car. We have access to better rates with AVIS and BUDGET, please contact me so I can assist you with booking. GET (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) TAT (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
access: This is a fantastic unit, and a newer addition to our rental pool! If you are looking to read reviews about us and how we cater to our guests, please click on my profile picture. There you will be able to view hundreds of positive reviews since I started hosting on Airbnb.
interaction: I am always available to be reached via email or phone. We have a Housekeeper on call; additional cleaning could be arranged at a $50 fee, generally our long stay guests take advantage of this service. Our Maintenance crew is on call and can assist at any time. Check-in and Check-out are very simple. We send you a pre-arrival email that has all necessary information on how to get to the condo, how to access the unit and pool areas, etc. We recommend you print the email prior to the trip or saving it on your smart phone to easily access it when you arrive at the complex. A private Concierge is always standing by to help with any activity bookings, island recommendations and restaurant reservations. GE-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)     TA-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

host.host_about:
I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Carine, Taylor, Jennifer and Tim, they help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

reviews.comments: Viktoria and her team were very quick to respond to any questions. The place was great and the you can not beat the location! The place was nice and the bed was comfortable, they had all the beach gear as well. We were very grateful for the opportunity for a late check out as well. This saved us big time. Thank you. We loved our time.

Very nice and clean unit at a great location - close to Kamaole parks and to Wailea. Everything we needed was in the unit - from cleaning supplies to all pans, pots and utensils and to snorkel and beach gear. There was also a detailed guide on pretty much everything we wanted to know while being there. The only drawback was that the living room did not have AC - just the bedroom. 
The place is managed with great professionalism and attention to detail. Very courteous and to the point help and guidance from them.

Our stay in Kihei was fantastic from start to finish.  The condo was a little bigger than the pictures indicated, communication was great, and there were many items like boogie boards and snorkeling gear that was a nice surprise as well.  Overall, would highly recommend this spot for a family vacation in Maui.

Viktoria and her team are really invested in making your vacation enjoyable!  This condo in Kihei is in a great location, central to the whole island and right next to a nice beach area complete with restaurants, markets, and shops.  The condo itself is comfortable and well outfitted, and as others have mentioned- is larger than it appears in pictures.  Everything you need to cook and eat is available and in great condition.  The beds, linen, and furniture are comfortable.  There is even a closet with beach accessories so you do not even need to bring your own (chairs, cooler, umbrella, boogie boards, etc)!
Viktoria (or her team) is immediately responsive to emails and will check in regularly to make sure everything is going well.  They will even send emails with suggestions for activities, dining, sight-seeing, and are available to assist you with securing reservations, if needed.
We are very happy with our stay at Viktoria's condo in Kihei!
Great place for a good price. Had a lot of amenities I appreciated. Nearby a lot of shops. Clean and well furnished. Will stay here again next time I come to Maui!

We stayed here the last 4 days of our trip on Maui and it's our favorite so far. Location in South Kihei made it easy to go to our favorite beaches, explore and watch beautiful sunsets.
We plan to request this again.

We were so pleased with our stay at Viktoria's place. Check-in and instructions were very straightforward, condo was very clean. Location is perfect, right across the street from Kamaole Beach III, a 2 minute walk! The condo was equipped with everything we needed: bodyboards, beach umbrella, beach chairs, etc. Air conditioning in the bedroom was a plus and Wifi worked well in the living area. A fantastic stay!

This is a spacious place with a large lounge room and full kitchen. From the balcony you look over landscaped grounds and the complex swimming pool. Best of all, you can just walk across the road to a nice park and beach. Communication with Viktoria and her team was quick and easy too.

My friend and I stayed at Viktoria’s place for a long weekend trip and had the best time! It’s centrally located just across the street from a gorgeous beach for snorkeling, is walking distance to the Kihei boat ramp where some excursions pick up, has tons of shops and restaurants nearby, and has free parking in the complex. Also the apartment itself was exactly as described, has a key code for easy check-in, and is nice and quiet for a relaxing stay. Victoria is very responsive and sent us tons of helpful tips on activities, restaurants, and sights for our stay. I’ll be recommending this place to all of my family and friends!

I’ll definitely book again. The room is spacious and extremely clean and has everything we need during our 3-day stay here. It’s right across the street from a beach park. The condo is located in a beautifully maintained community that is quiet and with plenty of parking spaces. The view from the balcony of the pool and lawn is so relaxing. It’s about ten minutes walk from a plaza that has restaurants, shops, shave ice and rental gears. Viktoria was super responsive and provided a ton of tips before our arrival. My only complaint is that there’s no WiFi signal in the bedroom (the speed is decent in the living room) and the AC’s kind of loud so I mostly just relied on the ceiling fan instead.
NA

This was our first trip staying at Hale Kamaole and it was absolutely perfect! The space and location were great and close to everything we needed. Viktoria and team were prompt and extra helpful in their communications. Super easy booking, we’d absolutely stay again!

The best location you can get!  The beach is literally right across the street!!!!!
My family rented a house and this condo..The service is excellent in every way!!!!

Great central location to everything we wanted to do. We went on a snorkeling tour out of Maalea harbor, sunset sailing and a luau in Kaanapali, Big Beach, sunset on top of Haleakalā and the road to Hana. 

The condo was located really close to the beach in Kihei and within walking distance to restaurants and shops. The condo itself was pretty basic in terms of design, but was clean and spacious and had boogie boards, beach chairs, snorkeling gear and a beach umbrella. Although WiFi is available, it was pretty slow and regularly disappeared and we had to log back on. 

Overall this place is a good value for the price and we would definitely stay here again if we come back.
Stayed here for two weeks. Great location. Everything you need is in the condo. Had no issues. Viktoria does an excellent job with communication.
Pretty fun and relaxing right by everything you could need
Great location! The place was spacious and very clean.  We loved everything about it.
Everything was orderly and pretty easy to figure out.  This was my first time using Airbnb, and it all went according to plan, thanks to this great host.

The location was excellent, next to the beautiful Kamaole beach and within easy driving distance of everything you could need in the town of Kihei.  The location was also ideal relative to some of the other beaches in the Kihei and Wailea part of town.

The condo itself was exactly as advertised. Viktoria was very prompt in her response and communicated clearly in near real time.  The place was very clean and air conditioned, always a plus in the islands in case the trade winds aren’t as strong on any particular day.

The location had fast WiFi when we needed it, it also had all the amenities and felt like a home away from home.  Viktoria is an excellent host and we look forward to booking her place again the next time we are in Maui.

Very well stocked space and the host is very communicative and provides a wealth of information for your stay. We would definitely stay at another unit hosted by this host! Laundry and washer is provided within the unit as well and was a very welcome surprise!

This condo, located on South Kihei Rd. was perfect for our stay on Maui. 3 adults had plenty of room to relax, sleep, and eat. The entire space was clean and the beds, linens and pillows were comfortable. Check in and out was easy and the information about the property was easily found. If you are looking for a location that's affordable and in the center of everything -- this south Kihei condo is it. Yes, it's hot, but there are two pools and it's located directly across the street from Kamaole Beach Park. Every morning we woke up, took a run, and then jumped in the ocean. The area is a good mix of local restaurants and stores, with plenty of tourist attractions available.
Great location saw sea turtles on the beach right in front of the condo. Would go again for sure. Helpful, informative host.
The space and the location are beautiful. There is easy access to the beach, and the community pool is lovely.

Our family of 3 had a great stay at Viktorias condo. The unit was right across the street from the beach with THE best sunset in Kihei. Host was excellent at communicating and even got us an early check in when we arrived sooner than we thought. Lots of towels and things to keep us busy at the beach. Would stay again for sure :)

Stayed in Victoria's condo in October 2018. A spacious one-bedroom with full kitchen, clean bathroom and bedroom. Was pleasantly surprised to find cooking utensils, as well as beach towel and chairs. The condo comes equipped with washer and dryer, everything you could ever imagine for comfortable living. A beautiful beach park right across the road, never had to drive to a beach once. Great stay!

Great place in a great location! Literally just had to walk across the street to a nice, non crowded beach. (Where we saw lots of sea turtles!) The elevator was a nice perk especially with two kids in tow. There was an abundance of towels and also some beach gear available which were well utilized. Viktoria and her staff were extremely responsive and helpful. The local tips were spot on. Would definitely stay here again!

This unit was in a great location -- just walk across the street to the beach.  It came with all the necessary beach equipment.  The pool in the complex was clean and a pleasant place to sit on a lounger.  The bed in the unit was very comfortable.  The kitchen is extremely well equipped with pots, pans, place-settings etc.  All in all we had an excellent experience and would return in a heart-beat.
Very quick response to any question. Location was perfect for us - just across the road from a great beach and park.

Comfortable bed
Clean bathroom 
Place to do laundry 
And a nice living room and kitchen loved the stay here.
Clean space. Friendly staff. Convenient check in. Greet location!
Better than excellent! Would return anytime.
Great host, keeps you informed of things going on during your stay as well.  Always available, extra services etc.

Unterkunft war so, wie angepriesen. Super Lage in Kihei, lag direkt neben dem Strand. Man musste lediglich eine Strasse überqueren. Apartment war so, wie so viele in dieser Region sind. Es ist alles vorhanden, was gebraucht wird, inkl. Strandutensilien.
great clean place in a great location.

name: Modern Kailua Getaway with Private Access to Beach
summary: Come enjoy the Kailua life!  This guest suite is situated on a quiet beachside street, and is minutes away from restaurants and shops.  Features an open and inviting layout, with many modern conveniences, including Bosch appliances as well as comfortable furnishings. Single-level unit with a dedicated parking space on the property. Located on a cul-de-sac with residents-only access to a peaceful stretch of Kailua Beach.  Get to the beach without crossing a single street. 日本人の方大歓迎 ｡
space: Recently-completed guest suite is nearly 800 square feet (75 square meters).  Single-level unit on a level property, with no stairs to climb.  Open layout with kitchen, dining, living, and sleeping areas.   Queen-size bed is topped with quality foam mattress and linens.  Full-size, Room & Board foam-mattress sleeper can accommodate two small children or one adult.  Overall, space is ideal for a couple or a small family. Bosch kitchen appliances and washer and dryer. Beach equipment such as chairs, cooler, boogie board, snorkels, and beach toys available for use. TV, cable (125+ channels), and internet. Ceiling fans and Fujitsu split A/C system. Dedicated parking space on the property as well as ample street parking.
description: Come enjoy the Kailua life!  This guest suite is situated on a quiet beachside street, and is minutes away from restaurants and shops.  Features an open and inviting layout, with many modern conveniences, including Bosch appliances as well as comfortable furnishings. Single-level unit with a dedicated parking space on the property. Located on a cul-de-sac with residents-only access to a peaceful stretch of Kailua Beach.  Get to the beach without crossing a single street. 日本人の方大歓迎 ｡ Recently-completed guest suite is nearly 800 square feet (75 square meters).  Single-level unit on a level property, with no stairs to climb.  Open layout with kitchen, dining, living, and sleeping areas.   Queen-size bed is topped with quality foam mattress and linens.  Full-size, Room & Board foam-mattress sleeper can accommodate two small children or one adult.  Overall, space is ideal for a couple or a small family. Bosch kitchen appliances and washer and dryer. Beach equipment such as chairs, cooler, bo
neighborhood_overview: In addition to beautiful Kailua Beach, local venues such as Lanikai Beach and Kailua Town make this the ideal getaway.  Minutes drive to Whole Foods Market, Target, as well as shops and restaurants.
notes: Our rates are inclusive of Hawai’i General Excise Tax of 4.712% and Hawai’i Transit Accommodations Tax of 10.25% (i.e., no hidden/incremental tax charges following your booking).
transit: Several ridesharing options, including Uber and Lyft.  Also close to public bus transportation. Rental car recommended in order to get to/from Kailua.  Three scenic arteries (H-3, Pali, and Likelike) between Kailua and town.
interaction: Guest suite is an in-law unit with a dedicated entrance on the left side of the property (separate from the owners' entrance).  Guests may access the unit via keyless locks.  Codes and contact information will be provided ahead of guests’ arrival.  Interaction will generally be limited -- owners are often offsite, but are certainly accessible to the extent anything is needed.
house_rules: Unit will be cleaned prior to your checkin.  Cleaning service can be provided during your stay for a fee. Please remove footwear before entering the unit, rinsing/dusting off any residual sand before entry.  Please leave the unit reasonably clean at checkout. Amenities include cooking basics; shampoo, body wash, and soap for normal skin types; a set of linens; and a bath towel and a beach towel for each guest.  A couple of detergent pods will also be provided for immediate laundering/washing needs (Target and Longs Drugs carry more of the same if needed).  No lifeguards on duty at the local beach, so please exercise water safety. There is a pool at the rear on the owner’s end of the property that is gated-off for the safety of guests and is not available for use (recall you have Kailua Beach!).   Groundskeepers periodically on premises to keep the exterior of the property looking its best.  To minimize disruption, they generally conduct their work after 8AM. Located in a residential ne

host.host_about: Finance professional based in Kailua, HI and New York, NY.

reviews.comments: The location of this guesthouse can’t get any better. Private beach access to the beautiful Kailua beach (about three houses down) literally made it ideal for a beach stroll every morning with my cup of coffee. Easy check-in/communication process with all necessary amenities provided. Comfortable bed and sofa bed. Everything looked new and recently renovated. Lots of natural light and the quiet neighborhood where you can hear the birds and the wind made it really peaceful. Highly recommend it!

John’s guesthouse was the perfect Hawaii getaway.  The house is bright and airy and offers a lot of privacy.  It is impeccably clean and stocked with many of the conveniences you could ever need on a vacation.  Best of all is the immediate beach access.  We were in Hawaii for a short time to recharge from a busy schedule and never had to leave Kailua, being just seconds from the most beautiful beach on Oahu and so close to Kailua’s restaurants and stores.  Highly recommended!

My family with 2 kids stayed at John’s place for a week. The place was located a few houses from the beach in a quiet neighborhood (you can hear the birds all day long). It’s very easy to access the beach so we visited it everyday. Everything was new in the house and had all amenities we needed. 
We didn’t met the host, but he responded promptly and kindly on our emails before and during our visit. John was a perfect host and we would love to come back.

Location can't be beat. I live in town, but wanted to escape the hustle and bustle. The house is on a cul de sac with private access to famous Kailua beach (less than 2 min!). It's a quiet stretch only used by local residents, so the beach is not crowded and feels like your very own paradise. Although set away from the traffic, it' only an 8 minute drive to Kailua town (Whole Foods, restaurants, etc), so still convenient to everything. The place is newly contructed; it was as if I was the first person using it, from the equipped kitchen to the Bosch washer/dryer. Super clean and new. Felt more like a hotel than other airbnbs. The bed is comfy memory foam and the mirror even has a button to turn on the light! Lovely place to stay. Bonus was the easy parking, which is not always available at other airbnbs in the area.

Loved my stay here!  Peaceful beach neighborhood with garden views.  Guest house is large and bright and comfortable.  Cannot say enough about the quick access to beautiful Kailua beach and shops and restaurants.  Will definitely return next time I’m back in Kailua!
Had an amazing stay!  Clean surrounds, great location (especially to the beach!), and gracious host.  Will definitely be back!!

I considered various options for my family (hotels, apartment hotels, vacation properties, etc). Prices for a hotel with kitchen and parking in a good location (basic necessities when travelling with a family including a child) were sky high! I was fortunate to find John’s property. It had basically everything we needed including plenty of parking, full kitchen, laundry, large step in shower, ample towels, sheets, etc. We spent most of our time at the beach which is behind a secured gate restricted to residents of the small street. Host supplied various beach equipment including beach toys for my child. Didn’t get to explore the Kailua town area but Wholefoods and other markets were just minutes away for basics and quick takeaway. Highly recommended for small families looking for convenience and value.

John was inviting and responsive via texts. We didn't meet in person but the communication was on point. He even notified us about the false missile crisis. Anything you asked he was available via Airbnb app or personal phone. The space was exactly as described. Clean, organized and little surprises from John or previous guests. The beach nearby was the perfect get away from the hustle and bustle from the city. Kailua was a great choice for a city be in. It's quaint and away from the loud traffic and touristy trap of waikiki. John's place was the first leg of our honeymoon. He left surprises on our front door which was a great gesture!  He was respectful and gave us the privacy we needed. Next to or even the best airbnb stay so far.  Mahalo John!
perfct‼︎

John’s house is really beautiful, clean and good location to the most beautiful sea in Hawaii. John is good guy and strongly supports your stay in Kailua. You can clean your cloths by yourself and cook everything. work to the sea is just 5 min and you can run in the morning time at the beach. It is 30 min to Waikiki and enjoy morning market, starbucks, whole foods at Kailua.

Check in was self service with a lockbox, and although the unit shares a wall with the owner's space, we felt like we were staying in our own separate property. Our only interaction was via text, and of course, when he left us Alohamacs at the end of our stay :) The rental had everything one could want for a week's stay at the beach! It was so well appointed. The cul-de-sac's private beach access made the place an incredible value. We were close enough to bike to downtown Kailua, but far away enough to be in a really nice neighborhood. Definitely coming back!

Love the direct walking access to the beach and quiet neighborhood. John was great with communication and provided seamless info for check in and   checkout. The studio was so clean and well equipped! Bed was reasonably comfortable and not some squeaky old bed. Definitely one of the cleanest Airbnb’s I’ve stayed at with great amenities with details like parking, soap, shampoo, beach chairs, and clean decent towels. I appreciated all the little touches it had which made things so convenient for our quick trip. On our last day he left a personal thank you card and chocolates, which was dug a nice gesture. Thanks John for such a great experience and I look forward to staying here again in the future!

We had a great time in Oahu, and John’s Airbnb was excellent, exceeding our expectations. The place has been recently remodeled & felt fresh and modern. Location is superb, on a quiet cul-de-sac road in a residential neighborhood, with very close (a couple of minutes walk) private access to Kalama beach. Our children enjoyed playing on the beach and it seemed to be non-touristy with locals going on their morning walks / jogs. Shops (supermarkets) and downtown Kailua are close; a 5-10 min drive will get you everything you need.  Even though we didn’t see John he was communicative and we appreciated his emails checking in with us during our stay. Thoroughly recommend this place and looking forward to a return visit!

This place was perfect for my little family of four! My husband and two young children immediately felt comfy in the space and made ourselves at home! The couch folded out into a queen bed that was perfect for the kiddos. The small tv on the pictures shown did make the space look cheap but in person the entire studio was very nice with high end renovations. Everything was clean and easy to access and John was quick to respond when we had an issue getting connected to the internet. We cooked breakfast every morning and made lunches to take to the beach. A boogie board, sand toys, and a set of snorkel gear was also provided for us to use. The residential street it is located on was clean and picturesque. The beach was only a short walk down a private, gated alley/walkway (which my kids loved) once you get toward the end of the path it opens up to the most beautiful beach scenery! Our favorite part of our trip was our early morning strolls to beach. When it came time to end our stay, my kids didn’t want to leave! We loved our stay here and definitely recommend it to anyone else looking for an easy getaway in Kailua.
Clean and modern.  Close proximity to the beach.  Parking on site.  Easy check-in.  Quiet neighborhood.  Close to restaurants and shops.

John and his place were beyond my expectations. This was such a beautiful space that was well represented in the photos. The entire space feels brand new and in wonderful condition. He went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable by creating a mini site to view before check-in and had recommendations about local life curated in a binder on the coffee table. He was very respectful and quick to answer any questions we had. The location is excellent, just steps from a quiet beach that my wife and I enjoyed watching the sunrise on almost every morning. If you're looking for a stay in Kailua, stop looking, this is it.

John’s place was amazing. Spacious apartment for the two of us, and had everything we needed. The beach was literally right there and it was such a beautiful beach! John was a great host and we can’t wait to come back!

Great location. Very close to beach. Need a car to get to town  -but great food in town. We liked nico’s buzz’s, kono’s and the farmer’s market on Sunday.  Clean space and very updated. Was perfect for a few days with our family of four. John was very pro active with communication and tips. Thank you!

We spent a week at John’s rental with our 18 month old daughter.  We absolutely loved the location and access to the beach for morning and evening walks.  The space is clean, quiet and not cluttered, yet well appointed with everything you need. We appreciated the fresh modern finishes and new appliances.  The fenced yard with well manicured grass made a great play area for our baby. John is a great host and was very responsive and even offered early check in and late check out options.  I would recommend having access to a car if traveling with a baby.  Although the area seems very walkable, we used a car to run errands and take a few day trips to other attractions on the island.  Overall this was one of the best vacation rentals we have had.

My husband and I were blown away by John's hospitality. The private beach made our stay, along with all the beach gear John kindly provided. Super close to Whole Foods, Target, yummy shave ice, with plenty of great breakfast spots all around. Mahalo, John! Can't wait to return.

This little house was absolutely perfect with all the things needed for an extended stay. Lots of amenities like a washer/dryer and dishwasher for easy cleaning and also quality beach equipment (chairs, cooler, umbrella, etc.) that we can use. These little things add up to make the stay a memorable one. The little private beach access was also a nice perk - no need to fight for parking at the beach; just load up the cooler (with wheels!) and take a quick walk down the path and you're there! John was quick with communication and provided instructions for check-in ahead of time in case we had any questions. He also provided a list of things to do and places to eat in case you're new to the area/island. John even left a box of alohamacs at the door on our last day. Definitely would stay here again when we visit Oahu again!

La calidad del equipamiento y el estado del apartamento-casa son impecables.
Tiene además lugar para estacionar el auto justo al lado de la entrada, con lo cual accedíamos fácilmente a otras playas de la isla.
Está en un barrio residencial muy tranquilo con acceso a la playa de Kailúa. 
John respondía rápidamente a nuestras inquietudes de manera cordial y respetuosa. 
Muy recomendable.

What a fantastic find! The place was outstanding and location on point. The space was extra clean and had all the amenities we needed to make our trip and stay comfortable. The kitchen appliances were top of the line, washer dryer a must for a stay with a little one, and location on the beach enjoyable. The town of Kailua was quaint and had everything you needed from Whole Foods, Starbucks, Jamba Juice and a Farmer's Market on Thursday nights. 

John was super hospitable and easy to reach. He provided recommendations on local restaurants and accommodated an early check in and later check out. He was a fantastic host and we can't wait to make a trip back.
John was a great host. The place is nice and clean. It is very close to the beach. You can’t beat it if you want beach assess.

We loved our stay at John’s cute studio! It’s so close to Kailua beach and we loved taking morning walks down to watch the sunrise. The space is modern and perfectly simple, and we loved being able to spend time in a private yard as well! I would highly recommend this place.

Johnさんのお部屋はとても清潔で素晴らしかったです｡家の近くの小道からｱｸｾｽできる海は人も少なく､とてもｽﾃｷなkailuabeachでした｡
子供たちは探検に行くようで毎日ﾜｸﾜｸしていました｡
ﾃｷｽﾄや電話の対応もすぐにしてくださり助かりました｡
またぜひ泊まりたいです｡
John's place is just as described. It was very clean and modern and more than enough space for our family of 4. We can't wait to come back!

It was our best Airbnb experience ever! I would highly recommend this place! John is very helpful and responds very quickly. The check-in and out is simple and easy. The location is superb! A nice quiet neighborhood and it's a 3min walk to the best beach on Oahu. You won't see many people at the beach so it feels like you have the whole beach to yourself. My son and I went to the beach every morning and afternoon. The sunrise at the beach is also breathtakingly beautiful. A short drive to the supermarket and local restaurants. The room is very clean and spacious enough for a small family. The room is also very well equipped. We would definitely stay here again (and again) when we go back to Oahu! :)

To say that we are beyond satisfied with our stay is an understatement. The guesthouse was modern, super clean, perfectly spacious and in a great location. John was accommodating, allowing us to check-in early and check-out late. He even left a personal gift for us! Highly recommend.

John is a gentle &  good guy.
He  supports our stay.
His  guest room  is really beautiful & clean.
Location is good. 
I would  recommend his guest room.

This place is fantastic for two people. Clean and in a quiet neighborhood which is easy to navigate in a car. The walk to the semi-private beach will take ~5 minutes at a leisure pace (maybe depending on how much you're carrying). Get ready to relax!

The house is so clean and immaculate with high end beds, finishes, and appliances! Truly felt like home! Location is perfect as the beach is a five min walk (if that) and downtown Kailua is a very close drive. We will definitely be coming back on our next trip to Hawaii!

This was the first time my family used Airbnb and we had an amazing experience. The place was exactly as described and had everything we needed, including beach toys and gear. John was very responsive and surprised us with some treats. My two girls were sad when leaving. We definitely recommend this place. Thank you again John.
We used to live in Kailua and were back for a family visit. John’s place is the perfect size for 3-4 people who want a clean quiet place close to the beach. Highly recommended!!

Immaculate Unit! 
Johns place is amazing. Close to Kailua town including restaurants and grocery stores. The neighborhood is nice and quiet, perfect for relaxing. If your looking for a nice and cozy stay this is the place for you. 
Mahalo John for the chocolate and super nice note   We hope to return soon!
John’s place is great. Very big and open (it is essentially a studio but feels large). Impeccably clean and everything seems new and in great condition. Nice thoughtful touches.

Johns place was great! Everything you could possible need and close to the beach.  Super quiet neighborhood.  He provided several Boogie boards, kids sand toys, snorkel gear and more.   He even purchased children’s life vests for my  kids to use while we stayed there!  Next time I visit Oahu, I’m staying at Johns!

This room is simple but full of aesthetic sense.
And utilities are very clean.
Our family (4 people) could stay comfortably on 1 bed and 1 sofa bed.

1. 房子离海滩300米,海滩距离Kailua Beach Park的海滩约3公里,在沙滩赤脚遛弯,顺便看日出很不错｡
2. 电器十分完善,有效减少生活琐事｡有烤箱､电磁炉､洗衣机､干衣机､咖啡机､烤面包机｡
3. 房东很热情､周到｡回应迅速｡特别允许我们晚退房,让我们能够从容安排起飞前的时间;及时通报飓风情况和高速路是否关闭;时常还有小礼品放在门口｡让房客在异国感觉有个依靠｡

John is a great host and super responsive if you have questions during your stay.  The place itself is very clean and modern and very close to the beach.  The amenities are perfect if you want to go to the beach (chairs, boards, cooler) and the AC is clean and quiet.  The beach access is not bad as you walk down a narrow, private pathway but it opens up to a narrow part of the beach without much cover.  The east side of the beach is a little better, especially if you have a young toddler like we had.

Better than expected! John's place is modern and offers a great space. Nice short walk to the beach and the unit is located on a quiet street. Updated appliances and modern furniture. Will def. book again on my next stay!

His property is simple and so clean. Additionally no BUGs heaven.
My wife and I could spend comfortable stay there. Highly recommended!

John's place is very accessible to the beach,.I and my husband enjoyed walking and swimming every morning. 
Privacy has been kept in the property, and everything we need was in place in the room. We relaxed in this comfortable and clean room as if we were at home. 
John responded quickly and provided necessary information at a good timing. He is a excellent host.
We want to stay at John's house when we come back to Kailua again.

Just perfect place and great host!(John) Great location, couple min walk to the beach ( private access to the beach) , 15-20 min drive from the house to any tourist attraction, very clean, and John was very accommodating and responsive! Thanks for hosting us !

John was so easy to book with. We needed to get a place for one of our workers last minute with only two hours before he arrived on the island notice. We found John's place and he replied very quickly. The place was nice and clean and ready for our worker as soon as he landed. John made everything very easy for us and was very accommodating when we needed to make last minute changes to our reservation. We highly recommend you stay with John while visiting the beautiful Kailua. His home will make you feel like you're at home away from home. Thank you again John! We hope to stay with you again soon.
A great place to stay with easy access to great places to eat and from amazing beaches and hiking trails.

John’s place is super clean and had everything I needed to make my stay comfortable. His place is perfectly located. Quiet at night but close to town (markets, Target), and most of all, a very quick walk to the beach! Would definitely come back!

John's place is EVERYTHING it advertises to be and a little more. The suite is clean, comfortable, and has everything you need. The host was responsive, considerate, and prepared. There is definitely no mystery why he is rated as a Superhost. You will not be disappointed if you stay here. I would not hesitate to book this suite again.

Highly recommended! The place was very clean. We were traveling with a two year old and the setup was very convenient with easy access to the beach. John was very attentive, thoughtful, and responsive during our stay. It was a wonderful trip!

Second time around and even better! John’s place is clean, classy, and well furnished (i.e. bed from design within reach?). It’s been about an year since my first visit, and it’s become a more refined stay. I think he added an AC unit, some more security, and beach amenities to mention a few upgrades. I’m going to keep coming! Seriously, it doesn’t get any better than John’s place in Kailua.

This is the second time we have stayed with John & it just doesn't get better than him. His home is so beautiful and it was perfect for our guest. They have requested to stay with John every time they come down. They loved John home so much that they decided to leave the mainland to move to Hawaii! If that doesn't tell you how much you will LOVE staying with John, I don't know what will.
Safe, clean, and comfortable. John was so easy to work with and very responsive! Everything about it was wonderful. We were sad to leave this little piece of Heaven.
Great clean place, quick walk down a private gated walkway to the beach.  Loved this place. Quick responses from host

This was our second time staying at John's place and we had a very good time as well as last time. It's really nice to have a place on Oahu where you're sure that you'll have a great time. We saw that there were more beach gear and toys for little kids on the beach and my seven year old loved it! He really enjoyed catching and observing crabs on the beach with the bucket and the net.
If you're looking for a stress free place to stay on Oahu this is the place. It's in a great neighborhood, 3 mins walk to a non touristy beautiful beach, John is very helpful and responsive, the room is clean with everything you need. We plan to stay here everytime we're in Oahu.
Best Airbnb experience ever.

Relaxing beach neighborhood- could hear the waves from our room. Just a 5 minute walk to the end of street and through the locked gate to a quiet georgeous golden sand beach. A few blocks down the beach each way to the closest public access so just a few families relaxing and playing in the surf. Waves and gentle slope of the soft golden sand were perfect for boogie boarding with my husband and teenage son.
John the host was very quick to reply to our one small problem with TV and fixed it almost immediately. Beautiful, clean new unit exactly as pictured with air conditioning and ceiling fan options. My son found pull out sofa bed comfy. Unit had a great online iPad with info about the area and activities. Off street parking for our rental car and very safe neighborhood.
This is a rare find and great treasure which our family highly recommends.

I had an amazing stay at John's place in Kailua!  I come to Oahu yearly but this was the first time staying outside of Waikiki and I loved it.  John's place was very clean, spacious, and all the amenities were great.  Everything was so comfortable, from the bed to the couch down to the linens.  Location was also ideal...just steps away from the most beautiful beach on the island  and a quick drive to Waikiki or the North Shore.  We got to enjoy the sunrise daily and utilized the beach chairs and boogie boards that John has available for guests.  The town is charming and more relaxed than Waikiki and I will definitely be staying here again on my next visit!

John’s place is amazing - one of the nicer Airbnbs I’ve stayed at anywhere. The beach access was so nice to have. John’s place is clean and well-eqipped for an enjoyable stay and he is very responsive, helpful, and communicative. Would definitely stay again if we come to Hawaii again!

Great place next to one of the nicest beaches in the world! John was fantastic. Just watch out for those man o wars on the beach they really hurt and kept us off the beach for half our trip which was a big bummer. Highly reccomend this place though, Kailua is wonderful!
Stay here!

This place is amazing! John truly lives  up to his super host rating. The home was sparkling clean and extremely comfortable. The neighborhood that the home is located in is very nice and offers private access to literally one of the nicest beaches in the world. My wife and I were able to surf from the beach too, if that’s your thing. We timed how long it took us to leisurely walk from the house to the beach. It takes exactly 3.5 minutes. We didn’t want to leave. We basically wanted John to adopt us and let us live there forever.
Comfortable, well-appointed, well-located...John is super responsive and hospitable!

This place was simple and not overly done. It has everything you need. I really loved the washer and dryer in the unit and the beach toys for the kids :) The beach is literally 3 minutes and 45 seconds away from the front door. John’s response time to my questions were less than 2 minutes. My little family would definitely stay here again!

name: Greatly located two people bedroom in mosman
summary: Great apartment with super view located in one of Sydney's most exclusive districts. 15 min walk to Balmoral beach and very close to the Spit Junction with shops, bars and restaurants to enjoy. Public transport basically outside the building with buses going directly to the CBD. You would be sharing the apartment with an organized and clean housemate.
space: The room is very comfortable and clean. The location of the apartment is ideal for people that want to enjoy Sydney but not be in the crowded cbd area. The view provided from the balcony is astonishing in is perfect to enjoy a wine in the evening and a coffee in the morning.
description: Great apartment with super view located in one of Sydney's most exclusive districts. 15 min walk to Balmoral beach and very close to the Spit Junction with shops, bars and restaurants to enjoy. Public transport basically outside the building with buses going directly to the CBD. You would be sharing the apartment with an organized and clean housemate. The room is very comfortable and clean. The location of the apartment is ideal for people that want to enjoy Sydney but not be in the crowded cbd area. The view provided from the balcony is astonishing in is perfect to enjoy a wine in the evening and a coffee in the morning. You would have access to the hall apartment with the exception of the master bedroom. You will be given a key with a electronic pass for the building access which will be charged for $150 if lost. I will not be available at most of the time since I will be traveling, but the flatmate that stays in the apartment will be able to assists and help if needed.
access: You would have access to the hall apartment with the exception of the master bedroom. You will be given a key with a electronic pass for the building access which will be charged for $150 if lost.

name: Casa Amarela - The Garden
summary: Casa Amarela is a 19th-century building with 4 apartments. The reconstruction combines the architecture and original features of the time with a modern decoration. It is located in front of a garden square in the historic area of the city, where you can walk to the main points of interest that the city has to offer. Traditional shops, cafes, restaurants and public transport can be found in the immediate vicinity.
space: This duplex apartment is on the ground floor. It consists of a large area where it has the kitchen, dining table and living room. Next to this division is the access to the garden. At the bottom there are 2 bedrooms, one of them is a suite. Both have direct exit to the garden/patio! You can find all the amenities of an inhabited house, since the kitchen washing utensils to the ironing iron to arrange that really nice outfit that is saved for a special occasion!

reviews.comments:
L'appartement est très lumineux, très bien équipé. Très moderne. 2 vraies grandes chambres, 2 salles de bain et aussi 1 toilette sur la terrasse. Il dispose de suffisamment de vaisselle pour une famille. Il donne sur un grand jardin à l'arrière. Très calme. Situé à quelques minutes de plusieurs restaurants et à 5 minutes à pied du métro Trindade. Ana nous a donné plein d'informations utiles. Seul bémol, si je peux dire  :  contrairement au descriptif, il n'y a pas de machine à laver (mais il y a un lave-vaisselle). Cela devrait être rectifié dans la description. 
Logement à recommander sans hésitation.

El apartamento de Ana es incluso mejor de lo que reflejan las fotos. Las habitaciones son amplísimas y la zona de la cocina y salón es acogedora y práctica.
Su ubicación es estratégica, alejada del bullicio y a poca distancia de los lugares de interés de la ciudad. Además está a menos de cinco minutos a pie de la estación de metro de Trindade, por la que pasan todas las líneas y tiene justo enfrente un supermercado.
El recibimiento de Ana fue estupendo, nos explicó todo lo necesario de la casa y nos hizo sugerencias sobre qué lugares visitar en la ciudad. La comunicación con ella fue estupenda y estuvo disponible para nuestras consultas en todo momento.
Sin duda una casa para repetir y recomendar
Excelente casa, ampla, luminosa, confortável, cuidado e limpa. Bem localizada.

Ana is a very warming host. Her suite is very cozy, clean and near to the city center. Highly recommend.
五顆星推薦 Ana 的 BnB,她本身是位設計師,整體空間很有質感,很適合家庭或朋友一起出遊渡假的你(妳)｡

Rui nos recibió puntualmente y nos dio buenas indicaciones sobre qué hacer en Porto.  La casa está muy bien situada, en una zona tranquila, a 5 minutos del centro y excelente para viajar con niños. Las habitaciones amplias y muy cómodas. Las camas excelentes para descansar bien después de un día de turismo. El salón amplio y muy confortable. Estuvimos muy a gusto y la recomendamos. Cómo único punto de mejora le faltan algunos útiles de cocina.

Das Appartement ist wunderschön eingerichtet. 
Die Lage ist hervorragend. Es handelt sich um eine rückwärtige Wohnung, deshalb ist sie - obwohl zentral gelegen -   wunderbar ruhig, da alle Zimer nach hinten rausgehen.
Die Tipps und Ratschläge die uns Nuria gegeben hat waren toll. Sie war auch jederzeit für uns ansprechbar.
Die Wohnung ist uneingeschränkt weiter zu empfehlen.
Old building which has been totally updated. Clean and beautiful place to stay which has been modernized.
A great apartment, large well equipped, stylish.... close to Trinidade metro, which goes direct to airport

Casa Amarela is a great, renovated space close to the old town center of Porto as well as the river banks. It is in walking distance to a subway stop and there are many buses departing from right in front of the door. 

The two-story apartment is very spacious with a minimal clutter; but you can find all you need for a group of 4 or 6. There are two and a half bathrooms, a laundry machine, dishwasher and an induction cooktop, alongside an oven and a microwave; internet tv and a huge beautiful yard are great bonuses for sure.

Nuria, our host, was very warm and welcoming. Check-in and check out were a breeze. More importantly Nuria provided many tips and suggestions to visit around town. It was like having a private tour guide to take a virtual trip around town. We visited most of her suggested places and definitely enjoyed all of them. 

One small issue is the humidity, especially downstairs, but nothing a cheap humidifier can't fix, if the host decided to get one. 

Both I and my family would love to visit and stay with Casa Amarela again in the future.
Great place and location.  Many places around the property.  Good stay.
The appartment is very modern and clean! It’s in a nice neighbourhood. The host is easy to reach and very attentive!

Very welcoming and flexible host.
The house was great with a very nice terrace. Good location easy to find.

We stayed 4 people (two couples) for three nights . It is ideal as it has two different spacious bedrooms and bathrooms. The flat is sunny, equipped modernly and decorated with good taste. It also has a big patio. It is only 15-20 min walk from the city center and is very close to a supermarket. It is located near the hip area which is full of bistros and bars but at the same time it is in a "safe" distance from them and so there is absolutely no noise, on the contrary it is super quiet. The people who run this flat are very polite and responsive, especially the guy (sorry for not remembering his name) who brought us a second pair of keys in the middle of the night as we were stupid enough to lock ourselves out. Highly recommended!

Excelente experiência!!! Núria nos recebeu  com atenção e nos deu uma aula sobre Porto. A casa é linda, bem estruturada, exatamente como nas fotos. A localização é muito boa, a poucos passos do centro.
Appartement très bien placé, très agréable, calme, bien équipé. Terrasse agréable. Hôte très sympathique.

l'appartement de Nuria est très bien situé il est entièrement rénové très propre et Nuria  nous a réservé un très bon accueil elle nous a donné toutes les indications pour que notre visite soit très agréable

Lovely duplex flat. Stylish decor inside. Location is perfect on Praca de Republica which is a short walk to Trindade station or local buses right outside the flat.
So spacious and clean. 2 bathrooms was a real luxury.
Nouri met us at check in and spend a good chunk of time with us explaining the area, where the major sights were and good places to go / eat - very much appreciated!
All in all very satisfied with the flat as a base for exploring Porto - no hesitation to stay here or in any of the other flats in the same property if I visit Porto again!

Casa is a lovely space with lots of room!  The location is perfect for seeing the sites of Porto.  The space, location, and price make this apartment a special place.  Thanks Nuria and Rui for your hospitality!
Great place in perfect location, feel very much like at home

This place is perfect. Everything you see in pictures is exactly what you get. Apartment is very stylish, comfortable and on great location. The host Nuria was very friendly and accessible. If we come back to Porto we'll know where to come
El alojamiento es tal y como aparece en las fotos. Muy buena ubicación, una recepción y unos consejos inmejorables.

Great place to base our stay in Porto. Nuria met us and gave us lots of useful hints for our stay. The apartment was lovely with lots of space  and lovely backyard. Close to station and  a supermarket which is handy

We would like to thank our hosts over and over again for helping to make our time in Porto fantastic!  They provided lots of great suggestions for restaurants, groceries and sites to see and enjoy.  We went to one suggested restaurant, called Paraiso, which was just around the corner twice - fantastic!.  The apartment has recently undergone a high-quality renovation, great workmanship, wonderful kitchen and living room, high ceilings, back yard access, laundry, etc.  Great home away from home!  We will return!!
Fantastic spot, nice renovated house, pretty close to the city (+- 10 minutes walk). The host, Nuria, was great and gave us plenty of tips on what to do around the city. Definitely recommended.
Very beautiful, spacious apartment, perfect for 2 couples. Good location.

Large and airy city apartment with modern furnishing.  Located 10 mins from Santa Cristina and a 20 minute walk to the river makes it a good base for those wishing to explore Porto.

Many thanks to Nuria (a great host) who was very accommodating with our late arrival  and still took the time to offer guidance on local attractions and restaurants.
Perfect!!!

Apartamento térreo excelente, muito bem equipado e decorado,  peças amplas e claras, silencioso e bem localizado. E com um maravilhoso pátio ! Equipe atenciosa e prestativa nos proporcionou excelente estadia na casa. Maravilhoso!!!

We had a great time at this apartment. It’s beautifully finished and more spacious than we expected. 
The location is great, walking distance to all the touristy stuff, but removed enough to get a taste of the local vibes of Porto and 60 cent coffee!
Welcome was great. Nuria met us at the apartment, had a map and lots of information which was great.
Would have been good to have things like hand soap in the bathrooms, extra trash bag, and more than two coffee pods (not the kind of things we travel with for a weekend break or want to have two buy for two days), but apart from that all was wonderful.
Perfect location, Perfect place and perfect host ! :)
Great place to stay. Perfect location for visiting Porto!
Nos recibieron muy puntuales, y todo estaba perfecto! El piso tiene mucho encanto, cerca del centro y con todos los servicios necesarios. Muy recomendable!
Stylish, comfortable apartament not far from the historic district. Hosts are very accommodating and helpful. Would definitely recommend.

Beautifully kitted out space - tastefully refurbished to a very high standard. The owners met us and were very friendly and helpful with local recommendations. If you stay here I highly recommend Buuh just a few doors up the street for brunch or tapas - owners are very friendly and the wine delicious. The accommodation itself is very pleasant - very spacious and very high quality finish. We loved how they’d kept original features but modernised it to a high standard. The square is off the tourist trail and well situated for the metro. Easy walk to town. Highly recommended

name: Curl Curl Getaway | Pool & Spacious 4 BR House
summary: Curl Curl Getaway is a modern, spacious 4-bedroom home with all the makings of a dream holiday.  Theres a lot to enjoy here, whether you explore the surrounds, or just sit back and relax by the pool.  This large home includes a new kitchen & laundry, a pool, out-door BBQ and dining and lounge area. It is conveniently located less than 1km from from Sydney's beautiful Curl Curl Beach.
space: On entry your eye is immediately drawn to the inviting pool at the rear of the house. A spacious hallway leads through the formal dining/sitting room to the open plan kitchen and lounge area. Through the doors at the rear you will realise your holiday has begun. Relax in the casual outdoor area where you can watch the kids in the pool all day long. The property boasts an integrated Sonos sound system allowing you to stream your music to multiple speakers around the home using a wireless connection.  The garden and yard is relaxed, private and includes a hot and cold out-door shower which is perfect after a swim or returning from the beach.  The bedrooms are located on the upper floor. As well there is a second TV and lounge area for the kids to escape and have their own space.  The bedroom configurations are a master king size bedroom with ensuite, two queen bedrooms, a fourth bedroom with two King Single beds and a single trundle under each. There is a second bathroom on this upper fl

neighborhood_overview: Curl Curl Getaway is ideally located to take advantage of all the unique attractions the area has to offer. Guest may like to take a stroll or bike ride amongst the picturesque Curl Curl Lagoon which leads you to the beautiful and unspoiled Curl Curl Beach and Cafe. At Curl Curl Beach you will meet the breathtaking ocean board walk. Follow the board walk south and you will come across Freshwater Beach (about 10 mins walking) or head north and it will lead you to a track through coastal bushland to the next beach, shops and restaurants (Dee Why Beach Front). Take a scenic bus ride or easy walk into Manly by following the coast line south. It will take about 20 mins walking over the headland to get into the heart of Manly and the Corso. There are companies in Manly who offer all kinds of adventurous sporting activities such as kayaking, Stand-up paddle boarding, snorkelling and scuba diving, whale watching (when the season is right), bike tours and ocean adventures. To get into the city
notes: The garage will be locked during the stay but parking is available on the premises on the driveway for 2 cars and 1 additional over the driveway on the street. There is ample parking on the street. There is no Dryer available at this property, but ample hanging space for your clothes is provided. Please note that dining table and chairs will be available outside under cover for your stay. Currently on order! Kitchen and laundry are new.
transit: Public transport is very convenient. A bus stop close by can take you to the shopping mall or to Manly Wharf. For transport by bus - Sydney Buses mainly need Opal cards which are obtained from local newsagents. A 10 minute bus trip will get you to Manly where you can catch a ferry into the city which will take about 30 minutes. The regular Manly Fast Ferry takes 18 mins to get to the city. Sydney Ferries (State run) depart every 30 minutes.
access: Guests will have access to the laundry (no dryer) and appliances as outlined in the welcome manual. Garage is not available, however, there is off street parking and parking on street is ample.
interaction: Our Airbnb home manager Katie will meet you for your check-in and can be contacted between 7am and 7pm daily if required.
house_rules: Please strictly follow rules regarding air-conditioner unit (provided in welcome manual on arrival) as misuse will damage it at cost to guests. This home is for family group bookings only. Food and shoes are not allowed on the upper level.

host.host_location: Curl Curl, New South Wales, Australia

reviews.comments: Tam's place is the ideal family home for a perfect getaway. The location was great to avoid the crowds but close enough to Curl Curl, Freshie and Manly to enjoy the beaches and all that the area has to offer. The pool was a definate draw card and the outdoor area is conducive to rest and relaxation. It's obvious that Tam is a keen cook as everything is thought of and available for entertaining. Would definately recommend and would come back again!
Great place, fully equipped house, Tam is great host, great beach 5-10 min easy walk away.

reviews.comments: Casa limpia y confortable. Muy buenos anfitriones, conocedores de la ciudad. Hospitalidad y amabilidad de principio a fin.

Stay in this house was great. The locality is very good - about 10min to the city centre by walk. Everything was perfectly clean, very nice. Antonio and his  wife were perfect and gave us many types where to go. We can highly recommend it everybody :)

The stay at Antonio and Fatima's place was great! The communication with the hosts was efficient and clear. The house in a Portuguese style, really nice and clean and well situated close to the city centre as well as to bars and restaurants. Antonio and Fatima are really great hosts! We were welcomed by Antonio who offered us coffee, pasteis de nata and Port wine and gave us a lot of recommendations about the city and what to visit. We felt like home and treated as friends! It was really a pleasure to stay at their place! Highly recommended!

António and Fatima are adorable people. We were welcomed with local specialties upon our arrival, and António took an hour of his time to show us all the must-sees of the cities, and share with us local shops and restaurants. And when we told him that our car was on the other side of the city, he took us there too. On top of this, the room was beautiful and the house very nicely located. It is easily accessible from the highway and not even 15 minutes away walking from the historical center. We will for sure come back!
Antonio’s place is clean, comfortable, near the center and well connected (less than 2 minutes walking from the metro). Antonio and Fatima are a really nice couple, I recommend this place!

Such a wonderful couple and very nice flat to stay in! The location was great!  There are a handful of AirBnB rooms and we enjoyed meeting the others staying there. I very much look forward to returning. Do remember there is no wifi in the flat, tho there is a cafe with access across the street.
Je ne peux que recommander cette adresse.

Elegant and luxurious living and dining room, decorated with modern and comfortable furniture. The wooden floors, the leather sofa and the warm colors of the walls transmit a very cozy feeling. The sliding doors give access to the terrace and the swimming pool.

neighborhood_overview: Elected Best European Destination 2017 by the travellers from 174 countries, Porto, the "Cidade Invicta" (unvanquished city) is history, is architecture, culture, gastronomy, trade, encounters and discoveries. Porto has all the charm of towns which happily cohabit with their river. You can stroll along the River Douro (river of gold) in the Ribeira, fly over it by helicopter or discover Porto ‘s architecture, its amazing landscapes and magnificent bridges by taking a cruise on this majestic river. Porto is also a sea city and in the briefest of time a tram will bring you to Foz do Douro’s gentle beaches face to face with the Atlantic. Enter the sumptuously cool Palacio da Bolsa, and walk through history with Portuguese adventurers, follow the country’s trade routes and be stunned by the treasures which they brought back. Remarkable buildings such as the Sé Catédral and its terraces offer superb viewpoints over a bustle of markets, grocery stores, bars, restaurants…
notes: Included in the rent: - Use of gas, water and electricity  - Towels and bed linen - Beach towels - Cot and high chair (on request) - Air Conditioning - Booking fee Not included in the rental price: - Cleaning: € 50 Security deposit: € 450
transit: Distances: - Restaurants and bars 0,6 km - Supermarket 1,5 km - City Park 0,9 km - Oporto Sea Life 1,5 km - Metro Station 2,2 km - Douro River 2 km - Historical Centre 5,2 km - Porto Airport 7,8 km

neighborhood_overview: You are in the heart of the city of Povoa. The apartment is located in a very calm and peaceful area of the in Povoa where you can comfortably relax with family and friends. Nearby is a supermarket, a butcher shop, and a fatastic bakery near to the apartment where you can try classic Portuguese pastries or grab Something quick to eat. There is also a large choice of restaurants where you can enjoy a variety of meals including typical Portuguese dishes. Everything that you could possible need is in walking distance so there is no need to worry about getting around. You can easily walk to the beach and through the charming streets of the city that will bring you anywhere you need to go. You can also take your car if you would like but parking on the street of the apartment is free all year round! The subway is less than 5 minute walk away from the apartment, which can bring you to surrounding areas and also the city of Porto direct access 40 minutes to TRINDADE train station.
notes: Our hotel services are included for stays of 7 or more nights. In the middle of your stay we will come by to change your sheets and towels.  Check in is from 3Pm to 7PM. Beyond these times, contact us for additional fees depending on the time. The check out time is from 8AM to 11AM. A deposit can be requested upon arrival Free wifi is available and also a flat screen TV that has up to 150 tv channels available.  Partying is not possible because there should be  no noise after 23h. Pets are not allowed. Babycots are available upon request with an additional cost of 15€/Week.
transit: You can very easily move around the city and do everything on foot : go and do some shopping, go to one of the beaches,  go to one of the many delicious restaurant, or simply walk around and take in all that this city has to offer. To visit the surrounding areas, motorways are nearby. The metro station POVOA DE VARZIM is a 5 min walking distance from the apartment, and can take you to Porto within 40 min ! Easy access to the airport by metro or by car.
access: Guest House 4U - Povoa Beach & Family is located on the 3rd floor of the apartment (without lift). During the summer months, you can rent and have access to the entire aparment.
interaction: Guest House 4U is completely at your disposal to accompany you before, during, and after your stay. If you need advice or a  guide, booking we will be at your disposal. For all specific requests, we can also offer you a private concierge (additional cost). Do not hesitate to contact us for more information!
house_rules: - Pas de bruit apres 23h pour le voisinage - Pas de fête possible - Pas plus de 7 adultes et 1BB dans le logement Arrivée tardive (après 19H) ou départ tardif (après 11h) des frais supplémentaires s'appliquent.

host.host_about:
Bonjour à tous,
Je suis tombée amoureuse de Porto et j’ai donc décidé de venir m’y installer. Mon parcours hotelier m'a donné envie  de créer ma propre société Guest H4U.
C'est une belle aventure que je partage avec mon conjoint, Mathieu.
Nous vous accueillons comme à l'hotel dans chaque appartement. Nous avons développer des partenariats (chauffeurs privées, guide, chasse aux trésors, tour dans le Douro) qui vous permettrons de découvrir Porto comme les Portuenses!
N’hésitez pas à nous contacter pour plus d’informations
Et d'ici là faites de beaux voyages!
Isabelle & Mathieu
Guesth4u

reviews.comments: 100%recomendado. El apartamento es muy luminoso con todo tipo de comodidades, además Lara nos ha tratado con mucho cariño desde la llegada hasta la despedida. Muy bien comunicado con Oporto, zona tranquila y perfecto para aparcar. Sin duda, repetiríamos.

Apartamento muy bonito,  en una zona tranquila y muy próximo a la estación del metro para ir a Porto. Lara estupenda, atenta y nos facilitó una estancia muy agradable, nosotras volveremos y lo recomiendo para quién busque buena relación calidad precio, limpieza y tranquilidad sin perder de vista la visita a Oporto.

O apartamento é muito bom. Super bonito, a 6 minutos de uma estação de metrô e a Lara é muito simpática e disponível para o que precisar. No check-in fomos recebidos com muito carinho e com os melhores doces portugueses! Recomendo.
O apartamento da Lara é perfeito, assim como nas fotos é bem novo. Bem aconchegante e confortável, fácil acesso ao metrô também ajuda muito na hora da locomoção. Recomendo!

El alojamiento está totalmente reformado con mucho gusto. Todo nuevo y con todos los detalles necesarios y más. Tiene dos terrazas con dos orientaciones en las que se está súper a gusto. El anfitrión súper atento. Nos tenía una buena sorpresa de llegada. Totalmente recomendable. Muy buena comunicación por metro con el centro. Una zona muy tranquila y muy agradable. Sin duda repetiremos.

spacious apartment and really clean, lara is always available ! 
it s better to come in car. 5 ou 6 persons can live, for a very good price !!
aller chez Lara vous ne regréterais rien,tout est parfait.
De todos os lugares que ficamos em Portugal, certamente foi o melhor! O apartamento é simples mas tem tudo o que se precisa, mas os detalhes é o que fazem uma estadia ser proveitosa!
Logement proche du métro pour accéder au centre en peu de temps. Les 2 lits sont très confortables. Équipements complets dans la cuisine. excellent rapport qualité prix.

Espaço agradável conforme as fotos públicas. Possui todas as comodidades e higiene para tornar a estadia muito boa. Apenas um reparo quanto ao ruído vindo do exterior e dos vizinhos, factos pelos quais a Lara não é responsável, claro.

Nous avons été très bien reçus par Lara qui s est rendue très disponible pour nous accueillir dans ce charmant appartement où il ne manquait absolument rien, nous recommandons cette option les yeux fermés, merci encore de votre accueil Lara !

Amazing, beautiful apartment with new furniture and stylish interior. Very comfortable bedTwo toilets, nice sofa, all the kitchen and other staff are new. Hihgly recommended for couples and families)
Un appartement joliment décoré, très agréable et très fonctionnel.
Je recommande ce logement sans hésiter. Très bien équipe, décoré avec goût et très confortable.

Apartamento muy limpio y acogedor, con todo lo necesario. Zona muy tranquila. Excelente lugar, ubicación y trato ni se diga, gracias por todo!
Recomendable 100%
Buen lugar para descansar fiesta proxima apartamento bien diseñado como y con todos los elementos necesarios para cubrir todas las necesidades

Stayed here with my husband and 8yo daughter and it was fabulous.  The bedrooms are lovely, the beds are comfortable, there are two balconies and the whole apartment is nicely decorated.  The kitchen has everything you need, the wifi is good, there's a first aid kit and we were welcomed with tasty Portuguese cookies. The apartment directly overlooks a football (soccer) club/small stadium and we loved watching the daily games and practices from our balcony. My daughter even participated in a practice and was invited to play in a game. The location is outside the tourist area, which we loved.  Less busy but the Metro is a short walk away, making it easy to get anywhere. We were actually able to walk to shops and grocery stores, the river, the Ribeira area, the Port Wine Cellars of Vila de Gaia and most importantly to the many declious pastry shops!  Definitely stay at Lara's place for a more authentic taste of the city and a very comfortable stay!

Absolutely amazing place! Lara is a very kind, attentive and quick to respond host. The flat is lovely, cosy, very clean and perfect for a couple or a small family! We particularly loved how the kitchen was well equipped. Very fast WIFI, comfy bed, great warm water and just everything you neen for a pleasant stay! Thank you Lara! Will be coming back for next time we´re in Porto for work or leasure :) Beijinhos!
Ha sido una estancia fabulosa y todo a pedir de boca

Lara was a wonderful host. She went out of her way to accommodate us, helping with our 18month old and printing our bus tickets. The place is great, there is everything you need and cups of tea and biscuits!! We walked down the hill into town which was an easy 45minute stroll and we caught a Uber home for $5, so it is very accessible and easy to travel to and from. There was plenty of parking around. I would definitely recommend this small but extremely comfortable place, it is great value.

Tive a possibilidade de passar 4 dias neste apartamento é só tenho a dizer bem, desde da limpeza da casa à disponibilidade do anfitrião tudo 5 estrelas, certamente irei voltar! Para quem procura um apartamento perto do Porto melhor opção, pois casas com lugares para os carros sem pagar mesmo à porta são muito raras!! Aconselho
