I really hate it and i consider it a lack of education.

host.host_about:
I am 65 years old. I love knowledge,to learn , and  relationships are always  very importants to me. I write a little and i  paint as well.
My life motto is never doing to the others what i don't want to me. And I haven't felt bad  with this roule!

reviews.comments: Unfortunately wa Í forced to skip my Porto trip.  Therefore it was not possible to enjoy her hospitality. She was very caring in advance to me. My sense telle me that it would have been very comfortable with her. The period was paid by me in front. Maybe later I get a chance to catch up.

I enjoyed my stay in Porto.  Great city toi explore and get lost.  The accomadations with Eulalia were great.  I do have somewhat of a different diet than most and should have mentioned it to her in our emails. She is a very nice individual and very accomadating to her guest.  The room was very nice, clean and comfortable.  Her home is realy nicely done with some of her beautiful paintings decorating the walls. She speaks both Enlish and Spanish. I was very happy with my overall stay with Eulalia.

I really enjoyed staying at Eulalia´s place. She is a very open and warm hearted woman who made me feel at home in Porto. I loved our conversations on English, French, Spanish and Portugese ;-). The room with the sleeping couch is really nice and you have your own bathroom. It is important to know that Eulalia has a lovely dog. Eulalia even offered me breakfast and shared her dinner with me when I was there. I would really recommend staying at her place which is also next to the metro station "marques" and a direct bus line to the train station and the beach.

We stayed with Eulalia for one week and it was a wonderful experience!
She has a really warm personality and likes to have conversations about different cultures and also talk about the beauty of Porto. She helped us a lot to discover the beautiful places in Porto and she invited us for a homemade dinner, which was delicious! And Fiona, the dog, is such a sweetie!
So, Eulalia, thank you so much for everything and we will never forget your immense kindness!

Mattijs and Anna

E's house is very nice and clean, she offer very wonderful breakfast
to us, you will feel comfortable to stay at her home.

Eulalia welcomed us warmly and nicely with a typical Portuguese dishes (surprise!). Beautiful apartment, very clean and decorated with a lot of taste. Eulalia is a really nice person, we had great conversations and she  gave us a lot of advices. She made us feel home. Breakfast was amazing too.
To sum up: we recommend

We only spent one night at Eulalia's, but we wished we could have stayed more. Eulalia is a VERY welcoming person, her place and her attentions are a delight, and we couldn't feel more spoiled. She is a very interesting person and we highly recommend Eulalia's place to stay in Porto, since she wants you to get the best experience in the city. 
A warm hug to you Eulalia, and we will see you very soon :)

Charline and Thomas

Eulalia is a fantastic woman! We spent some nice time together, chatting about art and poetry -she give me some good advice about Portugal litterature, and the most important things to visit in Porto. It was honestly important for her to have me a good stay - and I had! Her house was lovely and very clean, Fiona (her dog) is so cute. It was a pleasure to stay in this warm house, thank you for all!

Eulalia fue una excelente host, todo el tiempo atenta y amable, la casa es muy bonita y el cuarto es perfecto para 1 o 2 personas. El desayuno por la mañana es una deliciosa experiencia, nos habría encantado poder convivir mas con ella :)

I'm happy to have met Eulalia. She is a wonderful woman: warm, open, creative and beautiful. She is also an excellent hostess. She made every effort to make us feel comfortable and at home, and to acquaint us with Porto and the Portuguese way of life. Her puppy Fiona is still a bit young and playful, but loves to get massages :-p We enjoyed very much our time with Eulalia!

Eulalia is a very hospital, fine and tidy woman. She forms a perfect team with Fiona, her young and enthusiastic dog. We stayed for a couple days in one of the rooms of her appartement, which was a perfect base for exploring Porto. And we hope that Eulalia will soon start paiting again.

Très belle expérience avec une ambiance sympathique et chaleureuse. L'appartement est très bien entretenu et dont j'en garde un très bon souvenir. J'y retournerai très certainement. Merci à toi Eulalia.

A Eulalia é uma pessoa maravilhosa! Ela me buscou no trem, me orientou sobre tudo em Porto me dando um mapa, fez uma jana e um café da manhã deliciosos! O lcl é uito bem localizado. Obrigda Eulália e Fiona!

oh! what can I say? Eulalia is a great host with big heart..! everything she does is so warm and friendly)
The room is great, location is really nice...and I really hope to come back one day))

I spent 5 nights in Eulalia's home. The location is fantastic. I could walk to all the areas I wanted to see. Very central. My room was really comfortable and large. Eulalia is very warm, friendly and generous person. She made me feel very relaxed in her home and gave me lots of helpful local advice on where to go and what to see. 

This is the best expereince I have had usng airbnb.
 Eulalia is a wonderful person. Her home is gorgeous and very clean. Every morning she provided a fantastic breakfast. Lots of variety of food and always laid out the table to look beautiful.
My stay with Eulalia and her cute dog was a special expereince and a highlight of my holiday.
I highly recommend Eulalia's aprtment. 
Thank you Eulalia !!!

Mi estancia en casa de Eulalia fue genial, es una anfitriona perfecta!!

Su casa es muy limpia y bonita, tiene muy buen gusto la verdad!!

Mi habitación era amplia y muy cómoda.

Eulalia me dio siempre muy buenas indicaciones y consejos sobre cosas a visitar de Oporto, que por cierto es preciosa!!!

Tiene una perrita cocker Fionna que es una pasada de cariñosa!

Además se puede ir andando a la zona histórica del Rio perfectamente en 15 minutos.

Por tanto recomiendo la estancia en casa de Eulalia a todo el mundo!!

Gracias Eulalia y Fiona!!!
The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Portugal is known for its good gastronomy, sunny days and charming people. Eulalia is not an exception. Quite on the contrary. Your holidays on Porto will be even more special if you come across her and Fiona, her lovely dog. Eulalia always has a smile for you and good advices to where to go/what to do. 

The house is located not far from the centre. In less than 10min walking you are in one of the main streets of Porto (Rua de Santa Catarina), allowing you to get in touch with the real Porto before reaching the touristic part. 

Eulalia's house is cosy and tight. Her guest room has an amazing collection of books - mainly Portuguese written, so its a good excuse to start learning it. You can also appreciate Eulalia's paintings. 

Talk to her about art, literature, travelling, Portuguese traditions. You'll not be disappointed. And please enjoy every single piece of the amazing breakfast that she prepares you every morning. A delicious way to start the day.

___________________

Portugal é conhecido pela sua saborosa gastronomia, dias solarengos e pessoas acolhedoras. E a Eulália não é exceção. Pelo contrario. As suas ferias serão ainda mais especais se tiver a ocasião de encontrar a Eulália e a Fiona,  a sua simpática cadela. A Eulália traz sempre um sorriso e da sempre bons conselhos acerca do que fazer e onde ir.

A casa  encontra-se a 10min da rua de Santa Catarina. Deixe-se levar e aproveite para conhecer a verdadeira alma do Porto antes de chegar à parte mais turística.

Dentro, a casa da Eulália é confortável e sempre arranjada. O quarto de hospedes tem uma excelente coleção de livros – em bom português. Pode igualmente apreciar os quadros que a própria Eulália pinta.

Fale com ela sobre arte, literatura, viagens, tradições … Não se ira desapontar. E, por favor, aproveite bem o pequeno-almoço delicioso que a Eulália prepara todas as manhas. Uma excelente forma de começar bem o dia.

___________________

Le Portugal est bien connu pour sa merveilleuse gastronomie, journées sans fin de soleil et personnes toujours accueillantes.  Et Eulalia n’est pas une exception. Au contraire. Vos vacances au Porto seront encore plus spéciaux se vous trouverez Eulalia e Fiona, sa charmante chien. Eulalia porte toujours un sourire et donne de très bonnes conseilles sur quoi faire ou où y allez.

Sa maison n’est pas très loin du centre du Porto. En marchant 10min à pied, on se retrouve facilement dans la Rue de Sainte Catherine, une de plus connus. Ainsi, profitez  pour connaitre le vrai Porto avant d’arriver à la partie plus touristique.

Dedans, la maison d’Eulalia est toujours propre et confortable. Son chambre d’hôte a une très belle collection de livres – majoritairement en portugais, donc ça serait une belle excuse pour l’apprendre. 

Parlez avec elle sur art, littérature, voyages, traditions portugaises… Vous ne serez pas deçu. Et, s’il vous plait, profitez bien le délicieux petit-déjeuner, qu’Eulalia prépare tous les matins. Une excellente forme de bien commencer la journée.
Had a wonderful stay and my host went above and beyond to look after me. Great location, beautiful place and wonderful breakfast.

Eulalia was a great host; she was friendly and pleasant. The breakfast was really nice, especially Eulalia's homemade jams, which were absolutely gorgeous. The room's description was accurate and I found it really cosy and harmonious. Sleeping in such room surrounded by books, music and paintings could only be relaxing and peaceful. The neighbourhood was good and peaceful, with a few restaurants and snacks' places really close by. Walking distance to central Porto. It was a great choice and I certainly recommend Eulalia's book's corner as a pleasant and relaxing choice when visiting Porto.

Eulalia was wonderful! She was kind enough to let me drop my luggage off earlier than check in and even gave me directions into town. The room was exactly as pictured and the bathroom is beautiful. Fiona, Eulalia´s dog, is a curious little puppy that you cant help but fall in love with. Eulalia  prepared breakfast for me on both mornings which was a lovely surprise! Overall, I greatly enjoyed my stay! Although, I do recommend bringing earplugs because the room faces the street and can get very noisy at night!
Muy buena experiencia en esta acogedora casa de Eulalia que fue muy cariñosa y me ayudó a situarme en esta maravillosa ciudad. Casa muy limpia y barrio tranquilo

Je viens de passer un bon moment à Porto, et des bons moments avec Eulalia qui m'a préparé des sorties très sympas (découvrir le fado, prendre un verre au 14me étage de l'hôtel D. Henrique, découvrir porto by night à pied...).

Eulalia a un très bon goût. Les objets sont choisis avec beaucoup de gout, idem pour la décoration de l'appartement, et sa cuisine car elle m'a invité pour déguster sa recette perso de bacalhau!

Elle a un art pour rendre les choses et la situation agréables

Nous avons passé beaucoup de temps pour discuter sur divers sujets, notamment la philosophie qui la passionne...

Je vous recommande "the charming corner for my books - Porto"
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Lovely place and host! She made breakfast and the place was really clean, we had a nice time there.

I want to thank Eulalia for our nice and comfortable stay in Porto. Her flat is extremely clean, full of light, books and pictures. The atmosphere there is really creative. 

During the night it could be a little bit noisy in the room if the window is open, but it depends on your habits. We live in a quiet district, so as I said it was a little bit noisy for us :)

Eulalia prepares simple but charming breakfasts. She also respects guets' privacy and leaves them alone during their breakfasts in her living room. At the same time she is very easy to talk with. So we had several wonderful conversations about literature, travels and Porto, of course. 

Eulalia also has a dog - young, friendly and really sweet Fiona.

Olá Eulalia, tive uma ótima estadia em sua casa. Além de bem localizada, próxima do centro da cidade e dos meios de transporte, a casa é bonita e bem decorada, inclusive com suas pinturas interessantes. O quarto é grande e confortável, e tive uma casa de banho só para mim.  Fiquei hospedada ai por seis dias e já sinto saudades da sua convivência e da Fiona. Quando voltar ao Porto quero me hospedar novamente em sua casa! Um grande abraço.

Trés bon accueil d'Eulalia. ravie de t'avoir connu. Tu m'as donné de trés bons conseils afin de visiter les lieux symboliques de Porto qui est une trés belle ville. 
Bisous à toi et à fiona
Eulalia es una persona muy cálida y atenta. Fue todo un gusto compartir con ella. La ubicación del piso es muy buena y está cerca de todo. Muy recomendable. Obrigada, Eulalia :)

First of all, she is absolutely nice! The room is so lovely and very clean. And the bed is cozy and warm. The location is really good, too. I could explore a lot of small and beautiful shop in porto. And her dog, piona is so- cute and lovely.
She was very considerate for me in everything. I am going to visit here again next holiday:) I love porto, portugal.

Everything was wonderful at the lovely place, the location, the landlady ( and her adorable dog of course! ) and the warm room. Lia is always helpful and considerate. I would like to visit her again for sure!

Eulalia is a nice person who takes care of her guests, the room is big and full of her art. She is an artist. She makes good breakfast :). I was feeling sick and Eulalia took care of me. She has a beautiful bathroom. And her dog is so awesome she will need your attention :). The neighborhood is quiet 10 min walking to the center. The sofa bed is really comfortable.
The room was clean and tidy. Eulalia was a very good host. I will come back and visit you and your lovely dog next time. Great experience!

Eulalia is a very nice and warm-hearted host, I enjoyed staying with her very much! Having breakfast outside in her beautiful patio on a sunny day was wonderful! I loved Fiona, her cute cocker spaniel! The room was very clean perfect to sleep.  Obrigada Eulalia, hope to come back and stay with you again!

Eulalia is a great host, she treats me like family, I felt very warm when staying with her. And the little dog Fiona! Hahaha she always waits you to fondle her belly. Fiona wants your attention but she is really gentle! Eulalia's place is clean and tidy, the sofa bed is also very comfortable. Several minutes walk from the metro. I like this place!

Eulalia fue una anfitriona muy hospitalaria, preguntado en todo momento si necesitaba algo y explicándome las lugares mas interesantes que visitar y como moverse por la ciudad. Incluso me regalo un paraguas al ver lo mucho que llovía!
Deux jours en paix et au calme, l'accueil de l'hôte est très chaleureux, l'appartement est sublime et très bien situé, j'y retournerais sans hésiter ! ^^

Eulalia is very kind and caring.
If you are visiting Porto and need just a room for the night, it's ok, and for this price her place is great.
It is a bit far walking from the center. 20min and the neighborhood is not really glam, but if you are a backpacker or student you'll be fine.
Eulalia is a very nice lady and her dog is very energetic and lively.

Minha estadia no apto de Eulalia foi perfeita.O apto é  muito bom,limpo e organizado.
O quarto é ótimo assim como a casa de banho.
Localização de fácil acesso ao centro,ônibus e metro a poucos metros.
Eulalia e Fiona,muito obrigada por tudo.Adorei minha estadia.
Yes it was as I expected and close to all amenities. Eulalia was very helpful with directions.
You are my forever friend

Eulalia a été attentionnée et bienveillante. Pour autant il fallait respecter son rythme de vie indépendant. Elle a été de bons conseils pour les visites et a fait l'effort de parler français. Le lit est étroit pour deux. Attention aux futurs visiteurs, nous ne pouvons pas accéder à la cuisine.

Gostei!
A Eulália é muito bacana..e nos aproximamos, até saímos juntas à noite...um ótimo papo! 
Sua cachorra Fiona é linda e carinhosa. 
O quarto é limpo e a casa organizada. 
Não há problemas, seguindo as regras. Foi tudo agradável.  O bairro é tranquilo e há um metrô próximo.  
Muito boa a experiência, recomendo.

Eulalia ist sehr freundlich und nett. Sie ist auch äußerst hilfsbereit und unkompliziert. Alles ist absolut sauber. Auch ihr Hund Fiona ist ein nettes Geschöpf und sehr verspielt. Ich kann jedem der in Porto ein Zimmer über airbnb sucht empfehlen bei Eulalia zu buchen. Es gibt von meiner Seite aus überhaupt keine Kritik, alles war perfekt. Ich hoffe, dass ihr Zimmer wieder frei ist, wenn ich das nächste mal nach Porto fliege.

It was a pleasure staying with Eulalia for the brief time I was there. She was very accommodating and we had a nice chat over tea and biscuits and playing with her adorable dog, Fiona. She even walked me to the train station on the way back!

The room was just as shown, in a really lovely apartment which was very clean and comfortable. I also had the use of my own bathroom.

I'd definitely recommend staying with Eulalia :-)

Eulalia is an amazing, charming and very nice person. She helped me whenever I need anything, I felt very comfortable and welcomed in her home. And her breakfasts, oh my! Really good :-) Everything was great, no problem, her place is very close to center which was great, I highly recommend her apartment, she is a great host!

Eulalia is very special, smart, a great painter and keen of a nice chat! She host people to share experiences and history! She will also prepare you breakfast with delicious home made jams and has the cutest dog ever! Ah, and the room is perfect to have a good night of sleep after a nice shower in the glam bathroom! I miss you and our nice talks!! Hope to see you in Brazil soon! Beijinhos
Great place. Nice and clean. Eulelia was very helpful. Quite neighborhood and easy to get to the center of porto. If you want a cheap comfortable quite room. You should book that one

Eulalia war sehr freundlich und bemüht, dass wir uns bei ihr wohl fühlen. Auch ihr Hund ist sehr freundlich, wenn auch sehr lebhaft und verspielt. :) Eulalia konnte uns gute Tipps für Porto geben und war jederzeit ansprechbar. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und wir hatten das Bad sogar die meiste Zeit für uns. Das Bett ist eher für eine einzelne Person geeignet, als Pärchen und für den Preis aber absolut in Ordnung. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und würden die Unterkunft weiterempfehlen!

eulalia is such a gentle woman! staying with her was great! she helped me out when I got injured and even prepared a little breakfast for us in the morning! it was such a nice stay! thank you very much!

The true airbnb experience. Eulalia is a charming and welcoming host and we had some nice chats. The room is spacious, very clean and has its own bathroom. The apartment is at walking distance from the city center and is a few minutes walking away from a main metro station. She even surprised me with a nice breakfast. Highly recommended!
Eulalia is a very charming person. I had a nice stay at her house; everything was clean ans as described. She helped me whenever I needed anything, everything was great, no problem :)
房間非常舒適,有獨立衛生間,附近環境安靜,步行約10分鐘有地鐵站｡房東熱情招待,給予我所有必需的旅遊資訊和推荐有名的旅遊景點,還給我詳細介紹她的畫作和分享生活經驗,她的寵物也非常熱情可愛｡

I had a really good time at Eulalia's. She was so kind and very helpful, smiling also told about her city very well :) I had a good chat with her even I was staying just short time. Also the neighborhood is very calm and quiet and easy to get to the city too. Her dog,Fiona is so cute and friendly too!
I enjoyed staying at her place so much!

2泊の宿泊でしたが､ﾎｽﾄのLiaはとっても優しくてすごく居心地のいい滞在になりました｡静かで落ち着いた地区でもあり､市内へのｱｸｾｽやﾋﾞｰﾁへ行くにﾊﾞｽが通っていたり､とても便利です｡ｵｽｽﾒです!

Great experience!  Beautiful, clean, and bright apartment in a great location, peaceful but still very close to downtown and tourist attractions.  The room is nice and has its own bathroom. Eulalia is lovely, she has a very adorable dog, and she even prepared me a little breakfast!  Very recomendable!  Muito obrigada Eulalia! :-)
Great host, very lovely room. I felt very welcome and enjoy my stay. I had my own bathroom which was great and bed was comfy. Eulalia is a great host. Highly recommended.

Eulália es una anfitriona excelente. La comunicación previa funcionó estupendamente. La habitación es amplia, el sofa cama muy cómodo y el baño de uso privado. La estancia da a una calle con algo de tránsito, pero con tapones se descansa bien. Eulália tiene dos perros muy juguetones e inofensivos, pero como no acceden a la habitación no fue un problema. La casa está próxima al centro pero en un barrio residencial, por lo que la ubicación resulta muy conveniente para hacer turismo.

Eulalia is a charming and inspiring lady. I enjoyed my stay at her apartment. The room is very lovely and clean just like the picture shows. And I had a private bathroom during my stay. We had some nice chats. She recommended some great Portuguese writers and poets to me, and she even gave me two of her paintings as presents. I really enjoyed talking with her and was deeply moved. Oh, Eulalia, je t'adore. It was a pity that I couldn't celebrate your birthday with you. One day, I'll come back to Porto! Take care and big hug! ❤️

Eulalia a été une hôte très prévenante et de bon conseil, elle connait très bien son quartier et la ville, et a pu nous renseigner sur de bonnes adresses à découvrir. La chambre été confortable et la décoration de bon goût.

Nous avons été très chaleureusement reçu par notre hôte.

The room is as shown in the pictures. Eulalia is pretty strict about the check in and check out times. If you are planning on checking out later or earlier than the time described on her listing -double check to see if its ok, otherwise you are expected to promptly check out at 12.

A Eulália fez-me sentir bem vindo, foi hospitaleira e cuidadosa. O quarto é como no anúncio. Saliento a sua disponibilidade e a hospitalidade que revelou. Foi pena o pouco tempo para conversar, pois é uma boa comunicadora.

The room is cozy and charming. The private bathroom is right next to the bedroom and beautifully decorated. 

I think the way Eulalia describes herself and her space is accurate (the dog is jumpy, so don't go if you don't like dogs, and she really means it when she says to close the doors qu (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) etly). We had a bit of a miscommunication in terms of my arrival time, but I think it was okay in the end. When I asked about breakfast (which she lists), she just said no, which I was disappointed about, but I was a very last-minute guest so maybe she just wasn't ready.  

The location is pretty good and the apartment is light and airy. She seems like a cool, interesting person, and I would have enjoyed chatting with her more if time had allowed.

Staying in Eulalia's Apartment was a very nice experience. Eulalia is great host and look after every detail. She is also very charming and erudite lady so is also a great guide to Portugeese culture.

Fui bem acolhida por Eulalia e sua adorável Fiona em sua casa. O anúncio cumpre exatamente o que promete. O lugar é calmo e agradável, apenas lamentei não ter ficado mais alguns dias, pois acabei indo com amigos para Coimbra e Lisboa.
Não recomendo. Não me senti bem vindo. Comunicação desagradável. Pela primeira vez tive uma má experiência.
The room is extremely nice. Everything was very clean and cosy. The host is friendly and helpfull. If I go to Porto once more I would ask Eulalia to let me stay with her again.

English
Eulalia has been a wonderful host! She has made me feel like I was in my own home, I have felt very comfortable. The space she offers is beautiful, very private and just what I needed for my first few suss in Porto. She has been very helpful as well, giving me tips on what to see and where to go! I truly enjoyed the dinner she cooked for me during the Sao Joao festival! Her dog Fiona is lovely too, a beautiful addition to such a warm house! I would totally recommend Eulalia's house.
Portuguese
Eutalia foi uma excelente anfitriã. Ela me fez sentir como se estivesse na minha  própria casa, minha estadia foi aconchegante e confortável. O espaço que ela oferece é  muito bonito e privativo isso foi tudo que estava precisando para meus primeiros dias no Porto. Ela tem sido muito gentil me dando dicas preciosas e informações sobre os lugares que eu devo visitar e também tive o prazer de  apreciar  o jantar deliciosa que ela cozinhou para mim em comemoração ao Festival de São João. E também não posso deixar de mencionar Fiona sua amigável cachorrinha para completar todo o aconchego.  Eu recomendo totalmente a casa da Eutalia.
She is warm and inviting. I like the place because it makes me feel I'm a guest or a visitor to someone's home. The neighborhood is safe and clean. I had a great time in Porto.
La descripción del anuncio coincide totalmente con el alojamiento. La habitación es muy bonita, limpia y confortable. Eulalia es una excelente anfitriona; mujer culta, elegante y hospitalaria.
Très bon accueil et appartement très joli !
Eulalia is super friendly and a very good person :)
Eulalia is a great person, the hause is near the principal station. I feel like home

Dear Eulalia! Catch a thousands compliments from me! You are an amazing person (you are smart, easy-going, having a good sense of humour and a great taste) and a perfect host! I could not asking more - staying with you at your place forced me to feel like at home. Keep enjoying your life and stay as you are! And thank you for your dinner and a special gift! P.S. for those who are planning to stay with Eulalia, please have no doubt! The place is very clean, well furnished and is in perfect, convienient location. Eulalia's place is just the Airbnb experince to be! And Fiona is the most adorable dog I've met!

Excelente anfitriona, muy amable y educada, la casa entera muy de acuerdo con la personalidad artística de Eulalia, muy comoda la habitación y el sofá cama inigualable, muy recomendado venir a hospedarse aquí

Unfortunately I didn't knew Eulalia because she was not there. Some friend from her received me and did the welcome there. He recommend me a lot of places and things to do there. Very nice person.
The room is like in the pictures very confortable and clean. The only Problem that it has, the room is in  front of the street and It was very noisy. If you can't sleep well, maybe would be a very big problem.  I couldn't sleep very good my last night to noisy for me.
Everything that offers is there and I enjoy very much the few days in Porto.
Very clean and comfortable. Walking distance to metro station and the main train station.
Keurig en smaakvol appartement. Eulalia is hartelijk, en de hond is gewoon ontzettend lief en blij de hele tijd. Privacy en badkamer met toilet is zeer goed geregeld.
Excelente! Eulalia es muy atenta y amable, te hace sentir en casa, el piso está en excelentes condiciones,  100% recomendable!

The place is really central and nice. Eulalia was amazing with communication, directions, and flexible with the times of arrival and check out. The room was really bright, clean and gorgeous. I highly recommend her! It would be a pleasure to welcome her again!
Séjour parfait à Porto! Eulalia est accueillante et très sympathique, appartement très propre, je recommande !

The room was cozy and clean. Eulalia has a great taste, she put lots of beautiful decorations in the house. The house is great located, convenient to go everywhere, walk in 30 minutes. Eulalia was really friendly, and she owns a very lovely dog.

Very clean room/apartment, with a modern private bathroom.
Eulalia was an excellent surprise and a very good host with nive conversation and making you feel at home.
And Fiona (the dog) is so cute!
A good place to stay in Porto, 10 mins walking distance to metro station, and good value for the money.
Ill be back!

Eulalia es una persona muy amable y generosa. La habitación esta muy bien, yo me aloje por cuestión de trabajo y caminando hacia el centro eran unos 25 minutos. La zona es tranquila en un barrio no turistico, el piso esta muy limpio y bien decorado. Lo único si eres muy sensible al ruido mejor llevarte unos tapones a pesar de eso estoy muy contenta de mi estancia en casa de Eulalia y repetiría sin duda y recomiendo este alojamiento a gente que le guste las experiencias autenticas y que no se asusten en caminar un poquito.

A Eulália é uma pessoa encantadora. Muito educada, simpática, inteligente e adora ajudar. Me deu dicas de lugares para ir e como chegar. Seu apartamento é limpo, bonito e muito bem localizado. Fiz meus passeios todos a pé. Foi uma estadia maravilhosa! Além de conhecer uma cidade linda, conheci tbm uma pessoa fantástica!! Foi mais que uma anfitriã, foi uma amiga! ❤
Eulalia is a very attentive person, it is a cozy house, the bed is comfortable, I hope to visit her again in the future
I enjoyed very much staying at Eulalia's, she is very caring and helpful, her place is cozy, clean, artish and I slept so well there! Also I adore her lovely cheerful dog, Fiona !

Eulália is a very good host and one can tell by the tips on Porto she shares, that she loves the city and knows it well. She makes you feel welcome in her home at all times. Her dog Fiona is playful and adorable. What you see on the site in regards to the room you stay in, is what is waiting for you.  Will willingly stay with Eulália if passing through Porto.
숙소위치정말별루예염!메인에서넘멀리떨어져닛구호스트는넘예민해서지내는데넘불편했어요.다신가구싶지않아용.
Eulalia's place was everything I needed, it was clean and comfortable. Eulalia was very friendly and welcoming and I had a wonderful time staying at her place. Highly recommended!
Casa acolhedora e muito bem localizada, perto do centro e dos transportes públicos. A Eulalia foi sempre prestável e uma óptima anfitriã!
I highly recommend to stay with Eurasia, place is very clean and unusual. Eurasia is great host and very interesting person.

One of the best Airbnb experience! I highly recommend to anyone who plans to stay at Porto for travel. The room looks exactly like the pictures, warm and well decorated. The room and bathroom is super clean. Eulalia is warm and kind, making you feel at home. Her dog Fiona is energetic and loves massages! If only I could stay longer!!
I was fantastic! Very comfortable and very clean! :) Thanks a lot Eulalia for the nice stay in your houes :)

Eulalia, ha sido la persona más amable que he tratado en Airbnb, si van a Oporto no duden quedarse con ella. 
Además es una excelente persona.
Eulalia is a sweet and friendly host. She gave me lots of suggestion on places to visit. Her place was tidy, lovely bathroom and the location was great. I really enjoyed my stay. Thanks, Eulalia!

Had a great stay at Eulalia's place! It is about a 30 min walk to the Lello Library and about 45 minutes to Riberia and the metro is about 10 min away! I didn't mind walking but at night it was tiring after a full day of sightseeing. I loved the bright room and beautiful art of Eulalia. I didn't get to talk too much with her but I appreciated her warm welcome and lovely dog Fiona :)

Der Aufenthalt bei Eulalia war sehr angenehm und unkompliziert. Sie war freundlich und hat mir bei Fragen gerne weitergeholfen.
Die Wohnung ist sauber und freundlich eingerichtet. Der einzige Minuspunkt: das Zimmer liegt zur Strassenseite und es ist daher zeitweise etwas laut. 
Insgesamt auf alle Fälle weiterzuempfehlen!
Хороший вариант для жилья в Порту. Всё понравилось.

This was excellent!  Eulalia was sweet, kind, and very considerate.  The apartment was lovely -- very clean, stylishly appointed.  The shower and WC especially -- contemporary and elegant!  Also, Eulalia gave me advice on visiting Porto that was very helpful.

The neighborhood was pleasant, largely residential.  It is a 5 to 10 minute walk to connect with public transit.

O quarto é confortável e relativamente próximo do centro da cidade. A Eulalia foi sempre muito atenciosa e respeitadora, e tem dois cães amorosos. Por vezes o barulho da rua é incómodo mas ainda assim, depois de um dia de passeios, este espaço mostrou-se ideal para descansar.
Nice place to stay when you are traveling Porto. Walkable to city downtown, pretty big sized room, most of all friendly and warmhearted host
Una persona encantadora!! Y una estancia agradable

I would recommend that all guests communicate with Eulalia before arriving - to ensure both on the same page re timing.  We both had communications challenges and so we did not start off on the right foot.  For me Eulalia has a lovely spot and I think it is a good place for those who are looking only for a place to sleep and plan on being gone for the whole day.  I love walking - and its a 30 min walk to the centre and am sure that with public transit would be much closer.
A Eulália é uma pessoa muito simpática e prestativa. Seu espaço é muito aconchegante e organizado.

Eulalia m'a très bien accueilli. Elle a su me mettre à l aise rapidement et la communication en français était un vrai plus. Son petit chien est adorable et demande que des caresses. La chambre est parfaite pr un voyageur. Il y a de l espace et un balcon. Une supermarché est à 3 min a pied. L arret de métro Marques est à 10 min a pied. Je recommande vivement Eulalia qui est une personne chaleureuse!  Merci Eulalia !

Eulalia she is friendly and cool person also she take care of her guest. Any question just ask Eulalia she will give you good suggestions. She also a environmentally conscious people, so when you live in her place please cooperate with her and be respectful her house rules. : ) 
When I need help she took me there where I need to print out my air ticket, even just close to her place she still care. Also she gave me some disposable perfume that was really sweet, cause she knows I'm traveling can't carry to much liquid. I love it !!!!  
About her place to center just 20 mins by walk will arrive in center. 10 mins walk will arrive metro it's very convenient.  
About her place it's really comfy, relax and stylish. everything you need she already offer. You just need to come be relax and visit the city!!! 

Eulalia 是一位很酷又友善的人｡她很照顧她的客人,有何問題都可以問她,他都會告訴你最好的建議和方式｡同時她也是一位非常注重環保的人唷,所以住進她家的朋友們請一定要尊重及遵守她的房子規則並做好環保唷!
當我有需要印我的機票,她還親自帶我去影印店即使離他們家才不到10分鐘的路程,她都認為有責任帶我去!
另外,她知道我在旅行不能帶太多有一體的東西,所以她還主動給了我一些一次性的香水,真的是超棒的啦,我超愛的!
關於Eulalia的加到市中心(老城區)走路只需要20分鐘即可到達,走路10分鐘
即可到達家附近的地鐵站,很方便的地區｡
最後Eulalia的家,非常的舒服也讓人放鬆也很有風格,所以當你入住時你只需要放鬆並且快樂的去老城區逛逛!
Eulalia is very nice, place well located, very clean and Fiona adorable!
I stayed during 2 days at Eulalia's place with my boyfriend. It was really nice. The flat is clean. Eulalia is an adorable person. We plently recommend her place to stay.

Foi uma agradável surpresa . A sala é aconchegante e cheia de cultura e arte , toda a casa tem uma decoração muito especial .Eulalia é uma pessoa maravilhosa , linda e uma grande artista ! foi muito atenciosa , deu me bastantes conselhos, fui muito bem recebida . A sua cadelinha Fiona é um amor , adora festinhas na barriga . Foi muito fácil chegar a vários pontos da cidade , não precisa transportes !
Very nice room, located close to public transports. Eulalia is a very nice person, happy to share details on the city and surroundings. We recommend!!

Imagine to stay in a cozy room among beautiful books. Add a quiet apartment in a residential area with a charmant, kind woman as Eulalia is and a lively dog as Fiona.
Here you are Eulalia's apartment. Highly recommended.
Such beautiful and sweet host! Love the staying and the time with her and her dog!

Прекрасная комната с книгами, балконом и красивой мебелью, очень чисто и уютно. Находится в 8 минутах ходьбы от станции метро, в 20 минутах ходьбы от автобусного вокзала и в 35 минутах ходьбы от центра города. Эулалия необыкновенно мила и гостепреимна, помогала мне разобраться с картой и подробно отвечала на все вопросы. Спасибо, я искренне рада, что остановилась у Вас!

La habitación es muy amplia y está cerca del centro, a unos 10 minutos andando. Es una zona tranquila. El sofá cama es cómodo y amplio. También está todo muy limpio y el baño es espacioso. 

Eulalia ha sido muy simpática y atenta a que estuviese cómoda. Fiona es muy agradable y muy cariñosa.

Это прекрасная квартира! чистая, тихая и декорирована с большим вкусом. Очень  подробное описание как добраться, поэтому вы не заблудитесь:) Порту небольшой город, главные достопримечательности в пешей доступности. Eulalia очень душевная и дружелюбная, прекрасный хозяин. Вы будете чувствовать себя как дома, вдали от дома! Я была рада находиться  у Eulalia

Eulalia is an incredible host! Super super super friendly and welcoming. She replied to all my messages straight away, showed me how to get to different places, how to navigate public transport, and what to check out in the city. We had some nice conversations and I tried some amazing wine from Porto. Her dog Fiona is also amazing and friendly. The flat is a short walk or bus ride away from the centre, very nice and spacious, and located in a very relaxed neighbourhood. Would absolutely definitely recommend staying with her!

This surely is one of my unforgettable and favourite trips ever!!!! Eulalia’s place is cozy and tidy. The room you will stay is very artistic, I hope you will like the place as I do. Besides, Fiona (Eulalia’s dog) is really lovely and adorable. Meanwhile, actually this is a trip planned to celebrate my bday, and Eulalia is so nice that prepared a birthday cake for me. I really feel loved and blessed, thank you Eulalia. All these experiences make a memorable trip for me!!!

The flat is tastefully decorated and extremely beautiful in a residential area that is safe to walk at especially for a solo female traveller like myself. Amazing hospitality and kindness showed by the beautiful host, Eulalia who made the trip all the more amazing. And her sweet little Fiona who was such a joy to be around with. One of the best airbnb experiences I've had and I hope to stay at her place again the next time I visit Porto!
Eulalia is very welcoming and helpful on providing information of local attractions. :) Also she has a lovely dog that will warm your heart (if you like dogs of course).
Appartement bien situé dans un quartier calme, très propre. Eulalia est vraiment une personne adorable qui sait mettre à l'aise les gens. Rien à redire. Que du positif

I had a great stay at Eulalia's place. She stook extra care that I was warm at night, preparing a hot water bottle for me every night. The place is very modern and stylish and the amenities are exactly as described. I had a lovely stay and I highly recommend this place
Very nice clean welcome place. Eulalia is a kind and friendly person  who takes a lot of effort to make you feel at home. Thank you Eulalia.

Eulalia’s space was perfect for our New Years Weekend in Porto. The space was good for 2 people and everything was provided and accurate. Eulalia was very welcoming and a wonderful host! We loved getting to experience Porto from her home.

Eulalia is super nice and caring. She knew that I got a cold so she left me a hot-water bag under my blanket which is totally a sweet surprise for me when I went to bed. The apartment is great and stylish, plus Fiona is lovely and very welcoming:) I had a very comfortable stay there. Thanks Eulalia!
Decoração clean e bonita num espaço amplo e confortável. Excelente localização. Eulália é gentil e prestativa e sua amorosa cachorrinha Fiona tornou minha estada mais prazerosa.
Estancia inmejorable. Eulalia ha sido muy atenta y hospitalaria. 100% recomendable
Excelente espaço. Anfitriã atenciosa e acolhedora. Valter Hugo Mãe estava na estante. Para quem conhece o autor, um indício de que se está em um lugar onde a empatia prevalece.
An Absolute CUNT
Good position of the apartment... but what i realy didn't like is Eilalia's behaviour. i suggest to her to be more kind than that

Eulalia fait en sorte de bien vous accueillir. Son appartement est très propre et beau. Elle met à votre disposition des petites intentions. L'appartement est bien placé il faut juste faire attention lorsque c'est la première fois que l'on va au Portugal car les appartements ne sont pas nominatifs sur les boîtes aux lettres et si vous êtes tête en l'air comme moi vous serez surpris et aurez peut être un petit peu de mal à trouver. Porto est une très belle ville tout aussi belle que Lisbonne (malgré le mauvais temps). Bonne continuation Eulalia
Eulalia is very nice!! The house also is conveniente for turists!
Hello Eulalia I'm in Barcelona now,thanks for everything, I had a great time with you and the dogs=)

This place was my the first spot on my trip in Portugal and I'm really happy with my choice. Eulalia is a great host, she checked me in even though my flight turned out to be very late. The room is nice and cozy. On top of that I had a chance to meet the cute dog that lives there too. All in all it's a very good place to stay in Porto.

Eulália é muito simpática e atenciosa. A cama é confortável e o banheiro de uso exclusivo é  bem  próximo do quarto. Dá tranquilamente para ir a pé aos principais pontos turísticos. Enfim, recomendo a casa da Eulalia para quem quiser conhecer a maravilhosa cidade de Porto.
Very clean, great value, adorable dog :) Eulalia was a great host, and even made me dinner one night!

Eulalia 정말 친절했어요. 나쁜 후기 남기신 분도 있던데 저한텐 정말 친절하셨고, 아침에 일어나서 나갈 때랑 자러 갈때 대화도 친근하게 잘 나눴어요! 일단 영어를 좀 하는 분이니까 편안하게 숙소 이용하실 수 있을거예요. 숙소가 센터에서 걸어서 15-20분 정도 떨어져있긴 한데 센터보다 조용하니까 좋았구요, 방이랑 화장실이 참 예뻤어요. 소품들 배치가 인상적이었고, 침대도 푹신하고 좋았습니다. 추천해요!!

I had a great stay with Eulalia. The apartment is conveniently located and kept very clean. It was also decorated in a very stylish way. Eulalia is very friendly and gave me a very detailed introduction of the area and recommended places to visit.
Eulalia has two dogs so you would need to consider that if you are afraid of or allergic to dogs. Otherwise, I would recommend staying with Eulalia.

Eulalia ist ein großartiger Host. Sie war super flexibel beim Check-in, den ich aufgrund von Flugverspätungen nach hinten schieben musste.
Sie ist sehr bemüht, dass es einem an nichts fehlt und macht einem den Aufenthalt dadurch umso schöner. Kann ich nur empfehlen.
Amazing place for experiencing Porto with lovely dogs. And conmmunication was perfect.

Eulalia es una anfitriona encantadora, tiene una casa preciosa y es muy detallista. La habitación es luminosa y acogedora. Todo está muy limpio. Fácil acceso al centro de la ciudad. Está siempre pendiente de lo que puedas necesitar y la estancia en su casa ha sido excelente. Gracias!!
Really nice host and accommodation
Very clean room and bathroom. Well located, just a small walk to the city center.

Eulalia's house is well located, close to restaurants and coffee shops. The bedroom is comfortable, tidy, clean and also full of great books! She is thoughtfull and kidy woman and I really recommend staying in her house if you are coming to Porto. I'll do the same next time.
Eulalia is a very kind woman. I immediately felt like home. Her dogs are sweet as well. Large room and quiet area

La camera e molto grande a accogliente. La posizione e davvero buona. 15 minuti a piedi e siete nel cuore di oporto ed e vicino a supermarket e bars.
Eulalia e stata molto disponibile e si preoccupava ogni sera che andasse tutto bene, sia nelle grandi cosi che nei dettagli. Ho trovato pioggia e non ero attrezzata e da buona host mi ha prestato l ombrello salvando cosi la mia giornata. Obrigada Eulalia

Estive apenas por 2 noites no Porto e o que posso referir e que atendeu as expectativas. Pontos positivos: a casa e exatamente como nas fotos, um ambiente de cultura, aconchegante e excelente para descansar, alem da proximidade de pontos importantes. Outro fator que destaco e faz muita diferença em comparação com outras hospedagens que ja estive é a disponibilidade e rapidez que a Eulalia responde (muito rapida e atenta as mensagens, isso faz muita diferença). ASPECTOS DE ATENÇÃO: aqui nao e nenhum problema em si, na verdade informações ja podem estar no anuncio mas e importante reforçar: vc nao terá acesso a cozinha e nao pode comer no quarto, a proprietaria pode acessar seu quarto durante a hospedagem porque ela mantém itens pessoais nos armários e estantes, você deverar programar corretamente um intervalo de no máximo 2 horas para fazer o check-in, o banheiro é compartilhado com a proprietária para banho e não possui tranca, o sabonete oferecido para banho pode ser em pedra e ja utilizado pelo hospede anterior. (Esses pontos no meu caso nao foram negativos, a Eulalia foi muito transparente quanto a eles, no entanto chamo atencao pq sei que  para determinadas pessoas sao pontos mais sensiveis) por fim, super recomendo.
중심지에서 조금 떨어져있어서 주로 지하철로 다니긴 했지만 숙소는 너무 깨끗하고 좋았어요! 인테리어가 고풍스럽고 예뻤습니다 강아지도 너무 귀여워용 호스트분도 혹시 불편한점은 없는지 매일 잘 챙겨주셨어요~

Eulalia es una anfitriona increíble: educada y atenta, pero en la medida justa para respetar, la independencia del huésped.
Su casa está muy limpia y cuidada,  la zona es tranquila y nada ruidosa.
Se llega al centro caminando en unos 15 minutos, algo más si vas a zonas más alejadas de la Ribeira. De todas formas el camino es cuesta abajo y para volver, en caso de estar cansado, hay líneas de bus que dejan a 200m de la casa. Creo que es una buena opción, ya que está cerca de la zona turística sin meterse en el bullicio, ideal para descansar tras las excursiones por la ciudad.
Para mí la experiencia ha sido perfecta, tanto por la anfitriona como por el alojamiento.
Repetiría sin duda alguna.

Eulalia is very positive, hospitable and flexible person. My room was comfortable, very clean and exactly like in the pictures.  The apartment is located around 10-15 minutes walking distance from the metro, there is also good bus communication.  Thank you once again Eulalia :)

Eulalia est une hôte bienveillante et chaleureuse. Fiona, la chienne vous réserve un accueil des plus festifs ! Enfin, la chambre et la salle de bain mis à disposition sont mignons et très propres.
 Vous logerez ainsi à proximité du centre ville, dans un quartier calme et non loin du métro et des bus. 

Merci encore Eulalia !
Thank you so much for sharing your space with me. This is a wonderful and neat place. Eulalia is very hospitable and has her principles, and her dogs are cute. I will recommend it!

Eulalia une femme très genereuse et acceuillante. J'ai eu des discussions très agreables et très interessantes. Mon voyage à porto a coincidé avec une forte hausse de température, mais Eulalia etait tout le temps disponible pour offrir le meilleur de ce qu'elle peut et m'aider à retrouver de la fraicheur dans son chic appartement. Elle etait vraiment tres attentive et au petit soin..j'ai beaucoup apprécié losqu'en sortant, qu'elle m'a proposé de m'offrir la crème solaire car il y avait un temps très ensoleillé ..ainsi que tous les conseils qu'elle me donnait pour garder ma chambre fraiche. douche et toilettes très propres, un lit confortable et un acceuil chaleureux dès le premier (Website hidden by Airbnb) ne demandais pas plus pour me sentir chez moi..et donc je me suis senti vraiment comme si j'etais chez moi. Je remercie infiniment Eulalia pour chaque geste de bienveillance et sa bonne humeur, et je recommande vivement son appartement pour ceux qui cherche à passer un sejour inoubliable à la magique ville porto :)
Personne accueillante et de bons conseils. Je recommande !

Mon séjour à Porto était super, Eulalia très accueillante m’a  montré des endroits à visiter, toujours disponible.
Une personne très intéressante,j’ai aimé nos discussions et mon séjour chez elle.
Et ses chiens, Fiona une petite merveille qui demande toujours des câlins. 
Je recommande vivement.

A szoba nagyon kellemes, szép, tágas és a könyvek miatt nagyon jó hangulatú.  A konyhát nem lehet használni, de a környéken és a belvárosban sok olcsó helyet találunk, ahol a reggeli kávénkat megihatjuk, vagy ebédelhetünk. A fürdőszoba tiszta és gyönyörű,  látszik rajta Eulalia elegáns stílusának nyoma. Reggelente kicsit hangos az utca az autóktól, de amúgy nyugodt, csendes környék. Eulália nagyon kedves, kifinomult ízlésű, művelt hölgy, aki mindig szívesen beszélgetett velem, és nagyon jó tanácsokat adott a város látnivalóit illetően. A kutyái is nagyon aranyosak, barátságosak. Eulália lakásában otthon éreztem magam.
Eulalia est une hote attentionnee, chaleureuse et acceuillante. L'appartement est a proximite des transports. J'ai effectue toutes mes visites a pieds. Et Porto est vraiment a faire...

I would not recommend this place is anyone. My experience there was not a good one. This woman was very hostile and rude before I even got there. She had a poor attitude and almost ruined my time in Porto. I dreaded coming to her place in the evening for fear of be accosted by her mean and rude behaviour!:(:( and to top it all off she accused me of stealing a carpet. Which is just an absolutely ridiculous accusation. I feel like she might actually being loosing her mind in her old age. I’m very sorry this review has to be so negative my dear but you brought it on yourself with your poor attitude and mean behaviour. I’m sure the review you left about me is very nasty and full of falsehoods just like you. That being said I wish you good fortune in the future and I’ve already forgiven you and forgotten you. Goodbye!!!!!
Best airbnb experience ever! Felt like staying with family.
It’s very nice and clear room. Separate and good bathroom. Thank for hospitality) I recommend
This was a good choice to stay at Eulalias place. I felt in the apartment like at home and could really enjoy Porto! Thank you!
Eulalia is very nice and the bed and room are very comfortable

It was such a pleasant experience to stay here. The room was so nicely decorated and classy and the bathroom quite elegant! Eulalia was so friendly and helpful with everything I needed. Also her two dogs were adorable!  Good location, near to the centre and to the main train station

Eulalia is very nice and hospitable person and her home is just like her - warm, cozy and full of art. I really loved staying there  - the bed and room were nice, bathroom stylish and clean, location is good for people who like to explore cities and Fiona, Eulalia's dog, is the cutest little thing! Very thankful for hosting me and recommend this place to future travelers.

I feel like I made the best decision stay at Eulalia’s place! Eulalia and Fiona within a few days became a family to me. I will always remember this time, I felt so comfortable like at home. Everything was perfect! I recommend this place for everybody who is looking for a great company, beautiful place to stay where you will feel happy and safe! Thank you, Eulalia!

name: The Green Room Mong Kok
summary: 這間房間顏色為綠色及白色為主,獨立的房間獨立的洗手間,我們提供一般設備例如乾淨的毛巾被鋪,洗頭水護髮素及沖涼液,風筒等｡房源位於旺角太子地帶,5分鐘到達太子地鐵站｡
description: 這間房間顏色為綠色及白色為主,獨立的房間獨立的洗手間,我們提供一般設備例如乾淨的毛巾被鋪,洗頭水護髮素及沖涼液,風筒等｡房源位於旺角太子地帶,5分鐘到達太子地鐵站｡

reviews.comments: Super great host! Fast responds to any questions I had. 15 min walk to Mong Kok. Clean stylish room. Great experience, highly recommended!
房东人超好的,还特地送来衣架给我们,知道我们去看电影,还会给我们推荐片子,房间也很温馨｡
It was clean and near to mongkok(which i love the most). Highly Recommend!
Amazing place, very accessible, and a very responsive host. A definite book again in the future.
房間舒適,很適合年輕人自由行居住｡
地理位置确实很赞 但是窗户打不开 通风不太好 需要开空调 总体来讲住这里是很不错的选择!毕竟位置真的好.出行非常方便

생각보다 방이 작아서 캐리어 하나 피기도 좀 힘들었어요. 그리고 친구랑 둘이 갔는데 욕실 문이 완전 투명이라서 좀 민망했습니다. 또 욕실문이 위에만 고정장치가 있거 밑에는 없어서 덜컹거려요... 그래도 샤워시설 하나 보고 선택했는데 그건 괜찮았어여 하지만 겨울의 홍콩을 나기엔 너무 추운 숙소입니다.ㅜㅜ 히터가 없어서 숙소에 이불 밖에 있으면 손이 시려워요. 그래서 저희는 핫팩 깔고 잤어요.
很好很满意
步行到地铁站3分钟很方便,楼下各种店铺,干净卫生,布置很用心,指示很清晰,入住体验不错~唯一不足是窗户试了很久都不能打开,如果热水能用得久点就更好了!
很棒的地段,紧邻太子站,附近商场和餐厅也很多,生活极其便利｡入住体验还可以,房东给了很详细的讲解｡房间干净整洁时尚,独立卫浴非常方便｡会跟朋友推荐｡
Location is good however the WiFi is not strong. Mostly can’t be connected. The shower room is transparent glass door. So is not convenient if you come with friends or family member.
A+ for the price! Great value
房间的地理位置很方便,出门就有奶茶店､冰室､饼家和万宁､SASA,不远处就是地铁站,房间里也很干净,就是一直从外面会传来发动机还是什么的嗡嗡振动的声音,我比较浅眠会在意一些声音,其他的就还好~
位置好
地理位置很好,临近太子站,直接出来在通菜南街走大概3~5分钟就可以到｡ 楼下是一家烧腊店｡ 找钥匙的时候像破案｡ 不过房东的指引很具体｡ 整体还是比较方便｡ 房间内有冰箱跟空调｡ 房东也有准备沐浴露洗发水,护发素跟两瓶水跟小零食｡ 中午12:00退房有阿姨会直接过来打扫卫生｡ 下次还是会继续定的｡ 不错｡
地理位置很好!主要地铁站超级近呀!!出入很方便!房间干净!!很适合情侣或闺蜜哈哈!

During our 4 days' stay in the green room, everthing was perfect ! The appartement is very well located, easy to be found. Plus the district of Mong Kok is very animated, with a lot of good restaurants around the corner. Plus, the nearest metro is just 500 meters away, 2 min on foot. We enjoyed ourselves very much in Hong-Kong and liked this room a lot !
房子的地理位置真的很优秀了 超级方便 巴士和地铁都不需要走太多路 路边小吃也超级多 晚上夜宵美滋滋~唯一有点忧伤的就是没有电梯 行李要人工抬个两层楼 总体来说是很满意了!
适合两个人一起入住,会很温馨
很干净地理位置也很好
房间容易找,比想象中要大,牙刷牙膏拖鞋需要自己带,环境很不错
地理位置優越,就在地鐵站附近,需要自備毛巾拖鞋牙刷牙膏,也沒有熱水壺,但是衛生環境很不錯
民宿地理位置优越,离地铁站也只有5分钟路程｡房间内整洁干净｡负责管理民宿的阿姨亲切热情｡不过房间与图片上的有所差别,房东回复信息的速度慢,行程前一日并且需要催促才能够拿到确切的民宿信息｡整体还是可以的｡
交通很方便,离地铁站很近
位置好!环境好!价格好!清洁阿姨好!邻居好!啥都好!
房子很好离地铁站也很近房东人也很好喜欢的就别犹豫啦
房间内准备了洗浴用品和吹风机｡房间比想象中的好很多,毕竟寸土寸金,底层直不起腰,很多地方容易磕碰,上下床不是很方便｡但是上下结构空间很大｡房间整体很干净｡
真的好舒服 装修环境格调很喜欢 住的超级开心
就那样吧,就是垃圾没人清理
It is very beautiful and comfortable.
地理位置方便
房间比较小 可利用空间还是很大的 一定要带毛巾和拖鞋!
非常有风格有特色的房间,房东布置得很棒,可以感觉到室内用品都是认真挑选过的｡最重要的是平时易过敏的我都觉得床够干净舒服｡需要自备牙刷牙膏和拖鞋｡
房间很温馨,很适合情侣和闺蜜出游｡性价比很高,值得入住｡
这次住宿很开心很满意~房间和图片相符,干净舒适安全｡关于屋内的设备使用有详细的教程,非常贴心｡
位置很好,走路不远就是朗豪坊 top等商场,距离地铁站也很近,房间偏小,要做好心理准备~ 绿色的不如黄色的住得舒服｡
Well thought of small appartment. Good communication with the owner. Recommended!
交通便利!附近就有很棒的店铺!离地铁站很近,很好找!!!
Good room
Nice and clean room

Nous avons séjourné une semaine dans la chambre. L'emplacement est vraiment parfait avec toutes les commodités à côté et proche des marchés réputés de HK.
Même si nous savions que l'endroit serait petit il a été difficile de séjourner à deux dans un si petit espace. Nous trouvions le lit très dur et nous avons eu la surprise de découvrir au bout de 6 jours que le matelas avait était mis à l'envers . Autre chose surprenante la porte de la salle de bain et des toilettes est transparente... Dur d'avoir un peu d'intimité. Pour résumer un super emplacement mais vraiment petit pour 2.

host.host_about: Merhaba ben hasan uğur güneş . 25 yaşındayım . Saç ekimi uzmanıyım. Levent 'de oturuyorum

name: 標準1-3人房,2张床,有窗,独立卫浴 地鐵站上蓋,交通四通八達
summary: 有窗,24小時熱水,吹风机,冷气,WiFi,電視,转換插头,拖鞋,毛巾,一次性牙膏牙刷｡
space: ~建盈旅舍~位於香港九龍彌敦道525-543號寶寧大廈B座707 室/ 820室,本賓館是香港政府認可的持牌賓館,交通極為方便地鐵上蓋,面臨彌敦道四通八達巴士路線,油麻地地鐵站A1或B1出口,距離香港國際機場,迪士尼樂園,海洋公園,太平山頂,金紫荊廣場,香港科學館愽物館,星光大道,海港城等等都是15-50分鐘左右到各景點,步行3-8分鐘到旺角朗豪坊商場有各大品牌及化妝品名店,西洋菜南街-珠寶電器街,通菜街-女人街,花園街-波鞋街,附近餐飲店多選擇,有富臨酒樓,稻香酒樓,好彩酒樓,翠華茶餐廳,日,韓,西,港式茶餐廳等等應有盡有,是个人游,家庭游,情侶游,親子游,穷游必到目的地,賓館設有2人大床房,2人双床房,3人床房,家庭雙床3人房,房間環境干淨,独立卫浴,WiFi上網,24小時熱水供應,電視,冷氣,吹風機,轉換插頭,毛巾,洗漱用品設備一應俱全｡

host.host_about: kannischan

reviews.comments: 地理位置好｡交通方便,背后的街道上小吃真多,走5分钟到庙街小吃｡机场大巴坐A21直接到楼下｡房间狭窄了点,但九龙这里就是这样,有心理准备｡性价比极高,推荐｡
交通方便,房東熱情｡房間較小,廁所小到不想洗澡｡

市中心,很方便!房间小了点(香港都这样)但是性价比还是蛮高｡
老板人超nice,第一晚大晚上过了十二点传来别的房间的吵闹声,但是第二天老板主动问起并与其他房客商谈｡
问老板出行交通方式什么的也超nice回答｡
总之,算挺满意的｡

首先,要给房东先生点赞,真的超级好､很热情､很和蔼｡多次麻烦到他都没有不耐烦,有问题询问回复也很及时｡然后说说地址,在油麻地地铁站附近,特别方便,2分钟到地铁站或者到回深圳乘车的地方｡距离旺角朗豪坊步行只有几分钟样子｡出大厦的那条街也有很多sasa,珠宝店｡其次说说房间,有点小不过在香港能理解｡因为我是去考试的所以住两天,又是周五周六,大厦临街有点吵｡最开始选的是有窗靠街的那间房,后来换成里面的没窗的要好点｡第一天可能不习惯觉得很吵加上认床不怎么睡得着,第二天很快就入睡了｡最后说说吃食,在住房背后的上海街和砵兰街有很多相对平价好吃的小店可以选择｡总的来说,这次体验很不错,下次会选择这里也会推荐身边朋友!
房間很迷你,剛剛好能夠放下兩張床,但是能夠應付所需｡洗漱用品吹風機wifi一應俱全,房間乾淨沒有異味!地段超級好,附近餐飲,超市,交通非常方便!房東和大樓的看更阿伯都非常親切,很好說話,不過大樓有點年頭了,電梯上落停頓有點嚇人｡check in的時候房東不在也沒有提前告知方法,好在一個電話就馬上解決問題,不用check out,非常方便
住的地方超级方便!附近好吃的也好多｡房东人也很好!特别满意的一次旅行,同伴说一下来香港还要住这里
Great location, nice and clean. Fairly small but good otherwise.
离车站真的很近,性价比很高｡房间也整洁｡安全设施也不错｡就是电梯比较小,但还是很ok的｡房东态度超级好
地點超棒的,很符合我們的要求,下次還會再來｡
离朗豪坊很近,我们是去打针的,住这里很方便,但总体空间很小,尤其是卫生间｡不过可以理解｡
房源是帮朋友订的,据反映房间有股味,房间很小,不过在香港家庭式的旅舍都这样的,性价比高､交通便捷,特别是房东Kannis的反应很快而且提供的位置很准确朋友很快就找到房源了,谢谢Kannis!
地点很方便靠近地铁一分钟不到又有到广州的大巴｡很亲民楼下就有大众化的饮食很符合口味｡

地方真的非常好找,油麻地地铁站出来就是了,交通很方便｡房间是小的,不过很整洁,在香港能住到这样的房间也不错了｡房东人很好很客气,推荐大家入住｡
ps.如果住的是靠窗的房间,睡眠浅的人最好带一副耳塞,半夜外面会有飙车一类的声音的｡
房间确实很小,但干净整洁,房子的位子就在油麻地地铁口弥敦道上,出游购物都相当方便｡房东很热情,人非常好!下次来还想住这里｡
适合穷游的朋友｡房间内干净整洁,没有异味｡很舒适
房东人好,所在的大厦也挺好的,保安人很好｡
房间挺干净的,重点是位置挺好的,附近东西不少,出门几十米就地铁站了
環境乾淨,地點熱鬧,謝謝款待!
地理位置很好,出行很方便,离地铁站很近
老板超好的,虽然没有看到本尊但是一打电话马上就响应了~房间内该有的都有,交通真的是便利方便,就在地铁站旁边,真是想去哪里浪就去哪里浪呀~关键是价格美丽｡性价比太高了!下次还来你们家,希望越来越好,祝福!
賓館位置很好,交通方便,裡面一應俱全｡我們當天提早到了提前入住的｡最多只能三個人吧｡隔音的話我們都不介意｡反正到哪都睡得著｡總體好評!
下次去香港还会选择住这里.交通方便,接待我们的老板,也很有善.
安靜,交通方便喔
房间小是真的小  但是地理位置真的很方便 下面就是地铁站 旁边走一点就是旺角了 逛街不要方便   房东回应都很快  入住特别方便  整体还可以
性价比很高
这是一次很棒的旅行,中途有些小插曲,因为隔壁通厕所导致我们房间的厕所也弄脏了,我们以为有人进来过,跟房东反应的时候,他帮我们解答,看监控,确定没有人进出,还帮我们换了一个密码以防万一,深夜回复也很快｡
如果从新选绝对不会选他家,空间小可以理解但没有热水,临窗吵睡不好,位置还不好找打电话也说不清楚最后发名片边走边问有四十分钟才找到,小旅社毛巾掉毛,住俩天没看到房东
房间干净,位置靠近地铁很方便
还是很不错的 房间有一点点小 但该有的都有 还很贴心的按了不用转换器的插口 出门很近油麻地A1B1口 相当方便 晚回来也不怕 在博览馆看完演唱会 坐地铁半个多小时就回来了 超级方便
房東很好人,我都三個女生,給了我們兩間房間,挺幹凈的｡
房间相对小,三人房的话拖箱只可打开一个放置取物｡建议行李多看看她家别的房型｡或者使用背包｡
很干净,老板人很好,位置好
地理位置非常好,一出地铁站就到了,去到那里都可以,生活方面也很不错,在大厦A座入口哪里有一家面包房,面包很不错｡下次去还会入住这家的｡
房东很好客很有礼貌,房间干净整洁,要求不大比较满意~地理位置超好,就在油麻地地铁站出口旁边一点,往上走10分钟左右就是旺角东地铁站出口,购物方便快捷,夜景也很棒!就是冲凉房有点小,但在香港里性价比算很高了!以后还会优先选择,多谢房东的待客,感谢｡
香港寸土寸金,好小
哪里都好,唯一遗憾的是临时退改不可以｡w谢谢房东
房间整洁干净舒服,有热水供应,比预想中好很多 交通方便~去哪里都很方便 楼下安保很好,房东回复很快
房间很好,位置很方便,我是为了去亚博看演唱会订的,民宿离旺角站A1出口很近,晚上看完演唱会坐地铁回来也赶得及｡在楼下买东西吃东西也很方便,有机场直达巴士｡房间很整洁,有可以直接使用大陆插头的插座,空调电视机都有｡房间的走廊还有热水喝,晚上想用热水器洗澡的话记得提前15分钟打下开关｡整体来说很满意,下次再来香港的话也会订这里的｡
房东非常热心,服务周到,在香港这样的客房,性价比还是很高的｡
离旺角地铁站超级近,购物,吃饭都很方便,我住的房间临着弥敦道,所以晚上有点吵,房间小而整洁干净｡一楼有门卫,相对安全,电梯也方便｡
가격이저렴하고교통편도 편리하고 잘쉬다왔습니다

地理位置很方便 房间干净 房东也很好人

Good enough for that money

Very good airconditioner.  Smart locks for easy check in
住的真的很好  很舒服 什么都有  服务态度很好好亲近 下次会继续住
Host was very responsive to messages. Easy check in and check out. Location of the place was very good, very near MTR station.
good location, great host, suit for 3 person

name: CARNAVAL no Rio, Em Clima de Montanha, na Gávea!!
summary: Apartamento de 2 quartos, tipo casa, na Gávea. Aconchegante, iluminado e arejado, totalmente mobiliado e com roupas de cama e banho incluídas. Pode-se alugar apenas 1 quarto ou o apartamento inteiro. Ideal para 2 casais ou grupo de amigos. Ainda há a possibilidade de acomodar mais 2 pessoas na sala onde tem um sofá retrátil e um outro sofá com colchão ortopédico. (Valor de R$200,00 por noite  por cada hóspede)
space: O apartamento fica numa rua totalmente residencial, onde existe apenas um prédio. todos os demais imóveis são casas.  Super silencioso e recebe o Sol da manhã nas janelas dos quartos e sol da tarde, na sala. Possui área externa onde é possível tomar sol e banho de mangueira!

Pode-se alugar apenas 1 quarto ou o apartamento inteiro. Ideal para 2 casais ou grupo de amigos. Super silencioso e recebe o Sol da manhã nas janelas dos quartos e sol da tarde, na sala. Possui área externa onde é possível tomar sol e banho de mangueira! Fica bem próximo do Shopping da Gávea e tem uma padaria a 5 minutos a pé. Fácil de chegar pois tem ônibus bem na esquina. Fica a 5 minutos da PUC onde tem integração com o metrô. Tenho  tempo disponível pra interagir e orientar meus hóspedes no que for preciso em relação a cidade e ao apartamento. A Gávea fic
neighborhood_overview: A Gávea fica entre a Lagoa, o Jardim Botânico e o Leblon. Tem um comercio farto e compacto condensado em 2 quadras que concentram o Shopping da Gávea, mercados, restaurantes, Pizzarias e padarias.
notes: Embora seja proibido fumar dentro do apartamento, temos um pátio externo com sofás e bancos onde é permitido fumar além de ser bem agradável para ler e descansar!
transit: Para chegar de metrô basta descer na estação Antero de Quental e pagar o ônibus de integração até a PUC ou na estação Shopping da Gávea. As linhas de ônibus 112 e 538 passam na esquina da Rua Marques de São Vicente e ponto de ônibus mais próximo é o que fica em frente a PUC e a 5 minutos da casa. Uma caminhada bem agradável.
access: Fica bem próximo do Shopping da Gávea e tem uma padaria a 5 minutos a pé. Fácil de chegar pois tem ônibus bem na esquina. Fica a 5 minutos da PUC onde tem integração com o metrô.

I have a spare room in my apartment for rent. I work with film making production and sometimes I work from my home office. I have a flexible schedule so that I will love spending time with my guests and help them to know the city by bike, as I have a spare to lend, too!

Eu tenho um quarto vago no meu apartamento para alugar.  Eu trabalho com a produções cinematograficas e algumas vezes eu trabalho do meu escritório em casa. Eu tenho um horário flexível e vou adorar passar algum tempo com os meus hospedes e ajudá-los a conhecer a cidade de bicicleta. Ah! eu tenho um sobressalente para te emprestar, também!

reviews.comments: O espaço era exatamente como descrito. A Constância é uma pessoa super amigável e hospedeira perfeito. A localização é boa e bem tranquila.
Apto mara! Ótima localização e a hospitalidade incrível! Adorei!

Constância was a wonderful host. She received us wonderfully. We shared interesting conversations during our stay and showed us around a few times. it was always very appreciated. Her house is tidy and very cozy. It is very charming and well located. Muita obrigada!

name: ★BABU HOUSE★ Nova Suite Sleeps 4 ★Taksim★
summary: Located on the basement floor, this suite has a private entrance. The seating area comes with a 32” LCD TV and satellite channels. The open-plan kitchen is fully equipped with all cooking utensils, a stove, microwave and a toaster. A dining table is available. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The suite has a double bed and two sofa beds. Babu House is a self-serviced accommodation. Daily maid service is not provided. Units are accessible via stairway.
space: Babu House is a self-serviced accommodation located only 200 meters from Istiklal Avenue. Free WiFi access is available. With a light and modern decor, all suites feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning and a seating area. All units have a full kitchen with a stove, microwave and dining table. The private bathrooms are equipped with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. All suites feature a safety deposit box. Some units come with a balcony. Daily maid service is not provided. All units are accessible via stairway only. A shared laundry facility is available in the basement with washing machine, dryer, iron and ironing board.

host.host_about: Hi, my name is Madlen and I'm 28 years old. I was born and raised in Munich, Germany and later moved to New York for college. Later, when my family and I visited Istanbul for a short holiday, we realised the need for good quality but affordable holiday apartments. We offer several fully furnished holiday apartments in the heart of Istanbul.

name: Vocation House outside the city
summary: My place has a Scandinavian style duplex in clear way bay, where is surrounded by nature. This place has two floors plus one rooftop, four rooms with a shared kitchen, living room, one balcony.   If you are looking for a place to simply relax and enjoy the nature, my place is definitely your choice. You can easily access to Clear Water Bay Beach and hiking trails in Sai Kung area by minibus. It is easily accessed to the city in 20-30 minutes.

You can visit the neighbor hood, there are clear water bay beach and a fishing village nearby, you can spend one to two days exploring the surrounding.

host.host_about: We love traveling, we love meeting people, we love sharing ideas together. If you want to experience a real and local culture, come and join us for parties. We have an open kitchen and a large common area. The interior is newly renovated and designed by us.

name: HABITACIÓN DOBLE EN EL CENTRO MUY BIEN COMUNICADA
summary: La habitación es enorme, para dos personas o más. summary: Sie wohnen in einer alten Landhaus Villa in Alleinlage, in einem  mit viel Liebe zum Detail eingerichtetes  Motto Zimmer " Afrika".  Ein Doppelzimmer für 2 Personen mit TV im Zimmer. Es gibt verschiedene Gemeinschaftsbereiche, wie ein großes Wohn- Esszimmer, Billard Raum, Garten, verschiedene Terrassen, Pool Bereich. Das Anwesen liegt zwischen Pinienwäldern, Wiesen und Feldern. name: Architecturally designed studio
summary: This architecturally designed furnished studio apartment is east facing with ample natural light, open plan living, a well equipped kitchen including cooktop, oven and full size fridge/freezer, fan and reverse cycle air conditioning, wifi, TV and laundry facility including washing machine and trough and a small balcony. Moments from Danks St and Redfern St shops and restaurants. Sydney Cricket Ground, The Entertainment Quarter, Centennial Park and Randwick Racecourse all within a 3km radius.
space: This studio apartment is architecturally appointed with cleverly detailed spaces to feel light and spacious. The bathroom is located on the lower floor. It is newly built, a modern clean space with a very large shower, toilet and marble basin. There is a clothes washer and laundry sink also located in the bathroom.  The bathroom has towels, soap, shampoo, limited toiletries. It contains a clothes rack, iron and ironing board. The kitchen and sleeping is upstairs in a locked room above the garage. The kitchen has a beautiful cement bench top. There is a full size cook top and oven and a full size fridge. Coffee and selection of teas and breakfast spreads are supplied.
description: This architecturally designed furnished studio apartment is east facing with ample natural light, open plan living, a well equipped kitchen including cooktop, oven and full size fridge/freezer, fan and reverse cycle air conditioning, wifi, TV and laundry facility including washing machine and trough and a small balcony. Moments from Danks St and Redfern St shops and restaurants. Sydney Cricket Ground, The Entertainment Quarter, Centennial Park and Randwick Racecourse all within a 3km radius. This studio apartment is architecturally appointed with cleverly detailed spaces to feel light and spacious. The bathroom is located on the lower floor. It is newly built, a modern clean space with a very large shower, toilet and marble basin. There is a clothes washer and laundry sink also located in the bathroom.  The bathroom has towels, soap, shampoo, limited toiletries. It contains a clothes rack, iron and ironing board. The kitchen and sleeping is upstairs in a locked room above the garage. T
neighborhood_overview: Waterloo is a suburb on the fringe of Sydney City. it boarders Surry Hills, Redfern, Moore Park, Alexandria, Zetland and Rosebery. It is a mixture of luxury apartments, large terrace houses, light industrial and council housing. The housing is as eclectic as the people. It has a well know cafe strip Dank Street which has many lovely galleries, cafes, restaurants and bars.
transit: Arriving from the airport. It is similar if not cheaper to catch a taxi than the train for 2 people. It will be around $25-$30. Buses and trains require an Opal card available from newsagents etc. Best to look up on the internet. There is a bus 50m away on Elizabeth Street (route 343) that takes you into the city. This bus route stretches from Chatswood to Eastgardens. Redfern train station is a 10min 1km walk away. Central Railway station is a 15min 1.5km walk away.  There is NO onsite parking but the streets around the property are a mixture of timed and untimed parking. There is often parking available.
access: The studio is entered through the garage door. The garage is used by Kristin the owner of the main house so there is no parking available on the property. As the studio is above the garage there will be some noise in the room upstairs when the garage door is opened. You may cross paths with Kristin while accessing the studio and the bathroom which is located downstairs behind the parking space.
interaction: The studio is self contained and there is limited interaction between host and  guests. Arrangements, questions and any issues should be firstly directed to Nichola who is your main contact. If you are unable to contact Nichola then please ask Kristin.

reviews.comments:
This place was perfect for me while I was traveling solo in Sydney. It's close to buses, a bit of a walk to train stations, and close to a supermarket and lots of cafes.

It can be a little loud in the area - mainly birds and dogs which I'm not used to - and you can hear the garage door opening when the car is driven in and out, but it didn't bother me at all. 

Perfect little place for one person.
Beautiful space and great hospitality!
It's a great, stylish place, with quick access to the city and trendy local areas. We loved it and would recommend.
The place from Kristin was perfect for two people ! Everything was really clean and the design of the app was really nice !
Great stay!
Great space. Close to public transport to get into the CBD. Clean and tidy. Lots of privacy.

This was one of our favorite Airbnb experiences and after traveling for 7 months straight have stayed in A LOT. The interior is stunning, clean, and makes great use of a small space. We had everything we needed and then some to cook meals in as well. The bathroom was very clean and spacious and there is a washer which came in handy. Would stay again!
Absolutely loved this space. It’s in the perfect area and just a walk away from Surry Hills. Kristin was a great host!
Really nice little place, and Kristin was really friendly and helpful. I had a problem with the wifi and they got it fixed straight away. Good communication, too.

We had a great stay! The space is beautifully designed and considered. 

It was exceptionally clean and tidy. 

Well located for public transport and great food and drinking spots a stones throw away.

Thanks!
Second time I’ve stayed and again I was very happy with the place. Thank you!

The space is really luxurious and private and was the perfect location for my conference in Redfern. Didn’t meet my hosts but all communication leading up to my stay was great. The design and feel of the room and bathroom is top notch. Waterloo is a pretty lively locale and I didn’t always feel completely safe entering the property through the garage late at night. Only a minor bother. Thanks.
Kristin and Nichola’s place was such a lovely space. Thoughtfully designed, stylish and a great location. Communication was great. Would definitely stay again and would recommend to friends.

It was such a nice stay at Kristin’s. Stylish, clean, convenient and very hospitable.
Definitely recommend!
Very cute studio in a great location!
Visited Sydney for a work trip and this place was perfect. Easy to access late at night, a nice walk to public transport and had everything I needed. Will stay again
This is a great little apartment in a quiet back street, great wifi and amenities!
Great location, clean and comfy home, and all the amenities you need. Communication was easy and directions for the apartment were detailed and helpful. I would absolutely stay here again.
great, stylish little place to wake up in. quiet yet central location in Sydney. :)
A beatifully designed studio apartment, well connected for city. Great hosts.
Standard studio apartment, clean, good value.
Trendy spot, very clean and private. Walkable to cafes etc.
A nicely designed space, great shower.
The place is really nice. The bed is conformable. Everything was clean and tidy.
Nice and easy location.

We loved our stay at Kristin’s!
The location is amazing and we walked everywhere from the house.
The room is very comfortable and clean. Perfect for two people.
We would definitely stay again!
Lovely space, and great hosts.

A very simple yet stylish place. 

Easy check in and check out.
Amazing shower room. Excellent accommodation, and sparkling clean xx

Very cosy, beautifully designed place with extremely accommodating host (allowing me to extend my check in and out timings). Location is comparatively good, with accessible public transport to the city. However, I do recommend renting a car for leisure travel as there are ample free parking in the neighbourhood. Amenities were well stocked and good quality, bed was comfy with good ventilation (air-con and fan available). There were a few small insects seen during the stay as the room is built above a garage space. That said, it was neat and clean looking when we first arrived!
A great place, clean, stylish and convenient. The bird sound in the early morning may be a nuisance to somebody want to get up late.
Great location very comfortable studio apartment with a quality finish.
Lovely little studio!
Moments away from galleries cafes and numerous other points of interest.
Great place to be at if you want some place relaxing.
Very quick responses. Accommodation was tidy.
Great home with everything you could need!
Lovely guest pad that is separate from the main house which gives us privacy. The space is modern and beautiful as listed. We had a lovely and comfortable stay. Thank you!
Beautifully styled and furnished apartment, handily located near public transport with easy access into central Sydney. Kristin and Nichola are very helpful and made our stay memorable!
Lovely place in a great location :) The studio is modern, clean and practical... the perfect place between the beaches and the city!

This space is cozy and really well designed. Materials used were great so gave a really solid and homey feel to it. Amenities were great. The space was used really well so while it looked minimal when we first came in, all the stuff we needed was in the cupboards. Love this place.

We had a pleasant stay at Kristin's place which is easily accessible via public transport. The studio had a modern feel and the bed was very comfortable! Bathroom had plenty of amenities. Overall, we enjoyed our stay here and would recommend Kristin's place to other travellers!
What a Nice stay in Sydney ! Great place close to Sydney City. Near the bus and all facilities around. Stylish brand new bedroom and bathroom ! We recommand !
Awesome place, I stayed here twice during my trip - Lovely clean apartment :)
Great place!

Awesome stay! This little suite is perfect for two. Plenty of space to spread out and lots of amenities. Very clean, and hosts are super responsive and helpful. Found the walk over to Redfern quick and easy to the shops and restaurants and about a 12 min walk to the trains...bus was very efficient too. Love it!

We are a couple with a toddler and we stayed in this apartment for 3 weeks. It’s small but well designed with a great use of space, it was absolutely perfect for us. Comfy bed, very well equipped kitchen and great bathroom! There was also a portacot and highchair for us to use which was great. Lots of public transport options nearby. A perfect base in Sydney.
Stylish place, great stay!

The apartment is in a very central location, convenient from the airport, bus stop is right outside the apartment to get around the city. 
Very quiet. Amazing large bed and hotel quality sheets and towels. The apartment has absolutely everything you need. Great kitchen, AC, tips, easy check in. Highly recommend the apartment! Fast responses from the hosts! Excellent stay in overall!
Cozy studio, very bright apartment. Comfortable bed

name: Spacious new flat by HEC, UdeM & JGH. WiFi & Park.
summary: Spacious condo located across from the Jewish General Hospital and 8-minute walking distance from HEC and University of Montreal. All furniture is brand new, and the apartment is kept in pristine condition. Ideal for professionals and students looking for a spacious, clean place that is only 5-minutes walking distance from both the Orange and Blue metro lines. One block away from all restaurants and supermarkets on Cote-des-Neiges, this place is an ideal place to work, live, or study.
space: This condo is a one-bed-room apartment, but the living room was turned into another bedroom, which is completely isolated by a super nice oriental separator and an anti-light curtain.
