host.host_about:
Easy-going, laid-back guy. Fun to live with. Tons of roommate experience from everywhere in the world. Latin America, China, Korea. I love making friends and have language exchanges with my guests.

I love travelling! Amazing interactions with Chinese and Korean students! India changed my life. I'm a software engineer with a background in Math. What else? I practice Kung Fu... love animals. People. Pretty much everything. I dance salsa and can teach you!

reviews.comments: The apartment is big, modern and clean! Jesus was an excellent host and even left a guide book of Montreal and coffees to use in the Keurig.  It was super convenient for getting to the Jewish General Hospital. It was a lovely home away from home for 2 weeks.

Jesus's place was absolutely phenomenal to stay in; it's a nice and spacious apartment in a quiet building that isn't too far from downtown Montreal (i.e.: 20ish minute drive). 

He really thought of everything as he made the sofa bed for us, left some dishes and cutlery, and had everything you'd generally need for a stay. 

I'd definitely visit him again when I go back to Montreal - my friends and I had a great time.
Simple, comfortable and great location!
Jesus is a nice host. He always replies quickly and patiently. The place is clean and it is suitable for two or three people to stay there.
Everything was so beautiful, it was super clean, comfortable beds and very nice place.
Merci Jesus!
Great host, great location. Close to metro. Extremely clean apartment in a quaint neighbourhood.

O apartamento é espaçoso e estava limpo. Não conhecemos o anfitrião, mas auto check-in foi bem tranquilo. Jesus foi rápido na comunicação e prontamente nos atendeu, ao trazer os dois travesseiros que faltavam, já que estávamos em 3.
O apartamento estava limpo.
A decoração não correspondia às das fotos, mas nada que comprometa profundamente o conforto na estada.
Si buscan un departamento con buena ubicación y cómodo, este sin lugar a dudas lo tiene!

Très pro ! Bravo et merci pour la qualité de la prestation 
Djamel

Jesus's place was well suited for our needs. It provided us with a safe place to relax after our hectics days in Montreal, easy access to public transport, it was clean and best of all it had parking!
This apartment was located in a great area, it was quiet and safe. The apartment was clean and had the basic amenities. Parking was easy and on-site as mentioned in the listing.
Awesome location next to all highways if driving. Easy access to subway and awesome host

My dad and I had a great experience at Jesus's. It's in a great location, very convenient to public transportation. The apartment was clean and comfortable. Check-in was easy, and Jesus was very helpful and communicative. Highly recommend!
No thank you
Absolutely fantastic location. With two metro stations a few blocks away, the entire Montreal area is at your disposal.
Bon séjour. Bien placé. Parking+. Tel que décrit.

name: Le Bed & Cocktail: Discover Montreal like a local
summary: Le Bed & Cocktail is a hostel for travellers who want to discover Montreal like the locals, with the locals. From sound-proof ventilated pods to heated floors, we’ve created an intuitive space where guests can expect a good night’s sleep and where they can feel comfortable kicking off their shoes and hanging out during the day. Nesting above La Distillerie No.2, one of our 3 cocktail pubs in the city, Le Bed & Cocktail is located in a vibrant and trendy neighbourhood, the Plateau Mont-Royal.
space: We have twelve pods located in two rooms (one with 4 pods & one with 8 pods). Each pod has a night light, integrated ventilation, a curtain that allows you to close off your pod space completely, and storage for your luggage (lock not included). The pod is yours, the rest of the space is shared with other travellers and staff.   The shared space is an entirely renovated apartment with a communal kitchen, a lounge with board games, LEGOs and musical instruments, a computer and printer, 3 bathrooms, 3 showers, heated floors and a patio in the back. Here's a nice opportunity to live together with new friends visiting Montreal!
description: Le Bed & Cocktail is a hostel for travellers who want to discover Montreal like the locals, with the locals. From sound-proof ventilated pods to heated floors, we’ve created an intuitive space where guests can expect a good night’s sleep and where they can feel comfortable kicking off their shoes and hanging out during the day. Nesting above La Distillerie No.2, one of our 3 cocktail pubs in the city, Le Bed & Cocktail is located in a vibrant and trendy neighbourhood, the Plateau Mont-Royal. We have twelve pods located in two rooms (one with 4 pods & one with 8 pods). Each pod has a night light, integrated ventilation, a curtain that allows you to close off your pod space completely, and storage for your luggage (lock not included). The pod is yours, the rest of the space is shared with other travellers and staff.   The shared space is an entirely renovated apartment with a communal kitchen, a lounge with board games, LEGOs and musical instruments, a computer and printer, 3 bathrooms,
neighborhood_overview: The Plateau Mont-Royal is a residential neighborhood filled with quaint cafés, bars, restaurants and specialty boutiques of every type; everything you need is a short walk away.
notes: If you're a light sleeper, this isn't the ideal place for you! We're located above a bar that closes at 3:00 a.m. Although we've insulated the walls and pods, noise could be bothersome.
transit: With 2 bus lines passing in front of the hostel and Mont-Royal metro station about a 12-minute walk away, it’s easy to get around town. You can also rent a bicycle to explore the city on 2 wheels! There are 4 BIXI stations less than 2 blocks from Le Bed & Cocktail.
access: Guests can access the hostel 24 hours a day with a code. You'll also have access to WIFI, items for breakfast and snacks, and longboards.  Furthermore, La Distillerie No.2, located on the ground floor, is open 7 days a week from 4:00 p.m. to 3:00 a.m. Inside the bar, we have a Snack Bar to satisfy your food cravings.
interaction: The space was designed to encourage sharing and interacting. Someone will be available at all times, either in person or by phone.
house_rules: The space is suitable for a maximum of 12 people. It is possible to book the entire hostel by purchasing all 12 pods, but no extra guests are allowed.

host.host_about:
Si tu es ouvert d'esprit, social, et que tu cherches à découvrir Montréal comme les locaux, avec les locaux, Le Bed & Cocktail est un chez-toi à l'étranger créé par l'équipe de La Distillerie à Montréal, Québec. Avec 3 bars à cocktails à son nom dans la ville, La Distillerie met davantage l'hospitalité de l'avant avec une auberge sociale ouverte à des invités venant de partout. Niché au-dessus de notre deuxième succursale dans un quartier vibrant, le Plateau Mont-Royal, Le Bed & Cocktail accueille ses invités dans une communauté décontractée où ils peuvent partager et connecter dans un espace soigneusement conçue et tenue par un gars pas mal cool qui s'appelle Dave.
​
#livetogether

reviews.comments: One of the best hostels I've been to - hands down. The location is perfect for Montreal's nightlife, the kitchen, bathroom and decor are amazing. Highly recommended!
Super endroit, bien aménagé et excellent service!!!

This place is ideal for sociable and introverted folks alike- the space is definitely communal-centric but there is also a nice outdoor porch in the back and people are sweet. It is a lively space during the nighttime as it is over a bar but I slept like a babe no prob. The bar downstairs doesn't have a much of a beer selection but they more known for their cocktails and mixed drinks (very good, btw!). Definitely a place I'll go next time I'm in Montreal.
Worth every penny. A very modern space with plenty to do inside and out of the hostel. Great for big groups of friends!
Awesome place!!

Le logement est tout simplement magnifique et les hôtes sont très agréable. Tous est tres bien organisé, propore avec tout ce dont on a besoin. Le petit plus, La Distillerie juste en dessous est super avec de bons cocktails.
Je recommande vraiment !
This is a very nice set-up.  A lot of thought went into it.  The common area, kitchen and Lounge is excellent.  Very organized.

Ce que vous voyez sur le site Internet est exactement comment vous trouverez l’espace sur place.  Définitivement un bon rapport qualité-prix, très propre, décor et touches personnelles formidables, parfait pour de petits groupes!  Demandez les instructions pour le stationnement d’avance et s’il y a des événements dans les environs qui bloquent la rue.  Ceci vous évitera une perte de temps lors de votre arrivée.

Gorgeous space, very clean, great amenities, and responsive hosts with lots of recommendations for fun in the city.  Great location.  They seem to have thought of every detail when designing this hostel.  Beds have privacy curtains, individual lights and fans, and mattresses are fairly comfortable.  However, this is NOT FOR LIGHT SLEEPERS! (You know who you are.)  The bar below plays loud music every night until 4 a.m.  Though the space is well insulated, nothing can block out the thumping bass (including earplugs or noise canceling headphones, which is usually adequate for me in most hostels.) The hosts are thoughtful and offered to talk to the bartenders about the noise but it still kept me up every night.  They did also offer to refund my money for my remaining night’s stay if I preferred to find a hotel due to the noise, but we ended up staying as we couldn’t find an affordable alternative.   I would recommend this place so long as you are not a light sleeper (my friend slept fine though says she’s a very heavy sleeper),  but I will probably not stay here again for that reason.  It was otherwise an enjoyable stay.  It’s a beautiful space and most folks will probably sleep fine.

Brilliant little hostel with a sense of perfection and cleanliness, all equipped, the best of its price category I've ever stayed in. The bed boxes are superb. The Distillerie cocktail bar under will welcome you with a drink, we had a great night down there, bery lively.
Ce logement est vraiment à recommander! La propreté, la décoration et la finition sont parfaites. Assurément un des meilleurs logements que j’ai loué pour un week-end à l’extérieur!

The standards for hostels have been set on another level! Amazing interior with lots of well-thought details (lights, music speakers, music instruments, kitchen furniture,...). Super clean, easiest check-in possible, great tips for food and drink... Would definitely recommend without a doubt!
This is THE place to stay in Montreal. Great hosts, great accommodations.
Best place to stay in Montréal, period :)
I was super impressed by the accommodations. Everything is sparkling new and clean. Great location. I had no trouble sleeping in the pod, except there were no windows and I overslept a little.

One of the best options for any traveler. beautiful place with many amenities. my only complaint is that it's 25 minutes walk to the station and the sidewalks in Montreal are awful. put on a good pair of boots and it'll be fine.

Sejour d’une semaine et demi au Bed and coktail. Endroit super ! Deco vraiment top qui conviendra tout le monde, tout les espaces sont propres et très fonctionnels , quelques attention et choses bien pensé niveau équipements et bien être, mais je vous laisse découvrir par vous-même. Le quartier est vivant. Bref top adresse.
Je recommande +++

name: The Contemporain 1BR near Concordia!
summary: These contemporary apartments are as lavish and comfortable as they are practical and convenient for urban living.  The location is super convenient, being close to everything you will need including educational institutions, restaurants, shops, and much more. The amenities shall be available as follows: - Pool: End 2017 - Beginning 2018 - Fitness: End 2017 - Beginning 2018 Parking upon availability.
description: These contemporary apartments are as lavish and comfortable as they are practical and convenient for urban living. host.host_about:
Greetings to this wonderful Airbnb community! :)

I have been blessed to travel all around the world and experience many cultures! This has allowed me to understand much better travelers and I my passion is to take a good care of your accommodation!

Speak English, French and Spanish! :D
We would be pleased to host you when you come to Montreal for business, relocation or leisure! 

Thank you for checking our apartments and we hope to have you soon!

Alejandro.

name: Feel at home
summary: My house is my home. Can be yours for a time. It has two confortable bedrooms and a very nice dinning room. The living room has the best, confortable sofa and puffs.  Cable TV in beedroom and living room. Neighborhod nice. Well located. bus and metro

There is also a wide variety of restaurants and bars , which makes it very popular among tourists, young people and artists. Next to the house, the guest will find many types of trade such as bakery, stores, supermarkets, pharmacies , many differents banks, and more.  Apartament with a great location, taxi points. name: Prime location: abundant stores & transportation!
summary: People find Brooklyn to be vibrant and peaceful, exciting and family oriented. This house provides you with lots of natural light. Provided with ample space for your family to enjoy. You are in walking distance to the shopping center. As a result, transportation and stores are in abundance. During rush hour the neighborhood is vivacious, full of life and energy a stark contrast at night.  However there still is potential for some noise because it's New York afterall.
space: One day prior to your arrivial, I'll give you additional information about the property. I have compiled data on most asked questions and provided information in advance. Code for the door will only be provided once you or your party is phsysically at the property. If you are coming from overseas I'll provide you access code to the wifi in advance. Sorry for in the inconvenience. However this is for security reasons. This place is 6 blocks away from Brooklyn college (0.6 miles). It is 5 blocks away from Flatbush Junction (0.4 miles). Also at the junction there is a shopping center with a parking garage. This area has 7 bus lines that go to various parts of brooklyn. One of those buses is the B41 this bus route will get you to the famous Kings theatre (1.4 miles),  Barkley Center (4.0 miles), Atlantic Center Mall (4.0 miles) , Downtown brooklyn (4.9 miles), Juniors Cheesecake (4.9 miles) and etc. The trains 2 and 5 will get you to most of those places in a fraction of the time. neighborhood_overview: It's a tree lined, quiet residential block. The house is spacious. There is a plethora of stores, and most of them are within walking distance. Great thing is that you also have access to public transportion. Its' less than 30 minutes to the city while either driving or using the train.
notes: The target stays open until 11:45 pm. Near the target there are 24 hour stores: Subway, Dunkin dounuts, 7 eleven and RiteAid. The train and bus system works 24 hours and you can download a schedule that gives you live updates. Also if you need to send packages, there is a Fed Ex and UPS store near the Flatbush Junction.
transit: Flatbush Junction is 5 blocks away. This is home to a very extensive bus system: B 6, B 11, B 41, B 44, B 44 Select bus, Q35, and B103. Trains: 2,5. For those who are driving, one parking spot available upon request (the city is best seen at night, you don't have to dread looking for a spot when you come back).
access: The guest has access to the house except the basement, backyard and the attic.
interaction: I am always available and will answer my guest promptly.

Any damage or losses caused during the Rental Period, as well as any special cleaning requirements will be the Guest's responsibility! 2. No smoking of any type in the property. Only outside! 3. No parties or events on the property. If this is not adhered to automatic expulsion from the property. The Owner or Owner's Representative will require the Guest and their party, including visitors to vacate the Property immediately, without compensation or refund! 4. host.host_about: I love to go to theatre, movies, restaurants, travel and etc. I love the 80s music.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Shirley was a wonderful host and made me feel right at home!  Her home is right next to public transportation and very accessible to Manhattan.  I would definitely return!

Shirley is delightful, very responsive , and easy to communicate with.  The place has been renovated with care and is very clean.  The kitchen is GREAT! The bedrooms were nice and comfortable , but if you have a problem sleeping on a foam mattress, it is good to know that only one bedroom does not have a foam mattress.  The shower was wonderful.  convenient, safe neighbor hood, parking in driveway.  Highly recommend!

Shirley’s place was perfect. Check in & check out process was smooth, the location is great with everything within walking distance (close to a bunch of shops and food selections), the beds were comfortable, the kitchen was well equipped with cutlery, pots and pans, clean linen and soap were also provided, lastly the space was great and comfortably fit 5 people. Shirley was nice enough to extend our check out time since we had a very late flight. Our previous trip we stayed in a hotel closer to the city, however, we preferred Shirley’s apt much better. I recommend staying at Shirley’s apt no doubt.

This was an amazing house in a great neighbourhood. We had easy access to the subway system and lots to keeps us busy in Brooklyn. Our only complaint is that we didn't have enough time. I highly reccomend this spot.
Great host, lovely spot.

Shirley's place was clean, warm, and inviting,  Beds were comfy, the towels were big and soft, the sheets smelled great, and the huge shower head was awesome.  Being able to pull our car into the driveway without any worries about parking was a great plus. 
Shirley clearly cares about the quality of her her guest's stay and is so honest in how she describes the home.  Sure there is the possibility of some street noise in the front bedroom but we were there on a Saturday night and did not find it a problem at all.     She was a total pleasure to work with and we would return for sure.
Great house to rent for a family with a car: it is cosy and big enough to 5 Pers. Furthermore, beds are great and communication with Shirley was great. I recommend it!

Spacious 
Spotless clean 
Close to everything 
Quick response 
Comfy home feel 
Would definitely not pass up on this gem

Super maison, nous avons été surpris par la grandeur des pièces. La propreté est impeccable et il y a tout ce qu'il faut. Nous avons une semaine chez Shirley et nous étions content de retrouver le confort de la maison et des lits après des heures de marches dans New York. Shirley est une hôtesse accueillante, disponible et très arrangente. N'hésitez pas, super rapport qualité prix. Encore merci Shirley! la bonne demi heure pour rejoindre Manhattan  n'a pas du tout était un problème, c'était même bien de quitter pour la nuit l'agitation de big apple.

My family and I really enjoyed staying here! The place was very clean and spacious and plenty of room for my family of 5. The beds were comfortable and Shirley was quick to respond if there was anything we needed!

Shirley is a really nice women that helped us with everything we needed. The house was very clean and spacious. The subway is literally a 10 mins and the house is all around grocery stores. The are is nice and quiet at night.
We've been really confortable during our days here in Brooklyn.
Excellent experience.
Beautiful place and excellent location. Close to subway and bus lines. Would definitely stay here again.

My family and I had an outstanding time staying here with it being our first time in NY. Everything was just as pictured if not even better. Our stay was perfect and without a doubt look forward to booking with Shirley again. Definitely recommend it.
Shirley was a great host to also go with a great house everything was great and spacious and most importantly the house was clean. I will definitely be back again PS the shower head was great lol

The house is exactly as pictured, absolutely beautiful! Everything is brand spanking new. We were a little worried as the description said there was no AC and we were going on quite possibly the hottest weekend of the summer. However, we were surprised to find 2 brand new ACs in both of the larger bedrooms which we were extremely grateful for! Shirley was also kind enough to supply us with 2 small cases of water. The house was above our expectations and I would highly recommend staying with Shirley!
Place was very clean, she was very helpful our whole time during the day. Made it a great place to stay, would go again!

This house was amazing , just as the pictures ! 
1. The kitchen , rooms and bathroom were super clean.
2. Kitchen : has all the appliances and the oven , refrigerator and microwave are brand new.
3. Bedrooms : just as the pictures, beds are very comfortable, 2 of the have AC that works perfectly. All 3 of the bedrooms have closets.
4. Transportation : the subway is really  near. the trip to manhattan is about 40 minutes, but since it’s the last station on the line, we would alway be sitted for the entire trip 
5. Host: Shirley was amazing, always responded rapidly , was very nice , and helped us with the check in and check out times.
Everything was as described and Shirley communicated very well. Our group had a great time.
very kind and helpfull host. very good house in a perfect location to see this great city

A lovely house in a lively neighbourhood. Shops, restaurants and subway is very close. The host is a great woman who does the best for her guest (when we were locked out she rescued us even when it was 11 pm!)

A very nice old house recently renovated with all modern fixtures and appliances. Everything is provided, the property is clearly dedicated to being an Air BnB: fully equipped kitchen, comfy beds, multiple bathrooms, keypad entry. My wife and I stayed with her parents and brother while checking out the city, it was a good size for our party of 5. A short walk to Flatbush ave subway station, from there about an hour to midtown. Bodegas and shops within 3 minutes walk. 
If you are a light sleeper, be warned that the house in a block away from the police station, lots of sirens day and night. It didn’t bother us much but you should know.
Shirley was great to work with. Her house is very stylish and comfortable, and she provided with us New York newbies with some much needed advice on where to go and what to do.

shirley's place was very clean and organized. very spacious for 5 people. location is a bit far from Manhattan, about an hour by public transportation. but train station is within walking distance, so it wasn't bad. overall, I would recommend this place.
Really nice place! Would definitely stay again!

Great place to stay in NYC outside of Manhattan but still close enough to travel to every day. The subway is about 10 min away, as well as various shops.
 Very nice house to relax in after a long sightseeing day
This property is a cut above the rest - centrally located, good transport links, value for money and excellent host.

Shirley is a very kind New York lady.  She was extremely reponsive when we had a question. her house is ideal, up to 5 persons (when there are two couples). very new, complete renovated and very well equiped to cook your own meal etc. it's a 6 minutes walk to the nearest Subway station. the subway took more time then expected to reach the heart of the city (about 45 minutes). that was the only drawback. 
ideal for those who appreciate a normal house after the rush of Manhattan...
Great stay!

Awesome place to stay. Close to amenities. Immaculate place to stay with a lot of space and room. 

Good extra touches such as scented sticks, extra bedding, towels and coffee 

Will be back!
This place was in a great location.

Fui sola con tres niñas pequeñas y después de un viaje largo solo deseaba una entrada rápida, y así fue. La llegada independiente y muy fácil. La casa estaba impecable, con todo lo que puedas necesitar de aseo. Las habitaciones amplias y las camas y almohadas muy cómodas. Es cierto que no está cerca de Manhattan, pero también es cierto que la estación de metro está justo al lado y en 40 minutos estas en el centro de la ciudad. El alojamiento está en un barrio donde hay montones de tiendas y también restaurantes pero al mismo tiempo es muy tranquilo. 
Shirley es la anfitriona perfecta: discreta, amable, y disponible en cualquier momento. Su respuesta ha sido inmediata. Tuvimos una incidencia con la calefacción y en menos de 15 minutos lo había solucionado. Nos ha dado información acerca de la zona, y el penúltimo día tuvo la amabilidad de acercarnos a la ciudad y de camino nos hizo un Tour y contestó a todas nuestras curiosidades acerca de NY. 100% recomendable!!

Shirley's apartment is spacious and clean, with great amenities, a full kitchen and grocery stores and a Target within walking distance. Which is super convenient! 

The neighborhood can be a little noisy, and it was new to us but we were able to get around walking, by train or Lyft/Uber. 

Shirley is a fantastic host who welcomed us and even offered to change our linens partway through our stay!

Shirley’s place was the perfect spot after a long day touring around in Manhattan. We had lots of space and each of us had our own rooms. It was nice to be able to make breakfast in the morning and relax in the evenings. We were often out in Manhattan for most of the days, so we were never able to meet Shirley in person, but she was very quick with messages and everything was  effortless when we were there. Thanks Shirley for being a great host and for making sure we had everything that we needed!:)
Huge space. One of the beds is a little twin and the room it's in is very small too. Clean.

name: Lovely studio Copacabana next to beach and subway
summary: *** For bookings during Carnaval (March 1st to March 7th), there is a special price, please, don't make an instant booking, write a message first*** Our studio comfortably fits four guests. It`s located ate the central part of the best area of the city, the South Zone. Near from the beach and other interesting points of Rio, with stores, banks, restaurants and bars just a few steps away.
space: The apartment is completely furnished, which includes: - Double bed and a sofa bed (bed linen and towels included); - A/C and fan; - Cable TV and wi-fi; - Clothes rack; - Complete kitchen (stove, fridge, water filter, microwave, coffee machine, sanduich grill, blender, pans and utensils);
